original: Anschluss
translation: 德奥合并

original: Repeated uprisings in Austria clearly show that the people there long to be united with our Reich. It is now time to take action and allow the will of the people to be made manifest.
translation: 奥地利不断发生的起义充分证明了人民们想要加入我们帝国的家庭。现在是时候行动起来实现人民的愿望了。

original: How can anyone say that Austria is not German?!
translation: 谁敢说奥地利不是德意志一员？！

original: Anti-Comintern Pact
translation: 反共产国际协定

original: Germany proposes that we sign a pact to address the Comintern’s goal of spreading Communism worldwide, through the use of subversion and violence. By signing this pact, we agree to share intelligence on the Communist threat and act in close cooperation against this menace.
translation: 德国提议我们签署一个协议，以此来应对共产国际向全世界传播共产主义的企图，因为这通常伴随着颠覆国家政权和暴力手段。签署这个协议后，我们就可以共同分享有关共产主义运动的请报，携起手来共同应对威胁。

original: Join
translation: 加入

original: Refuse
translation: 拒绝

original: The Tripartite Pact
translation: 三国同盟条约

original: The signees consider it as the condition precedent of any lasting peace that all nations in the world be given each its own proper place, have decided to stand by and co-operate with one another in their efforts in Greater East Asia and the regions of Europe respectively wherein it is their prime purpose to establish and maintain a new order of things, calculated to promote the mutual prosperity and welfare of the peoples concerned.
translation: 缔约国认为永久和平的先决条件是每个国家都应该有符合自身的合理地位，在此基础上决定彼此支援合作在大东亚地区和欧洲地区建立和维持各自的新秩序，计划为共同的繁荣做出努力并为当地人民带来美好生活。

original: Join
translation: 加入

original: Refuse
translation: 拒绝

original: The Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact
translation: 莫洛托夫-宾特洛甫条约

original: The German Foreign Ministry have proposed a non-aggression pact between our two nations. This treaty will greatly increase our mutual trade, and an additional secret protocol suggests the division of Eastern Europe into German and Soviet spheres.\n\nWhile the fascists in Berlin may not be trustworthy, this pact will allow us to deal with Finland, the Baltic States and Romania without fear of outside interference. The eastern territories of Poland will also befall us in the event of a Polish collapse.
translation: 德国外交部提议了一个两国间的互不侵犯条约。该条约将会极大地促进我们彼此的贸易交流，并且在秘密附加条款内提出东欧应该被德国和苏联瓜分统治。\n\n虽然柏林的法西斯分子不值得信任，不过这个条约的达成将会让我们可以在没有外部势力干扰的情况下对付芬兰，波罗的海三国以及罗马尼亚。如果波兰瓦解的话波兰东部地区这块馅饼也将会落在我们头上。

original: Sign the treaty.
translation: 签署协议。

original: §RWhile the pact is in effect, the Closed Economy trade policy will be unavailable.\nThe War With Germany focus will be unavailable for two years.§!\n
translation: §R条约有效期内，封闭经济的贸易政策将无法使用。\n对德战争的策略也将在两年内无法使用。§!\n

original: No deals with the fascists!
translation: 不和法西斯分子谈判!

original: Moscow Signs the Pact
translation: 莫斯科签字了

original: The Soviet Union has wisely agreed to sign our non-aggression pact. This means that we are free to act without risk of Soviet intervention.\n\nUnfortunately, some of our friends now question Germany's commitment towards the ultimate destruction of communism. When matters with Poland and France have been settled, we may need to revisit this treaty, but that is a discussion for another time...
translation: 苏联明智的决定签署我们的互不侵犯条约。这意味着我们的行动将不会受到苏联的干预。\n\n不幸的是，有些我们的朋友质疑德国对彻底消灭共产主义的决心。当我们处理完波兰和法国以后，我们可能需要重新衡量一下这个条约，不过这件事我们还是留到以后再谈吧……

original: Excellent.
translation: 棒极了。

original: Moscow Rejects the Pact
translation: 莫斯科拒绝签字

original: The Soviet Union has refused to sign our non-aggression pact! This complicates matters, since we cannot deal decisively with Poland or France without the risk of the Bolsheviks getting themselves involved.
translation: 苏联拒绝签署我们的互不侵犯条约! 这让事情变得复杂了，因为我们无法在布尔什维克不请自来的干预风险下彻底解决波兰和法国。

original: Curse them!
translation: 诅咒他们!

original: The Partitioning of Poland
translation: 瓜分波兰

original: Poland is ours, but the eastern parts fall under the Soviet sphere of influence according to the stipulations of the Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact. Should we withdraw our forces and let the Soviets occupy this territory? Failure to do so would render our treaty void.
translation: 波兰是我们的，不过东部地区按照莫洛托夫-宾特洛甫条约的条款属于苏联的管辖范围。我们应不应该撤走我们的部队让苏联人占领这个地区？如果我们不撤出的话整个条约将会失效。

original: Yes. Treaty stipulations must be obeyed.
translation: 是的，条约的条文必须被遵守。

original: No! All of Poland belongs to the Vaterland!
translation: 不! 整个波兰都是祖国父亲的!

original: Germany Honors the Pact
translation: 德国遵守协议

original: In accordance with the Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact, German forces have evacuated eastern Poland and our own troops have moved in to occupy the territory.
translation: 遵照莫洛托夫-宾特洛甫条约，德国部队已经撤离波兰东部而我们的部队也已经进入并占领该了地区。

original: Germany Betrays the Pact
translation: 德国背叛协议

original: Germany has refused to partition Poland with us, in a blatant violation of the Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact! This betrayal has rendered our treaty with them null and void!
translation: 德国拒绝与我们分割波兰，这是对莫洛托夫-宾特洛甫条约公然的违约! 如此的背叛令我们与他们的条约宣告失效!

original: We were fools to trust the fascists!
translation: 我们信任法西斯分子简直蠢透了!

original: Second Vienna Award
translation: 第二次维也纳仲裁裁决

original: Recognizing that a new order has been established in Europe, we have been asked by Hungary and Romania to arbitrate in a territorial dispute between the two countries. Transylvania was taken from Hungary and incorporated into Romania in one of the many ill-conceived changes forced upon the world at Versailles. Should Northern Transylvania be returned to Hungarian control?
translation: 欧洲已经对新秩序认可了，我们被匈牙利和罗马尼亚邀请来仲裁两国间的领土争端。匈牙利的特兰西瓦尼亚被夺走兼并入了罗马尼亚，只是凡尔赛条约中许多构想拙劣并最后强加给世界的改变中的一个。南部特兰西瓦尼亚是不是应该归还给匈牙利？

original: Give Hungary Northern Transylvania.
translation: 给匈牙利特兰西瓦尼亚北部。

original: Give Hungary all of Transylvania.
translation: 整个特兰西瓦尼亚都是匈牙利的。

original: Transylvania shall remain in Romania.
translation: 特兰西瓦尼亚应该留在罗马尼亚里。

original: Romania Rejects Our Verdict
translation: 罗马尼亚拒绝了我们的裁定

original: Romania has refused to abide by the decision we reached in the Second Vienna Award! Their delegation has been recalled to Bucharest, and no territory has been surrendered to Hungary.
translation: 罗马尼亚拒绝遵守我们在第二次维也纳仲裁裁决中的决定! 他们的代表团被召回了布加勒斯特，没有任何领土割让给匈牙利。

original: The will of Germany must be obeyed!
translation: 德意志的意志必须被遵守!

original: Memel - Lithuania Folds
translation: 梅梅尔 - 立陶宛人认输了

original: The Lithuanian government has agreed to our demands, and Memel will be incorporated back into East Prussia. Yet another unlawfully stolen province has been returned to the German nation!
translation: 立陶宛政府接受了我们的要求，梅梅尔将会被合并回东普鲁。又一个被不正当偷走的省份回到了德国的怀抱!

original: Excellent.
translation: 好极了。

original: Memel - Lithuania Refuses Demand
translation: 梅梅尔 - 立陶宛人拒绝了我们的要求

original: The Lithuanian government has refused our demands! They are hiding behind the Klaipeda Convention, claiming that Germany has no legal right to the Memel territory. We shall have to explain our position to them by different means...
translation: 立陶宛政府拒绝了我们的要求! 他们躲在克莱佩达协议后面，声称德国对梅梅尔地区没有合法权利。我们将会用不一样的方式解释给他们听我们对此事的看法……

original: Stubborn fools.
translation: 顽固的蠢货。

original: German Military Mission to China
translation: 德国驻华军事代表团

original: Germany has enjoyed good relations with China since the end of the previous Weltkrieg, despite the loss of our Chinese possessions. A German military mission has been present in China for a number of years, and Alexander von Falkenhausen has made great progress in reforming parts of the Kuomintang army.\n\nThis is naturally of some concern to the Japanese, given their present war against China. They are demanding the immediate withdrawal of all German support to the Chinese.
translation: 德国一直对同中国自上次世界大战至今保持的良好关系感到满意，虽然我们当年失去了我们在中国地区利益。一个德国军事顾问团驻华已有很多年，亚力山大·冯·法肯豪森也在重整部分国民党军队的工作中取得了很大成就。\n\n这自然让日本感到担忧，他们正在于中国处在战争状态。他们要求德国立刻撤出所有的德国对华援助。

original: Recall von Falkenhausen.
translation: 召回冯·法肯豪森。

original: No, our advisors will stay.
translation: 不，我们的顾问不会走。

original: No, our advisors will stay, just as we have promised the Chinese.
translation: 不，根据承诺我们的顾问会继续留在中国。

original: Military Advisors Recalled
translation: 召回军事顾问

original: Deteriorating relations with China has made it politically unfeasible to maintain a military mission in their country. Alexander von Falkenhausen and the rest of our advisors have been recalled.
translation: 恶化的对华关系意味着驻华军事顾问团已经在政治上不切实际了。亚力山大·冯·法肯豪森连同我们其他的顾问已经被召回。

original: We shall put him to work.
translation: 我们会让他回到工作岗位里。

original: China Detains Military Advisors
translation: 中国扣押了我们的军事顾问

original: Germany and China are in a state of war, and the Chinese have consequently detained the German military advisors that were reforming their army. Von Falkenhausen and a few of his officers managed to elude capture, and are now on their way back to Europe.
translation: 德国与中国处于战争状态，因此中国扣押了正在整训中国军队的德国军事顾问们。亚力山大·冯·法肯豪森与他的少数军官逃离了，现在在回欧洲的路上。

original: Good man!
translation: 干得漂亮!

original: Fortifying the Westwall
translation: 要塞化西墙

original: Army pioneers have finished their survey of our existing fortifications, and identified the locations where they should be strengthened. The necessary construction orders have been placed.
translation: 陆军工兵们已经完成了对我们现有防御工事的勘测，并找出了需要加强的地点。其所必要的建筑工作的指令已经被下达。

original: This will hold better than the Siegfried Line.
translation: 这个防御体系将比齐格菲防线更好。

original: Germans press for Anschluss
translation: 德国要求德奥合并

original: Civil unrest and acts of violence have broken out as protesters voice their desire for Austria to join Germany in a union of German peoples. Berlin is pressing hard for an Anschluss, which would see Austria annexed into their nation.
translation: 抗议者喊出希望奥地利加入德国，德意志人民大联合的口号，抗议也伴随国内动乱和暴力行动的出现。柏林强烈要求德奥合并，让奥地利被德国兼并。

original: We shall join the German Reich!
translation: 我们将加入德意志帝国!

original: No, Austria's destiny lies elsewhere.
translation: 不，奥地利的命运指向别的地方。

original: Austria refuses the Anschluss!
translation: 奥地利拒绝德奥合并!

original: The fools in Vienna have refused to accept the merger of our two nations! This is a blatant disregard for the will of the Austrian people, and it will not stand! We may have to enforce the Anschluss through military means.
translation: 维也纳的蠢货们拒绝接受我们两国的合并! 这个公开违背奥地利民意的做法将不会长久! 我们也许不得不通过军事手段完成德奥合并。

original: We must prepare for a military intervention.
translation: 我们必须开始准备军事干预。

original: The Munich Conference
translation: 慕尼黑会议

original: German demands for the Sudetenland region of Czechoslovakia, where a significant number of ethnic Germans live, have come to a head. Hitler has positioned forces along the Czechoslovakian border in preparation for an attack. Talks are being held in Munich between Britain, France, Italy and Germany in the hopes of negotiating a peaceful end to the Sudeten Crisis. What will the British position be?
translation: 德国关于要求居住了大量的德意志族人的捷克斯洛伐克的苏台德地区的主张，已经到了非解决不可的地步。希特勒已经在捷克斯洛伐克边境线上部署了军事力量准备攻击。参与慕尼黑对话的大英帝国，法国，意大利和德国希望达成一个和平解决苏台德危机的方法。大英帝国的立场是什么？

original: German demands for the Sudetenland region of Czechoslovakia, where a significant number of ethnic Germans live, have come to a head. Hitler has positioned forces along the Czechoslovakian border in preparation for an attack. As we have already proven that we won't accept German expansionism, this means we now have another ally in the war against Germany.
translation: 德国关于要求居住了大量的德意志族人的捷克斯洛伐克的苏台德地区的主张，已经到了非解决不可的地步。希特勒已经在捷克斯洛伐克边境线上部署了军事力量准备攻击。正如我们曾经证明的，我们坚决反对德国扩张主义，这意味着我们又得到一个对德战争中的盟友。

original: The Czechs are on their own.
translation: 捷克人自生自灭吧。

original: Czechoslovakia must be defended!
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克必须被保卫!

original: German demands for the Sudetenland region of Czechoslovakia, where a significant number of ethnic Germans live, have come to a head. Hitler has positioned forces along the Czechoslovakian border in preparation for an attack. Talks are being held in Munich between Britain, France, Italy and Germany in the hopes of negotiating a peaceful end to the Sudeten Crisis.\n\nThe British have made it clear that they have no intention of going to war over a 'quarrel in a far-away country.' Should we follow their lead, or will we honor our obligations to Czechoslovakia by offering them support?
translation: 德国关于要求居住了大量的德意志族人的捷克斯洛伐克的苏台德地区的主张，已经到了非解决不可的地步。希特勒已经在捷克斯洛伐克边境线上部署了军事力量准备攻击。参与慕尼黑对话的大英帝国，法国，意大利和德国希望达成一个和平解决苏台德危机的方法。\n\n大英帝国表明他们不会为了一场在遥远国家发生的争论而步入战争。我们应该听取他们的意见，还是实践我们对捷克斯洛伐克的诺言给他们我们的支持？

original: Leave the Czechs to their fate.
translation: 捷克人自生自灭吧。

original: The British be damned! France supports her friends!
translation: 可恶的英国佬! 法国支持法国的朋友!

original: German demands for the Sudetenland region of Czechoslovakia, where a significant number of ethnic Germans live, have come to a head. Hitler has positioned forces along the Czechoslovakian border in preparation for an attack. Talks are being held in Munich between Britain, France, Italy and Germany in the hopes of negotiating a peaceful end to the Sudeten Crisis.\n\nThe British have refused to back down, and are instead threatening the Germans with war if they violate Czechoslovakia's borders. War may be imminent.
translation: 德国关于要求居住了大量的德意志族人的捷克斯洛伐克的苏台德地区的主张，已经到了非解决不可的地步。希特勒已经在捷克斯洛伐克边境线上部署了军事力量准备攻击。参与慕尼黑对话的大英帝国，法国，意大利和德国希望达成一个和平解决苏台德危机的方法。\n\n大英帝国拒绝退步，并且威胁德国战争如果德国侵犯捷克斯洛伐克的边境线。战争即将来临。

original: We must prepare!
translation: 我们必须准备好!

original: France should stay out of this.
translation: 法国不会参与进去。

original: France leaves the Allies
translation: 法国离开同盟国

original: The stubborn French have refused to follow our lead in the Sudeten Crisis! They stand by their support of Czechoslovakia, and since we do not they have decided to rescind our mutual alliance. Even now, France is preparing for an imminent war with Germany.
translation: 顽固的法国人拒绝听从我们对苏台德危机的意见! 他们坚持对捷克斯洛伐克援助，因为我们不肯同他们一样坚持援助，法国决定离开我们的同盟关系。尽管如此，法国开始了对即将到来的对德战争的准备。

original: Fools! Hitler must be appeased!
translation: 蠢货! 必须让希特勒冷静!

original: German demands for our territory in the Sudetenland region have become increasingly hostile, and now their forces are massing along our border! A conference is being held in Munich where European leaders are discussing the future of Czechoslovakia, but we haven't been invited.\n\nFortunately, it looks like the Allies will stand by their earlier promises of support. They have threatened Hitler with war if our borders are violated in the slightest. Despite this, we must prepare for an imminent German attack.
translation: 德国对我们苏台德地区的领土的领土要求越来越敌意化，现在他们在我们的边境线上囤积大军! 一场国际会议在慕尼黑召开，欧洲领导者们一起讨论捷克斯洛伐克的未来，但是我们却没被邀请。\n\n幸运的是，看上去同盟国决定遵守他们支援我们的诺言。他们威胁希特勒战争如果他胆敢侵犯我们一丝的边境线。尽管如此，我们必须为即将到来的德国进攻做准备。

original: Good! Let them come!
translation: 太好了! 让他们来试试吧!

original: German demands for our territory in the Sudetenland region have become increasingly hostile, and now their forces are massing along our border! A conference is being held in Munich where European leaders are discussing the future of Czechoslovakia, but we haven't been invited.\n\nThe British cowards have refused to back our sovereignty, but at least the French are sticking up for us! They have abandoned their alliance with Britain and formed a new one with us, promising to support Czechoslovakia against German aggression.
translation: 德国对我们苏台德地区的领土的领土要求越来越敌意化，现在他们在我们的边境线上囤积大军! 一场国际会议在慕尼黑召开，欧洲领导者们一起讨论捷克斯洛伐克的未来，但是我们却没被邀请。\n\n大英帝国的胆小鬼们拒绝支持我们的主权，不过至少法国人为我们站出来了! 他们舍弃了与英国的同盟关系并于我们达成了一个新的同盟关系，保证支援捷克斯洛伐克对抗德国侵略。

original: Vive la France!
translation: 法国万岁!

original: The Munich Diktat
translation: 慕尼黑协定

original: German demands for our territory in the Sudetenland region have become increasingly hostile, and now their forces are massing along our border! A conference is being held in Munich where European leaders are discussing the future of Czechoslovakia, but we haven't been invited.\n\nBoth the British and French have rescinded their earlier promises to support us against German aggression. Their diplomats have made it clear that if we choose to resist the Germans, we do so on our own. Perhaps we have no choice but to surrender the Sudetenland...
translation: 德国对我们苏台德地区的领土的领土要求越来越敌意化，现在他们在我们的边境线上囤积大军! 一场国际会议在慕尼黑召开，欧洲领导者们一起讨论捷克斯洛伐克的未来，但是我们却没被邀请。\n\n英国人和法国人都拒绝遵守他们对我们，对抗德国侵略的支援的承诺。他们的外交官说的很清楚，如果我们选择反抗德国，我们只能靠自己了。也许我们没有选择只能把苏台德地区割让出去……

original: This is a dark day for Europe.
translation: 这对欧洲来说都是黑暗的一天。

original: We will never surrender!
translation: 我们永不投降!

original: Talks have been held in Munich between the leaders of Germany, Britain, France and Italy to discuss the future of Czechoslovakia. The British and their Allies have both rejected our rightful claims to the Sudetenland, and they have threatened us with war if we 'violate' the Czech border!\n\nA plan for the invasion of Czechoslovakia has been drawn up, but this will likely trigger a general European war. We must make certain we are ready for this.
translation: 德国，英国，法国，意大利的国家领导人在慕尼黑对话一起讨论捷克斯洛伐克的未来。英国及其盟友拒绝了我们对苏台德地区合理的要求，而且他们威胁我们如果我们侵犯捷克人边境线就开战!\n\nA 入侵捷克斯洛伐克的计划已经完成，不过该入侵很可能引发一场全欧洲大战。我们必须保证我们自己准备好了。

original: Time to do this the hard way.
translation: 是时候用硬手腕解决问题了。

original: Talks have been held in Munich between the leaders of Germany, Britain, France and Italy to discuss the future of Czechoslovakia. The British have seen reason and accepted our claims to the Sudetenland as legitimate, but the stubborn French are refusing to back down.\n\nThey have abandoned their cooperation with Britain and forged closer ties with the Czechs instead. It looks like we will have to deal with them both at the same time, but at least now the British hopefully won't intervene...
translation: 德国，英国，法国，意大利的国家领导人在慕尼黑对话一起讨论捷克斯洛伐克的未来。英国人讲道理认为我们对苏台德地区的宣称是合法的，不过顽固的法国人拒绝退步。\n\n法国人舍弃了他们于英国的合作关系转而和捷克人更靠近了。看上去我们可能要同时解决他们俩，不过至少英国人应该不会再干预了……

original: This may work to our advantage.
translation: 这也许对我们很有利。

original: Talks have been held in Munich between the leaders of Germany, Britain, France and Italy to discuss the future of Czechoslovakia. Both the British and French have accepted our claims to the Sudetenland as legitimate, and their previous offers of support to the Czechs have been rescinded.\n\nDespite the hopelessness of their situation, the stubborn Czechs are refusing to surrender their territory! We will have to take it by force. An invasion plan has been prepared that will wipe this vile experiment of Versailles off the face of the Earth!
translation: 德国，英国，法国，意大利的国家领导人在慕尼黑对话一起讨论捷克斯洛伐克的未来。英国人和法国人都很讲道理认为我们对苏台德地区的宣称是合法的，而他们之前对捷克的保证也作废了。\n\n尽管他们毫无希望的处境，顽固的捷克人拒绝给我们我们的领土! 我们将会用武力把它拿回来。入侵计划已经准备好了，它将会把凡尔赛协议中的丑陋条款完全扫清!

original: The Czechs must be destroyed.
translation: 捷克人必须被摧毁。

original: Talks have been held in Munich between the leaders of Germany, Britain, France and Italy to discuss the future of Czechoslovakia. Both the British and French have accepted our claims to the Sudetenland as legitimate, and their previous offers of support to the Czechs have been rescinded.\n\nRecognizing the hopelessness of their situation, the Czechs have surrendered the Sudeten territories to us. Their oppressed German inhabitants will at long last be brought into the Vaterland!
translation: 德国，英国，法国，意大利的国家领导人在慕尼黑对话一起讨论捷克斯洛伐克的未来。英国人和法国人都很讲道理认为我们对苏台德地区的宣称是合法的，而他们之前对捷克的保证也作废了。\n\n认清了他们毫无希望的处境，捷克人把苏台德地区领土割让给了我们。地区内被压迫的德国人终于被带回了祖国父亲的怀抱!

original: This is a historic day for Germany.
translation: 今天对德国是历史性的一天。

original: First Vienna Award
translation: 第一次维也纳仲裁

original: Czechoslovakia is a cancer tumor in the heart of Europe, and at last the Germans have decided to take decisive action against them. The Sudetenland has already been surrendered to Germany, and now, as a consequence of the Munich Agreement, the Czechoslovakian territory that rightfully belongs to Hungary is to be returned to us.
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克就像一个在欧洲心脏上的癌症肿瘤，德国终于决定采取决定性的行动收拾他们。苏台德地区已经被还给德国了，现在，作为慕尼黑协议的后果，捷克斯洛伐克领土中合理属于匈牙利的应该归还给我们。

original: About time!
translation: 终于等到了!

original: The Annexation of Zaolzie
translation: 合并扎奥勒吉

original: Czechoslovakia is falling apart, and we must act quickly to protect territory with significant Polish populations before it can be seized by Germany. Czech ownership of Zaolzie has always been contested by us, and it is time for the region to join our nation.
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克正在崩溃，在他们土地交给德国以前我们必须快点行动起来保护有大量波兰居民的地区。捷克对扎奥勒吉的所有权一直与我们有争议，现在是时候把这片土地并入我们的国家了。

original: Zaolzie is ours!
translation: 奥尔扎那边的土地都是我们的！

original: The Fate of Czechoslovakia
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克的命运

original: Not content with stealing the Sudetenland, the Germans have now decided to seize the rest of our nation. Abandoned by our so-called allies, and with our best defenses lost in the Munich Diktat, the situation appears hopeless...
translation: 不满足于攫取苏台德地区的土地，日耳曼人已决意占领我们国家最后的领土。我们被所谓的盟友抛弃，我们最强的防御屏障在慕尼黑那一场可耻的阴谋中化为乌有，事情已经没有任何转机．．．

original: Give in to the Germans.
translation: 屈服于德国的铁蹄之下。

original: ...yet still we must resist!
translation: ……不，我们必须坚决抵抗!

original: The Czechs Resist
translation: 捷克人的不屈

original: The Czechs have somehow mustered the courage to fight our occupation of their country. Their best defenses were in the Sudetenland, which is now under our control, so this should be a swift campaign.
translation: 出乎意料，捷克人开始奋起反击并强烈责我们对其国家领土的占领行为。而他们最强的防守阵地位于苏台德地区，已处于我们的控制之下，捷克已是囊中之物。

original: Prague will soon be ours.
translation: 布拉格也很快是我们的。

original: The end of Czechoslovakia is at hand, and our forces are marching into Prague at this very moment. With the surrender of the Czechoslovakian military, we have liberated vast quantities of armaments. Their tanks, in particular, should serve our forces well.\n\nBöhmen will be annexed into Germany as a protectorate, but what should become of Slovakia? We can set them up as an autonomous puppet state under Jozef Tiso.
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克的末日已经来临，在这时我们的部队已经进入布拉格。在捷克斯洛伐克的军队投降时，我们缴获了大量的武器装备。他们性能优良的坦克也可以归于我军之用。\n\n波希米亚将被并入德国并且成为其保护国。但斯洛伐克该被如何处置？或许我们能把斯洛伐克变为一个由约瑟夫.蒂索领导的自治傀儡政权。

original: Having conquered Czechoslovakia, we must consider the best way to split up these territories.\n\nBöhmen remains German as a protectorate, but what should become of Slovakia? We can set them up as an autonomous puppet state under Jozef Tiso.
translation: 在占领了捷克斯洛伐克之后，我们必须考虑什么才是分割这片领地的最佳方案。\n\n波希米亚已经成为德国统治下的保护国，但斯洛伐克该被如何处置？或许我们能把斯洛伐克变为一个由约瑟夫.蒂索领导的自治傀儡政权。

original: Set up Slovakia as a puppet state.
translation: 斯洛伐克，傀儡之国。

original: Partition Czechoslovakia with Hungary.
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克与匈牙利的分离。

original: All of Czechoslovakia belongs to the Reich!
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克属于德意志帝国！

original: The Partition of Czechoslovakia
translation: 天鹅绒分离

original: German forces have entered Prague and the end of Czechoslovakia is imminent. They intend to annex Bohemia into the German Reich, but they are willing to let us have Slovakia. Should we agree to this partitioning? It will mean entering a formal military alliance with Germany.
translation: 德国军队已经进入布拉格，捷克斯洛伐克的末日已经来临。他们坚持将波希米亚并入德意志帝国，但是他们愿意将斯洛伐克地区给我们。我们应该同意这样的分割吗？即便这样意味着与德意志帝国正式成为军事联盟。

original: After annexing Czechoslovakia, Germany is intending to retain Bohemia as part of the Reich, but they are willing to let us have Slovakia. Should we agree to this partitioning? It will mean entering a formal military alliance with Germany.
translation: 在吞并捷克斯洛伐克以后，德国坚持保留波希米亚作为德意志帝国的一部分，但是他们乐意让我们拥有斯洛伐克。我们应该同意这样的分割吗？即便这样意味着与德意志帝国正式成为军事联盟。

original: Of course! Greater Hungary will soon be a reality!
translation: 当然！更强大的匈牙利指日可待！

original: No, we do not need Slovakia or German friendship.
translation: 不，我们不需要来自斯洛伐克或者德意志的友谊。

original: Hungary Rejects Our Offer
translation: 匈牙利拒绝了我们的提议

original: The Hungarians have outrageously refused our generous offer to annex Slovakia, claiming they have no interest in the region! We will have to deal with them soon enough. For now, we must come up with a solution to the Slovakian Question.
translation: 匈牙利人愤怒地拒绝了我们让出斯洛伐克这样慷慨的提议，声称他们对这一片地区毫无兴趣！我们不久就会处理匈牙利，我们必须为斯洛伐克地区的问题想出一个最佳解决方式。

original: Set up Tiso's puppet government.
translation: 建立约瑟夫•蒂索傀儡政府。

original: Annex Slovakia into Germany.
translation: 斯洛伐克，已入德意志帝国之腹。

original: The Polish Question
translation: 波兰问题

original: The Reichsministerium of Public Enlightenment and Propaganda has done an excellent job, and the people of Germany - indeed, the entire world - has been informed of the injustices our German brethren in Poland are forced to endure. We now have all the justification we need for a war!
translation: 帝国公共思想与宣传部干得漂亮，德国人民-事实上，全世界人民都已经了解到我们的同胞在波兰所被迫忍受的那些不公正的待遇。现在我们有绝对正义的理由开战！

original: Soon Poland will be no more!
translation: 很快，世间再无波兰!

original: The Remilitarization of the Rhineland
translation: 莱茵兰，厉兵秣马，重整军备

original: Several German divisions recently advanced into the Rhineland, marking the first time since the end of the Great War that Germany has forces positioned west of the Rhine. This is in clear violation of the Versailles Treaty, under which Germany is forbidden from militarizing the region! Unless we issue an ultimatum demanding their withdrawal, the treaty will not be enforced.
translation: 几支德国部队已经挺进莱茵兰地区，标志着大战以来德军第一次在莱茵河西岸部署了自己的部队。这是公开撕毁凡尔赛条约的行为，条约明令禁止德军将该地区军事化！除非我们发布最后通牒来要求撤军，我们才不用对德国强制执行凡尔赛条约中的相关规定。

original: This is an act of war! Rally the British to our side!
translation: 这是战争行为！鼓动英国人进入我们的阵营！

original: §RIf war breaks out, we will suffer a civil war due to our §YDisjointed Government:§!\n
translation: §R一旦战争爆发，我们将会遭受内战带来的苦楚。而这都“归功”于我们§Y支离破碎的政府：§!\n

original: Issue a diplomatic objection.
translation: 提出外交异议

original: Several German divisions recently advanced into the Rhineland, marking the first time since the end of the Great War that Germany has forces positioned west of the Rhine. This is in clear violation of the Versailles Treaty, under which Germany is forbidden from militarizing the region!\n\nThe French are mobilizing their forces, and seem intent on issuing an ultimatum. If Germany refuses, they are prepared to advance into Germany to deal with this threat. Popular opinion in Britain is against a war, but if we refuse to stand by the French our alliance with them will be dissolved.
translation: 几支德国部队已经挺进莱茵兰地区，标志着大战以来德军第一次在莱茵河西岸部署了自己的部队。这是公开撕毁凡尔赛条约的行为，条约明令禁止德军将该地区军事化！\n\n法国正在动员部队，意在对其发布最后通牒。如果德国方面拒绝，他们将准备进军德国来处理这一威胁。英国方面民意不支持开站，但如果我们不站在法国统一战线的话，我们的联盟就即将瓦解。

original: A war is out of the question.
translation: 战争的可行性不值得讨论。

original: We must stand by France!
translation: 我们必将和法国站在同一阵线!

original: Several German divisions recently advanced into the Rhineland, marking the first time since the end of the Great War that Germany has forces positioned west of the Rhine. This is in clear violation of the Versailles Treaty, under which Germany is forbidden from militarizing the region!\n\nThe French seem content to limit their response to this breach to diplomatic objections, and public opinion in Britain is firmly against a war.
translation: 几支德国部队已经挺进莱茵兰地区，标志着大战以来德军第一次在莱茵河西岸部署了自己的部队。这是公开撕毁凡尔赛条约的行为，条约明令禁止德军将该地区军事化！\n\n法国似乎只愿意对此行为提出不痛不痒的外交异议，英国方面，民众也是坚决反对战争。

original: We will issue an objection as well.
translation: 我们也将提出外交异议

original: Britain Refuses War
translation: 大不列颠拒绝战争

original: The British are refusing to support us against Germany, claiming that the Germans are 'simply walking in their own backyard.' If we go to war with them, it looks like we will be on our own.\n\nPublic opinion in France is against a war, but Germany will only grow stronger and the remilitarization of the Rhineland constitutes a direct threat against our borders. Issuing an ultimatum would be less threatening without Britain on our side. Should we proceed against them alone?
translation: 英国拒绝援助我们来抵抗德国的进攻，他们声称德国人只是“在他们的后院闲逛”。如果我们向他们开战，我们将孤立无援。\n\n法国的大众民调依然是反对战争，但若置之不理，德国人只会更加强大，而且莱茵兰地区的军事化进程是对我们边境领土的直接威胁。发布最后通牒是一个相对保险的措施，特别是当我们无法拥有英国的支持时。我们究竟应该独自发动战争吗？

original: Yes! Germany must be dealt with now.
translation: 是的！是时候处理德国了。

original: No, without the British we must back down...
translation: 不，没有英国人的帮助，我们必须撤退……

original: Britain Supports Us
translation: 英国是我们是强力支持者

original: Though popular support for a war is lacking in Britain, the British government has recognized the threat posed by the Germans and they have offered us their full support. We will issue a final ultimatum to Germany to withdraw from the demilitarized zone. If they refuse, it is time for our forces to drive deep into Germany and put an end to their tyrannical regime!
translation: 即便发动战争的提议一直不受英国国内大多数人的支持，英国政府依然意识到了德国所带来的威胁，并且给予了我们全面支持。我们将会向德国传达最后通牒，要求他们把部队撤出非军事区。如果他们拒绝的话，那我们将会派兵长驱直入德国，来给他们的暴政帝国划上句号。

original: Onwards!
translation: 向前进！

original: France and Britain Mobilize!
translation: 英国法国总动员！

original: The British and French have refused to accept the remilitarization of the Rhineland, calling it an 'unforgivable breach' of the Versailles Treaty. They are mobilizing their forces against us and have issued an ultimatum that our forces back down at once and the Rhineland remains demilitarized, or our nations are at war.
translation: 英法两国拒绝接受莱茵兰地区的军事化，他们把这称为对凡尔赛和约的“不可原谅的侵犯“。 他们已经开始动员部队，并且向我们下达了最后通牒要求我们把部队立即撤出莱茵兰非军事区，否则就将开战。

original: We cannot back down! The Reich must be defended!
translation: 我们不能让步！帝国必将受到保护！

original: We are unprepared for this confrontation. We must back down.
translation: 我们还没有准备好这场冲突。我们必须让步。

original: France Mobilizes!
translation: 法国总动员！

original: The British have seen reason and accepted the remilitarization of the Rhineland, but the mad French are refusing to back down! Claiming that this incident constitutes a direct threat against the security of their nation, they are mobilizing their forces and may sweep in across the border at any moment! We are at war!
translation: 英国已经理解了其中缘由，并且接受了莱茵兰地区的再度军事化，但是法国依然拒绝退让！他们声称这次事件直接威胁到国家安全，他们的动员部队随时进入我们的边界，我们已进入全面战备状态!

original: France Backs Down
translation: 法国全线撤退

original: The French wisely chose to back down when they realized that their mad enterprise wouldn't enjoy British support. Their forces have been demobilized and war has been averted for now. By golly, that was a close one!
translation: 当他们意识到他们疯狂的计划不会得到英国人的支持时，法国最终也选择明哲保身。他们的部队已被遣散。天哪，这可真险。

original: A war now would be madness.
translation: 现在开战无异于自取灭亡。

original: France Refuses to Back Down
translation: 法国拒绝退让

original: The French have stubbornly decided to go at it alone against the Germans, and our alliance with them has been rescinded. Yet another European war has broken out due to pointless squabbling. Perhaps it is time for Britain to distance itself from continental affairs again...
translation: 法国依然孤注一掷地决定在没有人支持的时候向德国开战，即便他们的盟友也与他接触同盟关系。而可笑的是，在欧洲的另外一面，爆发了一场战争，而战争的原因竟是毫无意义的吵嘴。或许，是时候英国不要再插手欧洲大陆的事务了……

original: Perhaps it was inevitable.
translation: 或许，这本无可避免。

original: The Oster Conspiracy
translation: 奥斯特阴谋

original: Believing that Hitler has pushed Germany into a war it cannot win, a group of senior officers within the Wehrmacht have launched a coup! It appears to have been orchestrated by Colonel Hans Oster of the Abwehr, but generals Beck, von Brauchitsch, Halder and Admiral Canaris have also been confirmed as involved!\n\nHeavily-armed men lying in wait in several Berlin apartments have converged on the Reichskanzlei intent on liquidating Hitler and his closest associates. A fierce gun battle is currently raging inside the building.
translation: 一些德国国防军的高级官员深信他们“伟大的”元首已经将德国推向了一场他不可能打赢的战争，这群高级官员发动了兵变！目前看来这是由德国反间谍机关的上校汉斯.奥斯特谋划，瓦尔特·冯·布劳希奇将军 上将威廉·弗兰茨·卡纳里斯都参与其中！\n\n一些重型武装士兵潜伏在位于柏林的帝国总理府周围的公寓里，准备一击彻底瓦解希特勒和他的得力助手。一场激烈的枪战正在这栋建筑物中展开。

original: Protect the Führer at all costs!
translation: 不惜一切代价，保护元首！

original: The Führer is Dead
translation: 元首，殉国了

original: SS troops and loyal army units rushing to the Reichskanzlei have managed to kill or capture all of the traitor commandos, but not before the dogs managed to kill Hitler! The Führer was found with several dozen gunshot wounds slumped over his desk - working tirelessly for the Vaterland to his last breath, no doubt!\n\nThe surviving conspirators will stand trial for their heinous crime, but for now Germany is at war and a new leader is needed. Who shall be the next Führer?
translation: 党卫军和皇家特卫队赶到帝国总理府，消灭了叛军并活捉了所有叛军指挥官，但没能成功把元首从这一群野兽中救出。元首被发现死在他的办公桌上，身中数弹-为他的国家工作到了自己生命中最后一秒，毫无疑问！\n\n那些仍然活着的篡位者将为他们所犯下的弥天大罪面对正义的审判。但目前德国仍然处于战争状态，国不可一日无君，谁才是下一任元首的最佳选择？

original: Herr Himmler will lead us into the future.
translation: 海因里希.希姆莱将带领我们走向明天！

original: Herr Göring is the logical choice.
translation: 戈林也许是合理的选择。

original: The Conspiracy Fails
translation: 阴谋论的覆灭

original: SS troops and loyal army units rushing to the Reichskanzlei have managed to kill or capture all of the traitor commandos, and Hitler himself led the clean-up effort with his trusty Luger. Miraculously, the Führer emerged from the fighting with only a few scratches.\n\nThe surviving conspirators will pay a steep price for their disloyalty, and Hitler is now even more committed towards prosecuting the current war towards a glorious victory!
translation: 党卫军和皇家特卫队赶到帝国总理府，消灭了叛军并活捉了所有叛军指挥官，而希特勒本人与他的心腹组织了清场。 奇迹般地，元首从这次可耻的埋伏中存活了下来，且只受了一些擦伤。\n\n那些仍然活着的篡位者将为他们的不忠付出巨大的代价，现在希特勒甚至更加坚定地要领导第三帝国走向最后的胜利！

original: Long live the Führer!
translation: 元首万岁！

original: The Conspiracy Succeeds
translation: 阴谋论的成功

original: The heavy fighting in the Reichskanzlei has reduced the building to a burning ruin. Despite a large number of SS soldiers rushing to Hitler's aid, army units loyal to the conspirators joined the fray and proved decisive. The Führer has been confirmed as killed, and the conspirators have successfully stormed all government buildings in Berlin.\n\nA large portion of the Wehrmacht has gone over to the other side, but many officers are still NSDAP loyalists. Who should be leading them?
translation: 那场激烈的战斗将帝国总理府化为一片燃烧的废墟。虽然很多党卫军士兵都慌忙地参与希特勒的救援行动，叛军士兵加入这场纷争也证明了他们的果断。元首已经确认被击杀，叛军已经成功袭击了位于柏林的所有政府建筑。\n\n大片德国国防军部队已经倒戈，加入到敌方阵营。但很多高级长官依然是德国民族社会主义的忠实追随者，谁来领导他们？

original: Death to National Socialism!
translation: 纳粹主义的消亡！

original: Himmler will turn this around!
translation: 希姆莱将改变局势！

original: Göring is our only hope at this point!
translation: 戈林是我们现今仅存的希望！

original: Preparing the Ground
translation: 准备登陆

original: The Austrians are yearning to become part of the German Reich, but the stubborn government in Vienna has so far resisted all attempts to bring about a union. We must increase support for fascism in Austria. The Austrian Nazi Party will then become a viable alternative to the ruling austrofascists.\n\nAn Abwehr agent has been made available for an espionage mission. Use him to covertly increase popular support for fascism in Austria.
translation: 奥地利人十分渴望成为德意志帝国的一部分，但是顽固的维也纳政府到目前为止阻止了一切帝国一体化的进程。我们必须加大法西斯主义在奥地利社会中的宣传力度。在奥地利的纳粹党派已经成为一个可取代政府的法西斯政权。\n\nAn 纳粹间谍部门的探员已经被指派进行间谍任务。我们将使用他来暗中提高法西斯党派在奥地利社会中的声望。

original: Austria will be ours!
translation: 奥地利将是我们的！

original: German-Soviet Treaty
translation: 苏德条约

original: Despite harsh previous rhetoric against both the people and the ideological leadership of the [Root.GetName], [From.GetLeader] and Germany has now reached out to us, requesting a mutually beneficial research treaty. While exchanging knowledge would help our efforts to develop new tank designs along with promises of other research benefits in the future, there is little doubt considering previous statements that the Germans are doing this for their own sake. Should we go forward with the agreement despite the risk of aiding [From.GetLeader]'s ambitions?
translation: 尽管之前对[Root.GetName]的人民和他们的思想使用各种肮脏的语言进行攻击，[From.GetLeader]和德国开始与我们接触，请求同意一个对双方都有好处的研究合约。互换技术可以帮助我们进行新的坦克设计以及提供将来其他领域研究技术承诺，不过从之前的发言看来毫无疑问德国这样只是为了他自己。我们应该接受这项合约，而去承受继续做大[From.GetLeader]的野心吗？

original: The capitalists are a worse threat to us both.
translation: 那些资本家对于我们双方来说都是更大的威胁。

original: We won't give fascists the weapons to crush the proletariat!
translation: 我们不会为法西斯主义者提供消灭工人阶级的武器！

original: Soviets Accept German-Soviet Treaty
translation: 苏联已经接受苏德条约

original: Our negotiations with the [From.GetName] have been successful. An agreement has been reached where our nations will aid each other in the development of new armored units, with a possible extension to other research areas in the future.
translation: 我们同[From.GetName]的商榷是成功的。我们已达成将在新式装甲单位的研发上互相协助，同时在可能的情况下，在将来的一些研发领域上互相协助。

original: This treaty will be a stepping stone to the future.
translation: 苏德条约将是我们通往美好未来的阶梯。

original: Soviets Reject German-Soviet Treaty
translation: 苏联已拒绝签署苏德条约

original: The [From.GetName] has rejected our suggestion for a treaty aimed at advancing armored unit research in both countries, presumably fearing our superior weapons would be turned against them.
translation: [From.GetName]已经拒绝我们关于两国之间合作对装甲单位的研发合约，他们推测新式先进武器可能会被用于攻击他们自己。

original: They have hardly diminished the risks of it now.
translation: 他们现在已经几乎无法降低这样做所带来的风险了。

original: German Joint Air Research
translation: 德国带头进行联合航空研究

original: As stipulated by the treaty with Germany, some of their special research projects share discoveries with our engineers. A recent breakthrough in radar technology has come to our attention, opening up unexpected opportunities to advance our research in the field.
translation: 根据与德国之间的合约有关规定，他们的一些特殊研发项目成果将与我们的工程师分享。最近一项雷达技术的突破引起了我们的关注，这将使我们在这一领域当中的研究发展带来了可能。

original: Detecting the enemy is the first step.
translation: 发现敌人，是战争的第一步。

original: Ultimatum from Germany
translation: 来自德国的最后通牒

original: With Greece under the thumb of Germany, [From.GetLeader] has put pressure on our government to join their ranks. The Soviet-German alliance has put us in a position where neutrality is no longer an option, and now an ultimatum has arrived from Berlin demanding we cede our eastern territories to their Soviet allies and join them in the very pact they are using to force our hand.\n\nAlthough we cannot maintain neutrality, there are other options. Seeking support from Britain is one, standing our ground is another. None, however, can secure the future of the republic with certainty.
translation: 介于希腊实际上是受德国支配的国家，[From.GetLeader]对其政府施加压力使其加入到他们中来。苏德联盟已经将我们推到了一个必须选择阵营的境地，我们已经收到来的柏林的通牒，要求我们向他的苏联盟友割让我们东边的领土，并且加入到这样一个给我们带来耻辱的公约中。\n\n尽管我们不能保持中立，但依然有其他自保之法，向英国请求支持是其中的一个，坚守我们的领土也是一个。然而，没有哪个可以确保我们拥有自己的未来。

original: If we work with the Germans, we may find the opportunity to reclaim other land.
translation: 如果我们同德国合作，或许我们将取得收回土地的机会。

original: We can count on British support, and they can count on us.
translation: 我们不能指望英国人的援助，而他们能指望我们。

original: If these despots want to take our home, they have to fight for it.
translation: 如果这些专制者想要夺走我们的家园，那么他们必须从我们的尸体上踏过去。

original: Danzig for Slovakia
translation: 斯洛伐克的格但斯克城

original:
The Germans have long had their eyes on Danzig, seeking to unite their territories in Ostpreussen with the rest of the German nation. Diplomats have warned that the day may come when they make us choose between Danzig or war.

Surprisingly, we have been presented with what the Germans consider a more peaceful solution. They offer the newly created state of Slovakia, currently little more than a puppet state under German rule, to us in exchange for Danzig. 
What steps the Germans will take if we decline is unknown, but we have been given an opportunity to resolve this conflict with some territorial gains.
translation:
德国人对格但斯克垂涎已久，企图将他在东普鲁士的领土统一到德意志帝国中。外交官警告，当德国让我们选择格但斯克或者战争时，那一天就到来了。

令人惊讶的是，我们收到了来自德国的一个更加令人心动的解决此问题的方式。那就是，他们提出将重建斯洛伐克来交换我们割让格但斯克，这也总比成为德国的傀儡国强不少。
如果我们拒绝，德国将要采取的措施是一个恐怖的未知，但是我们现在能通过增加领土的方式来解决目前这一冲突，已经是不错的结果。

original: This is the best offer we'll get.
translation: 这是我们能得到的最好提议了。

original: We will not give what is rightfully ours for what they have stolen!
translation: 休想让我们用本来属于我们的来换取他们无耻窃取的！

original: Danzig Ceded for Slovakia
translation: 抛砖引玉，用斯洛伐克来交换格但斯克

original: Poland has agreed to the exchange wherein Danzig will be ceded to [GER.GetNameDef], while Slovakia will now be under Polish control. Through this agreement, we have reclaimed Danzig while maintaining cordial, or at least not openly hostile, relations with our eastern neighbor.
translation: 波兰已经同意割让格但斯克给[GER.GetNameDef]来完成领土交换，现在斯洛伐克将在波兰控制之下。通过这一协议，我们重新获得了格但斯克同时表示了友好 ，或者，至少不是公开与我们的东部的邻居敌对。

original: Germany is one again.
translation: 德意志再度统一。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Refuses to give up Danzig
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝割让格但斯克。

original: Our generous offer of Slovakian territories to [From.GetNameDef] in exchange for Danzig has been rejected, leaving Danzig in Polish hands. Clearly, [From.GetLeader] does not share our understanding of Danzig as rightfully German territory. \n[Root.GetLeader] is furious, and the diplomatic options for reclaiming Danzig appear to have been exhausted.
translation: 我们提供给[From.GetNameDef]关于斯洛伐克地区和格但斯克的领土互换这样慷慨的提议竟然被拒绝了，这就意味着把格但斯克推入到波兰人的手中。显然[From.GetLeader]并不能理解格但斯克是德国固有领土这样的观点。\n[Root.GetLeader]异常愤怒，从而导致通过外交手段来重新获取格但斯克已变不可行。

original: It may be time to consider other options.
translation: 是时候考虑其他可行性了。

original: Anti-Soviet Pact
translation: 反苏协议

original: With the Anti-Comintern Pact, [From.GetNameDef] has secured fertile ground for diplomatic means of containing the Soviet menace. However, the pact does not constitute a military alliance, nor does it contain well-defined obligations for the signatories. [From.GetLeader] now seeks to extend the pact to an Anti-Soviet coalition, a binding agreement to join together in war if any signatory enters into a state of war with the Soviet Union.\n\nWhile substantially more dangerous, and likely to bring an end to any diplomacy we still maintain with the Soviets, this is also our chance to ensure that we have strong allies on our side in the case of war.
translation: 连同反共产国际协议，[From.GetNameDef]现在有充足的外交手段遏制苏联。不过这个协议不等于军事同盟，而且其中也没有明确各个签字国的义务。[From.GetLeader]现在希望扩展反苏协议到一个反苏联盟，使其成为一个有束缚力的条约，如果任何一方与苏联发生战争，所有缔约方都应将加入战争。\n\n虽然这实际上更危险，而且会破坏我们与苏联仅存的外交关系，不过条约将会为我们在未来对苏战争中带来强力的盟友。

original: We will stand by Germany and its allies against the Soviets.
translation: 我们将于德国及其盟友并肩对抗苏联。

original: Anyone could start another world war with such a pact.
translation: 任何人都可以用这个合约挑起一场世界大战。

original: Call Pact Members to War
translation: 召唤所有缔约国加入战争

original: Just as we suspected when we signed the Anti-Soviet Pact, we now find ourselves in a state of war with the Soviet Union. It is time for our co-signatories to honor their promise and join us.
translation: 正如我们在签署反苏协议时预想的，我们现在发现我们与苏联处在战争状态了。是时候让缔约国们遵守他们的诺言加入我们的战争了。

original: Our foresight pays off.
translation: 我们的远见起作用了。

original: [From.GetName] Calls Pact Members to War
translation: [From.GetName]召唤缔约国成员加入战争

original: [From.GetName] Calls Pact Members to War
translation: [From.GetName]让各缔约国准备战斗！

original: [From.GetName] Invokes Guarantee
translation: [From.GetName]请求保障独立。

original: The Anti-Soviet Pact stipulates that all signatories must join in any defensive conflict with the Soviet Union. [From.GetName] has now been attacked by the Soviets and has sent out a request for all pact members to come to their aid immediately. It is time to show the [Root.GetAdjective] dedication to protecting the world from the threat of the Soviet Union once and for all.
translation: 反苏协议要求所有缔约国必须加入任何一缔约国作为防御方的对苏冲突。[From.GetName]现在被苏联攻击了，他们请求所有反苏协议缔约国立刻加入战争帮助他们。现在是时候向全世界展示 [Root.GetAdjective]彻底解决苏联保卫世界的决心了。

original: The Anti-Soviet Pact stipulates that all signatories must join in any defensive conflict with the Soviet Union. [From.GetName] has now been attacked by the Soviets and has sent out a request for all pact members to come to their aid immediately. It is time to show the [Root.GetAdjective] dedication to protecting the world from the threat of the Soviet Union once and for all.
translation: 反苏联条约规定，当任一缔约国遭到攻击时，所有缔约国都必须加入针对苏联的防御性战争。现在[From.GetName]已经遭到了苏联的攻击并希望所有缔约国立即展开援助。是时候展示 [Root.GetAdjective]的奉献精神并且从苏联的威胁下一劳永逸地拯救世界了！

original: Our guarantee to [From.GetNameDef] stipulates that we must join in any defensive conflict with the Soviet union. They have now been attacked by the Soviets, and the time has come for us to uphold our end of the bargain and come to their aid immediately. It is time to show the [Root.GetAdjective] dedication to protecting the world from the threat of the Soviet Union once and for all.
translation: 我们对[From.GetNameDef]的保证规定我们必须加入对苏联的防御战争当中。现在他们受到了苏联的攻击，我们应该立即兑现承诺来援助他们。是时候展示 [Root.GetAdjective]的奉献精神并且从苏联的威胁下一劳永逸地拯救世界了！

original: [From.GetName] does not stand alone!
translation: [From.GetName]将不会独自战斗!

original: This is not our war.
translation: 这不是我们的战争。

original: §YThis will be viewed as a betrayal by all countries who honor the pact (§!§R-50§!§Y opinion)§!
translation: §Y这将会所有遵守条约诺言的国家看作可耻的背叛 (§!§R-50§!§Y 关系)§!

original: Danzig or War
translation: 要么但泽要么战争

original: [GER.GetNameDefCap] has long publicized their goal of reclaiming the territories they lost in the Great War. In particular they look to the territory of Danzig, which separates Ostpreussen from the rest of their nation. \n\nNow, they have demanded that Danzig be ceded to [GER.GetNameDef], and in exchange offer nothing but a promise to waive their claims on Poznan. With the threat of war looming, accepting the offer will delay a possible conflict, but at the cost of freely granting the Germans more strength for whatever lies ahead.
translation: [GER.GetNameDefCap]一直以来公开地宣称他们的目标是收回他们在上次大战中失去的领土。这次他们盯上了但泽，这块领土把东普鲁士与其他德国领土分割了开来。\n\n现在他们要求将但泽交还给[GER.GetNameDef]，作为交换条件他们除了放弃波兹南领土宣称以外不肯给出任何其他的东西.随着战争脚步的靠近，接受这个协议将会延缓一个可能的冲突，不过代价是让德国人没有付出代价地增强了他们面对未来威胁时的力量。

original: Let's make a deal. Maybe they'll turn elsewhere.
translation: 让我们达成个协议吧。也许他们会把注意力转向其他地方。

original: Danzig will remain Gdansk!
translation: 但泽将继续是格丹斯克!

original: Poland Cedes Danzig
translation: 波兰交出了但泽

original: Faced with our ultimatum, Poland has agreed to give up their unjustly acquired territory to us, proving that they must have known it rightfully belonged to Germany!
translation: 面对我们的最终通牒，波兰同意放弃他们非法占有的领土并归还给我们，他们一定是明白了但泽是德国的合法领土!

original: Poland has avoided war... for now.
translation: 波兰避免了战争……目前来看。

original: Poland Refuses to Cede Danzig
translation: 波兰拒绝交出但泽

original: Despite our attempts to allow Poland to hand over Danzig peacefully, even vowing to give up our claims on other German territories in exchange, we have been met with refusal. As expected, the world gives nothing to us that we do not seize by force.
translation: 尽管我们试图让波兰人和平的交出但泽，甚至为此我们还放弃了我们对其他德国领土的合理宣称作为交换，我们还是收到了他们的拒绝。正如我们预料的，如果我们不用武力抢过来没人会给我们任何东西。

original: They know very well what the alternative is.
translation: 他们十分清楚另一个选项是什么。

original: The Marco Polo Bridge Incident
translation: 卢沟桥事变

original: Japanese soldiers recently launched an attack on the strategic Marco Polo Bridge just south of Beijing, but they were repelled by our brave soldiers. No doubt this is an orchestrated event aimed at placing blame on us and forcing us to surrender more territory - just like the Mukden Incident when the Japanese invaded Manchuria. \n\nHow should we respond?
translation: 日军最近对战略上非常重要的北京北部卢沟桥发动了进攻，不过我们勇敢的战士们把他们击退了。毫无疑问这场精心策划的事件是为了把错栽在在我们头上并且让我们让出更多的领土 - 就像当时日本入侵东北的时候制造的奉天事件一样。\n\n我们该如何回应？

original: We have reached the breaking point!
translation: 我们的忍耐到了极限了!

original: We can ill afford a war with Japan.
translation: 我们承担不起与日本的全面战争。

original: Germany Withdraws Advisors
translation: 德国召回了德国顾问们

original: Germany has caved in to Japanese diplomatic pressure, and decided to withdraw their military advisors from our country! Von Falkenhausen promised at a farewell dinner that he would not reveal any of our battle plans to the Japanese, but the end of German support is sure to hurt our military.
translation: 德国在日本的外交压力下退缩了，决定撤出他们在我国的军事顾问! 法尔肯豪森在欢送晚宴上保证他不会泄露给日本任何一个我们的战略计划，不过德国军事援助的终结对我们的军队绝不是件好事。

original: We will have to make do without them.
translation: 我们只能离开他们独自抗争了。

original: Poor Sino - German Relations
translation: 中德关系变坏

original: Our deteriorating relationship with Germany has resulted in them recalling all of their military advisors from our country.
translation: 我们于德国逐步恶劣的关系是由于他们召回他们在华军事顾问团导致的。

original: Chinese officers will finish what they started!
translation: 中国的军官会完成他们开始的工作!

original: Military Advisors Detained
translation: 扣留德国顾问团

original: As we are now in a state of war with Germany, all of their military advisors that were present in our country have been detained. Von Falkenhausen and a few of his cronies managed to elude our grasp, and have returned to Europe!
translation: 我们现在与德国处于战争状态了，他们在我国驻扎的所有军事顾问都被控制住了。法尔肯豪森与少数几个他的手下逃脱了我们的控制，并且返回了欧洲!

original: Good riddance!
translation: 跑的真快!

original: Cornered No More
translation: 不再是困兽了

original: The Red Army once survived in a state of what seemed like hopelessness, but since the Long March several years back, the tide has slowly turned. With significant territorial advances, our role as an underdog is a thing of the past. Having fought through this time of struggle, our desperation is now behind us. Mao Zedong has gone from guerrilla army leader to chairman.
translation: 红军在看似绝望的情况下生存了下来，不过自从几年前的长征以来，情势慢慢的变好了。随着解放区的大大扩张，我们再也不是失败者了。斗争过了最困难的时期，我们的绝望已经不复存在。毛泽东从一个游击队领袖成长为了主席。

original: Long live the People's Republic!
translation: 人民共和国万岁!

original: Preparing Attack Against Communists
translation: 准备进攻共产党

original: After the long retreat of the Communist Party of China's Red Army, they have managed to regroup and establish themselves in Shaanxi. Their continued effort to turn the rural population against us and seek support from the Soviet Union suggest that they might grow more powerful if left to their own devices. However, many of the surrounding warlords, despite supporting our government, are unwilling or unable to make the necessary sacrifices for an effective attack.\n\nIt's currently unclear whether the Red Army is still recuperating or ready to face us in battle, but time is not on our side. To strengthen our political position, we need to strike against the communists.
translation: 自中国共产党的红军大撤退后，他们重整了军力并且在陕西扎住了脚.他们继续欺骗农村人口试图让他们反对我们，并且还寻求苏联的援助，这一切都说明如果我们不控制住他们的话他们可能会成长过快.然而，很多他们周围的军阀尽管支持我们政府但是无力或者不愿意付出必要的牺牲来解决他们。\n\n现在并不清楚红军是否已经重整旗鼓准备在战场上面对我们，然而时间并不在我们这边。为了巩固我们的政治地位，我们需要干掉共产分子。

original: Strongarm local warlords into the offensive.
translation: 威逼当地军阀进攻。

original: Recruit local outlaws to fight for us.
translation: 招募当地土匪为我们作战。

original: Rely on local volunteers who oppose the communists.
translation: 靠当地反共志愿者作战。

original: §YIf the PRC chooses to confront the attack:§!\n
translation: §Y如果红区选择直面这次进攻：§!\n

original: §YIf the PRC chooses to retreat:§!\n
translation: §Y如果红区选择撤离：§!\n

original: Kuomintang Launch Offensive
translation: 国民党开始进攻

original: Although we have escaped certain defeat through the Long March, the nationalists are not planning to let us grow stronger without more confrontations. Our spies suggest they are mounting an offensive against us, which could weaken our political support if we try to retreat further.\n\nWe don't know how committed the Kuomintang are to pushing us back right now. Trying to confront them carries significant risks. If the local warlords have been rallied to support the attack, our chances may be slim. On the other hand, retreating now when we have finally stopped may not be an option.
translation: 虽然我们通过长征避免了本不可避免的失败，国民党不会让我们安心发展而熟视无睹。我们的间谍告诉我们他们正在筹备针对我们的一场攻势，如果我们决定撤离到更深处将会消弱我们的政治支持度。\n\n我们不清楚国民党下了多大决心把我们击退.正面迎击他们的伴随着巨大风险.如果当地军阀都在这次进攻中团结一致，我们的机会非常小.另一方面来说，在我们刚刚决定停下脚步之后选择继续撤退也许并不可行。

original: Confront the attack with whatever means we can afford!
translation: 进一切我们所能直面这次进攻!

original: Retreat into isolation.
translation: 撤退至人迹罕至之地。

original: Communists Retreat
translation: 共党分子撤退了

original: Discovering our planned offensive through their local spy network, the CPC have withdrawn their Red Army further into Shaanxi. Although this deprived us of the opportunity to further weaken their numbers, this has shown that the communists are not ready to confront us, despite what their propaganda says. To some extent, the effort has still worked to our benefit.
translation: 他们通过的当地的间谍网了解了我们的攻势，中共撤离了他们的红军到陕西深处。尽管这样的行动使我们失去了进一步消弱他们的机会，然而无论他们的宣传怎么吹嘘这都说明共党分子无力面对我们.某种程度上，他们的行动时对我们有利的。

original: Cowards!
translation: 懦夫!

original: Victory Against Communists
translation: 战胜了共党

original: Our commitment to routing the Red Army has been successful, at least for now. Despite gaining information about the attack, the communists decided to confront our forces and lost. They have now been forced to withdraw further and many of the locals have grown skeptical of their ability to deliver on their promises of overthrowing our government.
translation: 我们击溃红军的行动是成功的，至少目前是如此。尽管他们提前获取了我们攻势的信息，共党决定直面我们的部队并战败了。现在他们不得不撤退到更偏远的地区，很多当地人开始质疑他们是否有能力完成推翻我们政府的承诺。

original: And rightly so!
translation: 他们这么想是对的!

original: Communists Repel Attack
translation: 共党击退了我们的进攻

original: Having gained information about our plans to launch an offensive beforehand, the Red Army was prepared and confronted our attack. The troops we had managed to assemble in this area, where our power base is weak, were insufficient to defeat the communist forces. \nSadly, the attack has been turned against us and seen as a sign of the Red Army's recovery after their long retreat.
translation: 在提前了解了我们进攻计划的情况下，红军做好了准备面对我们的进攻.在我们力所不及的地区，当地所能集结的部队不足以击败共军部队。\n遗憾的是，这场攻势变成了对我们的打击，并且标示着红军已经在大撤退后恢复过来了。

original: It won't help them in the long run.
translation: 这在长远角度是不利于他们的。

original: Defeat Against the Kuomintang
translation: 被国民党击败了

original: Despite our best efforts to repel the attack of locally assembled troops supporting the nationalist government, our preparations were insufficient to stop it. With significant losses, we have been forced into a new retreat, albeit shorter.\n\nConfronting the nationalists before we had fully recovered may have been a mistake. Our magnificent recovery in the Long March instilled hope in our supporters, but now, seeds of doubt have been sown.
translation: 尽管我们尽一切所能试图击退国民党在当地集结的部队，我们的准备不足仅以完成该目标.伴随着重大损失，我们不得不进行新一轮的撤退。\n\n在我们完全恢复前直面国民党也许是个错误.我们奇迹般的长征让我们的支持者充满了希望，不过现在，质疑的种子被栽下了。

original: We will recover and win the faith of the people again.
translation: 我们会卷入重来并且赢回人民的信心的。

original: Victory Against the Kuomintang
translation: 战胜了国民党

original: Challenging the Kuomintang offensive has worked in our favor. The locally assembled troops sent to confront the Red Army were not prepared for our knowledge of the impending attack and were defeated, all serving as a warning to nearby warlords that attacking us can be costly. \n\nThe nationalists have only proven that they underestimate us as a foe, and that the People's Republic is once again on the rise.
translation: 直面国民党的进攻非常的成功.其在当地集结的针对红军的部队不知道我们已经得到他们进攻计划的情报，最终被我们击败了，这将是对周围军阀的一次严重震慑让他们知道进攻我们将是损失惨重的行动。\n\n国民党分子大大的低估了我们，人民共和国再度崛起。

original: Political Power grows out of the barrel of a gun.
translation: 枪杆子里出政权。

original: Clash with Communist Guerrillas
translation: 与共党民兵发生冲突

original: With both us and the Chinese Red Army barely having recovered from our previous offensive, our mutual troop presence close to the border has reignited the conflict. In addition to the local warlords and militias, we have considered moving in more troops from elsewhere.\n\nAlthough this may not give us opportunity to crush the communist menace once and for all, it would be an important ideological victory to show that they will not be allowed to expand further.
translation: 随着我们和中国红军都刚刚勉强在我们上次的攻势中恢复过来，我们双方的边境部队又重新点燃了战火。不仅是当地军阀和民兵，我们现在考虑吧其他地方驻扎的兵力也调集过来。\n\n虽然这一次不会让我们有机会把共党分子完全消灭，这依旧是一场主义斗争上的胜利，让他们明白他们别想在扩张一点点了。

original: We must draw the line now!
translation: 现在我们必须画清这最后的界限!

original: We can't afford another confrontation.
translation: 我们承担不起另一场冲突。

original: Defeat in [From.GetName]
translation: 在[From.GetName]被击败

original: Despite our efforts to push show that the communists will not be allowed to expand their influence outside of where they have currently taken refuge, we could not afford to commit enough resources to win the conflict along the [From.GetName] border.\n\nThe sporadic conflicts with communist militias slowly turned out more and more in their favor, which in the end made the campaign a failure in demonstrating that we have the situation under control. If their popular support keeps increasing, the communists could turn out to be a genuine threat.
translation: 尽管我们试图让共产党明白除了他们现在避难的地区以外，任何方向的扩张都将被我们打退，可是我们没办法投入足够的资源在[From.GetName]边境击败他们。\n\n零星的战斗将会积小成大变成他们的优势，最终让我们遏制他们的行动成功化为乌有。如果他们的支持率持续增高，共党分子有可能变成个大麻烦。

original: Troubling.
translation: 我们有麻烦了。

original: Victory in [From.From.GetName]
translation: 在[From.From.GetName]战胜

original: After a number of smaller encounters in the outskirts of our controlled territory, the conflict with the Kuomintang appears to have turned to our advantage. Although maintaining constant pressure has been taxing on our troops and supplies, the effort has been worthwhile. \n\nNo decisive battles have been fought, we have won a slow victory this time, which has strengthened the faith in our cause and fanned the flames of the revolution once again.
translation: 经过我们控制区外围的战场上的数次小冲突，我们与国民党冲突的形式看上去变得对我们有利了.尽管保持这种压力消耗了我们很多战士和物资，不过结果被证明是值得的。\n\n还没有进行大决战，我们的胜利这次是逐步的，这进一步加强了大家对我们革命的信心让革命之火烧的更旺了。

original: This will not be soon forgotten!
translation: 这场胜利不会被百姓忘记的!

original: Defeat in [From.GetName]
translation: 在[From.GetName]被击败

original: Our efforts to wage an indirect war against the increased Kuomintang presence has proven disastrous. The nationalists were simply more dedicated to pushing us back than we thought, perhaps expecting the impact this failure would have on our reputation. Although our army is once again safe to recover, for now, the losses have not gone unnoticed by the locals, and rumors of the failure of the revolution are already spreading to nearby villages.
translation: 我们发动的消灭国民党外围势力的攻势被证明是灾难式的.国民党人比我们预期的决心要大得多，可能是他们预期如果他们失败的话将对我们的革命事业的帮助.尽管我们的部队再一次暂时的安全撤离，但是我们的损失被当地人看在眼里了，关于我们革命可能会失败的流言在附近村落里传播。

original: The revolution is far from dead!
translation: 我们的革命远没有失败!

original: Victory in [From.From.GetName]
translation: 在[From.From.GetName]的胜利

original: Our efforts to draw the line against the threat of communism have been successful. The CPCs guerrilla campaigns in response to our increased troop presence in regions surrounding their power base failed to anticipate our dedication to stopping them. This show of strength, although not entirely without costs, has convinced many of the locals who previously gave their tacit support to [From.GetLeader] and his party have now begun to realize that China can never be united under such an ideology.
translation: 我们遏制共党的决心十分成功.共产党民兵试图游击战来阻止我们对这一地区的增援并包围他们根据地的部署，不过他们未料到我们消灭他们的决心.这次我们展示的力量，尽管有它的成本，但是说服的当地曾经支持[From.GetLeader]和他们党派的民众，中国在共产主义的蛊惑下永远得不到统一。

original: Let us hope they remember.
translation: 希望他们能长记性。

original: Clash with Nationalist Army
translation: 与国民党军队的冲突

original: While we have still barely recovered from their previous offensive, the nationalists appear to be increasing their troop presence in the areas close to our border. Clearly, they are trying to show that they once again have us contained and that the Great March only delayed their final strike against the CPC. We cannot let the people think this is true.
translation: 尽管我们很勉强的从他们上一次的进攻后恢复了过来，国民党又在我们的边境线上增兵了.很明显他们试图表现出他们已经把我们遏制住了，而且长征只是延后了他们消灭我们的时间.我们不能让民众认为这是真的。

original: We cannot afford to spend our time recovering.
translation: 我们不能继续把时间都花在恢复兵力上了。

original: China Comes Under Further Attack
translation: 中国被再一次攻击了

original: Like a cat Japan advances and took Korea. They sought to humiliate us with their twenty-one demands, they occupy Manchuria and now they advance again. Well, no more, China will fight to her last to be free. In a speech to the people, [Root.GetLeader] appealed to all [Root.GetAdjective], that they stand together or face certain doom alone.
translation: 像一只猫一样日本占领了韩国进一步靠近了我们.他们试图用二十一条羞辱我们，他们占领了东北现在又想要更多.这已经足够了，中国为了她的自由将战斗到最后一人.在对全国人民的讲话中，[Root.GetLeader]请求所有的[Root.GetAdjective]，希望大家肩并肩作战而不是独自灭亡。

original: For China!
translation: 为了中国!

original: China Is Under Attack
translation: 中国被攻击了

original: It is time we stand together against our common foe, the Japanese. Let us lay aside petty squabbles and fight as a strong, united China!
translation: 是时候我们站在同一战线面对我们的共同敌人，日本人了.让我们放下我们不在那么重要的冲突，为了祖国母亲一起作战!

original: United we are strong!
translation: 团结才有力量!

original: We must fight off the invaders!
translation: 我们必须击败入侵者!

original: China Is Under Attack
translation: 中国被攻击了

original: With the Soviet Union occupied with the war against Germany we have been advised that they will no longer be able to provide the same amount of protection as they have done in the past. It will be in our best interests to gain the support of the KMT and join them in their war against Japan.
translation: 随着苏联焦头烂额的忙着与德国人作战，我们被告知他们将无力如以前一样保护我们了.为了我们的最大利益我们应该团结国民党加入他们的对日抗战。

original: United we are strong!
translation: 团结才有力量!

original: Let us fight back the Japanese menace together.
translation: 让我们一起击败日本的威胁。

original: Our interests are best protected by the mighty Soviet
translation: 对我们的最有利的选择是被伟大的苏联保护

original: China Unites
translation: 中国团结起来了

original: [From.GetName] has chosen to join us in the fight against the Japanese. United we will drive the invader back.
translation: [From.GetName]决定加入我们对日抗战.团结起来的我们一定会把入侵者打回他们老家。

original: United we are strong!
translation: 团结才有力量!

original: China Is Under Attack
translation: 中国被攻击了

original: China is under attack. The warlords are putting aside their grievances to fight against the invading Japanese forces. This is an opportunity to advance the interests of the CPC, we can show the people of China that it is us and not the decadent KMT who are the true future for China. Should we join the fight as well and ensure that there is a future for China?
translation: 中国被攻击了.军阀们都决定搁置他们的矛盾一起抗击日本入侵者。这是个发展中国共产党的好机会，我们可以向广大的中国人民证明只有我们才是中国未来的领导者而不是分裂的国民党.不过我们是不是应该也加入抗战来保证中国有个未来呢？

original: Will receive 10 divisions from Soviet.
translation: 将收到来自苏联的十个师的增援。

original: United we are strong!
translation: 团结就是力量!

original: They will have to handle Japan without our help
translation: 他们自己打日本去吧，我们不进行支援

original: \nNorthern China and Manchuria can now be liberated in the name of the [Root.GetName].\n
translation: \n现在可以以[Root.GetName]的名义解放华北与满洲。\n

original: China Unites
translation: 全中国联合了起来

original: [From.GetName] wants us to join forces in the fight against Japan. They have already joined the [From.GetFactionName] and are ready to put aside old grievances to stand against the Japanese invasion.
translation: [From.GetName]希望我们能联手抗日.他们已经与[From.GetFactionName]联合并放下旧怨一同反抗日军的侵略。

original: United we are strong!
translation: 团结就是力量!

original: We will allow them some control of our nation during the coming war
translation: 我们将允许他们在战争期间对我们的国家拥有一定治理权

original: China Unites
translation: 全中国联合了起来

original: [From.GetName] has joined [Root.GetFactionName] and are ready to fight.
translation: [From.GetName]加入了[Root.GetFactionName]并准备好了战争。

original: We will chase the Japanese devils from our lands
translation: 我们将把所有日本鬼子赶出中国

original: No Longer United
translation: 合作终止

original: [Root.GetFactionName] has served its purpose. There is no longer an enemy to stand united against. Mao Zedong is consolidating his hold over the territories in Northern China. However what hope will they have against our victorious armies.
translation: [Root.GetFactionName]已经达到了目的.不再有共同的敌人可以让我们联合.毛泽东对华北的掌控不断增强.然而面对我们的军队他们依然不堪一击。

original: With the end of the war the true patriots have triumphed. It is time to settle scores with those who hid while we bled.
translation: 随着战争结束，真正的爱国者取得了胜利.现在是时候对那些在我们流血牺牲之时躲在一旁的人进行清算了。

original: @PRC §YPeople's Republic of China§! takes control over Chinese states in §YNorthern China§! and §YManchuria§!\n
translation: @PRC §Y中华人民共和国§!将会控制§Y华北§!和§Y满洲§!\n

original: We no longer have a common enemy
translation: 我们已经没有共同的敌人

original: Communism Advances
translation: 共产主义必胜

original: Our role in the struggle against the hated Japanese dogs has given much prestige to the CPC. More and more people are seeing that we are the future for China, especially in comparison to the corrupt Kuomintang. Party cadres are already organising these people into a new army that will swim the peasant sea.
translation: 我们通过对抗日本狗不断增强了共产党的威信.越来越多的人看到我们才是中国的未来，特别是与腐朽不堪的国民党相比较.党员干部开始将这些人组织成一只新的军队发动人民战争。

original: We must bolster our ranks
translation: 我们必须加强我们的部队

original: Receive 20 divisions
translation: 获得20个师

original: Fight For China!
translation: 为中国而战!

original: §YGain claims on mainland China§!\n
translation: §Y获得了中国大陆的宣称§!\n

original: It is time to rid China of the sickness that is the Kuomintang. We will liberate every Chinese and have a united people under the wise leadership of Mao.
translation: 是时候摆脱国民党这个趴在中国身上的寄生虫了。我们会在伟大领袖毛主席的领导下解放每一个中国人。

original: To War!
translation: 开战!

original: [From.GetName] Declares War
translation: [From.GetName]宣战

original: [From.GetName] and the [From.GetLeader] cabinet has declared war on us.
translation: [From.GetName]和[From.GetLeader]领导班子已经对我们宣战。

original: To War!
translation: 开战!

original: No Longer United
translation: 合作终止

original: [Root.GetFactionName] has served its purpose. There is no longer an enemy to stand united against. We have used the time wisely to build up our support across Northern China and Manchuria and now it is time to formalise our control in this region.
translation: [Root.GetFactionName]已经达成了目的.不再有共同的敌人可以让我们联合。我们明智的建立的对华北和满洲地区的支持，现在是时候正式控制这一地区。

original: We no longer have a common enemy
translation: 我们已不再有共同的敌人

original: Joining the People's Republic of China
translation: 加入中华人民共和国

original: Having broken with the nationalist Kuomintang to liberate the people, we must now join forces with the existing People's Republic of China to avoid splintering the movement. The enemies of China have always relied on our infighting to weaken us; the new socialist state will not make such a mistake!
translation: 我们为了解放人民已经和国民党反动派分裂，我们必须加入中华人民共和国以阻止国家分裂.中国的敌人一直靠内讧削弱我们;新的社会主义国家不会犯这样的错误!

original: United we will defeat the nationalists!
translation: 团结起来打到国民党反动派!

original: Communist Revolters Join the Republic
translation: 共产主义革命家加入中国

original: Having broken free from nationalist control, Chinese revolutionaries who sympathize with our cause have made the decision to join their state with ours under the leadership of [Root.GetLeader]. Now and henceforth, there shall be one united People's Republic of China.
translation: 脱离国民党反动派控制之后，我们与有相同目标的中国革命家已经一起加入了[Root.GetLeader]领导下的国家。从今往后，都只有一个中华人民共和国。

original: We must join to protect our comrades!
translation: 我们必须保护我们的同志!

original: Communist uprisings in [CHI_communist_state.GetName]
translation: 共产党在[CHI_communist_state.GetName]起义

original: The growing communist support in [CHI_communist_state.GetName] has come to a breaking point. Government facilities have been overrun and the rebels have declared that they no longer consider themselves a part of [Root.GetName]. We have effectively lost all control of [CHI_communist_state.GetName] to the communist regime.
translation: 共产党在[CHI_communist_state.GetName]的支持日益高涨，终于达到了临界点.起义军已经占领政府机关宣布脱离[Root.GetName].我们已经失去了[CHI_communist_state.GetName]的控制，到了共产主义政权的手上。

original: We must quell this communist menace!
translation: 我们必须消灭共产党的威胁!

original: Communist uprisings in [CHI_communist_state.GetName]
translation: 共产党在[CHI_communist_state.GetName]起义

original: Having broken free from nationalist control, Chinese revolutionaries who sympathize with our cause have made the decision to join their state with ours under the leadership of [Root.GetLeader]. Now and henceforth, there shall be one united [Root.GetName].
translation: 脱离国民党反动派控制之后，拥有与我们相同目标的中国革命者和我们一起加入了[Root.GetLeader]领导下的国家.从今往后，只有一个[Root.GetName]。

original: We welcome our communist brothers!
translation: 我们欢迎共产主义同志!

original: A [Root.GetAdjective] Capital
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]的首都

original: With the end of the Chinese Civil War, it is time for us to consolidate power in China and show the people that we are the modern incarnation of the Middle Kingdom. We are the state that will guide them into the future.\n\nTo this end, we should have a capital befitting our great state.
translation: 在中国内战结束后，是时候整合全中国的力量并向人民展示我们是中央王国现代的化身。我们是将要带领他们走向未来的国家。\n\n为了实现这个目标，我们首先需要一个适合为我们伟大国家的首都。

original: We shall govern from the old Northern Capital.
translation: 我们应该在北方的旧都治理国家。

original: We shall govern from the old Southern Capital.
translation: 我们应该在南方的旧都治理国家。

original: There is no need to move the seat of government.
translation: 无需迁都。

original: Moves capital to §YNanjing§!.
translation: 把首都迁到§YNanjing§!。

original: There will be no cooperation against external threats.
translation: 不进行抵御外敌的任何合作。

original: Spanish Civil War
translation: 西班牙内战

original: Civil War!
translation: 内战爆发!

original:
A group of powerful generals in the Armed Forces have issued a pronunciamento, denouncing the current government of Spain! They have launched a right-wing coup with the support of conservative monarchists and the clergy. A significant portion of the military has sided with these Nationalists, but so far they have failed to capture any of Spain's major cities with the exception of Sevilla.

Leftist volunteers are meanwhile flocking to the banners of the Republican government, ready to support it against the rebels. These loyalists may be poorly trained, but no one can question their enthusiasm.

The battle-lines have been drawn - which faction should we support?
translation:
一些部队中的高级将领联合发表了一份宣告，谴责西班牙现政府!他们在保皇党和宗教团体的支持下发动右翼政变.大部分军队站在了国民军一边，但他们还未攻克除塞维利亚外的任何西班牙主要城市。

同时志愿者也在共和政府的号召下聚集起来，准备拥护政府对抗叛军。志愿者们可能缺乏训练，但无人可以质疑他们的忠诚。

战争已经爆发- 我们应该选择哪一派？

original: The Nationalists!
translation: 国民军!

original: The Republicans!
translation: 共和军!

original:
After the peaceful election of General Francisco Franco as president of Spain, there was hope that recent years violent uprisings and political turmoil would be put to an end. Rumors that Franco would attempt to create a one-party dictatorship with himself as chief of state has been fueled by the sudden disappearances of several opposition leaders.
After a swift trial, Carabineros officer José Galánfor was convicted of treason and his public execution followed shortly after. Though it was meant as a move to stamp out any will to resist the rise of Nationalist Spain it had the opposite effect. Leftist volunteers and even a group of generals have flocked to the banners of the newly formed People's Army, ready to support the fight against the oppressive Nationalists. Though most are poorly trained, they have managed to capture several key cities in the chaos that ensued the uprising.

The battle-lines have been drawn - which faction should we support?
translation:
弗朗西斯科-佛朗哥和平当选西班牙国家总统之后，有希望结束近年来的暴乱和政治动荡.然而有传言佛朗哥试图建立自己一党专政的国家元首制并且几个反对党的领袖相继失踪。
迅速审讯之后，宪兵军官何塞·加兰佛洛尔被判犯有叛国罪不久后公开处决.虽然处决他是为了震慑反对长枪党统治的人，消灭他们的反对意志，但它起到了相反的效果。左派志愿者甚至一些将领纷纷加入到新成立的共和军的旗帜下，准备支持反对国民军的斗争.虽然大多数都缺乏训练，但他们成功的攻下了几个因起义而混乱的城市。

战争已经爆发 - 我们应该选择哪一派？

original: The People's Army!
translation: 人民阵线!

original: Death to the Rojos!
translation: 杀光共产党!

original: Death to the Falangists!
translation: 杀光长枪党!

original: Seek International Support?
translation: 寻求国际支援？

original: The coup has not been a complete success, but Carlists, Falangists and the Confederation of the Autonomous Right have managed to mobilize a large part of the army to overthrow the Republic, which has too long allowed our proud Christian nation to fall apart into anarchy. The outcome is still uncertain, with the world watching with concern which side will emerge victorious.\n\nWe did not execute this coup by standing idly by, however, and neither should the world if it wants to crush the red threat. Other nations in the same process of restoring their national glory should be willing to come to our aid.
translation: 起义没有完全成功，但保皇派，长枪党以及各右派自治联盟调动了大多数的军队推翻了共和国，结束了其使我们为之自豪的基督教国家变得混乱的统治。结果仍不明朗，全世界都在关注着哪一方会取得胜利。\n\n我们面对政变没有束手就擒，但是，其他不希望被红色政党威胁的国家也该伸出援手。在重建我们的国家时他们应当援助我们。

original: Let's request equipment and munitions.
translation: 让我们请求装备和弹药的支援。

original: Spain must be won with Spanish blood!
translation: 西班牙的战争将由西班牙人流血赢得!

original: Reactionary and fascist forces in the military have sought to crush the Republic in one swift blow, but did not expect the resistance they met in major cities nor the rapid mobilization of workers' militias. Rather than a coup, they have started a war, war on progress and the future the Spanish people wanted.\n\nDemocratic and socialist nations alike voice support for the Republic, but few dare commit to direct involvement. We could ask them to support our endeavor, or the oppressors will come for their liberty and solidarity next.
translation: 军队中的保守派和法西斯党人试图快速粉碎共和国，但他们没想到会在各大城市遇到阻力和工团快速武装化.这不是政变，他们已经发起了战争，是试图摧毁西班牙人民想要的进步与未来的战争。\n\n民主和社会主义国家都表示了对共和国的支持，但很少有实际支援.我们应该要求他们进行援助，否则压迫者下一次威胁的就是他们的自由。

original: This is an international struggle to contain fascism!
translation: 这是一次遏制法西斯的国际斗争!

original: We will not become a puppet of degenerated workers' states!
translation: 我们不会成为堕落的工人国家的傀儡!

original: Nationalist Spain Wants Our Help
translation: 西班牙国民军需要我们的帮助

original: The Spanish Civil War has become a sort of microcosm for our view of the global situation: Communists and liberals seek to destroy old values, and we take up arms to revive them. It is not surprising that the Nationalists in Spain have reached out to us and others to equip them for the coming conflict.
translation: 西班牙内战已经成为国际形势的缩影:共产主义者和自由主义者想要破坏传统，我们将拿起武器阻止他们。西班牙国民军找我们和其他人为了未来的冲突装备他们并不令人惊奇。

original: We promise to send what we can.
translation: 我们将尽可能的帮助他们。

original: If they lack the strength to seize power, they do not deserve it.
translation: 如果他们没有力量夺取政权，他们就不值得支援。

original: Republican Spain Wants Our Help
translation: 西班牙共和军希望得到我们的帮助

original: The attempt to overthrow the Second Spanish Republic is a clear signal that the fascists will not allow the flowers of progress to grow even where they naturally take root. The Republicans and their allies, a mix of democrats, communists and anarchists, have turned to us and other parts of the international community for help. Many nations who claim to defend democracy and liberty have withheld their support for fear of being dragged into the war. How do we respond?
translation: 试图推翻西班牙第二共和国这一行为明确的表示了法西斯主义者不会让进步的鲜花成功生根发芽。共和党人和他们的盟友，民主党人，共产党人和无政府主义者联合在一起，正在寻求我们和国际社会的帮助。许多声称捍卫自由与民主的国家都因害怕被卷入战争而拒绝支援。我们怎么做？

original: Promise them to send arms and equipment.
translation: 答应他们赠送武器装备。

original: [From.GetName] will be thankful if we arrange a lend-lease during the war.
translation: 如果我们能通安排一次租借，[From.GetName]将感激我们。

original: Sadly, we cannot afford to intervene.
translation: 可悲的是，我们不能翻译。

original: Nationalist Spain Appreciates our Help
translation: 西班牙国民军感谢你的帮助

original: Our lend-lease to Nationalist Spain has not gone unnoticed. Should they emerge victorious, we may find ourselves with a strong ally once Spain is rebuilt.
translation: 我们对西班牙国民军的租借获得了他们的感激.他们应当取得胜利，一旦西班牙重建我们将发现我们获得了一个强大的盟友。

original: Let us hope they contain the Red terror.
translation: 让我们相信他们能遏制住红色恐怖。

original: Republican Spain Appreciates our Help
translation: 西班牙共和党感谢您的帮助

original: Our lend-lease to Republican Spain has not gone unnoticed. If the Republic is restored, we can trust they will support our continued efforts to rid the world of fascist scum.
translation: 我们对西班牙共和军的租借获得了他们的感激.如果共和国复兴，我们相信他们会支持我们不断努力消灭法西斯渣渣。

original: Long live the Republic!
translation: 共和国万岁!

original: Madrid Reclaimed
translation: 收回马德里

original: The war is won. Madrid is ours again and we have opportunity to make the age old city the center of Spain once again. It has seen much battle and will require rebuilding. What better way to do this than making it our capital?
translation: 战争胜利了.马德里再一次是我们的了并且我们有机会使这个古老的城市再一次成为西班牙的中心。它经历了太多的战斗，需要重建.有什么方法会比把它作为首都更好？

original: Move capital to Madrid
translation: 迁都马德里

original: Keep current location
translation: 首都位置保持不变

original: Spanish Election of 1936
translation: 1936年西班牙大选

original: The Second Republic has proven to be a fragile existence. Manuel Azaña can be president with the backing of the Popular Front, a broad coalition of left-wing groups supported by republicans, communists and anarchists.\n\nBut the right-wing opposition, encompassing conservatives, monarchists and fascists, is also beginning to unite for the cause of bringing down the Popular Front. Whichever coalition falls apart, their opponents are likely to take advantage of their internal conflicts to launch a revolution. This election is not the final test Spain will have to endure to resolve this conflict.
translation: 第二共和国的存在已经被证明相当脆弱.曼努埃尔·阿扎尼亚在人民战线这一个由共和党人，共产党人和无政府主义者组成的一个广泛的左翼联盟得支持下成为总统。\n\n但右翼反对派，包括保守派，保皇派和法西斯主义者也因人民战线的原因团结起来。无论哪一方联盟先出内乱，他们的对手都可能会利用他们内部矛盾的优势发起一场革命。这次的选举没有解决事情，西班牙将不得不忍受内部的冲突。

original: Maintain the Popular Front.
translation: 支持人民战线。

original: Unite the conservative groups under Falange.
translation: 团结在长枪党之下的保守派。

original: Request Balearic Islands from Spain
translation: 向西班牙索要巴利阿里群岛

original: During the civil war, Italy offered volunteers to fight for the nationalist cause. Although ideological motivations were paramount, Italy also had a strategic stake in the outcome. The defense of the Balearic Islands, especially Majorca, was of special interest to Italy due to their position in the Mediterranean Sea, especially in relation to west European colonies.\n\nNow, [From.GetLeader] has suggested the islands to be transferred to Italian control permanently. Considering their contribution to our victory, there may be merits to the suggestions.
translation: 内战期间，意大利将提供志愿者给国民军.虽然意识形态是一个重要的方面，意大利也有战略赌注在其中。巴利阿里群岛，特别是马略卡的防御，对于意大利由于其在地中海的位置是有特别的利益，尤其是在涉及到西欧国家的殖民地时。\n\n现在，[From.GetLeader]已经建议群岛永久转让给意大利控制.考虑到他们对于战争的贡献，这提议也许有些道理。

original: Let the Italians keep what they defended.
translation: 让意大利人保留他们想要保护的地盘。

original: We did not win this war to bow to foreign demands!
translation: 我们赢得战争后没有必要满足外国人的需求!

original: Spain Gives Up Balearic Islands
translation: 西班牙放弃巴利阿里群岛

original: Thankful of our support and defense of the fascist cause during the Spanish Civil War, [From.GetLeader] has agreed to make our temporary military installations on Majorca, Minorca and Ibiza permanent. Although these islands with their important strategic position are a welcome addition to our empire, it seems the Spaniards now consider the debt repaid.
translation: 为了感谢西班牙内战期间我们的支援和对法西斯主义事业的贡献，[From.GetLeader]已经同意在马略卡建造我们的临时军事基地，而梅诺卡岛和伊维萨岛则是永久的军事基地.尽管这些岛屿对我们的帝国有着重要的战略意义，西班牙人似乎正在考虑偿还债务。

original: As long as they acknowledge us as the rightful owners.
translation: 只要他们承认我们是巴利阿里群岛的合法所有者。

original: Spain Refuses to Give Up Islands
translation: 西班牙拒绝放弃巴利阿里群岛

original: Despite the aid we gave them in the civil war, [From.GetLeader] has now refused to give us the Balearic Islands, which our countrymen fought to defend. Although they insist that they seek to maintain good relations with our nation, making us withdraw the military installations that kept these islands Spanish in the first place is a slight we won't forget.
translation: 尽管我们在内战中给予他们援助，我们的同胞保护他们，但是[From.GetLeader]现在拒绝给我们巴利阿里群岛.虽然他们坚称他们会保持与我们的良好关系，让我们撤出军事设施保持这些岛屿还是西班牙人的是微不足道的小事，但我们永远不会忘记这件事。

original: If the need arises, we might claim them anyway.
translation: 如果有需要，我们无论如何都会要求他们。

original: London Conference
translation: 伦敦会议

original: Our friends in Yugoslavia have come under pressure from our northern neighbor. The corrupt and decadent western powers have shown why they are fading away by failing to stand up for the rights of Yugoslavia. This could be exactly the opening for a younger, more dynamic power who has the right leadership to stride purposely upon the world stage! The Commando Supremo reports they are almost ready to unleash our invincible legions.
translation: 我们在南斯拉夫的朋友们受到了来自我们北方邻国的巨大压力.腐朽堕落的西方势力错误的为了维护在南斯拉夫的权利变得越来越衰弱。这可能是一个更年轻，更有活力的新政权在世界舞台上表演的开始! 最高统帅部他们已经准备好发动我们的无敌军团了。

original: This is our time!
translation: 这是我们的时代!

original: There will be a better opportunity.
translation: 未来有更好的机会。

original: First Ljubljana Award
translation: 第一次卢布尔雅那仲裁

original: As the Yugoslav state collapses under its own contradictions it is time for Italy to take her due. The fading powers in the West may be so afraid of Italy that they will deny her due but new powers are rising who see Italy's true worth. Not only have we secured what was denied to us in the Mutilated Victory but our protectorate of Albania has seen its territory grow too.
