translation: 南斯拉夫由于自身内部矛盾垮台是时候让意大利取代它了.衰落的西方势力是如此的惧怕意大利而拒绝它的介入，但新生势力会看到意大利的价值.不仅我们拿回了曾许诺给我们但没有拿到的土地而且我们的保护国阿尔巴尼亚变得更大了。

original: Our decision to align with the rising power of Germany has paid off. The Yugoslav state is heading for dissolution and the German leadership has the foresight to see the benefits of Italian friendship. Montenegro will be passed to Albania as is only right
translation: 我们决定与德国这一上升力量的结盟已经见到成效。南斯拉夫已经走向解体的边缘而德国也看到了与意大利保持友谊的好处。黑山即将被并入阿尔巴尼亚是唯一正确的选择

original: After the betrayal of our former allies in the west at the Paris peace conference, where we were promised northern Dalmatia, we chose to align ourselves with Berlin. Germany has wisely judged that Italian friendship is too valuable to ignore and our claims in Yugoslavia are to be recognised. The Adriatic will be an Italian lake and justice will be done.
translation: 在巴黎和会上我们遭到曾许诺我们北达尔马提亚的前西方盟友的背叛后，我们选择了与柏林相结盟.德国明智的判断出意大利的友谊极为宝贵并认可了我们在南斯拉夫被忽视的权利.亚得里亚海将成为一个意大利的内海，正义将得到体现。

original: Italy Rises
translation: 意大利的崛起

original: Germany Thwarts our Demands
translation: 德国阻挠我们的诉求

original: Germany has seen fit to thwart our modest, fair and reasonable demands for Vichy territory. Should we leave [From.GetFactionName]?
translation: 德国认为可以阻挠我们对维希法国领土适度的，公平的和合理的诉求。我们应该离开[From.GetFactionName]？

original: Unacceptable. We can do better alone
translation: 不可接受。我们能独自做的更好

original: We will earn their respect
translation: 我们将赢得他们的尊重

original: Germany Supports our Demands
translation: 德国支持我们的诉求

original: Germany has seen the wisdom of supporting our demands for Vichy territory. Vichy has surrendered Savoy and Corsica to us.
translation: 德国已经看到了支持我们对维希法国领土诉求的智慧。维希法国交出了萨伏伊和科西嘉给我们。

original: With a small amount of Germany support Vichy has surrendered Corsica to us
translation: 德国不怎么支持维希法国交出科西嘉给我们

original: Revenge for Italy
translation: 为意大利复仇

original: Germany Almost Supports Us
translation: 德国大体上支持我们

original: Germany has seen fit to meddle in our dispute with Vichy France. They have blocked our attempt to gain Corsica but we still have Savoy.
translation: 德国认为可以介入我们和维希法国的纠纷。他们已经阻止了我们获得科西嘉的企图，但是我们仍然拥有萨伏伊。

original: The Corsica Question has only been Postponed
translation: 科西嘉问题仅仅被推迟了

original: Japan Demands Indochina
translation: 日本诉求印度支那

original: Japanese forces are positioned along the borders of our colony in Indochina, and they are demanding total access to our bases and facilities! If we agree to their request, we are effectively signing over control of Indochina to them. On the other hand, we don't exactly have the means to fight them on this issue.
translation: 日本部队沿着我们的印度支那殖民地安置边界，并且他们正在诉求我们基地和设施的全部进出口! 如果我们同意他们的要求，我们实际上是同意交出印度支那的控制给他们.换句话说，这意味着我们完全不会同他们争论这个问题。

original: We have no choice but to agree.
translation: 我们别无选择，只能同意。

original: Never!
translation: 不可能!

original: Extension of the Maginot Line
translation: 延长马其诺防线

original: Plans for the extension of the Maginot Line all the way to the English Channel have been finished, and construction orders placed. The Belgians have lodged an official protest after seeing our preparations from across the border, but work continues.
translation: 延长马其诺防线直至英吉利海峡的计划已经完成了，并且已经命令建造建筑物。比利时人在看到我们跨越国境的准备后提交了一份正式的抗议，但是工程仍然继续。

original: Perhaps they shouldn't have left our alliance.
translation: 也许他们不应该离开我们的同盟。

original: Extension of the Alpine Line
translation: 延长阿尔卑斯防线

original: We have begun work on improving the fortifications of the Alpine Line. When these new defenses are finished, the Italians would have to be mad to cross the border!
translation: 我们已经开始改善阿尔卑斯防线防御工事的工作。当这些防御工事完成时，意大利人越过国境时将不得不发疯!

original: Let them come!
translation: 让他们来!

original: Defeat
translation: 战胜

original: The battle is lost. Paris has fallen into German hands, and it is only a matter of time before the rest of the country is occupied. We must now think to the future. Elements within the government want an armistice with Germany, but many officers wish to continue the struggle from Britain.\n\nCertain members of the British War Cabinet have suggested another option - a merger of France and Great Britain into a single nation, which will fight on until all of France has been liberated.
translation: 输掉了战争。巴黎落入了德国人的手中，并且他们控制剩余的国家仅仅只是时间上的问题。我们现在必须考虑未来。政府内部想和德国有一份停战协定，但是很多官员希望从英国继续斗争。\n\n某些英国战时内阁的成员有另一个选择的建议 - 合并法国和英国为一个国家，它将作战到整个法国被解放。

original: We must collaborate with the Germans.
translation: 我们必须同德国人合作。

original: §YPlay as Vichy France if Germany grants armistice§!\n
translation: §Y如果德国同意停战协定将用维希法国进行游戏§!\n

original: The fight goes on!
translation: 战斗继续!

original: §YPlay as France if Germany grants armistice§!\n
translation: §Y如果德国同意停战协定将用法国进行游戏§!\n

original: Let us merge with Britain!
translation: 让我们和英国合并!

original: France Proposes Union
translation: 法国打算联盟

original: The situation in France is dire. Many in their government wish to seek an armistice with Germany, but some have responded favorably to a suggestion by members of the British War Cabinet to merge our two nations into one. This Franco-British Union will continue the fight against the Germans until victory is achieved. How should we respond?
translation: 法国的局势是悲惨的。很多政府中的人希望寻求和德国的一份停战协定，但是一些友好的回应是由英国战时内阁成员建议的合并两个国家为一个。这个法英联盟将继续反对德国人直到实现胜利。我们应该怎么回应？

original: No. Britain is Britain, and France is France.
translation: 不。英国是英国，法国是法国。

original: Yes, if that will keep the Frenchmen in the fight!
translation: 好，如果那将让法国人继续战斗!

original: Britain Agrees to Union
translation: 英国同意联盟

original: Britain has agreed to merge our two nations into one. Even now, a new joint government is being formed in London.
translation: 英国已经同意合并两个国家为一个。既然如此，一个新的联合政府将在伦敦成立。

original: To London!
translation: 去伦敦!

original: All §Y[FRA.GetAdjective] cores§! become §Y[ENG.GetAdjective] cores§!.
translation: 所有§Y[FRA.GetAdjective]核心§!成为§Y[ENG.GetAdjective]核心§!。

original: Britain Refuses Union
translation: 英国拒绝联盟

original: The British government has dismissed any possibility of merging our two nations into one. An armistice with Germany at this point is inevitable.
translation: 英国政府驳回了所有合并两个国家为一个的可能。一份和德国的停战协定这一点是不可避免的。

original: We must collaborate.
translation: 我们必须合作。

original: We must continue the fight!
translation: 我们必须继续战斗!

original: Triumph in France
translation: 法国的胜利

original: Our victory in France is nearly complete. The French government has asked for an armistice, and our diplomats have prepared terms which they have agreed to. They will retain control of southern France, while we are free to occupy the rest.
translation: 我们在法国的胜利接近完成。法国政府已经请求了一份停战协定，并且当他们同意时我们的外交官已经准备了条款。他们将保留对法国南部的控制，而我们可以自由的占据剩下的土地。

original: Establish Vichy France.
translation: 成立维希法国。

original: No, Germany will conquer all!
translation: 不，德国将占领全部法国!

original: Establish Bourbon France.
translation: 重建波旁法国。

original: Germany Refuses Armistice!
translation: 德国拒绝停战协定!

original: The Germans have refused our request for an armistice! They are evidently seeking to enslave us all... we have no choice but to fight to the last!
translation: 德国人拒绝了我们停战协定的请求! 他们明显在寻找奴役我们全部的……我们别无选择，只能战斗到最后!

original: We are doomed!
translation: 我们难逃一死了!

original: Stay Together, Stay Strong!
translation: 团结就是力量!

original: As recent events in Paris had an impact on most of us, it is more important than ever that we come together as a nation. We must look at the state our country and not accept, but change the outcome of this war. \n\nForget the past and look to new horizons. We don't know what to expect these following months, but we will face it together!
translation: 通过最近在巴黎的事件对我们大多数人造成的影响，重要的是我们比以往任何时候都更作为一个国家走到一起。我们必须着眼于说明我们国家的不可接受，但是这场战争的结果改变了。\n\n忘记过去，展望新的地平线。我们不知道在随后的几个月里会发生什么，但我们将一起面对!

original: We have seen worse!
translation: 我们已经见过更糟的事!

original: Invitation to French Faction
translation: 邀请法国的党派

original: In an effort to strengthen the Little Entente - Czechoslovakia, Yugoslavia and Romania - and contain the possible resurgence of aggressive expansionism on part of the old Central Powers, France has requested that we join them in an alliance aiming to bring these nations together.
translation: 尝试加强小协约国的力量 - 捷克斯洛伐克，南斯拉夫和罗马尼亚 - 并且包括在旧同盟国部分上复活侵略扩张主义的可能，法国要求我们加入他们的联盟，目的是让这些国家联合。

original: Gladly. The Little Entente needs to be rebuilt.
translation: 当然。小协约国需要重建。

original: [Root.GetName] walks its own path.
translation: [Root.GetName]走自己的路。

original: [From.GetName] Joins French Faction
translation: [From.GetName]加入法国阵营

original: Our plan to stop the Little Entente alliance from falling apart and away from us is making progress. [From.GetLeader] approves of our efforts and has accepted our invitation to an alliance.
translation: 我们计划从阻止小协约国联盟分裂和远离我们方面取得进展。[From.GetLeader]赞许了我们的努力并接受了我们联盟的邀请。

original: We are one step closer to rebuilding the Little Entente.
translation: 我们离重建小协约国更近了一步。

original: [From.GetName] Refuses French Alliance
translation: [From.GetName]拒绝了法国的联盟

original: Despite our best efforts to offer support to the Little Entente, our most recent attempt to reach out to one of the nations has been met with skepticism. [From.GetLeader] has refused to join the alliance, perhaps doubting our motives, or perhaps being concerned that aligning too closely with us would make them a target.
translation: 尽管我们尽最大努力去对小协约国提供支持，我们最近尝试帮助的国家之一已经受到了怀疑。[From.GetLeader]已经拒绝加入联盟，也许是怀疑我们的动机 ，又或许是担心和我们结合的太紧密会增大他们的目标。

original: They could already be a target for all they know!
translation: 他们可能早已是所有他们知道的一个目标!

original: Resistance to the armistice
translation: 抵制停战

original: In the wake of the French armistice with Germany and establishment of a new government in Vichy France, a group of senior officers have rebelled against the new French government. Charles de Gaulle delivered a radio broadcast urging resistance against the collaborationist Vichy regime. De Gaulle effectively assumes leadership of the Free French Forces and continues the fight against the Germans.
translation: 在法国和德国停战之后在维希法国建立一个新政府，一伙高级军官反抗新政府。夏尔戴高乐发表了无线电广播强烈要求抵抗通敌的维希政权。戴高乐实际上已经在自由法国势力中取得领导地位并且继续反对德国人。

original: The fight for France continues.
translation: 法国继续斗争。

original: §YCharles de Gaulle becomes leader of France§!
translation: §Y夏尔戴高乐成为法国的领袖§!

original: Workers threaten with strikes
translation: 工人威胁罢工

original: Following the sacking of two workers at a large factory, struggles between workers and factory owners have erupted across the country. Workers backed by [Root.GetCommunistParty] have organized and are demanding better conditions, such as higher wages and shorter work weeks. This will greatly reduce the output of our factories and is viewed as a victory for [Root.GetCommunistParty]. We are invited to Matignon for negotiations. Do we give in to their demands or stand firm and risk a countrywide strike?
translation: 随着一个大工厂的两名工人被解雇，斗争从工人们和工厂主之间爆发至整个国家。工人们被支持于 [Root.GetCommunistParty]被组织并要求更好的环境，比如提高工资和缩短工作周。这将大大的减少我们工厂的产出并且会被看做是 [Root.GetCommunistParty]的胜利。我们在马蒂尼翁邀请谈判。难道我们要对他们的需求让步或者坚定立场并有全国大罢工的风险？

original: Let them strike
translation: 让他们罢工

original: Negotiate a deal
translation: 谈判

original: Revisit Matignon Agreements
translation: 讨论马蒂尼翁协定

original: With the recently signed Matignon agreements our industry have no way of competing with the German. We are falling behind in production capacity with each passing day. Some factory owners have already started renegotiating some of the rights that were granted at the Matignon Agreements, with little to no resistance from the workers. We have an opportunity to officially revoke the newly gained worker rights countrywide, but risk them rallying behind [Root.GetCommunistParty] once again, in hopes that they will back another strike. Letting the workers keep their rights and focusing on optimizing the current workflow may help reunite the French people and let us grow together.
translation: 随着最近签署马蒂尼翁协定，在工业上我们没有办法和德国人竞争。我们在产能上正在一天天的落后。一些工厂主已经开始重新谈判在马蒂尼翁协定中授予的一些权利，几乎没有来自工人的反对。我们有机会在全国范围正式撤销工人新获得的权利，但是他们有再一次团结在 [Root.GetCommunistParty]后面的风险 ，希望他们将支持其他罢工。让工人们保持他们的权利，并着重于优化当前的工作流程可以帮助法国人重新团结并让我们共同成长。

original: With time we will be as efficient as before
translation: 随着时间推移，我们会像以前一样有效率

original: Revoke their rights and get our industry back on track immediately
translation: 撤销他们的权利并立刻让我们的工业回到正轨

original: Strikes Are Over
translation: 罢工结束了

original: Most workers have now realized that their unreasonable demands will not be met. Their children go hungry and even though [Root.GetCommunistParty] are urging them to continue the strike, they do not possess the resources to continue. With each passing day workers are caving and return to the factories. Our industry will be back to full capacity and it is unlikely we will have strikes anytime soon.
translation: 很多工人现在已经意识到他们无理的要求将无法实现。[Root.GetCommunistParty]要求他们继续罢工，他们的孩子因此挨饿，他们没有办法继续了。每一天工人们都在屈服并返回工厂。我们的工业充满了能量，并且短时间内不会有罢工。

original: Finally we can compete again
translation: 我们终于能继续在国际市场上有竞争力了

original: The Communist Threat
translation: 共产主义威胁

original: The threat that a united Germany and Soviet pose is too great to be ignored. After the two countries agreement for the partition of Poland we have a difficult choice to make. If we let [Root.GetCommunistParty] operate as they have so far we open ourselves to internal struggle as the Soviet grow in power. By proscribing any communist activities or affiliation with [Root.GetCommunistParty] we send a powerful signal to all citizens that we will not tolerate anyone who pose a threat to peace. \nTraditionally we have been able to include [Root.GetCommunistParty] in political discussions, but as they refuse to renounce their allegiance to Moscow it may be time to take drastic measures.
translation: 一个统一的德国和苏维埃带来的威胁太大以至于不能忽视。在两国瓜分波兰的协定后，我们不得不做出艰难的选择。如果我们因为迄今为止苏联增长的力量造成我们自己内部的斗争而让 [Root.GetCommunistParty]管理。通过禁止共产主义活动或加入 [Root.GetCommunistParty]我们对所有公民发出了一个强力的信号，那就是我们不会容忍任何人对和平构成威胁。\n传统上我们有能力将 [Root.GetCommunistParty]包括进政治会议中，但是因为他们拒绝放弃对莫斯科的忠诚，所以采取激烈措施只是时间问题。

original: Proscribe communism in France
translation: 在法国禁止共产主义

original: Disagreements are a part of the democratic process
translation: 不同政见是民主程序的一部分

original: London Conference
translation: 伦敦会议

original: With the regime in Berlin ratcheting up the tension over the border between them and Yugoslavia, the British have chosen to give way. However, Yugoslavia is one of the three pillars on which the Eastern European settlement is built. If it weakens then France's security will suffer. Should prove that we are the greater power and risk fighting alone?
translation: 柏林的政权加大了他们和南斯拉夫边境的紧张气氛，英国人选择了让步。然而，南斯拉夫是在东欧建立据点的三大支柱之一。如果他被削弱那么法国的安全性将会受到影响。难道我们要证明我们是更大的势力并能承担独自战斗的风险？

original: We will keep the peace
translation: 我们将维持和平

original: We will stand for liberty
translation: 我们将站在自由一边

original: London Conference
translation: 伦敦会议

original: With the regime in Berlin ratcheting up the tension over the border between them and Yugoslavia, the British have made the decision to stand against German aggression. Yet the wounds of the last war are not yet healed and our country is deeply divided, are we strong enough to go it alone?
translation: 柏林的政权加大了他们和南斯拉夫边境的紧张气氛，英国人已经做出反对德国的决定。然而在过去战争的创伤还没有愈合时我们就产生了严重的分歧，我们强大到可以单干了吗？

original: It is time to stand up to the Germans
translation: 是时候抵抗德国人了

original: This is the wrong cause
translation: 这是错误的原因

original: Germany Backs Italian Demands
translation: 德国支持意大利人的诉求

original: Germany has acceded to Italian demands for our territory. After our defeat we are really in no condition to contest it.
translation: 德国已经答应了意大利人对我们领土的诉求。在我们失利之后，我们真的已经没有条件去争辩了。

original: Italy is to be given both Savoy and Corsica. This decision from Germany has caused worry in the colonial governors wondering who will be next. The governor of Syria has not waited to find out and has defected to Free France.
translation: 意大利被给予萨伏伊和科西嘉。这个来自德国的决定已经在殖民地总督中造成不知谁将会是下一个的担心。叙利亚总督在还没等到查出就已经叛逃到自由法国。

original: We don't really have a choice.
translation: 我们真的没有选择。

original: The Germans are short sighted fools
translation: 德国人都是见识短浅的傻瓜

original: Syria Defects
translation: 叙利亚叛变

original: Following the German decision to grant Vichy lands to Italy the Syrian administration has chosen to join our side.
translation: 随着德国人决定将维希法国的土地给予意大利，叙利亚当局已经决定加入我们一边。

original: France is one step closer to redemption
translation: 法国一步步接近救赎

original: Britain accepts ally request
translation: 英国接受了盟国的请求

original: 'History has shown how much can be accomplished when our great nations stand side by side. In the spirit of the Entente Cordiale, we are proud to welcome you not only as friends, but as Allies. Together we will be a shining beacon of liberty in a world encroached by the darkness of oppression!'\n\nOur request to join Britain as Allies has been accepted. We can count on their full support in the turbulent times ahead.
translation: '历史已经证明当我们伟大的国家并肩而立时会有多少建树。在友好协议的精神下，我们将自豪的欢迎你不仅是作为朋友，跟是作为盟友。我们将一起通过黑暗的压迫成为自由世界中的一个光辉的灯塔!'\n\n英国已经接受了我们请求作为盟军加入的请求。我们可以依仗他们的全力支持在动荡的年代前进。

original: Together we will hold the line!
translation: 我们将一起守住防线!

original: Britain denies ally request
translation: 英国拒绝了成为盟友的请求

original: 'While we have enjoyed good relations in the past, we cannot risk an escalation of the conflicts across the channel. Germany has earned our trust in the honoring of our Naval Pact, and while we will defend ourselves should the fires spread we will not risk fanning the flames. Peace must always be the goal of any democratic nation.'\n\nOur request to join Britain as Allies has been denied. The British government is unwilling to antagonize Germany further, and will not jeopardize the current peace.
translation: '当我们度过了过去良好关系时期时，我们不能冒险横渡英吉利海峡使冲突升级。德国在兑现海军条约上已经赢得了我们的信任，并且当我们保卫我们自己时不会冒着煽风点火的风险让火势蔓延.和平必须始终是任何民主国家的目标。'\n\n我们作为盟军加入的请求已经被英国拒绝。英国政府不愿意进一步对抗德国，并且认为这不会威胁目前的和平。

original: Their 'peace' is just another word for 'surrender'
translation: 他们口中的“和平”不过是“投降”的另外一种叫法。

original: French Liberation
translation: 法国解放！

original: With the end of the war, the need to maintain a close union with the French nation is also passing. French political parties are increasingly calling for the establishment of a provisional government and a general election.
translation: 随着战争结束，和法国结盟的必要性也逐渐消失了。法国国内呼吁建立临时政府和开始普选的政党越来越多。

original: Of course, our staunch allies are a free people.
translation: 当然，我们是自由人民的坚定盟友。

original: We need to maintain tight security on the mainland.
translation: 我们必须在国内保持戒备森严。

original: Franco-British Union Ends
translation: 英法同盟的结束

original: With Britain at peace, [From.GetLeader] has agreed to the requests by French political parties for the restoration of a provisional French government. Their political integration has been halted, but no doubt the nations will continue to be close friends in the future.
translation: 在与英国达成和平协议后，[From.GetLeader]已经同意由法国政党建立临时政府的要求。各方的政治一体化进程已经停止，但是在未来仍然将会是盟友。

original: Bravo!
translation: 太棒了！

original: I see.
translation: 我明白了。

original: France Extends Maginot Line
translation: 法国扩大了马奇诺防线。

original: The French have decided to extend their Maginot Line west all the way to the English Channel! This clearly shows their intention to abandon us in case of a German invasion. Our embassy in Paris has lodged an official complaint, but it is doubtful whether it will have much impact.
translation: 法国决定扩大马奇诺防线，将其延伸到英吉利海峡。这清晰的表明了法国在德国即将来到的入侵中放弃我们的意图。我们在巴黎的大使已经提出了正式抗议，但估计不会有什么效果。

original: This is an outrage!
translation: 这是暴行！

original: Japanese Build-Up
translation: 日本加强了军力

original: Tensions along the Manchurian border have been tense for some time, and now we are receiving reports from our Mongolian comrades that the Japanese are massing forces in Heilungkiang. Backing down may be seen as a sign of weakness, but if we respond with force the situation could escalate. What are your orders, tovarisch komandir?
translation: 这段时间，满洲边境的紧张局势加重了，我们收到来自蒙古同志的报告：日本正在聚集其在黑龙江的军力。我们退让会被看作虚弱的信号，如果我们以武力回应将进一步恶化紧张的局势。指挥官同志，您的命令是什么？

original: We push back. Hard.
translation: 我们狠狠的打回去。

original: We cannot afford a war with Japan.
translation: 我们无法承担一场与日本的战争。

original: Successful Raid
translation: 奇袭成功

original: Our raid across the Manchurian border against the Japanese forces massing there was a success! We caught them before they had finished their preparations, and our brave soldiers gave them a good beating in the violent skirmish that ensued.
translation: 我们跨越满洲边境，对集结的日本军队的奇袭成功了！我们成功抓住了他们还未完成战斗准备的时机。我们勇敢的士兵漂亮给了他们一个迎头痛击。

original: Well done!
translation: 做的好！

original: Failed Raid
translation: 失败的奇袭

original: Our raid across the Manchurian border against the Japanese forces massing there was a failure! The enemy caught our forces in a pincer movement and we took heavy casualties before we managed to disengage.
translation: 我们跨越满洲边境，对集结的日本军队奇袭失败了！敌人破解了我们进行的钳形攻势，我们在撤退前遭受了严重的损失。

original: Prepare a firing squad.
translation: 组织一个行刑队。

original: Romania Surrenders Bessarabia
translation: 罗马尼亚交出了比萨拉比亚

original: The Romanians have wisely folded to our demands and withdrawn all of their forces from Bessarabia. We will incorporate the territory into the union as the Moldavian Soviet Socialist Republic. Its citizenry will now enjoy the benefits of socialism.
translation: 罗马尼亚人明智的接受了我们的要求并从比萨拉比亚撤出所有军队。比萨拉比亚将成为摩尔达维亚苏维埃社会主义加盟共和国，他们的公民将享受到社会主义太阳的光芒！

original: Excellent.
translation: 太好了

original: Romania Refuses Our Demands
translation: 罗马尼亚拒绝了我们的要求

original: The Romanians have refused to give in to our demands! It looks like we will have to expel their occupying forces from Bessarabia with force.
translation: 罗马尼亚人拒绝屈服，回绝了我们的要求!看来我们要用武力将他们从比萨拉比亚赶走了。

original: Fools!
translation: 蠢货！

original: Estonia Submits
translation: 爱沙尼亚屈服了

original: Estonia has surrendered to our demands. We have replaced the decadent government in Tallinn with a People's Parliament, which has unanimously voted to convert Estonia into a Soviet Socialist Republic. After deliberations, the Supreme Soviet has decided to accept this request.
translation: 爱沙尼亚在我们的要求下投降了。我们在塔林成立了人民代表大会取代了原来衰败的政府。爱沙尼亚人民代表大会随即全票通过了请求加入苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的决议，在审议之后，最高苏维埃同意了这个请求。

original: Welcome to the union, comrades.
translation: 欢迎加入苏联，同志。

original: Estonia Refuses Our Offer
translation: 爱沙尼亚拒绝了我们的提议

original: Estonia has outrageously decided to refuse our generous offer of a mutual assistance pact! The capitalists and sycophants in Tallinn have further had the gall to issue a statement demanding that we respect the territorial integrity of their nation!
translation: 爱沙尼亚蛮横的拒绝了我们慷慨的援助协议！塔林的资本主义者和献媚者竟然胆敢发表声明，要我们尊重他们的领土完整！

original: We must protect the Estonians from themselves.
translation: 我们必须从爱沙尼亚那里保护爱沙尼亚人。

original: Latvia Submits
translation: 拉脱维亚屈服了

original: The Latvian government in Riga has agreed to our demands, and we have replaced their corrupt rule with a People's Assembly. This body has unanimously voted to request membership in our great union as a Soviet Socialist Republic. We have graciously agreed to fulfill this request.
translation: 里加的拉脱维亚政府同意了我们的要求，我们用人民代表大会取代了他们腐败的政府。拉脱维亚人民代表大会随后全体一致通过了请求加入伟大的苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的决议，我们仁慈的同意了他们的请求。

original: You are socialists now!
translation: 你们现在是社会主义者了！

original: Latvia Refuses Our Offer
translation: 拉脱维亚拒绝了我们的提议

original: The bourgeoisie oppressors ruling Latvia have chosen to abandon all reason. They have rejected our generous mutual assistance pact, and are demanding the immediate withdrawal of all Soviet forces 'massing' along their border.
translation: 统治的拉脱维亚的资产阶级压迫者们毫无理由的拒绝了我们的慷慨的援助协议，并要求我们立刻从境内撤出所有的军队。

original: The Latvian people must be liberated.
translation: 拉脱维亚人民必须得到解放。

original: Lithuania Submits
translation: 立陶宛屈服了

original: Our request for military bases in Lithuania has been granted, but unfortunately their government has collapsed. We have established a People's Parliament to avoid anarchy, and they have unanimously voted to petition the Supreme Soviet for membership in our union. This request has been granted.
translation: 我们在立陶宛建立军事基地的要求被同意了。但不幸的是，立陶宛政府随即垮台了。我们建立了一个人民代表大会避免了立陶宛的无政府状态。立陶宛人民代表大会全体一致的通过决议，请求最高苏维埃允许立陶宛成为苏联的一份子，我们同意了这个请求。

original: We will save you from capitalism.
translation: 我们会从资本主义的魔爪中拯救你们。

original: Lithuania Refuses Our Offer
translation: 立陶宛拒绝了我们的提议

original: Lithuania seems bent on self-destruction, and the fools in their government are denying our forces access to their country. Do they think they would be better off under the Germans? Their selfish leaders are committing a crime against the people by denying their citizens true socialism.
translation: 立陶宛看起来下决心走向自我毁灭，他们政府的蠢货们以为在德国人支配下能活的更好？这帮拒绝自己的人民加入社会主义的自私领导人正在犯下滔天罪行。

original: The Lithuanian people have suffered enough.
translation: 立陶宛人民已经受够了苦难了。

original: Finland Accepts Our Demands
translation: 芬兰同意了我们的要求

original: The overwhelming forces we massed along their borders have convinced the Finnish government to accept our modest request for a revision of their borders. We have gained control of Karelia, and the position of Leningrad is now much more secure.
translation: 在苏芬边境势不可挡的压境大军使芬兰政府接受了我们修改边境线的谦逊协议。卡累利阿已经在我们的控制之下了，列宁格勒方向的安全已经可以进一步的确保了。T

original: We expected them to put up a fight...
translation: 我们本来期望他们来打一仗……

original: Finland Rejects Our Demands
translation: 芬兰拒绝了我们的要求

original: The Finnish government has rejected our demands, but this was to be expected. If we want Karelia, we will have to take it by force. It is time to teach the stubborn Finns a lesson they won't forget!
translation: 芬兰政府拒绝了我们的要求，但这正是我们所期待的。如果我们想要卡累利阿，我们自己会用武力夺取。现在是给顽固的芬兰人上一堂深刻的课程的时候了！

original: We will crush them in a few weeks.
translation: 我们几周内就会击垮他们。

original: Membership in the USSR
translation: 苏联的成员国

original: We are under pressure from Moscow to officially join the USSR. Should we agree to this?
translation: 莫斯科胁迫我们正式加入苏联，我们应屈服于莫斯科的要求么？

original: Yes, let us join them.
translation: 好吧，让我们加入苏联。

original: No, we have yet to reach our full potential!
translation: 不！我们还没有发挥出自己全部的潜能！

original: Tannu Tuva Refuses!
translation: 唐努图瓦拒绝屈服！

original: The Tuvans have outrageously refused to merge with the Soviet Union! What such a pitiful nation could possibly hope to accomplish on its own is a mystery that may never be answered.
translation: 唐努图瓦蛮横的拒绝了成为苏联的一份子！没人明白这个可怜的国家自己单干是想要做什么。

original: Best of luck to them.
translation: 祝他们好运。

original: The Annexation of Tannu Tuva
translation: 唐努图瓦的合并

original: The Supreme Soviet has received a formal request from the Tuvan parliament for membership in the Soviet Union. They will be organized as the Tuvan Autonomous Oblast in the Russian SFSR.
translation: 最高苏维埃收到了唐努图瓦议会加入苏联的请求。他们将成为俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国的图瓦自治洲。

original: Welcome to the union, comrades.
translation: 欢迎加入苏联，同志。

original: Improving the Stalin Line
translation: 强化斯大林防线

original: A thorough revision of the defensive fortifications along our western border regions has been completed, and convicts from our corrective labor camps stand ready to begin work. Soon the Stalin Line will live up to its glorious namesake!
translation: 我们西部边境防线的全面强化修正方案已经完成，集中营的劳改犯们也已经准备就绪了，很快斯大林防线将对得起它闪耀的名字！

original: Comrade Stalin will be proud!
translation: 斯大林同志会为此骄傲的！

original: The Partitioning of Poland
translation: 瓜分波兰

original: Poland is ours, but the western parts fall under the [GER.GetAdjective] sphere of influence according to the stipulations of the Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact. Should we withdraw our forces and let the [GER.GetAdjective]s occupy this territory? Failure to do so would render our treaty void.
translation: 波兰已经是我们的了，不过西部地区按照苏德互不侵犯条约的条款属于[GER.GetAdjective]的管辖范围。我们应不应该撤走我们的部队让[GER.GetAdjective]人占领这个地区？ 如果我们不撤出的话整个条约将会失效。

original: Yes. Now is not the time to break treaties.
translation: 撤出。现在还不是撕毁条约的时候。

original: No! All of Poland belongs to the Motherland!
translation: 不！整个波兰都是祖国母亲的！

original: Soviets honor the pact
translation: 苏联遵守了条约

original: In accordance with the treaty, the [SOV.GetAdjective]s have turned over the western parts of Poland to our administration. German troops have moved in to provide security.
translation: 遵照条约，[SOV.GetAdjective]部队已经将波兰西部的控制权移交给了我们。德国部队已经进驻。

original: Excellent.
translation: 好极了。

original: Soviets violate the pact
translation: 苏联背弃了条约

original: Despite repeated assurances, the Soviets have so far not pulled back their troops, nor have they made any move to turn over the territories and return to the borders we have agreed on. It appears that they have no intention of following the treaty.
translation: 尽管苏联多次承诺会遵守条约，但是苏军到目前为止完全没有后撤，也没有任何按照条约进行移交准备的迹象。看样子他们根本没有打算遵守条约。

original: It was not even worth the ink!
translation: 跟他们谈判完全是浪费笔墨！

original: The Russians Demand Karelia
translation: 俄国人索要卡累利阿

original: Citing the need to create a security buffer for Leningrad, officials from the Soviet Union have asked for a revision of our borders. They want us to cede Karelia to them, and judging by the build-up of Soviet forces along our border, they will not take no for an answer. How should we respond?
translation: 为了给列宁格勒创造一个缓冲区，苏联正式要求修订边境线，他们要求我们割让卡累利阿，从在边境线上不断聚积的苏联大军来看，他们不会接受拒绝的答案。我们应该怎么回应？

original: We have no choice but to accept their demands.
translation: 我们没有选择，只能接受他们的要求。

original: Let them come if they dare!
translation: 他们敢的话就来啊！

original: Request Swedish Assistance in War
translation: 请求瑞典的战争援助

original: Finland and the Soviet Union are at war. After only a few decades of sovereignty, we now risk once again becoming the subject of one of our neighbors.\n\nThe threat of our enemy extends beyond our borders, however. Our neighbors in Sweden are still retaining a neutral stance towards the Soviet Union, but could perhaps be convinced to join us in defending our mutual legacy and secure their own strategic buffer.
translation: 芬兰和苏联开战了。国家独立不过几十年，我们又一次成为邻国冒险的目标。\n\n敌人的威胁已经在边境线展开，不论如何，我们的邻国瑞典仍然保持着中立的态势，或许我们可以说服他们保卫我们的国家，保护他们的战略缓冲区。

original: They should contribute to the stand we've taken.
translation: 他们应对我们的立场做出实质性支援。

original: We have no need for the help of old oppressors.
translation: 我们不需要曾经的压迫者给予的帮助。

original: Finland Seeks Swedish Support
translation: 芬兰寻求瑞典的支援

original: Our neighbor Finland has refused to give in to pressures from the Soviet Union, and the nations are now in a state of war. Although no formal alliance has been agreed upon between our countries, the Finnish government has requested that Sweden contribute to a joint defense of Åland, which remains largely Swedish-speaking and strategically important to both countries.\n\nWhile the government remains divided on what steps we should take to help Finland, the public support for their defense is notable. How far are we willing to go to protect our fellow Nordic counties from eastern aggression?
translation: 我们的邻国芬兰拒绝屈服于苏联，现在他们正在交战。尽管我们和芬兰之间没有正式结盟，但是芬兰政府仍然请求瑞典一同防守奥兰。那里居住者大量讲瑞典语的居民，而且对我们两国来说都是战略要地。\n\n当政府在为了究竟援助芬兰到什么程度而产生分歧时，国内民众支持援助芬兰的情绪高涨。我们为了保护斯堪的纳维亚国家免受东方的入侵而愿意走多远呢？

original: We must retain our neutrality.
translation: 我们必须保持中立。

original: If public support is what they have, send volunteers and equipment.
translation: 既然公众支持援助芬兰，那么就派遣志愿军并援助装备。

original: Finland's cause is ours! To war!
translation: 芬兰的事情就是我们的事情，开战吧！

original: Sweden Rejects Request
translation: 瑞典拒绝了我们的请求

original: The Swedish government has responded negatively to our request for aid in the war against the Soviet Union. Preferring to remain neutral to avoid international and internal repercussions, they are so far opposed to contributing to the war in any way.
translation: 瑞典政府拒绝了在对苏战争对我们进行援助。他们保持中立以避免国内和国外的反响，他们为了避免战争怎么都行。

original: Let's hope they realize their mistake before it's too late.
translation: 希望他们能够在事态变得无可挽回前认识到错误。

original: Sweden Sends Volunteers
translation: 瑞典派出了志愿军

original: The Swedish government has been unwilling to join us in the war against the Soviet Union, but public support among our neighbors is still high, and many volunteers from the other Nordic countries have offered to join our ranks to aid the war effort. Although less than we hoped, at least there is some popular awareness about the threat we are facing.
translation: 瑞典政府并不愿意加入我们对抗苏联的战争，但瑞典民众支持我们的呼声越来越高，许多斯堪地维亚志愿者加入了我们的阵营，虽然数量少于我们的期望，对我们面临的威胁仍然是有帮助的。

original: It's the least one would expect.
translation: 这是最低的预期。

original: Sweden Joins Our War
translation: 瑞典参战

original: Our request to the Swedish government for a joint defense of Åland has been met above expectations. Sweden has joined us in war against the Soviet Union, refusing to remain neutral in the face of such a blatant threat. Despite internal disagreements, they will now fight with us side by side to secure continued Finnish sovereignty.
translation: 瑞典政府已经同意了和我们一起共同防御防御奥兰的请求。他们已经加入了我们对抗苏联的战争，不再保持中立以这应对紧迫而又明目张胆的威胁。尽管国内有反对呼声，瑞典将和我们肩并肩一起捍卫芬兰的主权。

original: This day will be remembered.
translation: 这一天将永远铭记在心。

original: Peace Negotiations With [SOV.GetNameDef]
translation: 和[SOV.GetNameDef]和谈

original: [Root.GetAdjective] communist Hella Wuolijoki has contacted our government and offered her help in establishing contact with the [SOV.GetAdjective] regime. A meeting has been set up in a secret location in Sweden, where we will be offered the opportunity to cede territory in return for continued [Root.GetAdjective] sovereignty. \n\nThe Finnish forces are rapidly depleting, and previous attempts to open a line of communication has been unsuccesful. This may be our only hope for a peaceful resolution to the conflict.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]的共产主义者海拉·伍里约基和我们联系并提出：她可以提供帮助，和[SOV.GetAdjective]政府接触并联系。安排一个位于瑞典的秘密地点进行的会议，讨论以割让领土换取继续维持[Root.GetAdjective]的主权。\n\n芬兰的军队损失殆尽，上一次与苏联展开谈判的尝试也没能成功。这可能是我们和平解决这次冲突的唯一希望。

original: §YIf [SOV.GetName] accepts:\n§!
translation: §YIf [SOV.GetName]被接受：\n§!

original: There is no winning this war
translation: 这场战争没有胜利者

original: We must keep fighting!
translation: 我们必须继续战斗！

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Offers Concessions
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]让步了

original: The war with [From.GetNameDef] has been a costly affair, but as we have been able to push back the [From.GetAdjective] army, they have presented us with a compelling offer. We are given control of strategically important areas, but need to withdraw our troops and cease further hostilities.\nThis will end our offensive on [From.GetNameDef] without full control over the region, but will in turn allow us to focus on extending our sphere of influece in other parts of the world.
translation: 和[From.GetNameDef]的战争损失惨重，但自从我们有能力击退[From.GetAdjective]的军队后，对方只好提供了让步的协议。我们得到了几处战略要地，但必须撤军且停止进一步的敌对行动。\n这会在还没取得此地区完整控制权就终止对[From.GetNameDef]攻击行动，但我们可以把焦点和影响力转移到世界的其他地方了。

original: Our soldier are needed elsewhere
translation: 其他地区也需要我们的士兵

original: We need all of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: 我们需要整个[From.GetNameDef]

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Refuses
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝要求

original: The negotiations initiated with [From.GetNameDef] has broken down. It was obviously a ruse to waste our time while the [From.GetAdjective] army positioned for yet another assault on [Root.GetAdjective] territory.\n\n[Root.GetNameDef] will stand tall and fight till the bitter end.
translation: 和[From.GetNameDef]的谈判已经破裂。这显然是为[From.GetAdjective]军队另一次攻击[Root.GetAdjective]地区而拖延时间的策略。\n\n[Root.GetNameDef]将巍然屹立并继续战斗直到最后。

original: They shall bleed for every step!
translation: 他们每前进一步都要付出血的代价！

original: Finland agrees to Soviet demands and cedes §YKarjala, Salla and Petsamo§!.
translation: 芬兰屈服于苏联的要求并割让了§Y卡累利阿、萨拉和贝柴摩§!。

original: Chinese authorities claim that the 'breaking point' has been reached in regards to our 'unwarranted aggressions' towards China! Our demands for reparations have been refused, and there are reports of Japanese nationals coming under attack in Shanghai. If we needed an excuse to deal decisively with the Chinese, this is it!
translation: 中国政府声称我们的'非法侵略'行为已经达到了'不可容忍的地步'！我们的要求已经被拒绝，现在有报告称日本国民在上海遭到了攻击。如果我们需要一个彻底解决中国的借口，就用这个吧！

original: They will pay for this!
translation: 他们会为此付出代价！

original: Surprisingly, the Chinese have chosen to back down following the skirmish at the Marco Polo Bridge. They understand that angering us carries a steep price, and have agreed to extensive territorial concessions that include Beijing and its surrounding regions. Little by little, China is becoming ours.
translation: 出乎意料！中国在卢沟桥事件中选择了忍让。他们明白激怒我们要付出何等巨大的代价，所以决定同意割让平津地区。中国正一点一点地变成我们的囊中之物。

original: The war will have to wait.
translation: 看来战争还要再等一会儿。

original: Border Skirmish: Soviet Victory
translation: 边境冲突：苏联胜利

original: The Russians and their Mongolian lap dogs detected the build-up of our troops in Heilungkiang, and responded with a large raid across the border before our preparations had been completed! Our forces were badly mauled in the intense skirmishing that followed before the two sides disengaged.
translation: 俄国人和他们的蒙古走狗发现了我们正在增强黑龙江的驻军，他们在我们准备好之前就发动了进攻！我们的部队在血腥的遭遇战中遭到了敌人无情地蹂躏。

original: How could this have happened?!
translation: 为什么会变成这样？！

original: Border Skirmish: Japanese Victory
translation: 边境冲突：日本胜利

original: The Russians and their Mongolian lap dogs detected the build-up of our troops in Heilungkiang, and attempt to launch a large raid across the border to disrupt out preparations! Fortunately, our quick-thinking commanders caught their forces in a pincer movement. We inflicted severe losses on their forces before they fled back across the border.
translation: 俄国人和他们的蒙古走狗发现了我们正在增强黑龙江的驻军，他们越过了国境试图对我们进行先发打击！我们机智的指挥官发现了他们的企图并成功地夹击了敌人。敌人在遭受巨大的损失后夹着尾巴逃回了边境的另一侧。

original: That will teach them!
translation: 这会给他们一个教训！

original: Soviet Withdrawal
translation: 苏联撤退

original: After detecting our troop build-up, the Soviets wisely chose to withdraw their forces from the areas immediately adjacent to the Manchurian border. Our soldiers have temporarily occupied several of their abandoned border outposts. This will hopefully put an end to the ludicrous border claims the Russians and their Mongolian allies have been putting forward.
translation: 在侦测到我们集结的部队后，苏联人很明智地让他们集结满洲边境上的部队向后撤退。我们的士兵们临时地占领了一些被他们遗弃的哨所。这很有希望终结俄国人和他们的蒙古盟友对满洲边境提出的可笑主张。

original: A show of force was all it took.
translation: 这就是为了展现武力。

original: The French Accept Our Demands
translation: 法国接受了我们的要求

original: The French have agreed to our demands, and their bases and facilities in Indochina are at our complete disposal. They have effectively turned over full control of their colony to us.
translation: 法国接受了我们提出的要求，他们在印度支那的基地和其他设施现在完全由我们掌控。他们实际上已经把殖民地的完整控制权交给了我们。

original: A wise move.
translation: 明智的举动。

original: The French Refuse Our Demands
translation: 法国拒绝了我们的要求

original: The French have outrageously refused our demands! It seems that if we want Indochina, we'll have to take it by force!
translation: 法国蛮横地拒绝了我们的要求！看起来如果我们想要得到印度支那，那么我们就得用武力去夺取它！

original: Fools!
translation: 蠢货！

original: Germany Recalls Advisors
translation: 德国召回顾问

original: The Germans have agreed to recall all of their advisors from China. They should be boarding planes bound for Berlin even now. Germany recognizes that the future of Greater East Asia belongs to Japan, not China.
translation: 德国已经召回了他们在中国的所有顾问。现在他们应该已经登上前往柏林的飞机了。德国人意识到大东亚的光辉未来将属于日本，而不是中国。

original: And so they should.
translation: 他们就应该这样做。

original: Germany Refuses Our Request
translation: 德国拒绝了我们的请求

original: The Germans have refused to recall their advisors from China, despite the fact that their military mission interferes directly with our plans for East Asia! Do they not see that this erodes the foundation for our nations to build diplomacy on? Can the Germans even be trusted?
translation: 德国拒绝从中国召回他们的顾问，完全不顾这些顾问的军事任务直接干扰了我们在大东亚的计划！难道他们认不清这样会破坏德日两国外交关系的基础吗？我们究竟能不能信任德国？

original: Then their advisors will die with the rest of the Chinese.
translation: 他们的顾问会和其他的中国人一起死去。

original: Issue Ultimatum to Siam
translation: 对暹罗的最后通牒

original: Amassing troops in Indochina, close to the Siamese border, we have made it clear that our intent to use their land as a base for freeing Southeast Asia from European colonialism is sincere. Hopefully, by allowing them the option of joining us in a military alliance, effectively making Siam a puppet state of the Japanese Empire, we can avoid a meaninglessly one-sided invasion. Of course, if they reject it, this will be tantamount to a declaration of war.
translation: 我们已经在印度支那靠近暹罗边境的地方集结了大量部队，我们的态度很明确，我们真诚地希望使用他们的领土作为基地，将东南亚从欧洲殖民主义的手中解救出来。不过，通过允许他们加入我们的军事同盟，我们很有希望将暹罗变为日本帝国的一个傀儡国，这样就可以省去一次一边倒的入侵行动。当然，如果他们拒绝了我们，那就等同于对我们宣战。

original: We will enter Siam, regardless of what they say.
translation: 我们会进入暹罗，不管他们想要说什么。

original: In hindsight, threatening invasion is too aggressive.
translation: 事后看来，威胁入侵的确太咄咄逼人了。

original: Japan Issues Ultimatum
translation: 日本下达了最后通牒

original: Japan has been gathering forces close to our border for a long time and as suspected, their plan is to use our ports as bases for further expansion into Burma and Malaya. Now, they have presented us with the choices of submitting and allowing them to pass through or facing invasion.\n\nAlthough this could be seen as giving up our sovereignty and turning us into a Japanese puppet state, avoiding a war may be in our best interest.
translation: 日本已经在靠近我们边境的地方集结了大量军队，根据判断，他们的计划是使用我们的港口作为进一步入侵缅甸和马来亚的基地。现在，他们给我们的选择是要么屈服并允许他们通过，要么就面对他们的入侵。\n\n尽管这意味着我们放弃主权并变成日本的傀儡国，但是避免战争才是我们最佳的选择。

original: We will agree to an alliance with Japan.
translation: 我们同意与日本结盟。

original: We will not surrender our independence so easily!
translation: 我们不会轻易放弃自己的独立！

original: Siam Accepts Ultimatum
translation: 暹罗接受最后通牒

original: [From.GetLeader] has wisely decided to accept our ultimatum and forge a military alliance between our nations. Effectively, we will be able to use Siam as a base for future operations in the Pacific.
translation: [From.GetLeader]明智地决定接受我们的最后通牒并与我们结成军事同盟。 事实上，我们将把暹罗变为我们在太平洋下一步行动的基地。

original: The Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere grows stronger.
translation: 大东亚共荣圈愈加强大了。

original: Siam Rejects Ultimatum
translation: 暹罗拒绝最后通牒

original: [From.GetLeader] has rejected our demands to enter Siam and our offer of a military alliance. Having announced our intent to enter regardless, this means war.
translation: [From.GetLeader]拒绝了我们进入暹罗以及结为军事同盟的要求。不过我们已经宣布不管如何都会进入，所以这意味着战争。

original: Unfortunate that it would come to this.
translation: 事情变成这样真是不幸。

original: Soviet Union Demands Bessarabia
translation: 苏联索要比萨拉比亚

original: Soviet forces are concentrating on the other side of our border, and their diplomats have demanded that we cede all of Bessarabia to them! We cannot expect the Germans to intervene, as their pact with the Russians apparently contained a secret protocol that put us inside the Soviet sphere of interest. Should we resist?
translation: 苏联的部队聚集在我们边境线的另一边，他们的外交官要求我们将整个比萨拉比亚割让给他们。我们无法指望德国的调停，因为他们与俄国人签订的条约里似乎包含着一个秘密协议，把我们放在了苏联的利益范围之中。我们应该反抗吗？

original: No. It is hopeless.
translation: 不，那毫无希望。

original: Yes! We will not give up our territory without a fight!
translation: 是的，我们不能不战而退，不能放弃我们的领土！

original: Second Vienna Award
translation: 第二次维也纳裁决

original: Germany has been brought in to mediate our territorial dispute with Hungary, and at the Second Vienna Award they decided that Northern Transylvania should be returned to Hungarian control. Should we accept this decision?
translation: 德国开始调停我们与匈牙利的领土争端，在第二次维也纳裁决上他们决定北特兰西瓦尼亚应该重新由匈牙利控制。我们应该接受这个决定吗？

original: Yes... we have no choice.
translation: 是的，我们别无选择。

original: No, we will never give up Transylvania!
translation: 不，我们绝不会放弃特兰西瓦尼亚！

original: Germany has been brought in to mediate our territorial dispute with Hungary, and at the Second Vienna Award they outrageously decided that all of Transylvania should be restored to Hungarian rule! Should we accept this decision?
translation: 德国开始调停我们与匈牙利的领土争端，在第二次维也纳裁决上他们粗暴地决定整个特兰西瓦尼亚都应该重新由匈牙利统治！我们应该接受这个决定吗？

original: Germany Mediates Dispute
translation: 德国调停争端

original: Germany has been brought in to mediate our territorial dispute with Hungary, and they have wisely decided that Transylvania should remain under Romanian control. The Hungarians are not pleased, but hopefully this will settle the matter once and for all.
translation: 德国开始调停我们与匈牙利的领土争端，在第二次维也纳裁决上他们决定特兰西瓦尼亚应该继续由罗马尼亚控制。匈牙利人很不高兴，但是这个决定有希望一劳永逸地解决问题。

original: Transylvania shall remain Romanian.
translation: 特兰西瓦尼亚应该继续属于罗马尼亚。

original: Treaty of Craiova
translation: 克拉约瓦条约

original: Bulgarian diplomats have come forward, with German backing, requesting the return of Southern Dobrudja - territory we annexed from them in 1913 after the Second Balkan War. The concessions we have already been forced to make seem to have spurred this request.
translation: 保加利亚在德国的支持下，不断派遣外交官来索要南多布罗加——这是我们在1913年第二次巴尔干战争后从他们那里吞并来的领土。我们之前的让步似乎刺激他们提出了这个要求。

original: This will solve the dispute
translation: 这将解决争端

original: No, the line must be drawn here!
translation: 不，边境线必须画在这里！

original: A Hard Choice
translation: 一个艰难的选择

original: We have lost so much territory to our rapacious neighbors. Still, there are opportunities to recover some of the lost land, with interest. All we have to do is pick the right side.
translation: 我们贪婪的邻居已经从我们这里夺走太多的领土了。不过，我们还有机会重新得到一些失去的土地。我们需要做的就是选择正确的阵营。

original: Our only hope is Germany.
translation: 德国是我们唯一的希望。

original: The Soviet Union offers us our best chance
translation: 苏联给我们提供了最好的机会

original: We should stay neutral
translation: 我们应该保持中立

original: Soviet Ultimatum
translation: 苏联最后通牒

original: The Soviet Union is pressuring us to sign a 'mutual assistance' treaty with them, which would give them the right to station forces inside our territory! This is nothing but a thinly veiled attempt to annex our country, but we can offer little resistance to the forces they have stationed on our border.
translation: 苏联正对我们施压，要求我们签订一份“互相援助”条约， 这份条约将使他们有权在我们境内驻扎部队！这完全是要赤裸裸地吞并我们的国家，但是我们根本没有什么方法来抵挡他们驻扎在我们边境线上的部队。

original: Accept the inevitable...
translation: 接受不可避免的结果……

original: They will have to take our land by force!
translation: 他们只有用武力才能夺走我们的土地！

original: Germany Demands Memel
translation: 德国索要梅梅尔

original: German forces are massing in Ostpreussen, and their Foreign Ministry has presented us with an ultimatum! We are to immediately cede the Memel territory to them, or face the threat of military action. Should we agree to their demands?
translation: 德国部队在东普鲁士集结，他们的外交部长向我们下达了一份最后通牒！我们必须立即将梅梅尔割让给他们，不然就要面对他们的军事行动。我们应该同意他们的要求吗？

original: We must accept.
translation: 我们必须同意。

original: Never!
translation: 绝不！

original: Communists In Control.
translation: 共产主义者掌权。

original: [Root.GetName] has chosen solidarity and the political power has been wrenched from the bourgeois. Many within the new government suggest that we fulfill our communist duties and become on with the Soviet Union.
translation: [Root.GetName]选择团结一致，资本家们被迫交出了政权。新政府内的许多人认为我们应该实现我们的共产主义使命，成为苏联的一部分。

original: Our future is best secured if we truely become one with the Motherland.
translation: 和母亲祖国融为一体最符合我们未来的利益。

original: [Root.GetName] has more to offer operating on its own under the protection of the Soviet Union.
translation: [Root.GetName]在苏联的保护下可以更好的开展自己的行动。

original: [Root.GetName] shall remain a sovereign state.
translation: [Root.GetName]应该继续做一个独立的主权国家。

original: [From.GetName] Requests [Root.GetAdjective] Participation in the [From.GetFactionName]
translation: [From.GetName]请求[Root.GetAdjective]参与 [From.GetFactionName]

original: With the signing of a treaty of friendship between our nations, [From.GetName] has requested that [Root.GetName] joins them in their [From.GetFactionName], to unite against the growing threats that surround our nations. Whether communist or fascist, [From.GetName] promises to stand up for [Root.GetAdjective] interests.
translation: ，随着两国友好条约的签订， [From.GetName]请求[Root.GetName]加入他们的[From.GetFactionName]，以共同面对两国之外不断增长的共同威胁。不管是共产主义还是法西斯主义， [From.GetName]都承诺保护 [Root.GetAdjective]的利益。

original: [Root.GetName] stands with its brothers.
translation: [Root.GetName]站在自己兄弟国一边。

original: [Root.GetName] can only survive on its own.
translation: [Root.GetName]只能靠自己了。

original: German Arbitration
translation: 德国仲裁

original: Despite our rightful claim, Germany has decided that Transylvania should remain under Romanian control. They say they are eager to right all the wrongs created at Versailles, but evidently this only holds true where their own borders are concerned.
translation: 德国不顾我们的合理要求，决定让特兰西瓦尼亚继续留在罗马尼亚手中。他们说自己愿意改变所有凡尔赛条约的错误，但明显这只针对他们自己的边界线。

original: Outrageous.
translation: 太离谱了。

original: Second Vienna Award
translation: 第二次维也纳裁决

original: Germany has recognized the validity of our claim, as we knew they would, and Northern Transylvania has been returned to Hungary. This is a historic moment!
translation: 德国认识到我们索求的合理性，正如我们所预料的那样，特兰西瓦尼亚将重新回归匈牙利这是历史性的一刻！

original: A day to celebrate!
translation: 值得庆祝的一天！

original: Germany has not only recognized the validity of our claim, but they have decided that all of Transylvania is to be returned to Hungarian control! This is more than we had dared hope for.
translation: 德国不但认识到我们索求的合理性，而且决定将整个特兰西瓦尼亚重新划归匈牙利！这是我们想都不敢想的结果。

original: Germany recognized the validity of our claim and awarded Northern Transylvania to us, but Romania has stubbornly refused to accept their decision!
translation: 德国认识到我们索求的合理性，将北特兰西瓦尼亚裁决给我们，但是罗马尼亚顽固地拒绝接受这个决定！

original: The fools!
translation: 蠢货！

original: Germany recognized the validity of our claim and awarded all of Transylvania to us, but Romania has stubbornly refused to accept this decision!
translation: 德国认识到我们索求的合理性，将整个特兰西瓦尼亚都裁决给我们，但是罗马尼亚顽固地拒绝接受这个决定！

original: First Ljubljana Award
translation: 第一次卢布尔雅那裁决

original: The Germans may complain about the Treaty of Versailles but they got off lightly compared to the injustice of the Treaty of Trianon. Although they claimed it was about national self-determination, it condemned so many true sons of Hungary to foreign rule. One such wound on Hungarian pride is the province Vojvodina. The return of the lands back to Hungary have righted a wrong inflicted upon us.
translation: 德国人一直抱怨凡尔赛条约的不公平，但是比起特里亚农条约来说，凡尔赛条约算不上什么。尽管这个条约宣称什么民族自决，但是事实的结果是很多匈牙利人受到了外国的统治。匈牙利的尊严受到了伤害，伏伊伏丁那省就是一个例子。这片土地的回归将是对强加在我们身上的错误的一个纠正。

original: Justice of Hungary
translation: 匈牙利的正义

original: Treaty of Craiova - Romania Agrees
translation: 克拉约瓦条约 ——罗马尼亚同意了

original: The Romanian government has accepted German Arbitration in our dispute. Southern Dobrudja has been reunited with Bulgaria!
translation: 罗马尼亚政府接受了德国对我们边境争端的裁决结果。南多布罗加重新回归了保加利亚！

original: At last!
translation: 终于！

original: Treaty of Craiova - Romania Refuses
translation: 克拉约瓦条约 ——罗马尼亚拒绝了

original: The Romanian government has refused our offer to end all all disputes! They claim that Southern Dobrudja now forms an integral part of their nation which they will never give up.
translation: 罗马尼亚政府拒绝接受我们终结所有边境争端的提议！他们宣称南多布罗加现在是他们国家不可分割的一部分，他们绝不会放弃那里。

original: Unacceptable!
translation: 不可接受！

original: First Ljubljana Award
translation: 第一次卢布尔雅那裁决

original: Long have we dreamt of a greater Bulgaria and long have we been treated as second class. Denied our just due at the London Conference, betrayed by our allies in 1913, punished for wanting justice in 1918. Well no longer, Germany seeks to right the wrongs of that so called peace, not just for herself but others too. Bulgaria will now see the return of Macedonia from Yugoslavia.
translation: 长久以来，我们梦想着建立一个伟大的保加利亚，但是却一直被当做二等国家。 伦敦回忆否决了我们的正当要求，我们的盟友在1913年背叛了我们，1918年我们又遭打了惩罚，只因为我们想要正义。现在，德国正在纠正那所谓的和平犯下的错误，他不但是为了自己，也是为了其他国家。 保加利亚现在将要从南斯拉夫手中重新拿回马其顿。

original: Bulgarians rejoice!
translation: 保加利亚人的欢庆日！

original: Treaty Of Craiova
translation: 克拉约瓦条约

original: We have not forgotten on how Romania stabbed us the back in 1913 and cowardly took Southern Dobrudja while our armies were occupied elsewhere. Hungary has used her friendship with Germany to gain revenge on Romania, is it our time now?
translation: 我们没有忘记罗马尼亚在1913年从背后捅了我们一刀，他们在我们军队调往其他地方时懦弱地夺走了南多布罗加。 匈牙利要利用与德国的友谊来向罗马尼亚复仇，我们现在就要采取行动吗？

original: We will have our revenge
translation: 我们将要复仇

original: Revenge is a dish best served cold
translation: 君子报仇，十年不晚

original: Treaty Of Craiova
translation: 克拉约瓦条约

original: Germany has chosen to side with despicable Romanians in our quest for justice. [Root.GetLeader] has let the German ambassador know that Bulgarian expects more from her friends.
translation: 德国选择和罗马尼亚站在一起，而不顾我们正义的要求。 [Root.GetLeader]已经向德国大使表示保加利亚期待德国朋友能够给与更多的帮助。

original: Denied
translation: 拒绝

original: Albania Yields
translation: 阿尔巴尼亚屈服了

original: The Albanian authorities have agreed to our demands, and King Zog has been forced to abdicate. From now and until the end of time, Albania shall be Italian!
translation: 阿尔巴尼亚政权已经同意了我们的要求，佐格国王宣布退位。从今往后，阿尔巴尼亚将属于意大利人！

original: A glorious day.
translation: 一个荣耀的日子。

original: Zog Rejects the Ultimatum
translation: 索古拒绝了最后通牒

original: Defiant to the last, King Zog has rejected our ultimatum. He and his advisors are now trying to scrape together whatever pitiful defenses Albania can muster. We must occupy Tirana and put an end to this farce!
translation: 目中无人且顽固不化的索古一世国王拒绝了我们的最后通牒。他和他的顾问们正在阿尔巴尼亚国内召集军队，试图东拼西凑起一点可怜的防御。我们必将占领地拉那并给这场闹剧画上句点！

original: We could have done this the easy way, Zog!
translation: 我们本可以轻松解决这件事，索古！

original: Italian Ultimatum
translation: 意大利的最后通牒

original: Italian diplomats have presented an ultimatum to us demanding that we submit to their occupation! Albania is to be ruled in a personal union under the Italian king!
translation: 意大利外交官向我们发出了最后通牒，要求我们同意他们的军事占领！阿尔巴尼亚将成为意大利国王统治下的共主邦联！

original: We must submit.
translation: 我们只能接受。

original: It shall not come to pass! Rally to Zog!
translation: 不能让这发生！守卫索古！

original: Extension of the Vallo Alpino
translation: 扩建阿尔卑斯之壁

original: Engineers from the Regio Esercito have studied our northern frontier and identified the locations where the Vallo Alpino needs to be strengthened and expanded. The necessary build orders have already been issued.
translation: 皇家陆军的工程师们研究了我们的北方边界，并指出了阿尔卑斯之壁需要加强和扩充的位置。必要的建设命令已据此下达。

original: If these forts had been here in Hannibal's day...
translation: 如果彼时汉尼拔面对的是这样的堡垒……

original: Italian-German Technology Treaty
translation: 意德技术互助协定

original: Italy suggest an exchange of technology and ideas that will bring our nations closer and make us both stronger.
translation: 意大利建议进行技术和理念的交流，这将拉近两国的外交关系并使得我们一起变得更强！

original: An excellent suggestion!
translation: 好主意！

original: German technology is for the German people only
translation: 德国的技术只为德国人服务

original: Italian-German Technology Treaty - Accepted!
translation: 意德技术互助协定——通过！

original: As we expected, the Germans were delighted to draw up a series of exchanges for technology. It's clear that new winds are blowing in Europe and Italy is now a step closer to reclaiming its former glory!
translation: 如同我们所期望的那样，德国非常乐意进行一些技术交换，很显然一股新风正拂过欧洲，而意大利向着恢复昔日荣光又前进了一步！

original: Great!
translation: 非常好！

original: Italian-German Technology Treaty - Rejected!
translation: 意德技术互助协定——驳回！

original: The Germans have rejected our offer of a treaty.
translation: 德国人拒绝了我们提出的协定。

original: We best look out for ourselves from now on
translation: 我们最好从现在开始为自己着想

original: Join the French faction.
translation: 加入法国的阵营。

original: Mouvement Franciste is gaining ground in France and has asked us to join their faction. Does this further the interests of Italy?
translation: 法兰西斯行动正在法国茁壮成长，他们邀请我们加入他们的阵营。这符合意大利的长远利益吗？

original: Let us join the French.
translation: 让我们加入法国的阵营。

original: The French are not to be trusted
translation: 法国人不值得信任

original: Earhart Wants to Enlist
translation: 埃尔哈特想要参军

original: As American mobilizes for war, we have received an unusual request. Amelia Earhart, the famous aviator who successfully circumvented the globe not long ago, wishes to enlist in the Army Air Corps as a fighter pilot. She has demonstrated considerable skill in mock dogfights, but there are many within the military establishment who frown on the idea of a having a woman flying combat missions. Should we make an exception in her case and let her join?
translation: 在美国宣布进行战争动员后，我们收到了一份特别的申请：在不久前驾驶飞机环游了世界的著名飞行员阿梅莉亚·埃尔哈特希望加入伦军航空队，成为一名战斗机驾驶员。她在模拟狗斗演习中展示了极为丰富的飞行技巧，但许多军队内部人士对于让一个女人执行飞行战斗任务这一想法感到不悦。我们是否应该网开一面，让她加入军队？

original: Yes, we need her.
translation: 当然，我们需要她。

original: No, that won't be necessary.
translation: 不，完全没有必要。

original: Manifest Destiny
translation: 昭昭天命

original: The unique foundation and history of the United States makes it our duty to preserve democracy and freedom in the world. The last decade has proven that this mission cannot be fulfilled without taking up arms against those who seek to destroy it. From now on, every oppressor will have to answer to us, and our armed forces will liberate people across the globe.
translation: 合众国独特的立国之本和历史进程使得维护世界上的民主与自由成为我们与生俱来的使命。过去的十年已经证明，如果我们不拿起武器同试图摧毁这些的家伙们战斗，我们就无法完成这一使命。从现在开始，所有的压迫者都将不得不向我们俯首，我们的军队将解放全人类。

original: Liberty or death!
translation: 不自由，毋宁死！

original: American Fleet in Pearl Harbor
translation: 珍珠港的美国舰队

original: The diplomatic and economic sanctions we have suffered from the United States appears to have been the beginning of something more threatening. The American Pacific Fleet has been stationed in the naval base in Pearl Harbor, Hawaii, clearly signaling that the Americans will maintain a strong presence in the Pacific and continue supporting our enemies. Striking against the base at this point may give us the element of surprise.
translation: 美国对我们施加的诸多外交和经济制裁正日渐成为一些更大的威胁的开始。美国太平洋舰队正停泊在夏威夷珍珠港的海军基地中，这清晰地传达了一个信号：美国将在太平洋上保持强大的存在感，并继续援助我们的敌人。在这个时间点袭击珍珠港或许能给我们带来一些惊喜。

original: Who knows how long the opportunity will last?
translation: 谁知道这个机会能持续多久呢？

original: Destroyers for Bases Agreement
translation: 驱逐舰换基地协议

original: Having taken a stance against the Germans, the US appear interested in ensuring Britain stands strong against the German threat. They are, however, also concerned with maintaining their own naval presence in the Atlantic. In exchange for several of our naval bases, they will supply our nation with destroyer ships. The ships have been in reserve, but accepting will still strengthen the military bonds between our nations, and may be a wise decision.
translation: 在采取了与德国敌对的立场后，美国开始希望英国能够坚定地对抗德国的威胁。然而，他们也希望能够保持他们的海军在大西洋的存在感。我们将提供给他们几座海军基地，而作为交换，他们将提供给我们一些驱逐舰。这些船只都来自预备役，但接受她们依旧能够增强两国间的军事联系，这将是一个明智的选择。

original: This is a unique opportunity.
translation: 这是一个难得的机会。

original: We will gain 34 American Destroyers.\nCanada will gain 6 American Destroyers.
translation: 我们将获得34艘美国驱逐舰。\n加拿大将获得6艘美国驱逐舰。

original: This is clearly more favorable to the US, and unacceptable.
translation: 很明显这对美国更有利，我们不能接受。

original: Britain refuses offer
translation: 英国拒绝了建议

original: Despite our preparations and good intentions, Britain has refused our offer of old Destroyers in exchange for their naval bases.
translation: 尽管我们做了大量的准备，释放了足够的好意，英国还是拒绝了我们用旧驱逐舰交换他们的海军基地的建议。

original: Their loss.
translation: 是他们的损失。

original: Election of [GetYear]
translation: [GetYear]年总统大选

original: The day of the presidential election has arrived. Incumbent Franklin Delano Roosevelt has already implemented several of the programs referred collectively to as the New Deal, intended to take the US out of the Great Depression.\n\nWhile many of the efforts have been popular, his plans to further extend the role and power of the government have been met with criticism from his opponent, Republican Alf Landon. Coming from the oil industry, Landon wants to see greater economic freedom, while Roosevelt and the Democratic Party want to expand Social Security and ensure economic stability. The election may be a close call, or a major victory for the Democrats.
translation: 总统大选的日子到了。现任总统富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福的新政实施了许多计划，打算将美国带出大萧条的低谷。\n\n尽管其中的许多尝试大受欢迎，他进一步扩大政府的作用和权力的计划遭到了其对手共和党人阿尔夫·兰登的强烈批评。出身于石油工业的兰登期望更为自由的经济政策，而罗斯福和民主党想要扩大社会福利并增强经济的稳定性。这次选举，民主党将勉强过关，或者取得巨大的胜利。

original: The Democrats. Four more years!
translation: 支持民主党。再干四年！

original: The Republicans. We must safeguard the ideals of the American system.
translation: 支持共和党。我们必须捍卫美国的传统理念。

original: Roosevelt vs Willkie
translation: 罗斯福对阵威尔基

original: Since the office of President of the United States was first established, no president has ruled for three consecutive terms. However, in light of the precarious state of the world and international developments in the last few years, President Roosevelt has decided to break with tradition and run for a third term. Republican Wendell Willkie, characterized as a dark horse candidate with a background as an industrialist with limited political experience, has been critical both of Roosevelt's economic interventionism and his justifications for running for a third term.\n\nAlthough the candidates have much in common in their foreign policies and Willkie wants to retain some form of the New Deal, many still consider this election a determining point for the future of American democracy.
translation: 自从美国的总统办公室第一次组建以来，还没有哪位总统能够连任三届。然而，鉴于近年来不稳定的世界局势和国际化发展，罗斯福决定打破传统，竞选第三任总统。共和党人温德尔·威尔基被视为候选人中的一匹黑马，他出身实业，从政经验寥寥。威尔基批评了罗斯福在经济方面的干涉主义政策及参选第三任总统的理由。\n\n尽管候选人们在外交政策方面所见略同，而威尔基也希望保留新政中的一些内容，许多人还是将这次选举视作未来美国民主政治的关键点。

original: The Democrats. FDR is indispensable.
translation: 支持民主党。罗斯福不可或缺。

original: The Republicans. We want Willkie!
translation: 支持共和党。我们想要威尔基！

original: Landon vs Roosevelt
translation: 兰登对阵罗斯福

original: President Landon put a stop to the Democrats' continued New Deal reforms four years ago, choosing to rely on the nation's strength lying in industrial companies such as those he helped establish prior to his presidency. Roosevelt, who has continued to campaign in favor of completing the programs he originally planned for his second term, is now running for president again. While he remains a popular candidate, Landon has continued to criticize his efforts to concentrate power in the hands of the president, and has accordingly avoided similar policies himself.\n\nThreats abroad, both to our own nation and others, remain a reality and neither candidate is in favor of the United States turning a blind eye to them. The question is who will lead the arsenal of democracy through these dire times.
translation: 四年前，兰登总统制止了民主党继续推行新政改革的脚步，选择了依赖所谓国家实力，而其根本则在于工业企业，例如他上任总统前一手扶植的那些。而持续进行着政治活动，希望能够完成那些他原本准备在第二个任期中施行的计划的罗斯福，如今也已宣布参选。鉴于他依旧是一位大受欢迎的候选人，兰登还是继续了对他试图扩大总统权力这一点的批评，而他自己也因此避免了推行类似的政策。\n\n一些来自海外的力量正威胁着我们和别国，这一现实依旧存在，而每一位候选人都不希望美国对此熟视无睹。问题仅仅是谁将带领民主的兵工厂跨越这些黑色的年代。

original: The Republicans. Landon is devoted to our values.
translation: 支持共和党。伦敦忠于我们的价值观。

original: The Democrats. Roosevelt is prepared to do what's necessary.
translation: 支持民主党。罗斯福已经准备好去做需要做的一切事。

original: Roosevelt vs Dewey
translation: 罗斯福对阵杜威

original: The presidency of Franklin D. Roosevelt has already been exceptional in many ways. Despite his declining health and the unprecedented length of his presidency, he aspires to continue leading our country through the war effort. The Republicans have been limited in their choices of candidates due to many potential nominees serving in the war, but have chosen Governor Thomas E. Dewey to represent them.\n\nRoosevelt continues to have popular support, but many suspect he may not live to see the end of his term. But is that sufficient to grant Dewey a victory over the man who has taken us this far?
translation: 富兰克林·D·罗斯福的任期已经超出常规好多年了。尽管他的健康状况日渐糟糕，而他的任期也达到了史无前例的长度，他还是准备继续领导我们的国家赢得战争。由于许多潜在的被提名者都在军中服役，共和党在候选人方面的选择很有限，但他们还是选出了纽约州州长托马斯·E·杜威来代表他们。\n\n罗斯福继续维持着高支持率，但许多人猜测他或许看不到自己任期结束的那一天。但这足以代表杜威能够击败一个带领我们走了这么远的人吗？

original: FDR defeats Dewey.
translation: 罗斯福将战胜杜威。

original: Dewey defeats FDR.
translation: 杜威将战胜罗斯福。

original: [Root.GetLeader] vs Roosevelt
translation: [Root.GetLeader]对阵罗斯福

original: Although many aspects of the New Deal were retained by [Root.GetLeader], Roosevelt still sees the opportunity to make his original plans for continued development of the programs reality. Despite declining health, he has managed to retain much of the support which landed him the presidency previously, and is now campaigning for the Democrats again.\n\n[Root.GetLeader] is arguing that a change of leadership in America's sensitive situation would be irresponsible, which is somewhat ironic since the same claim was made before his previous victory over Roosevelt. Despite this, he may have a point.
translation: 尽管[Root.GetLeader]在许多方面都延续了新政，罗斯福还是认为推行他有关计划可持续发展的初始蓝图是可行的。尽管健康状况持续下滑，他还是设法维持了之前助他竞选成功的大多数支持者，并在此宣布代表民主党参选。\n\n[Root.GetLeader]认为在而今这个敏感时期更换领导人很不靠谱，讽刺的是四年前罗斯福在面对他的挑战时也发表过类似的讲话。尽管如此，他的话还是有几分道理。

original: [Root.GetLeader] has proven a capable leader.
translation: [Root.GetLeader]已经证明了他是个合格的领袖。

original: America is ready for a new New Deal.
translation: 美国已经准备好施行一次新的新政。

original: Roosevelt vs MacArthur
translation: 罗斯福对阵麦克阿瑟

original: With the continued threat of being drawn into a war, both Democrats and Republicans have aspired to find a candidate from the military. General Douglas MacArthur, normally devoted to his military duties, has taken the opportunity to campaign for the Republican nomination while our nation is at peace and won. He is now challenging Roosevelt, supporting the conservative coalition.\n\nRoosevelt continues to be popular, but MacArthur's charisma and sense of duty has made a strong impression on voters. Does the military really know best?
translation: 鉴于战争的威胁日益临近，民主党和共和党都期望能找到一位来自军旅的候选人。道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟上将平时专注于他的军人使命，而今，鉴于我们正处于和平且赢得了战争，他也决定抓住机会竞选了共和党的提名。现在他代表保守派联盟向罗斯福发起了挑战。\n\n罗斯福保持着他的支持率，但麦克阿瑟的个人魅力和使命感令选民们印象深刻。军人真的见得多了吗？

original: Roosevelt and Truman will pull through.
translation: 罗斯福和杜鲁门将渡过难关。

original: MacArthur is a man of peace as much as war.
translation: 麦克阿瑟武能上马定乾坤，文可提笔安天下。

original: Campaign of Douglas MacArthur
translation: 道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟的竞选

original: To challenge Roosevelt's record-length presidency, the Republicans have looked to respected military commanders, hoping to find a potential candidate to take America through this war. General Douglas MacArthur has been a popular nominee among the conservatives, but he is also an indispensable asset in the ongoing conflict and has been reluctant to spend his time campaigning for the presidency.\n\nHe nevertheless remains one of the more promising conservative candidates and can perhaps be convinced to campaign to avoid getting a moderate Republican president. Is it worth the sacrifice?
translation: 为了挑战罗斯福创纪录的连任，共和党寄希望于备受尊敬的军队指挥官，想要找到一位潜在的候选人带领美国赢得战争。道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟上将在保守派中备受欢迎，但他也是前线不可或缺的人物。而今他只能勉强同意花费时间参加总统竞选。\n\n然而他从不是一位有希望的保守派竞选人，或许他能够有助于确保最后上台的不会是一个温和派共和党。为此做出的牺牲真的值得吗？

original: MacArthur is needed more on the front lines than in the White House.
translation: 前线比白宫更需要麦克阿瑟。

original: We need him to challenge Roosevelt.
translation: 我们需要他来挑战罗斯福。

original: Roosevelt Passes Away
translation: 罗斯福逝世

original: Although President Roosevelt's health has been in decline for some time, his strong presidential campaign convinced many that he had many years left. However, the possibility of FDR's death while still in office has remained, and today he passed away after suffering a stroke. Vice-President Harry S. Truman has now taken the oath of office, requesting the support and prayers of the people. The old cabinet remains, and Truman has vowed to continue many of the policies of his predecessor.
translation: 尽管罗斯福总统的健康状况已经恶化很久了，他在总统竞选中展现的强健还是让很多人以为他还能坚持很多年。但是，他在任期上去世的可能性一直存在，而在遭遇了今天的一次中风后，罗斯福与世长辞。副总统哈里·S·杜鲁门已宣誓就职，希望人们能够支持和祝福他。旧的内阁得以保持，杜鲁门也已立誓将延续他前任的政策。

original: So ended an era, and so began another.
translation: 一个时代结束了，一个新的时代将要开始。

original: Marco Polo Bridge Incident
translation: 卢沟桥事变

original:
Japanese and Chinese forces have skirmished inconclusively over the strategic Marco Polo Bridge located just southwest of Beijing. 

[CHI.GetNameDef] has rejected [JAP.GetNameDef]'s demands for an apology and territorial concessions, claiming instead that the 'breaking point' of Japanese aggression has been reached. 

Diplomats fear that the volatile situation could result in war at any time.
translation:
日本与中国的军队在北京西南方的战略要地卢沟桥爆发了一场无果而终的冲突。

[CHI.GetNameDef]已经拒绝了[JAP.GetNameDef]提出的中国道歉并就领土问题作出让步的要求，并声明中国政府对日本侵略行为的忍耐已经达到极限。

外交部担心这一不稳定局势随时可能导致战争爆发。

original: Interesting times indeed.
translation: 真是个乱世啊。

original: We'll teach those Chinese!
translation: 我们会好好教训那些中国人！

original: That's right! Not an inch!
translation: 没错！寸土不让！

original:
Japanese and Chinese forces have skirmished inconclusively over the strategic Marco Polo Bridge located just southwest of Beijing. 

[CHI.GetNameDef] has accepted full responsibility for the incident, forwarding an apology to [JAP.GetNameDef] as well as agreeing to extensive territorial concessions. This has surprised many experts, who had predicted that the border tensions would erupt into a full-blown war. 

Does this mean lasting peace in Asia?
translation:
日本与中国的军队在北京西南方的战略要地卢沟桥爆发了一场无果而终的冲突。

[CHI.GetNameDef]声明他将对此负全部责任，并向[JAP.GetNameDef]表达诚挚的歉意，愿在领土问题上作出大量让步。这一声明震惊了许多外交专家，此前他们认为两国边境的紧张局势将引发一场全面战争。

这表示亚洲将维持长久的和平吗？

original: Doubtful.
translation: 令人生疑。

original: This will satisfy us... for now.
translation: 我们对此很满意……就现在而言。

original: We had no choice.
translation: 我们别无他法。

original: [JAP.GetNameDefCap] Demands French Indochina
translation: [JAP.GetNameDefCap]要求获得法属印度支那

original: Taking advantage of French weakness in light of the struggle in Europe, [JAP.GetNameDef] has coerced the new government into surrendering control over their colony in Indochina! \n\nJapanese troops have already moved to occupy all major bases in the region, and experts fear that the colony could be used as a launching point for future military expeditions.
translation: 鉴于法国在欧洲战场上的挣扎所体现的孱弱，[JAP.GetNameDef]决定趁此机会逼迫其新政府放弃其在印度支那殖民地的统治。\n\n日本军队已经前往占领这一地区的重要据点，专家们担心这块殖民地或将成为日本未来军事远征的跳板。

original: Vultures picking on a corpse...
translation: 秃鹫选中了一具尸体……

original: As well it should be.
translation: 确实如此。

original: The jackals left us no choice.
translation: 豺狼使我们别无选择。

original: Our allies show initiative!
translation: 我们的盟友很积极！

original:
Attempting to take advantage of France's weakness in light of their defeat in Europe, [JAP.GetNameDef] recently issued a demand to the new French government for complete access to their bases in Indochina. 

This would effectively mean transferring over control of the entire colony to Japan, something the French could not agree to.

Experts consider it likely that this decision will lead to Japanese military reprisals.
translation:
鉴于法国在欧洲战场上的挣扎所体现的孱弱，[JAP.GetNameDef]试图趁此机会获取利益，于近期向法国新政府提出了完全接管其在印度支那的据点的要求。

这实际上意味着整块殖民地的控制将移交给日本，法国不会同意这一要求。

专家认为这一决定很可能引发日本军队的报复。

original: They wouldn't dare... would they?.
translation: 他们不敢……对吗？

original: The stubborn fools will pay for this mistake.
translation: 那些顽固的蠢蛋会为此付出代价。

original: We must prepare ourselves.
translation: 我们必须做好准备。

original: Another bold move by our friends.
translation: 我们的朋友又作出了一次大胆的行动。

original: Soviet - Japanese Skirmish
translation: 苏日冲突

original:
Soviet and Japanese forces recently clashed in a major skirmish along the Manchurian border. 

A significant Soviet raiding force supported by Mongolian cavalry apparently caught the Japanese by surprise, inflicting heavy casualties. 

The mood in Tokyo has been reported as tense, but it is too early to tell if the conflict will escalate into open warfare.
translation:
苏联和日本最近沿满洲边境爆发了一场冲突。

在蒙古骑兵的掩护下，一支苏联突击队突袭并包围了日本军队，造成了巨大的伤亡。

据报道，现在东京的气氛十分紧张，但断言此次冲突是否会升级为正式开战还为时尚早。

original: Is this the start of another war in Asia?
translation: 这会是亚洲又一场战争的起始吗？

original: A shameful display...
translation: 真是一个耻辱……

original: We have sent a message to the world.
translation: 我们给全世界传达了一则信息。

original:
Soviet and Japanese forces recently clashed in a major skirmish along the Manchurian border. 

Accounts from the battle indicate that the Japanese caught the Soviets in a pincer movement when they attacked across the border, forcing the survivors to withdraw in disarray. 

Will this incident prompt Moscow to dispatch more forces to the Russian Far East?
translation:
苏联和日本最近沿满洲边境爆发了一场冲突。

有关这次战斗的报告显示日本军队跨越边境，以一次钳形攻势包围了苏军，幸存者只能仓皇逃窜。

这次事件会导致莫斯科增加在俄罗斯远东地区的驻军吗？

original: For the Emperor!
translation: 大日本帝国万岁！

original: We must evaluate the situation...
translation: 我们必须评估局势……

original: Soviet Withdrawal
translation: 苏联撤退

original: After a build-up of Japanese forces in Manchuria, the Soviet Union appears to have unexpectedly withdrawn units that were stationed right alongside the border. \n\nThis may be a bid by Moscow to avoid a future confrontation with Japan, possibly triggered by the stinging memory of the defeat Russia endured in the Russo - Japanese War.
translation: 随着日本在满洲的部队不断增加，苏联出人意料地让紧紧压在边境线的部队向后撤退。 \n\n这很可能是莫斯科希望避免在未来与日本发生冲突，也有可能是因为想起了当年在日俄战争中被日本打败的悲惨记忆。

original: Perhaps this will result in a lasting peace.
translation: 也许这能达成一次持久的和平。

original: The cowards fled!
translation: 懦夫们逃走了！

original: A tactical retreat. Nothing more.
translation: 只是一次战术撤退。没什么大不了的。

original: Soviet Union Claims Bessarabia
translation: 苏联索要比萨拉比亚。

original: After massing forces along the Romanian border, [SOV.GetNameDef] has issued an ultimatum to the government in Bucharest for the immediate transfer of Bessarabia, to their control. The region once belonged to the Russian Empire, which [SOV.GetNameDef] sees as sufficient legal basis for their demands.\n\nRomania has declared that it has no choice but to accede, and its forces have been withdrawn from Bessarabia.
translation: 自从一些士兵在罗马尼亚边境失踪后，[SOV.GetNameDef]向布加勒斯特政府下达了一份最后通牒，要求罗马尼亚立即割让比萨拉比亚。这片区域曾经是沙俄帝国的一部分，因此[SOV.GetNameDef]将他们的索求视为正当的。\n\n罗马尼亚已经宣布自己在别无选择的情况下只有接受苏联的要求，比萨拉比亚境内的罗马尼亚部队已经撤离。

original: Interesting.
translation: 有趣。

original: Bessarabia rightfully belongs to us.
translation: 比萨拉比亚本来就属于我们。

original: We had no choice...
translation: 我们别无选择……

original: Enjoy this temporary victory, Moscow.
translation: 享受这暂时的胜利吧，莫斯科。

original: Romania Rejects Soviet Demands
translation: 罗马尼亚拒绝了苏联的要求

original:
[SOV.GetNameDefCap] has been concentrating significant forces along its border to [ROM.GetNameDef], and today Moscow issued an ultimatum to the Romanian government, calling for the immediate transfer of Bessarabia to its control. The region once belonged to the Russian Empire, which [SOV.GetNameDef] sees as sufficient legal basis for their demands.

In a defiant move, Bucharest has chosen to reject all Soviet territorial demands, and the Romanian army has been given the order for a complete mobilization. 

International observers expect Soviet forces to cross the border at any moment.
translation:
[SOV.GetNameDefCap]将大量的部队聚集在与[ROM.GetNameDef]的边境上，同时莫斯科向罗马尼亚政府下达了一份最后通牒，要求立即将比萨拉比亚交由苏联控制。这片区域曾一度属于沙俄帝国，[SOV.GetNameDef]据此将自己的索求正当化。

布加勒斯特以挑衅的姿态拒绝了苏联的所有领土要求，并且下令对军队进行总动员。

国际观察员预计苏军部队可能在任意时刻越过边境。

original: Interesting.
translation: 有趣。

original: They have made a terrible mistake.
translation: 他们犯了一个巨大的错误。

original: Bessarabia is ours!
translation: 比萨拉比亚是我们的！

original: Let the fools fight.
translation: 让那些傻瓜来战斗吧。

original: [FIN.GetNameDefCap] Rejects Soviet Demands
translation: [FIN.GetNameDefCap]拒绝了苏联政府的要求

original:
Soviet diplomats have presented an ultimatum to the government of [FIN.GetNameDef], demanding border adjustments in the region of Karelia. 

Despite a significant build-up of Soviet forces on the border, Helsinki has rejected these demands, stating that "not a single foot of Finnish soil will be given willingly to the Russian aggressors." 

International observers fear that a Soviet invasion may be imminent.
translation:
苏联外交官向[FIN.GetNameDef]政府递交了一份最后通牒，要求调整卡累利阿地区的边境线。

尽管苏联在边境上聚集了大量的部队，赫尔辛基依然拒绝了苏联的要求，声称“我们不会把任何一寸芬兰土地让给俄国侵略者” 

国际观察员表示苏联的入侵随时可能发生。

original: This will not end well.
translation: 此事没法善了。

original: They should not have rejected our demands.
translation: 他们不应该拒绝我们的要求。

original: We must see to our defenses.
translation: 我们必须开展防御。

original: Let us see how well the Bolsheviks do...
translation: 让我们看看布尔什维克有什么本事……

original: They will soon recognize their error.
translation: 他们很快就会认识到自己的错误。

original: [FIN.GetNameDefCap] Accepts Soviet Demands
translation: [FIN.GetNameDefCap]接受了苏联的要求

original:
After much debate, the government of [FIN.GetNameDef] has decided to accept Soviet demands for border adjustments in the region of Karelia. 

[SOV.GetNameDef] has cited the need to create a buffer zone to improve the security of Leningrad, located only 30 kilometers from the now former Finnish border. 

Many observers had feared that a full-scale Soviet invasion of Finland was imminent, but this diplomatic solution should lay those fears to rest.
translation:
在大量的争论后，[FIN.GetNameDef]政府决定接受苏联对于卡累利阿地区的边界调整要求。

[SOV.GetNameDef]以列宁格勒距离苏芬边境只有30公里为由，要求建立一个缓冲区以保障列宁格勒的安全。 

许多观察者一度担心苏联随时可能会发动大规模的入侵，但外交局势的变化让这些担心烟消云散了。

original: Peace, but at what cost?
translation: 但是和平的代价是什么？

original: Now we can focus our efforts elsewhere.
translation: 现在我们能将注意力转到其他地方了。

original: We have secured our independence.
translation: 我们捍卫了自己的独立。

original: A pity. It would have kept the Bolsheviks busy.
translation: 很遗憾，那本可以让布尔什维克忙一阵子。

original: Our comrades show their strength!
translation: 我们的同志展现了他们的力量！

original: [SOV.GetNameDefCap] Annexes [TAN.GetNameDef]
translation: [SOV.GetNameDefCap]吞并了[TAN.GetNameDef]

original:
In a press release earlier today, Moscow announced the formal annexation of [TAN.GetNameDef]. 

The Supreme Soviet agreed to a request from the Tuvan parliament for membership in the USSR. 

The small Tuvan People's Republic, which had only been officially recognized by the Soviet Union and Mongolia, will be organized as an autonomous oblast.
translation:
今天早些时候的一场新闻发布会上，莫斯科宣布正式吞并[TAN.GetNameDef]。 

苏联最高苏维埃同意了图瓦国会的请求，批准它们成为苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的成员。

小小的图瓦人民共和国只得到过苏联和蒙古的承认，在加盟后将成为苏联的一个自治州。

original: Tannu what?
translation: 唐努图什么？

original: They will be better off.
translation: 他们的情况会变得更好。

original: Second Vienna Award
translation: 第二次维也纳仲裁

original:
A treaty has been signed at Vienna following German arbitration that will see Northern Transylvania restored to Hungarian rule.

The territory had previously been awarded to [ROM.GetNameDef] upon the conclusion of World War I, leading to a bitter dispute. 

Are these the first of many borders to be adjusted, now that a new order seems to have been established in Europe?
translation:
在德国仲裁后，与维也纳签订的一份条约规定特兰西瓦尼亚将回归匈牙利的统治。

这片领土在一战后的瓜分中被划分给了[ROM.GetNameDef]，留下了一场苦涩的纠纷。

在欧洲似乎已经建立起新秩序的情况下，这是否开了调整边境的先例？

original: We shall see how long this lasts.
translation: 我们会看看这会持续多久。

original: The map of Europe shall be redrawn.
translation: 欧洲的地图应该重新绘制了。

original: Hopefully these revisions will favor us some day.
translation: 幸好这些修正某天会对我们有利。

original: Hear, hear!
translation: 听着，听着!

original:
Following German arbitration, a treaty has been signed at Vienna that will see all of Transylvania restored to Hungarian rule. 

The territory had previously been awarded to [ROM.GetNameDef] upon the conclusion of World War I, leading to a bitter dispute. 

Are these the first of many borders to be adjusted now that a new order seems to have been established in Europe?
translation:
随着德国的仲裁，一份条约在维也纳签订下来，特兰西瓦尼亚的所有地区将重新由匈牙利统治。

这片领土在一战后的瓜分中被划分给了[ROM.GetNameDef]，留下了一场苦涩的纠纷。 

在欧洲似乎已经建立起新秩序的情况下，这是否开了调整边境的先例？

original: Romania Rejects German Arbitration
translation: 罗马尼亚拒绝德国的仲裁

original:
Negotiations between [HUN.GetNameDef] and [ROM.GetNameDef] regarding a territorial dispute have broken down at Vienna. 

[GER.GetNameDef] acted as arbiter, but when they decided to return Northern Transylvania to [HUN.GetNameDef], [ROM.GetNameDef] rejected the decision. The Romanian government promptly ordered their delegation to return to Bucharest. 

It would appear that [GER.GetNameDef] does not yet wield the diplomatic influence they imagined they did.
translation:
[HUN.GetNameDef]和[ROM.GetNameDef]在维也纳的谈判破裂了。 

[GER.GetNameDef]是两者间的仲裁人，但是当它决定将北特兰西瓦尼亚交还给[HUN.GetNameDef]时，[ROM.GetNameDef]拒绝了这个决定。罗马尼亚政府迅速要求自己的代表团返回布加勒斯特。

看起来[GER.GetNameDef]的外交影响力并不像它自以为的那样强大。

original: Interesting...
translation: 有趣……

original: The Romanians have embarrassed us...
translation: 罗马尼亚人让我们难堪……

original: Transylvania is ours!
translation: 特兰西瓦尼亚是我们的了！

original: This isn't over.
translation: 这事还没完。

original:
Negotiations between [HUN.GetNameDef] and [ROM.GetNameDef] regarding a territorial dispute have broken down at Vienna.
