original: Increases the chance of popular support for a fascist coup.
translation: 提高了人民支持法西斯政变的机率。

original: Fascist Sympathies in the Military
translation: 军队中有法西斯主义的支持者

original: Several high-ranking members of the [Root.GetAdjective] military have expressed support, some privately and some openly, for the Fascist movement in [Root.GetName]. They feel the [Root.GetRulingParty] has forgotten how important force of arms is to keeping the country together, and are increasingly annoyed by the army being treated by the government as more of a tool than a one of the nation's most important institutions. Some of them go as far as to suggest that a new government is needed, one that knows how to lead [Root.GetName] into the next half of the century.\n\nThis faction may not predominantly be politicians, but some of them have gained positions in the department of defense. If these developments continue, they may have sufficient political support to execute a coup.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]军队中的一些高层将领公开表示支持那些秘密的或公开的发生在[Root.GetName]的法西斯运动。他们认为[Root.GetRulingParty]已经忘记了军队对于维持国家统一是多么重要的力量，并且被政府视军队为工具而不是国家最重要机构的轻视态度所激怒。其中不少人认为建立一个新政府是必要的，一个知道如何领导[Root.GetName]屹立在世纪下半叶的新政府。\n\n这一派系在政治中可能并不占主导地位，但是其中一些人已经在国防部中任职。如果这些发展继续下去，他们可能获得足够的政治支持来发动一场政变。

original: The national spirit outranks the government.
translation: 民族精神高于政府。

original: Fascist Coup d'état
translation: 法西斯政变

original: Some will say they saw it coming. Both those who warned against the dangers of fascism and those who extolled it as the savior of [Root.GetName] have found their prophecies made reality today, as the military in [Root.Capital.GetName] overthrew the [Root.GetRulingParty]-led government and seized power. [Root.GetLeader] is missing, rumored to have gone into exile, and the coup has been met with little initial resistance.\n\nThe new [Root.GetAdjective] leadership has no plans to allow resistance to grow, either. Martial law has been declared and with the changes that are underway, whatever comes after is unlikely to be very different.
translation: 有人说，他们看到了它的到来。无论是那些反对法西斯主义或是赞颂它为[Root.GetName]救星的人，发现他们的预言在今天都变成了现实。随着[Root.Capital.GetName]的军队推翻了[Root.GetRulingParty]领导的政府并夺取政权，[Root.GetLeader]失踪，据说已经流亡。政变过程没有遇到什么大的阻碍。\n\n新的[Root.GetAdjective]领导者并不打算让抵抗势力有喘息和成长的时间。军事管制法已经宣布，新的变化正在进行中，无论之后是什么，都不会有什么太大的不同了。

original: A strong state is needed to protect people from themselves.
translation: 人民需要一个强大的国家来保护自己。

original: Civil War for Fascism
translation: 法西斯内战

original: While the attempts of the fascist movement to revive nationalistic sentiment have seen some success, the resistance against these ideas remains high. The generals plotting to overthrow the current administration are disappointed in the lack of confidence the [Root.GetAdjective] population themselves seem to have in [Root.GetFascistParty].\n\nThey remain certain that the people will eventually tire of [Root.GetLeader], but are divided on what course of action to take. Some call for a coup to be executed now, before [Root.GetName]'s enemies take action. However, doing so while public support is limited would plunge the nation into civil war.
translation: 虽然企图煽动起民族主义情绪的法西斯运动已经看到了一点成功，但是对这些运动的阻力仍然很高。将军们密谋推翻现政府的努力将因人民对他们缺乏信心而破灭，[Root.GetAdjective]人民看上去似乎仍支持[Root.GetFascistParty]。\n\n他们确信，人民终将厌烦[Root.GetLeader]，但他们却在采取何种行动上产生分歧。有些人要求立刻发动政变，赶在[Root.GetName]的对手采取行动之前。但是，让国家陷入内战的做法并不受人民热烈欢迎。

original: The will to power is meaningless if one hesitates to seize it.
translation: 如果对夺取权力犹豫不决，那么对权力的渴望是毫无意义的。

original: They must unite the people first, then rule them.
translation: 他们必须先团结人民，然后管理他们。

original: Fascist Assault Divisions Form
translation: 法西斯主义者袭击分裂势力

original: The political and the martial have always been intertwined in fascism. In parallel with its growing political movement, fascist parties have begun to form paramilitary organizations to protect against both internal and external threats, the internal threats being their political opponents. Although many people find this development worrying, the wave of militaristic furor has led to an increased amount of volunteers joining our armed forces.\n\nThe political leaders of the movement have pointed out that their opponents have reason to be afraid. Having the army permeated on several levels by so explicitly political elements, the enemies of [Root.GetName] and the enemies of fascism are beginning to look very much alike.
translation: 在法西斯主义中，政治和军事相互交织在一起。与其不断发展的政治运动相并进的是，法西斯政党逐渐开始形成准军事组织来抵御内部和外部的威胁，内部威胁是他们在政治上的对手。虽然很多人认为这样的发展令人忧虑，但是对军国主义的狂热崇拜促使大量的志愿者加入我们的军队。\n\n法西斯运动的领导人指出，他们的敌人有理由感到害怕。随着军队在不同政治层面上的不断介入，[Root.GetName]的敌人和法西斯的敌人开始变得越来越相似。

original: Only traitors to the country have anything to fear.
translation: 只有国家的叛徒才会害怕这一切。

original: The Threat of Communism
translation: 共产主义的威胁

original: '[Root.GetLeader] would have you believe [Root.GetName] stands safe and united. It is no surprise such lies have poisoned the minds of our people, when a snake is coiled up next door! Look no further than across our border to see countrymen having turned on each other in the name of communism, declaring the end of nations. How long until they declare our nation dead as well? Will the [Root.GetRulingParty] protect us from this threat?'\n\nThe growth of the fascist movement in [Root.GetName] has been bolstered by the proximity of the communist revolution. Many moderates who might normally dismiss fascism as another misguided ideological experiment find this to be a very real concern for them as well. Given the choice between the communism of our neighbors and a fascist regime, they would admittedly prefer the latter. They might even be willing to actively support it.
translation: '[Root.GetLeader]极力使你们相信[Root.GetName]代表安全和团结。像这样的谎言已经侵蚀了我们人民的精神，这点是毫不奇怪的，尤其是当一条蛇盘绕在我们隔壁的时候。看看我们的边境，我们的同胞以共产主义的名义互相伤害，宣布这个国家已经死亡。他们宣布我们国家死亡已经持续多久了？[Root.GetRulingParty]保护我们免受这样的威胁了吗？'\n\n共产主义革命的逐步逼近推动了[Root.GetName]的法西斯运动不断增长。许多原本把法西斯主义视为另一场错误思想实验的温和派发现这已经成为他们密切关注的问题。如果非要在我们共产主义邻居和一个法西斯政权之间做出选择的话，他们当然更倾向于后者。他们甚至可能愿意积极支持它。

original: We will be the vanguard against the red threat!
translation: 我们将是抵御红色威胁的先锋！

original: Move Towards Democracy
translation: 走向民主

original: 'If we silence the voices of the people, how can any of us claim to be the voice of [Root.GetName] ourselves? If we fear dissent, if we fear being publicly denounced or ousted by public vote, what we truly fear is that we are hated and reviled by our own citizens. Does the [Root.GetRulingParty] really have so little confidence in its principles?'\n\nA careful and loosely organized, but passionate faction in the government has begun to push for less repressive policies against enemies of the state. They want the public involved in decision-making through referendums and local party meetings, even if this means risking the future of the current agenda.
translation: '如果我们压制了人民的声音，我们该如何自称代表[Root.GetName]的声音？如果我们害怕异议，如果我们害怕被公开谴责或被公众投票罢免，那么我们真正害怕的其实是厌恶和憎恨我们的人民。难道[Root.GetRulingParty]真的对它自己的信条都没有一点信心吗？'\n\n虽然在管理组织方面还有些谨慎和松散，但政府中的热情人士已经开始减少对国家反对者的镇压政策。他们希望公众通过公民投票和出席地方会议来参与决策，即便这意味着将冒着目前议程不被通过的风险。

original: We can discuss this internally for a start.
translation: 我们可以在国内讨论如何开始。

original: Increases the chance of internal support for arranging elections.
translation: 提高国内支持选举的机率。

original: Knowing we're in the right, we can afford allowing our enemies to talk more openly.
translation: 我们知道我们是正确的，我们可以让我们的反对者更直率地表达他们的意见。

original: Increases the chance of people voicing support for democracy and forming an opposition.
translation: 提高人民声援支持成立民主国家的机率，同时产生一个反对党。

original: [Root.GetRulingParty] Debates Democracy
translation: [Root.GetRulingParty]对民主进行辩论

original: Surprisingly, the call for more referendums and less repressive measures against opponents of the regime has received some support in internal party discussions. While [Root.GetRulingParty] leadership remains skeptical, several influential members have supported a shift.\n\nPerhaps they have confidence that little will change in practice, or perhaps they are secretly traitors to the party cause, as many of their opponents would have it. Regardless, if the public call for such changes should come, some of the leaders of [Root.GetName] are ready to compromise.
translation: 令人惊讶的是，要求增加公民投票和减少针对反对党压制措施的呼声在党内得到了一定的支持。虽然[Root.GetRulingParty]的领导者仍持怀疑态度，但是不少有影响力的成员都已经支持这样的转变。\n\n也许他们有信心，认为在实际中可以基本保持不变，也或许他们已经秘密地背叛了党的事业，与他们的对手相勾结。不管怎样，如果公众呼吁要求进行这样的变化的话，一些[Root.GetName]的领导人准备进行让步妥协。

original: The choice may not always stand between liberty and death.
translation: 选择并不总是夹在自由和死亡之间。

original: The government may arrange elections when the policy has majority support.
translation: 当这项政策受到多数支持时，政府可能会安排进行选举。

original: Democratic Opposition Forming
translation: 反对派形成

original: Relaxing the restrictions on what sort of anti-[Root.GetRulingParty] propaganda can be spread publicly has, predictably, lead to an increase in public expressions of dissent. Organized demonstrations and pamphlets are so far found mostly in academic institutions and some of [Root.GetName]'s more unfortunate areas, but there is little doubt that the movement is spreading.\n\nThe nation's leaders are torn over the issue. [Root.GetLeader], who maintains an iron grip on party leadership, has little desire to diversify public debate. The first steps have already been taken, however, and there may be no turning back.
translation: 对反对[Root.GetRulingParty]的党派的宣传活动放松限制，可以明显地预见到，将促使公众更多地发表他们不同的意见。目前组织示威游行和分发小册子主要集中在学术机构和一些[Root.GetName]相当穷困的地区，但毫无疑问的是，这场运动正在蔓延。\n\n国家领导者们在如何处理这个问题上产生了分裂。[Root.GetLeader]坚持要用铁腕手段来保证党的统一领导，而不是众多的公共辩论。然而开弓没有回头箭，第一步既然已经踩下去了，就已经没有回头路了。

original: The movement appears to grow naturally in the absence of of repression.
translation: 在没有镇压的情况下，运动正蓬勃发展。

original: Public Call for Elections
translation: 公众呼吁举行选举

original: The demonstrations of public dissent which were once confined to limited areas are now widespread. While people gather in the streets, the [Root.GetRulingParty] finds itself at a crossroads. If we continue allowing this propaganda to spread, the referendums suggested both from within the party itself as well as the opposition may show that we do not have the support of the public. The unity we have strived for is giving way to a plurality of opinions, united against us.
translation: 曾经被局限在一定区域的公众游行示威现在已是随处可见。随着人们越来越多地聚集在街头抗议，[Root.GetRulingParty]发现它自己正处在一个关键时刻。如果我们允许这样的宣传运动继续扩大，公投会显示，无论是从党内还是到竞争对手，我们都没有获得人民的支持。我们为之奋斗的所谓的团结，只不过是让众多其他不同的意见，联合起来反对我们。

original: Even if reform is happening, we must show our strength by suppressing this defiance.
translation: 即使正在进行改革，我们也必须抑制这种反抗势力来展现我们的力量。

original: Let the people be heard.
translation: 放手让公众去听吧。

original: Public Election in [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]举行公众选举

original: As freedom of expression and assembly have grown to become increasingly accepted in [Root.GetName], the faction within the [Root.GetRulingParty] calling for holding elections has gone from secret conspirators to publicly supported reformers. Despite [Root.GetLeader]'s protests, the country has been making a slow but steady move towards democracy for the past months and an election now seems like the natural next step.\n\nHowever, far from all [Root.GetAdjective] citizens are in favor of democratic reforms. There is still debate within the party regarding whether to wait holding the election until we can ensure a stable development.
translation: 随着言论自由和集会自由在[Root.GetName]被广泛接受，[Root.GetRulingParty]内部呼吁举行选举的派系已经从早期秘密参与到现在公开支持改革者。尽管[Root.GetLeader]发表声明，过去一个月，我国一直缓慢但稳步走向民主，现在下一步举行一场选举已是自然不过。\n\n但是，并不是所有[Root.GetAdjective]的公民都赞成民主改革。同时党内对是否暂停大选直到我们可以确保稳定发展的讨论，仍有不少争议。

original: Those loyal to the [Root.GetRulingParty] will support the decision now.
translation: 那些忠于[Root.GetRulingParty]的人会支持这个决定。

original: The reforms need broader support before an election can be held.
translation: 在大选前，改革需要更广泛的支持。

original: Fascists Demand Referendum
translation: 法西斯主义者要求公投

original: The rapidly growing [Root.GetAdjective] fascist movement has never claimed that they need majority support before they seize power, counting on uniting the nation under their leadership once their rule is established. However, it seems their public support has grown rapidly. Many fascists are now calling [Root.GetLeader] a hypocrite, claiming to represent the wishes of the people while in reality turning a deaf ear to the masses.\n\nThe call for a referendum has been dismissed as typical attempts at disrupting the system by [Root.GetRulingParty] members so far, but at least it's a political measure. If we do not act now, the fascists may choose the violent struggle as a better path to power.
translation: 快速发展的[Root.GetAdjective]的法西斯运动从未声称他们需要多数人的支持来夺取政权，用他们建立的规则，在他们的领导下团结整个国家。但是，似乎他们的公众支持在迅速增长。许多法西斯主义者称[Root.GetLeader]是个伪君子，自称代表人民的意愿，却对人民的呼声充耳不闻。\n\n目前为止，对公投的呼声因被视作破坏现行体系的典型尝试而遭到[Root.GetRulingParty]成员的无视，但至少它是一种政治手段。如果我们现在还不采取行动，那些法西斯分子或许会选择暴力斗争作为通向权力的道路。

original: Suppress this hateful movement!
translation: 镇压这个可恶的运动！

original: Don't pay any attention to them.
translation: 我们对他们不关心。

original: If the people want it, we'll hold the referendum.
translation: 如果人民要求，我们就举行全民投票。

original: Communists Demand Referendum
translation: 共产主义者要求公投

original: Marxist ideas took root in [Root.GetName] a long time ago, but have gained much more widespread support lately. The movement has spread outside political theory and into political practice, with disgruntled workers and even some high-profile celebrities voicing support. The communists call this class consciousness. The [Root.GetRulingParty] call it a fast track to riots and treason.\n\nShowing little faith in [Root.GetLeader] being willing to implement the reforms they demand, the more vocal communists have called for an immediate referendum to have the current government removed. While we might be able to reverse the momentum of this mass movement, failure to do so will doubtlessly result in the more popular communist method of removal: Revolution.
translation: 马克思主义很久以前就扎根于[Root.GetName]，但得到了相当广泛的支持。这场运动与心怀不满的工人和一些知名人士联合起来，广泛推广他们的政治理念，并与政治实践相结合。共产主义者称这是一种阶级意识。[Root.GetRulingParty]却称之为通向暴动和叛变的快车道。\n\n指望[Root.GetLeader]愿意实现他们要求的改革是不切实际的，更多的共产主义者呼吁立刻举行一场公投让现在的政府下台。我们有能力扭转这种群众运动的势头，但一旦失败，毫无疑问会爆发共产主义者最喜欢采用的方法：革命。

original: Un-[Root.GetAdjective] activities must be stopped!
translation: 反对[Root.GetAdjective]的活动必须停止！

original: Ignore them, they're just causing trouble.
translation: 无视他们，他们只会惹麻烦。

original: The referendum is preferable to a bloody revolt.
translation: 选择全民投票至少要比一场血腥叛乱来的好。

original: Democrats Demand Referendum
translation: 民主主义者要求公投

original: Unsurprisingly, the idea of the people ruling the nation they inhabit can easily grow very popular among the people. The [Root.GetRulingParty], of course, sees the idea of democracy as represented by these movements - freedom of speech, public elections, free press - merely populist rhetoric meant to weaken [Root.GetLeader]'s government.\n\nHowever, there is no denying those ideas have taken hold among the [Root.GetAdjective] population. In true democratic fashion, they call for a public referendum on replacing the current regime. Although currently easy to ignore, these ideas have a way of growing very persistent. What will happen to us if we make peaceful revolution impossible?
translation: 毫无疑问的是，让人民能够管理自己居住的国家的政治理念很容易受人们欢迎。[Root.GetRulingParty]，当然，通过这些民主运动看到了民主的理念-言论自由，公开选举，新闻出版自由-但是这些言论意味着削弱[Root.GetLeader]政府的权威。\n\n但是，无可否认的是这些理念已经深深地扎根于[Root.GetAdjective]人民中。他们呼吁以一种真正的民主方式，通过一场全民投票，来取代现行的政治制度。虽然现在可以忽视他们，但这些理念以一种独特的方式持续传播着。如果我们拒绝和平革命，天知道会发生什么？

original: Round them up.
translation: 把他们集中关押起来。

original: Just proceed as usual.
translation: 照常运作，无视他们。

original: If we accept the referendum, perhaps we can preserve our legacy.
translation: 如果我们接受全民投票，也许我们可以保全我们的遗产。

original: Fascists March on [Root.Capital.GetName]
translation: [Root.Capital.GetName]发生法西斯游行

original: Having been refused their referendum, almost a token attempt at seizing power legally, the fascists have used their significant public support and connections in the [Root.GetAdjective] military to attempt a coup. The [Root.GetRulingParty] government has refused their terms and claims it is going to fight to the end to preserve [Root.GetName] as we know it.
translation: 拒绝了法西斯分子公投的要求，相当于断绝了他们合法夺取政权的企图。法西斯分子企图利用他们的公众支持和与[Root.GetAdjective]军队的联系，来发动一场政变。[Root.GetRulingParty]政府拒绝了他们的条件，并声明将战斗到底，来保卫我们熟悉的[Root.GetName]。

original: We will stop them at any cost!
translation: 我们将不惜任何代价阻止他们！

original: The fascists carry the true spirit of [Root.GetName]!
translation: 法西斯主义者们具有[Root.GetName]真正的精神！

original: Communists Rise Up
translation: 共产主义者起义

original: After their request for a referendum was denied, the few reformers of the communist movement in [Root.GetName] rapidly lost influence to the more radical elements. With the [Root.GetRulingParty]'s refusal to acknowledge the public support for the suggested reforms, the romantic view of the revolution gradually grew more widespread and the leaders of the movement become those who could most easily start a riot. Those riots have now erupted into a full-scale civil war, with the future of the nation at stake.
translation: 在他们公投的要求被拒绝后，一些[Root.GetName]的社会主义运动改革者很快失去了对大部分激进分子的控制。随着[Root.GetRulingParty]拒绝接受那些受公众支持的改革建议，革命的观念迅速传播，那些共产运动领导人现在可以轻松地发起一场暴乱。这场暴乱如今已经爆发成一场全面内战，国家的未来岌岌可危。

original: We won't allow them to ruin our country!
translation: 我们绝不会纵容他们毁掉我们的国家！

original: The fire of the revolution must be extinguished with the blood of the oppressors!
translation: 革命之火惟有暴君之血方能浇灭！

original: The [Root.GetAdjective] Spring
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]正在滋长

original: After their attempt at a public referendum to institute democracy was refused, the people behind the suggestion have dismissed the [Root.GetLeader] regime as incorrigible. A broad coalition of rebel groups, united by their common goal of instituting more representative political systems in [Root.GetName], have taken up arms and announced that they will not rest until the [Root.GetRulingParty] is overthrown.
translation: 在发起公投以建立民主的尝试遭到拒绝后，提案的支持者们认为[Root.GetLeader]政府已经不可救药。为了在[Root.GetName]建立更加具有代表性的政治体系这一共同的目标，反政府集团已结成一个广泛的联盟，拿起武装，并公开宣告：[Root.GetRulingParty]一日不倒，斗争便一日不息。

original: Spare us from this mob rule!
translation: 让这群暴徒滚远点！

original: At long last, [Root.GetName] is free!
translation: 九转功成，[Root.GetName]得到了解放！

original: Fascists Ridiculed
translation: 法西斯在嗤笑

original: The [Root.GetAdjective] people's infatuation with nationalistic pride and attempts to revive the glories of the past appears to have passed. A rude awakening for its ardent supporters, whose uniforms, militaristic posturing and over-the-top speeches are now more commonly the subject of mockery than sympathies.\n\nOnce considered a threat to the [Root.GetRulingParty] power base, [Root.GetAdjective] fascism is now increasingly seen as an absurd, extremist position and an attack on the most fundamental values of our nation, the very nation they claim to hold in such high regard. The word seems more suited as an insult than a political designation.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]的人们沉迷于民族自豪感并试图复兴过去已失落的荣耀。突然出现的狂热支持者们身穿制服，军人举止，演讲浮夸，如今越来越多地成为嘲弄而非同情的对象。\n\n在被[Root.GetRulingParty]权力基础的威胁后，[Root.GetAdjective]法西斯现在日益演变为荒唐的极端主义立场以及对我们国家，他们声称最为关注的伟大国家的最根本的价值观的攻击。他们的言论与其说是政治构想，不如说是种侮辱。

original: What a bunch of clowns.
translation: 真是一群跳梁小丑。

original: Communist Fad Blows Over
translation: 共产主义潮流势不可挡

original: Many communists had predicted that [Root.GetName] was going to be the next nation to fall to the so-called international revolution, but after a few months of strikes and red flags in the streets, the movement seems to have died down. The working class, the supposed driving force of the revolution, has more pressing concerns than overthrowing [Root.GetLeader] and seem decidedly unimpressed with how well these revolutions have played out elsewhere. Meanwhile, the intellectuals who wrote passionate calls for slitting the throats of the oppressors have turned out to be surprisingly reluctant to instigate anything that might actually upset their comfortable lifestyle.\n\nTalk of the revolution will likely continue, whether over cheap beers or expensive wines, but it will likely be talk and nothing more.
translation: 许多共产主义者已经做出预测，[Root.GetName]将是下一个沦陷于他们所谓的国际革命的国家，但是在大街上插满红旗和几个月的战斗之后，这场运动似乎是死绝了。被视为这场革命主要动力的工人阶级，更关注别的东西而不是推翻[Root.GetLeader]，并且面对其他地方如火如荼的革命漠不关心。与此同时，激情泼墨，号召人们割开压迫者喉咙的知识分子们，出人意料地不再情愿去煽动那些实际上会破坏他们舒适生活的东西了。\n\n关于革命的讨论似乎仍会继续——伴随着廉价的啤酒或昂贵的葡萄酒，但似乎也就止步于清谈而已了。

original: What a bunch of hypocrites.
translation: 真是一群伪君子。

original: Democratic Movement Goes Silent
translation: 民主的步伐沉寂了

original: After a few months of loud opposition against [Root.GetLeader]'s regime, calling for public elections and more liberal laws on freedom of assembly and speech, the movement seems to have fallen apart. People now express more concern about the stability of [Root.GetName] if such reforms were to take place, with those who clamor for democracy being seen more as troublemakers than everything else.\n\nMore mysteriously, many of the leading figures of the movement appear to have gone missing or stopped their work suddenly. Perhaps some of them chose to go into exile when they saw the failure of their efforts. Regardless, the [Root.GetRulingParty] government denies all knowledge and involvement.
translation: 声势浩大的反[Root.GetLeader]政府运动、对公共选举以及放宽集会和言论自由的疾呼持续了几个月后，整个运动已是分崩离析。如今人们更关心改革后[Root.GetName]能否保持稳定，然而那些喧闹着要民主的家伙们看起来是最会惹麻烦的。\n\n更令人费解的是，许多运动的领导人物似乎失踪了，或是突然放下了他们的工作。也许他们中的一些人在目睹了他们事业的失败后选择了逃亡海外。不管怎样，[Root.GetRulingParty]政府宣称对此一无所知并且与之无关。

original: What a bunch of quitters.
translation: 真是一群虎头蛇尾的家伙。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Abandons Neutral Foreign Policy
translation: [Root.GetLeader]放弃了中立的外交政策

original: After [Root.GetRulingParty]'s recent rise to power, [Root.GetLeader] announced that [Root.GetName] would no longer keep its Neutral Foreign Policy.\n'The world has become tangled and complex. We are no longer safe on our own. We must stand with our fascist partners against our enemies. If we do not choose a side, we will perish alone.'
translation: 在[Root.GetRulingParty]最近上台执政后，[Root.GetLeader]宣布[Root.GetName]将放弃中立的外交政策。\n‘世界局势已经变得混乱而复杂。仅凭我们自己不能确保安全。我们必须和我们的法西斯兄弟站在一起对抗我们的敌人。如果我们不选边站，我们将会独自灭亡。’

original: After [Root.GetRulingParty]'s recent rise to power, [Root.GetLeader] announced that [Root.GetName] would no longer keep its Neutral Foreign Policy.\n'The world has become tangled and complex. This country has always stood on it principles and been ready to defend them. We are no longer safe on our own. Neutrality is no longer the safe haven it used to be and those who seek power in this world do not respect it. We must stand with our communist brothers against the powers that seek to oppress us. Against the bourgeois majority who wants nothing more than keep us down. If we do not take a stand, we will perish alone.'
translation: 在[Root.GetRulingParty]最近上台执政后，[Root.GetLeader]宣布[Root.GetName]将放弃中立的外交政策。\n'世界局势已经变得混乱而复杂。这个国家始终坚持自己的原则，并已经准备好抵御外来威胁。仅凭我们自己不能确保安全。保持中立不再像过去那么安全，而且世界上渴求权力的人亦视中立宣言为粪土。我们必须和我们的共产党同志站在一起对抗图谋压迫我们的势力，抗击一心只想令我们屈服的多数资本家。如果我们不选边站，我们将会独自灭亡。'

original: For the future of [Root.GetName]
translation: 为了[Root.GetName]的未来

original: [Root.GetNameDefCap] Reunited
translation: [Root.GetNameDefCap]恢复统一了

original: The terrible civil war that has devastated our land draws to an end, and we have finally reached a political agreement. We now see eye to eye with our fellow [Root.GetAdjective]s, and together we will rebuild our great nation. The enemies that have sought to capitalize on our infighting must now face a united [Root.GetAdjective] state.\n\nThe new [Root.GetRulingIdeology] [Root.GetName] will never be divided again!
translation: 蹂躏祖国的恐怖的内战已经结束了，我们终于达成了政治和解。现在我们[Root.GetAdjective]人民已经重归于好，并将携手重建我们伟大的祖国。妄图利用我们内讧的敌人现在必须面对一个团结的[Root.GetAdjective]国家。\n\n新的[Root.GetRulingIdeology][Root.GetName]将永远不会分裂！

original: United at last!
translation: 终于统一了！

original: End of Civil Conflict
translation: 内战结束

original: The civil war that has divided our nation has now ended, and our cause has prevailed. We cannot, however, let those who supported our adversaries continue to spread their insidious propaganda among the population. A firm hand is required in the days to come, so that we may stand united, ready, and strong against any external threats that would endanger our fledgling government.
translation: 蹂躏祖国的恐怖的内战已经结束了，我们的主张得到了伸张。然而，我们不能让那些支持敌人的人继续队广大人民进行他们阴险的政治宣传。我们需要强有力的政策，来保证我们新生的政府可以团结在一起做好充分的准备面对外敌。

original: It will be done.
translation: 保证完成任务。

original: The Tizard mission
translation: 蒂泽德计划

original: The British government have sent us a scientific delegation led by Henry Tizard with an interesting proposal. The British are willing to pool their research efforts with ours in several key areas as they do not have the industrial capacity to produce their inventions in great enough numbers.
translation: 英国政府已经向我们派遣了由亨利·蒂泽德率领的科学代表团和一个有趣的提案。英国愿意在几个关键领域和我们共同进行研究，因为他们不具备将产品大量生产的工业实力。

original: An excellent proposal!
translation: 非常棒的提案！

original: No, the British are on their own.
translation: 不，英国人自己的事情得自己做。

original: We should aim for a more long term cooperation.
translation: 我们应该专注于长期合作。

original: Tizard successful
translation: 成功的蒂泽德

original: The US government has agreed to our proposal and have shared some of their research data with our delegation.
translation: 美国政府已经同意了我们的提案并和我们的代表团分享了他们的一些研究数据。

original: Jolly good!
translation: 真棒！

original: Tizard rejected
translation: 被拒绝的蒂泽德

original: The US government has rejected our proposal, we will get no help from them.
translation: 美国政府拒绝了我们的提案，我们将无法从他们那里得到援助。

original: Those blighters!
translation: 讨厌的家伙！

original: The Burma Road
translation: 滇缅公路

original: In order to aid our war against Japan, Britain has improved the Infrastructure and constructed air bases along our Burmese border
translation: 为了支持我们对日本的战争，英国在我们缅甸边境改良了基础设施并修筑了空军基地。

original: Repel the running dogs!
translation: 赶走疯狗！

original: A Puppet of Japan
translation: 沦为日本傀儡

original: The Japanese seek to control the wealth of China, and will not be stopped short of war. If we do not wish to fight them, we must submit to their control and become nothing more than a Japanese Puppet.
translation: 日本人试图控制中国的财富，唯有战争才能阻止他们。如果我们不想和他们战斗，我们就必须屈服于他们的通知并沦为一个日本傀儡。

original: We cannot fight
translation: 有奶便是娘

original: We must fight!
translation: 誓死抗战！

original: China submits
translation: 中国投降

original: The cowardly Chinese have once again submitted to our demands, they have agreed to become a mere puppet of our nation.
translation: 懦弱的中国人再次屈服于我们的要求，他们同意成为我国的卑微傀儡。

original: Their loss is our gain!
translation: 他们的损失就是我们的收获！

original: China refuses
translation: 中国拒绝

original: The foolish Chinese have refused our perfectly reasonable request that we manage certain aspects of their government. We will need to conquer them if we want access to their resources.
translation: 愚蠢的中国人胆敢拒绝我们完美合理的接管他们政府部分职能的要求。如果我们要掠夺他们的资源，就需要征服他们。

original: Shouldn't be difficult!
translation: 轻而易举！

original: Indian Independence
translation: 印度独立

original: Four years ago we promised India independence within four years. Time is up, and the Indians want us to honor our promise. Shall the crown jewel leave the British empire?
translation: 四年前，我们承诺印度在四年里将会独立。时间已经到了，而印度人希望我们兑现承诺。我们是否应该让皇冠上的明珠离开不列颠帝国？

original: It's time to let go
translation: 是时候放手了

original: Never!
translation: 绝不！

original: Indian National Army
translation: 印度国民军

original: Following our defeats of the British we have a great number of Indian prisoners of war. With the right persuasion, we could use those prisoners to bolster our forces...
translation: 随着我们击败英国人，我们手头有了一批数量可观的印度战俘。经过适当的说服，我们可以让这些战俘支持我们的军队……

original: For great justice!
translation: 为了伟大的正义！

original: Two divisions of the Indian National Army arrive in Singapore.
translation: 印度国民军的两个师已经到达了新加坡。

original: End trade with Germany
translation: 断绝对德贸易

original: Great Britain has issued us an ultimatum: Either we stop our trade with Germany, or they invade.
translation: 英国对我们发布了最终通牒：要么我们断绝对德贸易，要么他们便会发动入侵。

original: I never liked the Germans anyway
translation: 反正我从来都不喜欢德国人。

original: We'll trade with who we like!
translation: 我们想和谁做贸易就和谁做！

original: Demand refused!
translation: 要求被拒！

original: [From.GetName] has rejected our demand that they cease trading with Germany.
translation: [From.GetName]拒绝了我们断绝对德贸易的要求。

original: Then it's war!
translation: 那么就是战争了！

original: We cannot force them.
translation: 我们不能强迫他们。

original: Chamberlain Resigns
translation: 张伯伦辞职

original: With the war developing to the detriment of us and our allies, the Prime Minister has come under fire for both his peacetime and wartime decisions at critical junctions. At a moment when Britain needs to stand united more than ever, it finds itself divided as portions of the parliament holds Chamberlain in contempt.\n\nLacking vital support from Labour, the Prime Minister has made the decision to resign, favoring Lord Halifax as his replacement. However, Halifax has been skeptical and Chamberlain has advised the King to call on Winston Churchill. Churchill, who has long warned of the war that is now upon us, is believed to be capable leading us through it.
translation: 随着战争开始侵害我们和我们盟友，首相在和平时期和战争时期的各个关键问题上的决策都饱受抨击。在这需要英国展现出空前团结的时刻，英国却因议会对张伯伦的轻蔑而分裂。\n\n由于缺乏来自劳工的关键支持，首相决定辞职，并推荐哈利法克斯勋爵作为继任者。然而哈利法克斯却犹豫不决，而张伯伦建议国王传唤了温斯顿·丘吉尔。丘吉尔作为很久以前便警告战争来临的人如今已经上位，被认为是能带领我们走出困局的人。

original: We shall never surrender.
translation: 我们绝不投降。

original: Chamberlain Passes Away
translation: 张伯伦就此离去了。

original: Prime Minister Neville Chamberlain has fallen ill recently, despite previously generally having been healthy for his age. After being diagnosed with bowel cancer, increased pain and lost sleep has led him to resign from his post. Chamberlain still enjoys strong popular support and steps down only as a last resort, realizing he will not live to return to work.\n\nThe question remains who will take up the torch after this great statesman and lead Britain through the dark times that may still lie ahead of us.
translation: 首相内维尔·张伯伦最近生病了，尽管先前以他的年龄来说他还算是比较健康。在被诊断出肠癌后，与日俱增的疼痛和失眠令他不得不辞去自己的职务。张伯伦仍然享有很高的民望，下台对他而言只是最后的一次休假，因为他知道自己的身体已经无法重返工作岗位了。\n\n他遗留下来的问题仍横亘在我们面前，那便是究竟由谁来接过这位伟大绅士的火炬，继续领导英国走出这段黑暗时光？

original: Winston Churchill is who the Empire needs.
translation: 帝国需要的是温斯顿·丘吉尔。

original: Lord Halifax is Chamberlain's first choice.
translation: 哈利法克斯勋爵是张伯伦的首选。

original: Tizard triumphant
translation: 蒂泽德胜利

original: The US government has not only agreed to our initial proposal but even offered a more long-term cooperation between researchers in our nations.
translation: 美国政府不仅同意了我们的初步提议，而且还在两国研究人员之间提供了长期合作。

original: Outstanding!
translation: 很好！

original: The Xi'an Incident
translation: 西安事变

original: External pressure from the Soviet Union for the end of the hostilities between us and the Chinese Red Army has led to people in our ranks taking matters into their own hands. Two generals have had [Root.GetLeader] arrested, attempting to force a truce between us and the communists to unite China against external threats. International pressure for a peaceful solution, along with the weakness of China divided in this era are factors in favor of establishing a united front. What course should we take?
translation: 在苏联要求我们终止和中国红军的敌对关系的外部压力之下，我们队伍里的一些人开始擅自行动。两位将军将[Root.GetLeader]监禁，试图迫使我们和共产党休战以团结中华共御外侮。国际上的压力要求我们和平解决此次争端，以及中国本世纪以来的分裂问题，以建立一条统一战线。我们应该怎么办？

original: Contact the communist party for peace talks.
translation: 告诉共产党，我们同意和谈。

original: Never!
translation: 绝不！

original: Nationalists Offer Truce
translation: 民国同意休战

original: Disagreements within the Nationalist ranks have led to a precarious situation. Their leader, [From.GetLeader] has been arrested in an effort to force our enemies to accept a truce with us to unite China against foreign enemies. Although we would like to see the Kuomintang leadership facing punishment for their crimes against us, this is a rare opportunity to cooperate and ensure that China does not fall in the hands of foreign imperialists.
translation: 国民党内部的不满发展到了危险的地步。他们的领导人，[From.GetLeader]被拘禁，以迫使我们的敌人和我们休战以团结中国共御外侮。尽管我们乐于见到国民党领导人为他们对我们所做出的暴行受到惩处，但这是一个难得的机会，让我们可以团结合作，防止中国落入外国帝国主义者手中。

original: We accept a truce for now.
translation: 我们同意休战，至少是现在。

original: The revolution cannot be set aside for this!
translation: 不能因此把革命置之不理！

original: Nationalist China Refuses Negotiations
translation: 中华民国拒绝谈判

original: Despite the kidnapping of [From.GetLeader], the Nationalists have refused to enter negotiations for a truce with the Communists. Sadly, the Chinese will remain in violent conflict with their own people, making them easy prey for their enemies.
translation: 尽管[From.GetLeader]遭遇兵谏，国民党拒绝和共产党进行休战谈判。可悲的是，中国人仍要继续和中国人进行血腥的战斗，这会让他们在敌人面前变得无比脆弱。

original: We did what we could.
translation: 我们做了所能作的一切。

original: Truce in Chinese Civil War
translation: 中国内战停火

original: The negotiations in Xi'an have borne results. Both Nationalists and Communists have agreed to a truce, putting an at least temporary end to the hostilities and allowing the parties to cooperate against foreign threats.
translation: 西安的谈判已经达成成果。国民党和共产党已经同意休战，使得敌对关系至少是暂时结束了，并且让各个政党可以团结起来对抗外来威胁。

original: There is hope for China yet.
translation: 中国还有希望。

original: Communist China Refuses Negotiations
translation: 中共拒绝谈判

original: Despite the best efforts of Kuomintang generals to achieve a truce with the Communist Party leaders, the communists refuse to make even a temporary peace as long as the leader of the Nationalists is alive. It appears that the hostilities will not end so easily.
translation: 尽管国民党将领做出了最大努力以促成和共产党领导人之间的休战，共产党拒绝在国民党领导人尚存的情况下停火，哪怕只是暂时的也不行。看来敌对状态不会那么轻易结束。

original: At this rate, China's enemies may divide and conquer.
translation: 这样的话，中国的敌人便可个个击破他们了。

original: Soviet Union Cedes Land
translation: 苏联割让领土

original: The Soviet Union has other threats to worry about and does not wish to further increase hostilities with our Empire. As a sign of desiring peace between our nations, they have ceded some territory to us, hoping that this will strengthen our diplomatic ties.
translation: 苏联有别的威胁需要对付，并且不想和我们进一步敌对下去。作为希冀与我们和平的信号，他们割让给我们一些领土，希望这能增强我们之间的外交联系。

original: Perhaps this can be a turning point.
translation: 也许这可以成为一个转折点。

original: The Fifth Column
translation: 第五纵队

original: The persecution of enemies of the people, those who would reverse or subvert the revolution, has been ongoing policy since the Party came to power. The internal power struggles that followed have shifted our focus, and purging the Party ranks themselves has been given more emphasis since Trotsky's exile. Stalin has made himself an icon, but at the cost of making many real enemies and innumerable imaginary ones.\n\nHaving seen the worst of internal power struggles, the General Secretary is prone to act on the slightest suspicion. Being purged from the Party means imprisonment or death. Dark times lie ahead for those who show disloyalty - or just a bit too much loyalty to seem credible.
translation: 清洗人民的敌人，清洗那些可能背叛或破坏革命的人，自党上台后已成为现行的政策。紧随而来的内部权力斗争转移了我们的注意力，在托洛斯基逃亡后，清洗党的队伍已经越发紧迫。斯大林将他自己塑造成一个图腾，作为代价，他需要制造大量现实中的敌人和无数想象中的敌人。\n\n在意识到内部权力斗争落败的结果之后，最轻微的嫌疑都会令总书记大动干戈。被清洗出党意味着监禁或死亡。黑暗时代来到了表现出不忠的人——或者是表现得太忠诚所以不可信的人面前。

original: Are Zinoviev and his ilk still in touch with Trotsky?
translation: 季诺维也夫和他的党羽还在联系托洛斯基吗？

original: Trial of the Anti-Soviet Trotskyist Center
translation: 审讯反苏维埃托洛斯基派核心

original: Despite Leon Trotsky being forced into exile, Joseph Stalin fears that he has secret supporters within the party. A series of rapid arrests and brutal interrogations have yielded confessions and testimonies conveniently pointing to some of Stalin's rivals. However, the more questions are asked and the deeper the secret police delves into letters and journals, the more people are implicated, if indirectly.\n\nParty members are beginning to believe that Stalin's absolute power and the death of his wife have isolated him to the point where he perceives anyone as a threat, but isn't that exactly what a traitor would say?
translation: 尽管列夫·托尔斯基已经被迫流亡，约瑟夫·斯大林仍担心他有秘密的支持者残留在党内。在一系列迅速的逮捕和血腥的审讯后，逼供出来的自白和证据很轻易地便指向了斯大林的反对者们。然而秘密警察们审问得越多，对嫌疑人的书信和行踪调查得越多，被牵连的人，哪怕只是间接被牵连的人也越来越多了。\n\n党员们已经开始坚信斯大林是绝对的统治者，而妻子的趋势令斯大林陷入了怀疑所有人为威胁的孤独境地，但那不正是叛徒才会说的话吗？

original: Kalinin's wife is suspected. He cannot be trusted either.
translation: 加里宁的妻子也有嫌疑，所以他也不可信。

original: Khrushchev dabbled with Trotskyism in the past. He must go.
translation: 赫鲁晓夫过去和托洛斯基的人有一腿。他必须滚。

original: Radek's confession points to several people within the party.
translation: 拉迪克的供词指向了党内的一些人。

original: Party members can be trusted. This paranoia must cease.
translation: 党员们是可信的。这个偏执狂该消停了。

original: Secret Trial of the Generals
translation: 秘密审讯军队领导人

original: The Red Army has always been home to subversive elements, ever since Trotsky himself was Commissar of War. Documents acquired by the NKVD have implicated several high-ranking officers as not only traitors, but spies. Mikhail Tukhachevsky is among the most prominent of the suspects, and one Stalin is keen to rid the army of. Meanwhile, the navy's frequent contact with foreigners has led to many of them being arrested as well.\n\nAlthough there are documents from our enemies proving their guilt, there is no telling if they fabricated them, or if they were given false information by those who wanted this purge in motion to begin with.
translation: 红军一直是破坏分子的老巢，甚至连托洛斯基都曾经当过政委。NKVD获得的文件不仅牵连了数位高级军官，他们不仅是叛徒，还是间谍。米哈伊尔·图哈切夫斯基是嫌疑人中最突出的，而且斯大林极力想把他赶出军队。与此同时，海军和外国之间频繁的联系也令他们中的许多人遭到逮捕。\n\n尽管有我们敌人那里得来的文件证明他们的罪孽，但如果这些文件都是伪造的话，那便毫无意义。也许这些都是希望发动清洗运动的人制造的假消息。

original: Tukhachevsky must be tried in secret and executed immediately.
translation: 图哈切夫斯基必须被秘密审讯并立即处决。

original: Rokossovsky refuses to confess, but cannot be allowed to live.
translation: 罗科索夫斯基拒绝供认，但仍不让他活下去。

original: False documents and forced confessions are not proof.
translation: 伪造的文件和屈打成招不是证据。

original: Trial of the 21
translation: 二十一人审判

original: Increases penalty from §YOfficers Purged§!
translation: 增加§Y军官被肃清§!的惩罚

original: §RWill lead to a civil war in the future.§!
translation: §R将来会发生内战。§!

original: After several rounds of arrests and trials, the Great Purge has weaved a narrative that led up to this trial. Among the accused are not only old leaders like Nikolai Bukharin, but a number of diplomats, politicians, military officials and even many high-ranking NKVD officers. The charges are also more extensive than previously, including decade-old plots to murder Soviet leaders and sell the Union to its enemies.\n\nThe fact that the NKVD themselves are now among the targets of the purge has in a sense brought the proceedings in full circle. Threats and beatings have led to many confessing to all charges, even the most outlandish ones. The leading defendants face execution.
translation: 经过几轮的逮捕和审判，大清洗编了一个导致这次审判的故事.被控告的人中不仅有尼古拉·布哈林这样的老领导，还有许多外交官，政治家和军官，甚至许多内务人民委员会的高级官员也牵涉其中.此次审判比之前的更加广泛， 包括了过去十年间密图谋杀苏联领导人与卖国行为。\n\n在某种意义上，内务人民委员会本身也在清洗目标之内导致此次行动绕了一个大圈子.威胁和殴打致使许多供认被定罪，无论供认有多么的古怪.主要被告将面临死刑。

original: The navy and air force have been getting off easy so far.
translation: 到目前为止，海军和空军力量还未遇到苦难。

original: As we suspected, enemies are everywhere.
translation: 就像我们所怀疑的，敌人无处不在。

original: This has gone too far. Soon we will have killed all of our own.
translation: 这实在是太过分了.我们迟早会连我们自己也杀光

original: Trotskyist Coup
translation: 托洛茨基政变

original:
The world may never know if Stalin's paranoia was targeting the right people, or whether he made more enemies trying to exterminate every Trotskyist in the Party. What is known is that what he feared eventually came to pass. Today, Leon Trotsky reemerged as having returned from his exile, and with the support of several influential party members and NKVD officers, launched a coup overthrowing Stalin's rule.

The former General Secretary was attacked in his home with an ice axe, and was swiftly executed along with several of his supporters. Tearing down the cult of personality he built up will take time, but the people know now at least that he was not immortal.

 One of the few survivors who managed to escape was Ivan Konev. The fierce supporter of Stalin has managed to gather some support and declared war on the Trotsky government, in an attempt to take back power and 'fulfill the vision of Comrade Stalin'.
translation:
世界或许永远不会知道是否斯大林的妄想症是把正确的人当作目标，还是他让更多的敌人来根除政党里每一个托洛茨基派人士.我们所知道的就是他所害怕的最终变成了现实.今天，列夫·托洛茨基获得了一些有影响力的党员和内务人民委员会关于的支持从他的流放中归来并发起了推翻斯大林统治的政变。

前任总书记在他的家中被冰斧所攻击，并与其支持者迅速被处死.揭开他建立起的个人崇拜需要时间，但至少人们知道他不是不朽的。

其中一个试图逃跑的幸存者是伊万·科涅夫.暴躁的斯大林支持者企图聚集一些支持并向托洛茨基政府宣战，试图拿回权利并'实现斯大林同志的价值观'。

original: Leaders come and go, but the people remain.
translation: 领导人会变，但人民会留下来。

original: France wants to join the Comintern.
translation: 法国想加入共产国际。

original: Our comrades in Parti Communiste Francais have made great progress. The nation of France is ready to join the Comintern.
translation: 我们在法国共产党的同志们向前迈了一大步.法国已经准备好了加入共产国际。

original: A welcome addition
translation: 令人愉悦的加入

original: No!
translation: 不!

original: Communists relent
translation: 共产党员变温和

original: Due to the Soviet Union and ourselves being at war with a common enemy, they seem to have toned down support to our domestic communist parties.
translation: 因为苏联和我们拥有共同的战争敌人，他们好像减弱了对我们国内共产党的支持。

original: Glad to be rid of them!
translation: 非常高兴摆脱了他们!

original: Back Coup in Yugoslavia
translation: 支持在南斯拉夫的政变

original: The anti-Axis sentiment in Yugoslavia, which we have long tried to balance in an effort to make the country remain neutral and continue our cooperation with the current leadership, has reached a critical point with the nation's new efforts to cooperate with Germany. Despite several of Germany's allies having territorial interests in Yugoslavia, the leadership has chosen to allow German troops into their country.\n\nAn initiative in the Yugoslav Air Force is seeking to overthrow the German-friendly government. Although this could risk destabilizing the region further, it would put a stop to their cooperation with Germany. Should our intelligence operatives support the coup, or try to convince the anti-German faction to hold it off?
translation: 南斯拉夫的反轴心国情绪，即我们长期试图平衡并努力保持其中立性和我们之间与其现有领导人的现有合作因其与德国的新合作已经到达了临界点.尽管德国的一些盟友对南斯拉夫的领土有兴趣，他们的领导人还是让德国军队进入他们的国家。\n\n南斯拉夫空军力图推翻亲德国政府.尽管有进一步破环地区稳定的风险，但会停止与德国的合作.我们的情报机构是应该支持政变，还是说服反德派系推迟行动呢？

original: Aid the coup through the SOE.
translation: 通过SOE支持政变。

original: Dissuade the plotters.
translation: 阻止阴谋者。

original: Coup d'état
translation: 政变

original: As [Root.GetLeader] has tried to remain on friendly terms with Germany, domestic resentment for cooperation with the Germans has grown. Serb nationalists in particular have opposed this diplomatic direction, and popular opposition has been vocal. Today, military officials in the air force attempted a coup, pronouncing the young King Peter II to be of age and putting him on the throne. Encouraged by the intelligence agencies of Germany's enemies, the coup aims to cut short our agreements. This may mean war.
translation: 因为[Root.GetLeader]试图与德国保持友好条约，国内对于与德国合作的愤怒增长了.塞尔维亚民族主义者尤其的反对这个外交方针，而且大众的反对非常的直观.今天空军的军官企图政变，宣称年轻的国王彼得II世已到法定年龄并拥立其登基.此次政变被德国敌人们的情报机关所怂恿并计划缩短我们的协议.这将意味着战争。

original: Better a war than the pact!
translation: 宁可开战也不接受条约!

original: We'd rather fight the coup than the Germans.
translation: 我们宁可面对政变也不愿与德国战斗。

original: London Conference
translation: 伦敦会议

original: Our hope that we would not face German threats alone have been realised. The might of the British Empire and her allies will stand with us.
translation: 我们不希望独自面对德国的威胁变成现实.大英帝国的势力和她的盟友会站在我们这边。

original: Our hope that we would not face German threats alone have been realised. The might of the British Empire and her allies will stand with us. Sadly France has chosen the coward's path.
translation: 我们不希望独自面对德国的威胁变成现实.大英帝国的势力和她的盟友会站在我们这边.不幸的是，法国选择了懦夫的路。

original: Yugoslavia will stand free
translation: 南斯拉夫会自由的

original: Our hope that we would not face German threats alone have been realised. Although the waning might of the British Empire is not with us, the powerful French Empire will stand alongside us.
translation: 我们不希望独自面对德国的威胁变成现实.尽管大英帝国变弱的势力不帮助我们，但强大的法兰西帝国会站在我们这边。

original: We will triumph!
translation: 我们会胜利的!

original: London Diktat!
translation: 伦敦勒令!

original: In the face of a resurgent Germany who tears up the treaties that kept have the peace. The cowards in the west throw us to the wolves in hope that we will appease their hunger. History will judge them unkindly, but now we must choose our fate.
translation: 在面对撕毁过去和平条约的复苏的德国.西方的懦夫门把我们扔进狼群，企图以此来满足德国的野心.历史会毫不留情的审判他们，但现在我们要选择我们自己的命运。

original: Resistance will only lead to pointless deaths
translation: 抵抗只会导致毫无意义的牺牲

original: We will fight to the last
translation: 我们会战斗到最后

original: London Conference
translation: 伦敦会议

original: When all others have deserted us only Italy stands with us. This is now our truest friend and we will fight together.
translation: 当所有人抛弃我们时只有意大利站在我们这边.现在他是我们最真实的朋友，我们将会并肩作战。

original: God Help Us
translation: 上帝保佑我们

original: Fate Of Yugoslavia
translation: 南斯拉夫的命运

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] demands that we hand over full control of our country to them. All citizens of Yugoslavia will in essence become German and we will no longer have any influence. We can chose to stand our ground here and hope that help will come, but this may very well be the only way to avoid a slaughter of the Yugoslav people.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]要求我们将国家的所有控制权移交给他们。所有南斯拉夫的公民将从本质上变成德国人而我们将不会再拥有任何影响力。我们可以选择坚守家园并祈祷会有援助来临，但妥协很可能是唯一避免南斯拉夫人灭亡的方法。

original: We must stand firm
translation: 我们必须抵抗到底

original: It will spare so many lives
translation: 这会拯救很多人的性命

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] demands that we hand over full control of our country. The citizens of Yugoslavia will in essence become citizens of [From.GetNameDef] or one of their puppet states. We can chose to stand our ground here and hope that help will come, but this may very well be the only way to avoid a slaughter of the Yugoslav people.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]要求我们将国家的所有控制权移交给他们。所有南斯拉夫的公民将从本质上变成[From.GetNameDef]人或者他们的附庸国民。我们可以选择坚守家园并祈祷会有援助来临，但妥协很可能是唯一避免南斯拉夫人灭亡的方法。

original: We must stand firm
translation: 我们必须抵抗到底

original: It will spare so many lives
translation: 这会拯救很多人的性命

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] demands that we cede territory to a newly formed Crotian government, controlled by [From.GetNameDef]. They also demand we implement major government reforms, which will allow us to govern the citizens of Yugoslavia, but with heavy [From.GetAdjective] influence on our politics. We can chose to stand our ground here and hope that help will come, but this may very well be the only way to avoid a slaughter of the Yugoslav people.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]要求我们割让领土给刚刚成立的[From.GetNameDef]克罗地亚傀儡政府。他们还要求我们进行政府改革，虽然依然允许我们继续领导南斯拉夫公民，但是我们的政策会极大受[From.GetAdjective]影响。我们可以选择坚守家园并祈祷会有援助来临，但妥协很可能是唯一避免南斯拉夫人灭亡的方法。

original: We must stand firm
translation: 我们必须抵抗到底

original: It will spare so many lives
translation: 这会拯救很多人的性命

original: Unholy Alliance
translation: 罪恶的联盟

original: After the success of our recent cooperation, the Germans have come to us with an intriguing offer. They propose that we put our differences aside and instead of wasting our strength fighting each other while the western democracies watch and profit, we combine our strength and crush them instead!
translation: 在外面最近的合作成功之后，德国人提出了一个有趣的提议.他们建议我们向不同的方向扩张而不是浪费我们的力量从而让西方民主国家坐收渔翁之利，我们可以联合起来让摧毁他们!

original: Let the world tremble!
translation: 让世界颤抖吧!

original: No deals with the Fascists!
translation: 拒绝法西斯!

original: Alliance refused
translation: 联盟遭拒

original: The Soviets have refused our offer, if we want the resources of the Soviet Union we shall have to take them by force!
translation: 苏联拒绝了我们的提议，我们必须武力征服他们如果我们想要得到苏联的资源!

original: If they are not with us they are against us.
translation: 如果他们不加入我们，就是我们的敌人。

original: France wants to join our faction
translation: 法国想要加入我们的派别

original: The strong leaders of Mouvement Franciste have made great progress and offer to join our cause. The nation of France is ready to fight for the Reich.
translation: 法国法西斯运动的领导人完成了伟大的任务并且提议加入我们的事业.法国已经准备好为德意志帝国而战。

original: Mehr Soldaten für das Reich
translation: 帝国获得更多人力

original: Nein!
translation: 不!

original: Germany Refuses Ultimatum
translation: 德国拒绝了最后通牒

original: Despite our clarification that their remilitarization of the Rhineland would be viewed as an act of war, Germany has refused to back down and advanced into the demilitarized zone, ignoring our warning. This means that despite our best efforts to maintain peace, war has once again broken out in Europe.
translation: 尽管我们声明莱茵兰的再武装将被视为战争行为，德国仍无视警告，拒绝让步并且前进到非军事区.这意味着尽管我们尽最大的努力维持和平，战争再一次的在欧洲爆发。

original: The Versailles Treaty must be enforced.
translation: 凡尔赛条约必须被实施。

original: London Conference
translation: 伦敦会议

original: We expected the great powers of Europe to sit sound the table and come to equitable agreement in the name of peace. Instead the British and French have chosen to support the upstart Yugoslavs and their artificial state. Slovenia will be ours, one way or another....
translation: 我们期望欧洲列强坐下来谈判并以和平的名义得到公平的协议.而不是英国和法国选择支持傲慢自负的南斯拉夫人和他们人造的国家.斯洛文尼亚终将是属于我们，按这种方法或其他的……。

original: We expected the great powers of Europe to sit sound the table and come to equitable agreement in the name of peace. Although France saw the justice of our case the foolish British have chosen to support the upstart Yugoslavs and their artificial state. Slovenia will be ours, one way or another....
translation: 我们期望欧洲列强坐下来谈判并以和平的名义得到公平的协议.尽管法国看到的是愚蠢的英国人决定选择帮助傲慢自负的南斯拉夫人和他们人造的国家.斯洛文尼亚终将是属于我们，按这种方法或其他的……。

original: We will not be denied
translation: 我们不会被拒绝的

original: The London Surrender
translation: 伦敦让步

original: In yet another triumph for daring and action Slovenia, soon to be renamed to Carniola, has been returned to its rightful home in the German Reich.
translation: 在另外一场英勇的胜利与行动中，斯洛文尼亚-不久被重命名为卡尼鄂拉，已经回归了德意志帝国大家庭。

original: A Triumph for Germany!
translation: 胜利献给德国!

original: The Yugoslavs Refuse
translation: 南斯拉夫拒绝

original: In a misplaced sense of their place in the world the Yugoslavs have chosen to not accept the chance we have offered them.
translation: 南斯拉夫因为对其在世界上位置的错误定位，选择不接受我们给提供给他们的机会。

original: Time to teach them a lesson
translation: 是时候教教他们了

original: London Conference
translation: 伦敦会议

original: The Yugoslavs, egged on by the foolish Italians, have decided to defy us. The ungrateful Italians will burn with the Yugoslavs. General Rommel assures us that they ran the last time, and no doubt they will run again.
translation: 南斯拉夫，被愚蠢的意大利人煽动，决定公然反抗我们.忘恩负义的意大利人将会与南斯拉夫人一起被毁灭.隆美尔将军向我们保证上次意大利人跑了，毫无疑问这次他们还会逃跑。

original: This war won't last long
translation: 这场战争不会持续太久

original: London Conference
translation: 伦敦会议

original: The great London Conference was supposed to right one of the many wrongs that have been done to Germany. The French, though, still thirst for revenge and only wish to see Germany on its knees. They backed the regime in Belgrade despite the justice of our cause. They honestly think their empty threats mean anything to us?
translation: 伟大的伦敦会议被建议纠正已经对德国犯下的许多错误中的一个.但法国仍致力复仇并只希望德国屈膝妥协.他们支持贝尔格莱德的政权而不管正义.他们真认为他们可以吓到我们？

original: We will crush them both.
translation: 我们会碾碎他们。

original: The Fate of Yugoslavia
translation: 南斯拉夫的命运

original: §YIf Yugoslavia accepts, the following will happen:§!\n
translation: §Y如果南斯拉夫接受，将会发生：§!\n

original: We always knew that the Yugoslav state carved out of the Hapsburg Empire was an artificial country fated never to last. The ethnic resentment simmering under the surface has boiled over and the state is falling apart. We must step in to rectify the situation.
translation: 我们一直知道南斯拉夫是从哈布斯堡帝国分裂出来的一个人造的国家所以注定不会长久.表面之下的种族冲突激化已经到达了顶点导致国家正在分裂.我们必须介入来改正这个状况。

original: Annex all of Yugoslavia.
translation: 合并整个南斯拉夫。

original: Make a Croatian puppet. Annex the rest.
translation: 成立克罗地亚傀儡国，合并剩下的。

original: Make puppets of both Croatia and Yugoslavia.
translation: 成立克罗地亚傀儡国与南斯拉夫傀儡国。

original: Carve up Greece
translation: 瓜分希腊

original: When we suggested that perhaps the Greek frontiers should be readjusted the Italian ambassador thundered that they would rebuild the Roman Empire in the ashes of Greece.
translation: 当我们建议或许希腊的边境线需要重新调整时，意大利的大使大声说出它们将在希腊的骨灰上重建罗马帝国。

original: Of course they will
translation: 他们当然会这么做

original: Stick to getting the trains running on time
translation: 坚持按时坐火车

original: Carve up Greece
translation: 瓜分希腊

original: Territory that Bulgaria considered her own was handed to Greece after the Second Balkan War and the Great War. If we right this wrong we would bind Bulgaria to us. However, if they are not strong enough to claim it on their own, are they a worthy ally for us?
translation: 在第二次巴尔干战争和第一次世界大战中保加利亚割让给希腊大片领土，如果我们帮助他们恢复了这些不正当的领土就可以把保加利亚和我们绑在一起.但如果他们不够强大去声称这些领土，他们还值得做我们的同盟国吗？

original: Let us bind Bulgaria to us
translation: 让我们紧紧约束保加利亚

original: They need to earn our friendship
translation: 他们需要得到我们的友谊

original: Carve up Greece
translation: 瓜分希腊

original: A lack of suitable allies leaves Germany in an unfortunate strategic position in the Eastern Mediterranean. However, we can remedy this by demanding from Greece bases and territory around it to secure them.
translation: 盟友不足导致德国在东地中海处于一个令人遗憾的战略位置.但是，我们可以通过向希腊索取周围基地和领土来保证他们的安全来补救。

original: They must hand over bases to Germany
translation: 他们必须移交基地给德国

original: We should play the long game
translation: 我们应该玩一场长时间的游戏

original: §YIf Greece accepts, the following will happen:§!
translation: §Y如果希腊接受，将会发生：§!

original: Greece Refuses
translation: 希腊拒绝

original: Greece has foolishly refused our assistance in solving their border disputes.
translation: 希腊愚蠢地拒绝了我们关于解决他们边界辩论的帮助。

original: They must have realised the alternative
translation: 他们必须实现给出的选择

original: Greece Refuses
translation: 希腊拒绝

original: Greece has refused our generous offer of protection and assistance
translation: 希腊拒绝了我们慷慨的保护和协助提议

original: We must force them to see reason
translation: 我们必须征服他们来找到原因

original: Italy Demands Vichy Territory
translation: 意大利需求维希领土

original: The Italians have started to issue demands to Vichy France on the back of our victory. They are seeking the frontier zone of Savoy to strengthen Italy. However, we are the ones who will decide that.
translation: 在我们节节胜利的情况下，意大利人已经开始向维希法国提出他们的要求了。为了使意大利变得更为强大，他们希望得到萨沃伊的边境地区。但不管怎么样，我们才是最后拍板决定的人。

original: The Italians are demanding the Island of Corsica from Vichy as their share of the spoils. We could grant it to them?
translation: 意大利向维希法国提出了将科西嘉岛作为战利品割让给他们的要求。我们应该支持这个要求？

original: Italy has demanded that Vichy hand over Savoy and Corsica. It would be a boon to Italy but this will concern the French colonial authorities.
translation: 意大利已经要求维希法国交出萨沃伊已经科西嘉。对意大利来说，获得这些领土显然是一件大好事，但对于法国殖民当局来说就很头疼了。

original: I suppose the can have Savoy
translation: 我觉得意大利应该获得萨沃伊

original: Corsica is all they are worth
translation: 意大利拿到科西嘉就够了

original: Let them have Savoy
translation: 让意大利拿走萨沃伊

original: A strong ally leads to a strong Germany
translation: 盟友越强，德国就越强

original: They need more than a few thousand dead
translation: 他们死上一千遍都不够

original: Italy Leaves [Root.GetFactionName]
translation: 意大利退出了 [Root.GetFactionName]

original: Following our decision to not grant any lands to Italy. They have chosen to leave [Root.GetFactionName] saying that we are not worthy enough allies for them.
translation: 在得知我们没有满足意大利对法国任何的领土要求后，意大利决定退出[Root.GetFactionName]，因为他们觉得我们不配当盟友。

original: They never did much fighting anyway
translation: 他们根本就没打什么仗

original: Treaty Of Craiova
translation: 克拉约瓦条约

original: Treaty Of Craiova
translation: 克拉约瓦条约

original: With Hungary's gain of Northern Transylvania, Bulgaria has reminded us of their long standing boundary dispute with Romania over Southern Dobrudja, seized by Romania in 1913.
translation: 在匈牙利获得了北特兰西瓦尼亚后，保加利亚提醒了我们其与罗马尼亚长期存在的边界争议问题，争议焦点主要是关于在1913年被罗马尼亚占领的南多布鲁扎。

original: With Hungary's gain of Transylvania, Bulgaria has reminded us of their long standing boundard dispute with Romania over Southern Dobrudja, seized by Romania in 1913.
translation: 在匈牙利获得了特兰西瓦尼亚后，保加利亚提醒了我们其与罗马尼亚长期存在的边界争议问题，争议焦点主要是关于在1913年被罗马尼亚占领的南多布鲁扎。

original: Since relationship with Hungary has cooled, with them choosing to join in another alliance, our original plan to give them a part of Transylvania is out of the question. Instead, we should lend an ear to the Bulgarian territorial dispute for Southern Dobrudja, seizedby Romania in 1913.
translation: 由于我们与匈牙利的关系日益冷淡，再加上他们选择了加入另外一个阵营，原计划中我们将特兰西瓦尼亚给予匈牙利的议题就此搁置。转过头来，我们将关注焦点在1913年被罗马尼亚占领的南多布鲁扎的保加利亚领土争端。

original: Let them demand Southern Dobrudja
translation: 让保加利亚获得南多布鲁扎

original: We will not back any Bulgarian demands
translation: 我们不会支持保加利亚的要求

original: The Flight of Rudolf Hess
translation: 鲁道夫·赫斯飞越北海

original: Deputy Führer Rudolf Hess was arrested by Home Guard soldiers in Scotland yesterday after parachuting from a heavy fighter. An accomplished pilot, he apparently flew alone across the North Sea, taking care to stay out of radar range before veering west towards Britain.\nHess appears to have taken it upon himself to negotiate a peace treaty between Britain and Germany, although Berlin has denounced him as a madman and he has been stripped of all of his political offices. British authorities have not been available for comment.
translation: 副元首鲁道夫·赫斯昨天在从一架重型战斗机中跳伞后被苏格兰的国民警卫队士兵逮捕了。作为一个经验老到的飞行员，他试图独自通过擦着雷达搜索范围的边界越过北海到达英国。\n尽管柏林方面已经宣称赫斯是一个疯子，并且解除了他所有政治上的职务，但他仍试图代表德国与英国官方媾和。英国当局还没有就此事发表评论。

original: Wahnsinn!
translation: 疯子!

original: The Death of Rudolf Hess
translation: 鲁道夫·赫斯之死

original:
Deputy Führer Rudolf Hess was killed yesterday when the Royal Air Force intercepted the heavy fighter he was flying off the coast of Scotland. The exact nature of his mission remains unclear - although Hess was an accomplished pilot, he flew alone and his airplane does not appear to have been armed.
His remains were recovered by British authorities, but a state funeral with an empty coffin has been scheduled in Berlin. 

Hitler was reported as being visibly distraught by the death of his old friend.
translation:
副元首鲁道夫·赫斯昨天在试图驾驶重型战斗机飞离苏格兰海岸时遭到皇家空军的拦截后坠机身亡。他确切要执行的任务仍是个迷——尽管他是个经验丰富的飞行员，但他试图驾驶一架没有携带武器的飞机独自离开。
他的遗体已经由英国当局找到，但柏林方面已经为其安排了国葬仪式——尽管棺材里什么都没有。

根据报告，希特勒看上去因为老朋友的逝去感到十分悲痛。

original: That poor fool.
translation: 那个可怜的傻瓜。

original:
The airship Hindenburg, which had been moored in Germany since the beginning of hostilities, met with a dramatic end today when it exploded over Scotland. It appears to have been commandeered by Deputy Führer Rudolf Hess, who managed to fly it alone across the North Sea on a personal mission to negotiate peace with Britain.
British radar stations had no trouble detecting the massive aircraft, and several Royal Air Force wings were immediately directed towards its position. When the Hindenburg failed to respond over the radio, they opened fire. 

Hess parachuted to safety, and has now been imprisoned in the Tower of London.
translation:
自从战争开始以后就就一直停靠在德国的兴登堡号飞艇迎来了一个戏剧性的结局——在苏格兰变成了漫天烟火。它似乎是在副元首鲁道夫·赫斯辖下，准备给副元首执行与英国媾和任务的座舰。
英国雷达站在检测了大量的飞机后都没有发现问题，一群皇家空军的飞机很快就发现了飞艇的位置。在兴登堡号拒绝回应雷达站后，皇家空军开火了。

赫斯安全地跳伞着陆了，但现在被囚禁在伦敦塔中。

original:
The airship Hindenburg, which had been moored in Germany since the beginning of hostilities, met with a dramatic end today when it exploded over Scotland. It appears to have been commandeered by Deputy Führer Rudolf Hess, who managed to fly it alone across the North Sea on a personal mission to negotiate peace with Britain.
British radar stations had no trouble detecting the massive aircraft, and several Royal Air Force wings were immediately directed towards its position. When the Hindenburg failed to respond over the radio, they opened fire. 

The remains of Hess were found in the wreckage.
translation:
自从战争开始以后就就一直停靠在德国的兴登堡号飞艇迎来了一个戏剧性的结局——在苏格兰变成了漫天烟火。它似乎是在副元首鲁道夫·赫斯辖下，准备给副元首执行与英国媾和任务的座舰。
英国雷达站在检测了大量的飞机后都没有发现问题，一群皇家空军的飞机很快就发现了飞艇的位置。在兴登堡号拒绝回应雷达站后，皇家空军开火了。

在残骸中找到了赫斯的遗体。

original: That madman...
translation: 那个疯狂的男人……

original: Yugoslavia Refuses
translation: 南斯拉夫拒绝

original: Yugoslavia has foolishly refused our offer to resolve tensions in the region.
translation: 南斯拉夫愚蠢地拒绝了我们试图解决这个地区纷争的帮助。

original: They have forced our hand
translation: 他们已经逼着我们动手

original: Germany Officially Requests Danzig
translation: 德国正式要求得到但泽

original: Seeing their military support as essential for any future success in our civil war, [GER.GetNameDef] has presented plans for establishing [GER.GetAdjective] control over Danzig upon the conclusion of hostilities. They have also made it clear that [Root.GetNameDef]'s reliance on their military support leaves [Root.GetLeader] no choice but to sign this "Danzig Agreement.
translation: 了解到他们的军事支持是我们获得内战胜利至关重要的因素之后，[GER.GetNameDef]提出了战后[GER.GetAdjective]将获得但泽控制权的安排。他们同时也明确道[Root.GetNameDef]对他们军事支持的依赖使得[Root.GetLeader]别无选择，只能签署“但泽协定”

original: [Root.GetName] must take one battle at a time.
translation: [Root.GetName]同一时间只能打一场仗。

original: German Demands for Danzig
translation: 德国要求获得但泽

original: Following our victory in the [Root.GetAdjective] civil war, Germany has repeatedly reminded us of their request for Danzig. They have also reminded us of what the consequences of disobedience may be for a nation still recovering from internal conflict.
translation: 在我们赢得了[Root.GetAdjective]内战后，德国多次提醒我们履行协定，将但泽的控制权交出来。德国人同时提醒我们一个仍在内战后舔伤口的国家不履约会有什么下场。

original: They will have Danzig, as agreed.
translation: 他们会如约地获得但泽。

original: We will never cede Polish land!
translation: 我们永远不会割让波兰的土地!

original: Poland Cedes Danzig
translation: 波兰割让但泽

original: In accordance with the Danzig agreement, [GER.GetNameDef] has agreed to the transfer of Danzig to [GER.GetNameDef] control.
translation: 根据但泽协定，[GER.GetNameDef]已经同意将但泽的控制权交到[GER.GetNameDef]手上。

original: This has proved a beneficial partnership.
translation: 这已经被证明了是一个互利共赢的合作。

original: Poland Reneges On the Danzig Agreement
translation: 波兰对但泽协定的毁约

original: Ignoring the invaluable support we offered them in their civil war, [From.GetName] has decided to ignore our claims on Danzig.
translation: [From.GetName]决定不理睬我们对但泽的诉求，将过去我们在其内战中提供过的宝贵支持置诸脑后。

original: Dishonoring our agreement will cost them dearly.
translation: 他们这群言而无信者将付出代价。

original: We cannot afford this conflict.
translation: 我们承担不起这场冲突的代价。

original: The Danzig Agreement
translation: 但泽协定

original: [From.GetName] has agreed to our request for Danzig in exchange for support in their civil war. Our request and our promise have been formalized in the Danzig Agreement. Now we must make certain that [From.GetName] emerges victorious from their conflict.
translation: 作为我们对其内战支持的回报，[From.GetName]已经同意了将但泽交到我们手上。我们的诉求以及保证都已经正式地写在了但泽协定之上。现在我们需要确保[From.GetName]在内战中获得最后的胜利。

original: This is a [Root.GetAdjective] struggle, too.
translation: 这也是[Root.GetAdjective]的战斗。

original: The Yalta Conference
translation: 雅尔塔会议

original:
With the war in Europe progressing apace, it is time for the inevitable victors to consider the future of Europe.

We may propose to [yalta_partner.GetNameDef] a conference on the division of [GER.GetNameDef] after the war, to delineate our spheres of influence on the continent.

Our "friends" in [yalta_partner.GetNameDef] have indicated that they would be interested in such a conference. No doubt, they will want some kind of reward for their sacrifices.
translation:
欧洲战场态势已经明朗，大势所趋的胜利者是时候开始考虑欧洲的未来了。

针对战后关于[GER.GetNameDef]的分治，同时划定我们在大陆的势力范围，我们需要与[yalta_partner.GetNameDef]坐下谈谈了。

我们的[yalta_partner.GetNameDef]"朋友"也表示对这次谈判有兴趣。毫无疑问，他们会对他们的牺牲索要一些奖励。

original: We need a conference on the future of Europe.
translation: 我们需要召开一个会议来讨论欧洲的未来。

original: We cannot cooperate with [yalta_partner.GetNameDef].
translation: 我们不能跟[yalta_partner.GetNameDef]合作。

original: The Yalta Conference
translation: 雅尔塔会议

original: With the war against [GER.GetNameDef] marching towards its inevitable conclusion, [yalta_origin.GetNameDef] has approached us about a conference on the future of Europe.\n\nThey are suggesting a division of [GER.GetNameDef] between east and west. This would allow our sphere of influence to extend deep into Europe, which would make up for some of the losses we have suffered in this gruesome struggle.
translation: 对[GER.GetNameDef]的战争天平已经无法避免地倒向我方，[yalta_origin.GetNameDef]已经与我方接触，讨论何时举行一个会议以绝对欧洲的未来。\n\n他们提议将[GER.GetNameDef]分成东西两部分。这将会使得我们的势力能够扩展到欧洲的中心，也能弥补我们在这场可怕的战争中遭受到的损失。

original: For the sake of lasting cooperation.
translation: 为了一直以来的合作。

original: We will dictate our own peace.
translation: 我们将争取属于自己的和平。

original: [yalta_partner.GetNameDefCap] Refuses to Participate
translation: [yalta_partner.GetNameDefCap]拒绝出席

original:
Our proposed conference on the future of Europe has fallen through.

Speaking in no uncertain terms, [yalta_partner.GetLeader] dismissed any need for planning and cooperation in post-war Europe.

"We will meet when I am making my demands of [GER.GetNameDef] at the peace table. I will not see petty politicking stand in the way of [yalta_partner.GetNameDef].
translation:
我们原定讨论欧洲未来的会议没能成功举办。

毫不含糊地说，[yalta_partner.GetLeader]拒绝了所有关于战后欧洲安排的合作与计划。

“当我们决定好在谈判桌上对[GER.GetNameDef]的要求的时候，我们将会碰面。我不看到像[yalta_partner.GetNameDef]那样的政治扯皮。”

original: This is worrisome.
translation: 这令人不安。

original: The Division of Germany
translation: 德意志的分裂

original: As stipulated in the Yalta agreement, Germany is to be split into two separate states, each falling under the sphere of one of the warring parties.\n\nLet us hope this brings an end to conflict in Europe.
translation: 按照雅尔塔协议的安排，德国将被划分成两个国家，分别加入由战胜国的两方阵营各自组成的联盟。\n\n希望这能给欧洲的冲突画上一个句号。

original: For Germany...
translation: 为了德意志……

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Demands the Sudetenland
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]索要苏台德

original: In the middle of the ongoing situation, Germany has demanded the Sudetenland territory from us, to "protect the German population" of the region.\n\nWith the ongoing situation, they have made it very clear that this is it. There will be no negotiations or diplomacy. They will have the Sudetenland, or they will go to war over it.
translation: 在当前局势下，德国向我们索要苏台德地区的领土，以便在那里“保护德国人”。\n\n随着事态的发展，他们明确指出这点不容任何谈判和外交斡旋。他们获得苏台德地区，或他们为此开战。

original: They can have their war, if they dare!
translation: 他们只要敢的话，尽管开战！

original: We cannot afford a war with [From.GetNameDef].
translation: 我们无法承担与[From.GetNameDef]的战争

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Refuses us the Sudetenland
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝割让苏台德地区

original: In a foolish diplomatic move, [From.GetLeader], the leader of the [From.GetAdjective]s has rejected all [Root.GetAdjective] demands!\n\nThey will not cede the Sudetenland, and practically dared us to declare war, mocking our desire to protect our [Root.GetAdjective] brothers and sisters.
translation: 这是一个愚蠢的外交行为，[From.GetLeader]，[From.GetAdjective]的领袖，拒绝了所有[Root.GetAdjective]的要求！\n\n他们不会割让苏台德地区，并实际上挑战我们开战，嘲讽我们保护[Root.GetAdjective]兄弟姐妹的愿望。

original: So be it!
translation: 那么好吧！

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Cedes the Sudetenland
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]割让苏台德地区

original: Facing the prospect of war with us, [From.GetNameDef] has agreed to cede all control of the Sudetenland, and renounce any future claim to the region.\n\nThe [Root.GetAdjective] population of the Sudetenland will finally be safely in the fold of the [Root.GetNameDef].
translation: 面对与我们开战的预期，[From.GetNameDef]同意交出对苏台德地区的控制，并且放弃对该地的任何宣称。\n\n苏台德地区的[Root.GetAdjective]人民在[Root.GetNameDef]的保护下终于安全了。

original: For [Root.GetNameDef] and all [Root.GetAdjective]s!
translation: 为了[Root.GetNameDef]和所有[Root.GetAdjective]人！

original: Anschluss or Destruction
translation: 合并或者灭亡

original: §RCan lead to war§!\n
translation: §R会引发战争§!\n

original: Civil unrest and acts of violence have broken out as protesters voice their desire for Austria to join Germany. The internal struggles our nation already suffers from only adds to the voice of people wishing for a union with Germany. Berlin is pressing hard for an Anschluss and this may very well be our only chance to keep part of the true Austrian values alive.
translation: 我国爆发了内乱和暴力事件，抗议者们希望奥地利加入德国。国民在内部斗争中蒙受的损失进一步加强了希望与德国统一的声音。柏林正对德奥合并施加强大的压力，这可能是我们使得部分真正的奥地利价值观得以存留下来的唯一机会了。

original: We shall join the German Reich!
translation: 我们应该加入德意志帝国！

original: No, Austria's destiny lies elsewhere.
translation: 不，那里没有奥地利的未来。

original: Formalize the Alliance
translation: 正式结盟

original: United in our fight against the Soviet Union, perhaps it is time to formalize the alliance and invite our new partners in this anti-communist war to our faction.
translation: 我们正在团结一致对抗苏联，也许是时候正式邀请新伙伴加入我们的阵营了。

original: We shall send envoys.
translation: 我们应互遣特使。

original: We will not have further obligations to them.
translation: 我们将没有更多的义务来帮助他们。

original: The Anti-Soviet Pact
translation: 反苏条约

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has offered to welcome us to their faction, so that we may better coordinate against the communist threat. Envoys to formalize this alliance have already arrived in the capital.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经表示欢迎我们加入他们的阵营，这样可以使我们更好地应对共产主义的威胁。他们派来促成联盟的特使已经到达了我们的首都。

original: This is a great initiative.
translation: 一个伟大的倡议！

original: Our fate lies with others.
translation: 我们的命运已经和别人绑在一起。

original: Threat from actions
translation: 威胁行动

original: [Root.GetLeader] Speaks Against [From.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetLeader]批评[From.GetName]

original: 'Does [From.GetName] belong to the [From.GetAdjective]? Let us ask ourselves a better question: Does the future belong to the [From.GetAdjective] or does it belong to [Root.GetNameDef]?'\n\n[Root.GetLeader]'s speech today suggested that [Root.GetName] is on the path to war. Political tensions have been building over the past month and it seems the [Root.GetAdjective] people are coming to accept that war is inevitable.
translation: ‘[From.GetName]属于[From.GetAdjective]吗？让我们向自己问一个更深的问题:未来到底是属于[From.GetAdjective]还是[Root.GetNameDef]的？’\n\n今天[Root.GetLeader]的演讲中提出了[Root.GetName]在走向战争之路的观点。在过去的几个月里，政治局势越发紧张，而且看起来[Root.GetAdjective]的人民已经开始接受战争无可避免的观点了。

original: The future belongs to [Root.GetName]!
translation: 未来属于[Root.GetName]!

original: [Root.GetLeader] Denounces [From.GetAdjective] Ideals
translation: [Root.GetLeader]批评[From.GetAdjective]主义

original: 'The [From.GetAdjective] claim to have liberty and democracy, claim to want peace, but all of these things they pride themselves on are hollow. Their democracy divides the people where it should stand united and their liberty only betrays a lack of discipline. We [Root.GetAdjective]s see through these lies... and we can see that this peace, peace on their terms, is a lie as well.'\n\n[Root.GetRulingParty] has long derided the weakness of the [From.GetAdjective] nation, but lately the rhetoric has grown more aggressive. The day of armed conflict grows closer.
translation: ‘[From.GetAdjective]宣称他们拥有自由与民主，宣称他们热爱和平，但所有这些都不过是他们往自己的脸上贴金。他们的民主使得本该团结一致的人民产生了分裂，他们的自由只暴露出了纪律的缺乏。我们[Root.GetAdjective]已经看穿了这一切……我们可以看到，这样的和平，在他们眼中的和平，不过是一个谎言。’\n\n[Root.GetRulingParty]一直在嘲笑[From.GetAdjective]国家的弱点，但最近使用的言辞似乎变得更加地咄咄逼人。战争将近……

original: [Root.GetName] stands united under [Root.GetLeader].
translation: [Root.GetName]在[Root.GetLeader]的领导下团结在一起。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Warns Against [From.GetAdjective] Communism
translation: [Root.GetLeader]警告[From.GetAdjective]共产主义

original: 'Is there a bigger threat to our way of life, or indeed the way of life itself, than communism? This plague that threatens to make the slaves, not the masters, rule every nation, to abolish the nation itself, to abolish people and their history. We will take [From.GetName] and abolish the communist plague.'\n\n[Root.GetLeader]'s hatred of communists has been well known since before [Root.GetRulingParty]'s rise to power, but it appears to have intensified recently in the specific case of the [From.GetAdjective] government. Our quest to purge Marxism off the face of the Earth may start there.
translation: ‘还有什么比共产主义更能威胁我们的生活？共产主义瘟疫的威胁在于它让奴隶，而不是主人去统治国家，其将毁掉国家本身，乃至这个国家的人民与他们的历史。我们会采用[From.GetName]来抵御共产主义的瘟疫。’\n\n在[Root.GetRulingParty]的崛起之前，[Root.GetLeader]对共产党人的仇恨就已经广为所知，但随着最近[From.GetAdjective]政府这一特例的出现，仇恨被更加地深化了。我们试图将马克思主义从地球上抹去的努力应该从这里开始。

original: Those who reject nations will see their own perish.
translation: 拒绝我们的人会看到自己的灭亡。

original: [Root.GetName] Prepares for Great Struggle
translation: [Root.GetName]为伟大的斗争作准备

original: 'The [From.GetAdjective] are a people who will not part easily with power. However, they must also realize that the trajectory of our two nations can only end in a clash. We must steel ourselves for the struggle to come. For [From.GetName] will not be taken without a fight.'\n\nThe possibility of an understanding between the similarly minded governments of [From.GetName] and [Root.GetName] has given way to a campaign to take their territory by force.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]人民自古便崇尚霸权。這也意味着，长此以往，我们两国定有一战。\n\n[From.GetName]跟[Root.GetName]和平共处的可能性已经是十分渺茫。[From.GetName]不会拱手送人，我们应当全力备战，以期获得最后的胜利。

original: History will be written through our victory.
translation: 历史将由我们的胜利来书写。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Brings Revolution to [From.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetLeader]给[From.GetName]带来革命

original: 'While we have consolidated the socialist society in [Root.GetName], many nations still suffer under the despots of old. The workers of [From.GetName] have no voice, no means to organize, and any attempts to institute socialism will be crushed savagely by the [From.GetLeader] regime. We cannot wait for the gears of the international revolution to turn for the [From.GetAdjective] people. With the revolution we have proven that we could crush the capitalist oppressors here, and we will crush the oppressors in [From.Capital.GetName] as well!'\n\n[Root.GetLeader] has abandoned all attempts at diplomatic rhetoric towards [From.GetRulingParty]-controlled [From.GetName]. The quest to eradicate all borders is now strictly focused on eradicating their borders.
translation: ‘虽然我们已经巩固了在[Root.GetName]的社会主义政权，但很多国家依然饱受原有的压迫统治。[From.GetName]的工人没有发言权，也没有办法组织起来，任何其他建立社会主义组织的行动都会被[From.GetLeader]政权无情地镇压。我们不能等待国际革命的浪潮翻滚到那里去拯救[From.GetAdjective]的人们。根据我们之前的经验，可以证明我们能粉碎当地资本主义的压迫者，我们也要干掉[From.Capital.GetName]的压迫者!’\n\n[Root.GetLeader]已经放弃与[From.GetRulingParty]控制下的[From.GetName]打笔仗，专心保护好自己的边境不受侵扰。

original: [From.GetAdjective] workers, your liberation is near!
translation: [From.GetAdjective]工人，你们的解放即将到来!

original: [Root.GetLeader] Calls to Aid [From.GetAdjective] Workers
translation: [Root.GetLeader]号召对[From.GetAdjective]的工人提供援助

original: 'Is there a greater lie than the supposed liberty of the [From.GetAdjective] people? Where they once slaved under the princes and dukes who claimed ownership of the soil, they are now forced to sell their labor to those who claim ownership of the factories. Their freedom to choose one master over the other can hardly be called liberty. Likewise, their freedom to elect their leaders is a false choice, as propaganda would never allow the true socialists to take power. A people so thoroughly indoctrinated can only be saved by a [Root.GetAdjective] intervention.'\n\n[Root.GetLeader] has polemicized against the government in [From.GetName] for a long time in party meetings, but this rhetoric is now used more frequently in public. There is little reason to believe that this conflict could be resolved peacefully.
translation: ‘有比给予[From.GetAdjective]人民自由更大的谎言吗？那些曾经是贵族土地下的农奴的人们，如今又被迫将劳力出卖给了工厂主。他们选择主人的自由也称得上自由吗。同样地，所谓的选择统治者的权利也不过是句空话，他们绝对不会允许一个真正的社会主义者掌权。人们被彻底地灌输着只有[Root.GetAdjective]的干涉才能拯救他们。’\n\n[Root.GetLeader]已经与[From.GetName]的政府在党派会议上辩论了很久这个问题，但是最近这种言论在公众中出现的频率有所增大。我们没什么理由相信这冲突能够和平解决。

original: We will crush their bourgeois dictatorship!
translation: 我们将打倒他们的资产阶级专政!

original: [From.GetAdjective] Communism Failing
translation: [From.GetAdjective]共产主义的崩溃

original: 'Comrades, although the greatest revolutionaries have once been called traitors, it has become plain to see that the revolution itself has been betrayed. How else would you explain the rule of the [From.GetRulingParty] of [From.GetName], who have cast aside every hint of Marxist ideas to build a degenerated worker's state where they can reign under false premises? In strengthening their own power at the price of the international revolution, they have shown that they care little for the ideals they claim to hold. We must bring the true revolution to them.'\n\nAlthough initially supportive of the [From.GetAdjective] revolution, [Root.GetLeader] has expressed increased disappointment with how it has developed. The [Root.GetRulingParty] may have to intervene before it is too late.
translation: ‘同志们，尽管最大的革命家也曾经被称为叛徒，我们已经清楚地认识到革命本身已经被出卖了。你们还能怎么样解释[From.GetRulingParty]的[From.GetName]的理论？在错误的假定下，谁又能建立起了一个属于工人的国家？通过国际革命运动强大起来的他们，已经显示出来他们根本不在意承诺过什么。我们要将真正的革命带给他们。’\n\n尽管最初支持[From.GetAdjective]的革命，但随着革命的发展，[Root.GetLeader]已经越来越表现出对革命的失望。[Root.GetRulingParty]要在一切都还没太迟的情况下加以干涉了。

original: There is time yet to salvage their attempt at socialism.
translation: 还有时间去挽救他们的社会主义。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Calls for Crushing [From.GetAdjective] Nationalism
translation: [Root.GetLeader]号召碾碎[From.GetAdjective]的民族主义

original: 'Is there any society more repugnant to the future of the revolution, any more alien to the plight of the worker, than the fascist regime of [From.GetName]? Calling upon the people to devote themselves fanatically to the decrepit institution of the nation state, they have dressed up age-old ways of savagery in a modern costume, trying to present themselves as an alternative future to the inevitable international victory of the working class. It is only a matter of time until they strike against us or our allies. Let us strike first.'\n\nNo one has expected less than mutual contempt between us and the [From.GetAdjective], but the animosity has intensified lately. It now appears that conflict will arise sooner rather than later.
translation: ‘有什么社会形式会比[From.GetName]的法西斯政权更加反感未来的革命，更加对工人疏远？他们在现代社会的环境中打扮复古，尝试向人们展现出他们是终将获得胜利的工人阶级的模样，号召人们投身于民族国家这个过时的理念中。他们向我们或者我们的盟友下手只是时间问题了。让我们先下手为强吧。’\n\n每个人都认为我们跟[From.GetAdjective]是互相鄙视的，但最近鄙视升级成了敌对。显然冲突一触即发。

original: Death to fascists!
translation: 法西斯的灭亡!

original: Diplomacy with [From.GetName] Breaks Down
translation: 与[From.GetName]的外交关系跌至冰点

original: 'Despite our attempts to find a diplomatic solution to our conflict with [From.GetName], negotiations have once again broken down, leaving us with limited options. The authoritarian [From.GetLeader] regime has displayed the unreasonable approach to this matter typical of leaders who are not accountable to their people. Barring a complete turnaround in the policies of [From.GetAdjective] leadership, we will be left with no recourse but to fight.'\n\n[Root.GetAdjective] intervention in [From.GetName] has been a hot issue, with some politicians in the opposition claiming that [Root.GetRulingParty] has pursued a hawkish policy from the start. Whatever their original intent, a future war now suddenly seems very real and inevitable.
translation: ‘尽管我们努力尝试通过外交途径解决我们与[From.GetName]的冲突，但谈判再度破裂，留给我们的选择有限。执政者[From.GetLeader]处理这件事的方式显然不合常理，他似乎不打算对他的人民负责。除非[From.GetAdjective]的政策有一百八十度的转弯，不然我们除了开战别无办法。’\n\n[Root.GetAdjective]在[From.GetName]的干涉已经成了一个热点问题，一些持反对观点的政治家宣称[Root.GetRulingParty]从一开始走的就是强硬的政策路线。无论他们原意如何，未来的战争似乎迫在眉睫而且无可避免。

original: Sometimes, you need to climb the mountain of conflict.
translation: 有时候，我们无法避免冲突。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Calls for Intervention in [From.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetLeader]呼吁在[From.GetName]的干涉

original: 'It is with heavy heart that we must confront the reality of our situation: An invasion of [From.GetName] may be our only recourse. It is of too great a strategic advantage to attempt any other solution in our current situation. Although we trust that neither the [Root.GetAdjective] nor the [From.GetAdjective] people want war, but history has led us to this point and our options are limited.
