We can only hope that through this assertion of our military power, we can avoid further bloodshed in the future.'\n\nAlthough it is a popular theory that democracies do not go to war against other democracies, recent developments have pointed to a [Root.GetAdjective] invasion of [From.GetName] in the future. History may surprise us yet.
translation: ‘我们必须沉重地面对这样一个事实:对[From.GetName]的入侵大概是我们唯一的出路。在目前的情况下，这是能够争取到最大战略优势的方法了。尽管我们坚信[Root.GetAdjective]跟[From.GetAdjective]的人们都不希望战争的来临，但历史让我们走到了这里，我们别无选择。我们只能祈求通过这次的军事行动，以减少日后的流血。’\n\n尽管民主国家相互之间无战事这是一个很热的理论，最近事态的发展已经指明[Root.GetAdjective]将要入侵[From.GetName]。历史总会出人意料。

original: [From.GetName] is a dubious democracy anyway.
translation: [From.GetName]不过是一种有名无实的民主。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Speaks Against Red Menace
translation: [Root.GetLeader]抨击红色威胁

original: 'Without a doubt, [From.GetName] communism is one of the greatest threats to liberty and order in this era. Relentless and ruthless, it threatens to devour not only the [From.GetAdjective] people's hope of a prosperous, democratic society, but that of its neighbors as well. If we do not act now, we may well see this first domino fall too late, leaving more failed social experiments in its wake. How many more need die before we intervene?'\n\nThe threat of subversive activity undermining our democracy, fueled by [From.GetAdjective] ambitions, has become a hotly debated topic recently. While representatives in opposition have called this a Red Scare aimed at pursuing war with [From.GetName], the rhetoric of the [Root.GetRulingParty] has been highly successful so far.
translation: ‘毫无疑问，在这个年代里，[From.GetName]的共产主义是自由与秩序最大的敌人之一。它不仅无情地吞噬着[From.GetAdjective]的人们对一个富强民主社会的希望，而且还对其邻居的人民虎视眈眈。倘若我们现在还不采取行动的话，我们就会看到这第一张多米诺骨牌的倒下，随之更多社会制度的试验会宣告失败。在我们干涉之前还要牺牲多少人？’\n\n政权颠覆运动威胁着我们民主制度的安全。在[From.GetAdjective]的野心推动下，这已经成为了最近的社会焦点讨论问题。反对派代表称“红祸”之称其实是旨在对[From.GetName]发动战争，[Root.GetRulingParty]的言论最近大受欢迎。

original: They follow a violent ideology, what reaction can they expect but violence?
translation: 他们遵从暴力的理念，除了暴力，他们还能有怎么样的对策呢？

original: [Root.GetLeader] Confronts [From.GetAdjective] Fascism
translation: [Root.GetLeader]面对[From.GetAdjective]的法西斯主义

original: 'In modern history, perhaps even in history as a whole, there has been no worse tyranny than the iron grip in which [From.GetRulingParty] now holds [From.GetName]. People may argue that we should not provoke conflict, that we should trust [From.GetLeader] to honor treaties and promises in the future, but these people fail to see that treaties made under the reign of fascism are useless. To these dishonorable liars, might makes right, and the paper on which an agreement is written burns just as easily as the books of their detractors.'\n\nPeople who have long hoped to avoid a direct confrontation with [From.GetName] have now been strongly opposed by [Root.GetLeader], who argues that we in Machiavellian terms are merely postponing war to the advantage of the enemy. At this rate, we may strike the first blow after all.
translation: ’在现代历史乃至世界通史中，都没有比在[From.GetName]控制下的[From.GetRulingParty]的铁腕专政那样暴虐的统治了。有些人可能会认为我们不应该这样挑起矛盾，我们应该相信[From.GetLeader]在将来会信守诺言，但他们没有发现对法西斯政府来说，条约跟诺言一文不值。对于这种毫无节操的骗子，拳头才是道理，而写在纸上的条约就跟他们的批评者的文章一样，唯一的用处就是烧着取暖。’\n\n人们一直以来都避免与[From.GetName]正面冲突，但这一切都被[Root.GetLeader]破坏了，他认为我们只是在玩弄权谋以达到拖延战争，扩大优势的目的。在这种情况下，我们或许应该首先打响第一枪。

original: There can be no peace in our time until they are gone.
translation: 在他们消失之前，我们的时代不会有和平。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Calls for War Against [From.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetLeader]号召向[From.GetName]开战

original: 'Although we may be a peaceful people, our nature alone does not determine the course we must take in history. This is a time of war. For too long, the [From.GetAdjective] have possessed the means that we need to make it through the trials we may face, and it's apparent that they will not part with them peacefully. Despite our best efforts to build a modern state, some matters can only be settled through the old trials of battle.'\n\n[Root.GetLeader]'s hostile rhetoric towards [From.GetName] has gone to great lengths to justify an invasion. Some portion of the population support this course, but the decision lies in the lands of our leader.
translation: ‘尽管我们大概是个热爱和平的人，但我们的本性并不能决定我们实际的行动。这个一个战争的年代。长久以来，[From.GetAdjective]已经具备与我们打一场旷日持久的战争的能力，显然他们也不会拱手放弃这一切，和平解除武装。尽管我们已经尽力去创建一个现代的国家，但有些问题终究是得通过战争这种古老的方式才能解决。’\n\n[Root.GetLeader]对[From.GetName]的敌对宣言已经在极力粉饰战争。一部分人已经开始支持这个借口，但决定权依然在我们的领导者手上。

original: It may be a difficult decision, but we must stand behind it.
translation: 虽然很难接受，但我们全力支持。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Challenges [From.GetAdjective] Pretensions
translation: [Root.GetLeader]挑战[From.GetAdjective]要求

original: '[From.GetName] may think themselves more modern and advanced than us, but the truth is that their nation has not been tested as ours has, nor are they prepared for the threats now plain to see on the horizon. By their disdain towards us, and preventing us to seize that which is rightfully ours, they have made us one of those threats to themselves. Their weak and divided nation will hardly resist our claims.'\n\nThe derisive opinion of [From.GetName] long held by the [Root.GetRulingParty] has developed from criticism to hostility. Although popular opinion is that the [From.GetAdjective] people want to avoid war, [Root.GetLeader] claims that their elected leaders have provoked it through their arrogance.
translation: '[From.GetName]自认为比我们更加先进更加文明，但事实上他们的国家没有遭遇过我们国家经历过的考验，也没有准备好面对地平线上如今清晰可见的威胁。他们蔑视我们、阻挡我们取回理应属于我们的东西，是他们我们化成了他们的最大威胁。他们的四分五裂的国家根本无法阻止我们的索求。'\n\n[Root.GetRulingParty]对于[From.GetName]长久以来的嘲弄逐渐从批判升级为敌意满满。虽然[From.GetAdjective]的人民都不想要战争，但是[Root.GetLeader]声称这都是他们投选出来的傲慢领导自找的。

original: They do not know how strong our hardships have made us.
translation: 他们还知道历经苦难的我们如今是如何的强大。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Wants to Restore Order in [From.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetLeader]想要恢复[From.GetName]的秩序

original: 'The [Root.GetAdjective] national spirit is strong, but not all nations are so fortunate. [From.GetName] has had its traditions destroyed and rightful rulers long since murdered and buried, all in the name of the idea of the great Marxist revolution. It is our duty to restore order to this world led astray by bloodthirsty usurpers and to assert the strength of [Root.GetName] against this threat.'\n\nWhile the [Root.GetRulingParty] has always opposed communism, [From.GetName] has been a target of particular attacks in recent speeches. Whether or not the attack on the [Root.GetAdjective] nation from communists is a real threat, the preemptive attack on [From.GetAdjective] communism is already in the works.
translation: '[Root.GetAdjective]的民族精神很强大，但不是每一个国家都同样那么幸运。[From.GetName]的传统被毁灭了，它的合法统治者被谋害了，而这一切的始作俑者就是所谓伟大的马克思主义革命。 我们有责任为这个世界重塑秩序、驱逐冷血的篡位者，让[Root.GetName]的力量扶助世人对抗这个威胁。'\n\n虽然[Root.GetRulingParty]向来反对共产主义，但是[From.GetName]却成为了近来多场演讲的主要攻击目标。无论共产主义对[Root.GetAdjective]国的威胁是否真的存在，对[From.GetAdjective]的共产政权的先发制人攻击已经开始了。

original: Those murdered in the revolution will be avenged!
translation: 为革命流血的人复仇！

original: [Root.GetLeader] Calls Out [From.GetAdjective] Oppressors
translation: [Root.GetLeader]谴责[From.GetAdjective]的压迫者

original: 'My opponents would have you believe that my rule is like that of the [From.GetRulingParty] in [From.GetName]. They could not be more wrong. While [From.GetLeader]'s successes are the result of a recent fad, a destructive mass movement bent on bullying other nations into submission, the [Root.GetRulingParty] stands in opposition to that movement as the ones who will not submit. I am prepared to do whatever is necessary to eliminate this threat, even if it means war.'\n\nThe [Root.GetLeader] regime has adopted a hostile policy towards the [From.GetAdjective] nation. Whatever our leaders may be called, fascist is a word reserved for our enemies.
translation: '你们可能听说过我的对手抹黑我说我跟[From.GetRulingParty]的[From.GetName]没两样。事实上他们是错的。[From.GetLeader]的成功是来自一场充满毁灭性的狂热的集体运动，他们致力于威迫其他国家臣服，但是[Root.GetRulingParty]反对这种行动，并且坚决不会臣服。我已准备好一切必须的手段来消灭这个威胁，哪怕需要通过战争。'\n\n[Root.GetLeader]的政权对[From.GetAdjective]国采取了敌对政策。无论如何评价我们的领导，他都是坚定的对抗法西斯主义者。

original: Tradition and pragmatism will always triumph over fanaticism and terror.
translation: 传统和实用主义永远会打败狂热和恐怖主义。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Questions [From.GetAdjective] Sovereignty
translation: [Root.GetLeader]质问[From.GetAdjective]的主权

original: 'Who determines the borders of a nation and how are they determined? Whatever way people may have found in the past to justify where [Root.GetName] ends and [From.GetName] begins, we live in a new era. The strategic importance of this border cannot be overstated, and we are well within our rights to shift it to ensure the continued security of our people.'\n\nListening to [Root.GetLeader]'s recent speeches, an invasion of [From.GetName] appears imminent. Dissenting voices have objected, but public support for war is on the rise.
translation: '谁有权力评定一个国家的边境线在哪里？无论过去的人们是如何决定[Root.GetName]和[From.GetName]之间的国境，但我们现在正处于一个全新的时代。边境的战略重要性不可置疑，为了确保我们的子民的安全，我们有权力更改边境线。'\n\n听到[Root.GetLeader]最近的演讲词，人们就知道入侵[From.GetName]是势在必行的。异议的声音当然有，但是主战的声音日益增长。

original: We must rally behind this cause!
translation: 我们必须支持这场奋斗！

original: [Root.GetLeader] Questions the Motives of [From.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetLeader]质问[From.GetName]的目的

original: 'There is no doubt that [From.GetName] is preparing for war. The changes in economic policy make it plain to see that the [From.GetAdjective] are not a people of peace, but rather waiting for the right opportunity to strike against us. Will we stand idly by and watch them arm themselves while [Root.GetName] is undefended? Or will we disarm this threat before it grows beyond our power?'\n\nThe hawks in the [Root.GetRulingParty] have turned their eyes towards [From.GetName], arguing that attack is the best defense. Their viewpoint is gaining traction and [Root.GetName] is preparing for war.
translation: '毫无疑问[From.GetName]正在准备战争。[From.GetAdjective]的经济政策的改变已经显示出他们并非一个爱好和平的民族，他们只是伺机而动等待机会攻击我们。我们是准备坐以待毙坐视他们武装自己而让[Root.GetName]毫无防备吗？还是说我们该主动出击把这个威胁扼杀在摇篮中？'\n\n[Root.GetRulingParty]的鹰派人士把视线转移到[From.GetName]上，开始主张最好的防守就是攻击。他们的主张逐渐占据优势，[Root.GetName]因此整装备战。

original: At least through war, there will be an end to this conflict.
translation: 至少通过战争可以解决这场纷争。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Angered by [From.GetAdjective] Posturing
translation: [Root.GetLeader]被[From.GetAdjective]的装腔作势激怒了

original: 'Those naïve citizens of [Root.GetName] who imagine the [From.GetAdjective] as a people of peace are entirely out of touch with reality. Those who live at our border do not have the luxury of such delusions, seeing their troops closing in on us just across it. This is a threat we cannot leave unanswered. With every passing day, [From.GetName] is preparing for war. It would be madness for us not to do the same.'\n\nThe [From.GetAdjective] military presence close to our territory has sparked increased concern as this nation appears more and more to be the enemy of the [Root.GetRulingParty]. Whether it is the cause or the effect of their polemic is a matter of contention.
translation: '[Root.GetName]的幼稚人民竟然认为[From.GetAdjective]是一种爱好和平的民族，简直是跟现实脱节了。那些住在我们边境线的人可没有这么幼稚，他们的大军密布整条边境线，就等着越过去的一刻了。这是我们不能坐视不理的威胁。[From.GetName]每一天都在全力备战，我们要是还不动员起来就是傻逼了。'\n\n[From.GetAdjective]在我们边境上陈兵百万让整个国家陷入了恐慌，他们似乎对[Root.GetRulingParty]越来越多充满敌意。至于他们的敌意是什么原因则是个充满热议的课题。

original: Regardless, we must ready the people for war.
translation: 无论如何，我们都要准备面对战争。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Advocates Invasion of [From.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetLeader]倡导入侵[From.GetName]

original: 'If we want to have the strategic advantage in the foreseeable, not to say inevitable war with [From.GetName], there is no room to hesitate. This is about safeguarding our children's futures and ensuring that [Root.GetName] has a place in the world tomorrow. This is a matter of devotion to our cause and the ideals we take for granted. It's time to act.'\n\nA series of rousing speeches from [Root.GetRulingParty] leaders, most prominently [Root.GetLeader], has been calling the public to support an invasion of [From.GetName]. The geopolitical motives behind the invasion are less prominent in the rhetoric to patriotic sentiments, but this campaign appears highly efficient in convincing the public of its necessity.
translation: '如果我们想要对[From.GetName]占据战略优势，那就没有什么好犹豫的。这是为了我们的下一代的未来以及确保[Root.GetName]将会在未来的世界有一席之地。这是为了我们奋斗的目标和我们追随的理念。是该动手了。'\n\n[Root.GetRulingParty]的领导们尤其是[Root.GetLeader]发表了一系列的动员演讲热烈地呼吁民众支持入侵[From.GetName]。入侵背后隐藏的政治目的已经不重要了，人们都被爱国情绪鼓舞得热血沸腾了。

original: The nation stands behind this important decision.
translation: 全国人民支持这个重要的决定。

original: [From.GetLeader] Speaks Against [Root.GetName]
translation: [From.GetLeader]谴责[Root.GetName]

original: 'Does [Root.GetName] belong to the [Root.GetAdjective]? Let us ask ourselves a better question: Does the future belong to the [Root.GetAdjective] or does it belong to [From.GetName]?'\n\n[From.GetLeader]'s speech today, suggested that [From.GetName] is on the path to war. Political tensions have been building over the past month and it seems the [From.GetAdjective] people have accepted that war is inevitable. [Root.GetName] must also prepare.
translation: '[Root.GetName]是属于[Root.GetAdjective]的吗？我们换个更清晰的问题吧：未来是属于[Root.GetAdjective]的还是属于[From.GetName]的？'\n\n[From.GetLeader]今天的演讲在暗示[From.GetName]正在迈向战争。过去数个月来紧张的局势持续升温，[From.GetAdjective]人民明白，战争已经无可避免了。[Root.GetName]也必须做好准备。

original: Why can we not be allowed to live in peace?
translation: 为什么我们就不能和平共处？

original: [From.GetLeader] Denounces [Root.GetAdjective] Ideals
translation: [From.GetLeader]声讨[Root.GetAdjective]的理念

original: 'The [Root.GetAdjective] claim to have liberty and democracy, claim to want peace, but all of these things they pride themselves on are hollow. Their democracy divides the people where it should stand united and their liberty only betrays a lack of discipline. We [From.GetAdjective]s see through these lies... and we can see that this peace, peace on their terms, is a lie as well.'\n\n[From.GetRulingParty] has long derided the weakness of the [Root.GetAdjective] nation, but lately the rhetoric has grown more aggressive. The day of armed conflict grows closer.
translation: '[Root.GetAdjective]自称拥有自由和民主，自称想要和平，但是他们这些引以为傲的东西都是虚幻的。他们的民主将团结的国民打成了一盘散沙，他们的自由恰恰彰显了毫无纪律。我们[From.GetAdjective]看穿了他们的这些谎言……我们看穿了他们的这个所谓和平，也是谎言。'\n\n[From.GetRulingParty]长久以来一直嘲笑[Root.GetAdjective]，但最近他们的措辞越来越趾高气昂了。看来战争不远矣。

original: As expected from fascist scum like [From.GetLeader].
translation: [From.GetLeader]这种法西斯渣渣就是这样的啦。

original: [From.GetLeader] Warns Against [Root.GetAdjective] Communism
translation: [From.GetLeader]警告[Root.GetAdjective]的共产主义

original: 'Is there a bigger threat to our way of life, or indeed the way of life itself, than communism? This plague that threatens to make the slaves, not the masters, rule every nation, to abolish the nation itself, to abolish people and their history. We will take [From.GetName] and abolish the communist plague.'\n\n[From.GetLeader]'s hatred of communists has been well known since before [From.GetRulingParty]'s rise to power, but it appears to have intensified recently in the specific case of the [Root.GetAdjective] government. Our quest to purge Marxism off the face of the Earth may start there.
translation: '有什么比共产主义更加威胁我们的生活方式的吗？这个瘟疫般的思想打算让奴隶们打倒主人、夺权管理每一个国家，摧毁国家的概念、消灭民族的界限。我们会夺过[From.GetName]并且消灭这场共产瘟疫。'\n\n[From.GetLeader]对共产党的憎恨早在[From.GetRulingParty]上位前就已经是家喻户晓的，但是在[Root.GetAdjective]政府这个个例中却愈演愈烈。我们想要将马克思主义从地球上铲除的话，可以考虑从那里开始。

original: If they fear our cause, they fear their own people.
translation: 他们惧怕我们的理想，也会惧怕自己的人民。

original: [From.GetName] Prepares for Great Struggle
translation: [From.GetName]即将面对艰难抗争

original: 'The [Root.GetAdjective] are a people, who will not part easily with power. However, they must also realize that the trajectory of our two nations can only end in a clash. We must steel ourselves for the struggle to come. For [Root.GetName] will not be taken without a fight.'\n\nThe possibility of an understanding between the similarly minded governments of [Root.GetName] and [From.GetName] has given way to a campaign to take their territory by force.
translation: '[Root.GetAdjective]就像一个不会轻易舍弃权力的人。但他们也必须明白，到最后两个国家唯有开战才能解决问题。我们一定要为接下来的斗争做好准备，[Root.GetName]绝不会束手就擒。'\n\n有着相似想法的[Root.GetName]和[From.GetName]政府也理解彼此的目的，用武力夺取土地将在所难免。

original: Let them come!
translation: 放着他们来！

original: [From.GetLeader] Bring Revolution to [Root.GetName]
translation: [From.GetLeader]引领[Root.GetName]革命

original: 'While we have consolidated the socialist society in [From.GetName], many nations still suffer under the despots of old. The workers of [Root.GetName] have no voice, no means to organize, and any attempts to institute socialism will be crushed savagely by the [Root.GetLeader] regime. We cannot wait for the gears of the international revolution to turn for the [Root.GetAdjective] people. We have proven that we could crush the capitalist oppressors here, and we will crush the oppressors in [Root.Capital.GetName] as well!'\n\n[From.GetLeader] has abandoned all attempts at diplomacy with our government. The communist task of eradicating all borders is now strictly focused on eradicating our borders.
translation: '虽然[From.GetName]的社会主义社会的地位已得到巩固，但世界上仍有许多国家在遭受封建制度的折磨。[Root.GetName]的工人没有发声的权力、没法建立起自己的组织，任何尝试建立社会主义制度的人都会遭到[Root.GetLeader]治下体制的野蛮摧残。我们不能等着革命的齿轮自行带动[Root.GetAdjective]人民，我们在这里成功摧毁了资本主义的压迫，我们也必将摧毁[Root.Capital.GetName]的资本主义压迫！'\n\n[From.GetLeader]放弃与我们政府进行外交谈判。共产主义无国界这个目标如今变成了要彻底消除我们的国界。

original: [Root.GetLeader] is a better ruler than any revolutionary opportunist!
translation: [Root.GetLeader]才是最好的革命领袖！

original: [From.GetLeader] Calls to Aid [Root.GetAdjective] Workers
translation: [From.GetLeader]呼吁帮助[Root.GetAdjective]工人

original: 'Is there a greater lie than the supposed liberty of the [Root.GetAdjective] people? Where they once slaved under the princes and dukes who claimed ownership of the soil, they are now forced to sell their labor to those who claim ownership of the factories. Their freedom to choose one master over the other can hardly be called liberty. Likewise, their freedom to elect their leaders is a false choice, as propaganda would never allow the true socialists to take power. A people so thoroughly indoctrinated can only be saved by a [From.GetAdjective] intervention.'\n\nUnwilling to accept that our people may be satisfied without their social experiments, the communist regime in [From.GetName] has openly threatened to attack our nation. There is little reason to believe that this conflict could be resolved peacefully.
translation: '有比[Root.GetAdjective]人民获得自由更大的谎言吗？他们一度被掌控石油资源的皇室贵族奴役，如今又被迫为工厂主出卖自己的劳动力。自由选择自己的主子根本不能叫做自由。同样，所谓自由选举领袖也不过是花言巧语，政府从来就不允许真正的社会主义者掌权。只有通过[From.GetAdjective]介入才能拯救被彻底洗脑的人民。'\n\n[From.GetName]的共产党政权不愿承认我们的人民满意当今的社会体制，公然威胁要向我国发动战争。恐怕这场冲突是无法以和平方式来解决了。

original: What merits can their convictions hold if they must force them on us?
translation: 他们采取暴力压迫也能这么理直气壮吗？

original: [Root.GetAdjective] Communism Failing
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]共产主义崩溃

original: 'Comrades, although the greatest revolutionaries have once been called traitors, it has become plain to see that the revolution itself has been betrayed. How else would you explain the rule of the [Root.GetRulingParty] of [Root.GetName], who have cast aside every hint of Marxist ideas to build a degenerated worker's state where they can reign under false premises? In strengthening their own power at the price of the international revolution, they have shown that they care little for the ideals they claim to hold. We must bring the true revolution to them.'\n\nAlthough initially supportive of [Root.GetRulingParty]'s victory in [Root.Capital.GetName], [From.GetLeader] has drifted away from [Root.GetLeader]'s philosophy. The conflict has escalated to the point where they are preparing to invade to enforce their brand of socialism on us.
translation: '[Root.GetName][Root.GetRulingParty]怎么会摒弃掉所有马克思主义的思想，建立起一个倒退的、工人被谎言蒙骗的国家？他们以牺牲国际革命为代价巩固自己的权力，忘却了曾经追求的理想。我们必须展开一场真真正正的革命。'\n\n[From.GetLeader]虽然曾对[Root.GetRulingParty]在[Root.Capital.GetName]获得胜利表示支持，但他已经与[Root.GetLeader]的理念渐行渐远。他们企图用暴力的方式将社会主义强加给我们。

original: They do not understand what the revolution means to the [Root.GetAdjective] people.
translation: 他们根本不理解对于[Root.GetAdjective]人民而言革命是什么。

original: [From.GetLeader] Calls for Crushing [Root.GetAdjective] Nationalism
translation: [From.GetLeader]呼吁消灭[Root.GetAdjective]民族主义

original: 'Is there any society more repugnant to the future of the revolution, any more alien to the plight of the worker, than the fascist regime of [Root.GetName]? Calling upon the people to devote themselves fanatically to the decrepit institution of the nation state, they have dressed up age-old ways of savagery in a modern costume, trying to present themselves as an alternative future to the inevitable international victory of the working class. It is only a matter of time until they strike against us or our allies. Let us strike first.'\n\nNo one has expected less than mutual contempt between us and the [Root.GetAdjective], but the animosity has intensified lately. Hearing [From.GetLeader] speak, it appears that conflict will arise sooner rather than later.
translation: '还有哪个社会比法西斯政权统治下的[Root.GetName]更反感革命、对工人压迫更严重的吗？号召自己的人民推崇腐朽体制，建立单一民族主义国家，披着现代社会皮的封建制度，妄以为自己可以在工人阶级领导全世界的浪潮下独善其身。敌人迟早会来打击我们和我们的盟友，因此我们要先下手为强。'\n\n我们与[Root.GetAdjective]之间的敌意从来没有消减，但现在这股仇恨愈演愈烈。[From.GetLeader]的讲话显然意味着这场冲突将一触即发。

original: Death to communists!
translation: 消灭共产主义者！

original: Diplomacy with [Root.GetName] Breaks Down
translation: 与[Root.GetName]外交决裂

original: 'Despite our attempts to find a diplomatic solution to our conflict with [Root.GetName], negotiations have once again broken down, leaving us with limited options. The authoritarian [Root.GetLeader] regime has displayed the unreasonable approach to this matter typical of leaders who are not accountable to their people. Barring a complete turnaround in the policies of [Root.GetAdjective] leadership, we will be left with no recourse but to fight.'\n\n[From.GetAdjective] intervention in our domestic affairs has been a hot issue, with some politicians in their opposition claiming that [From.GetRulingParty] has pursued a hawkish policy from the start. Whatever their original intent, a future war now suddenly seems very real and inevitable.
translation: '我们多次尝试用外交手段解决与[Root.GetName]的矛盾，但一次又一次的谈判无果让我们没有了退路。[Root.GetLeader]的独裁体制表明，只要有这种不对人民负责的领袖存在，双方就永远无法解决问题。除非[Root.GetAdjective]政策发生翻天覆地的转变，否则我们只能以战争的方式寻求出路。'\n\n[From.GetAdjective]干涉我国内政是当前继续解决的问题，对方有些政治家认为[From.GetRulingParty]从一开始就追求的就是强权政治。不管初衷如何，原本一场遥不可及的战争如今已迫在眉睫。

original: Their condescending rhetoric will not intimidate us.
translation: 他们再怎么大放厥词也不会威胁到我们。

original: [From.GetLeader] Calls for Intervention in [Root.GetName]
translation: [From.GetLeader]呼吁介入[Root.GetName]问题。

original: 'It is with heavy heart that we must confront the reality of our situation: An invasion of [Root.GetName] may be our only recourse. It is of too great a strategic advantage to attempt any other solution in our current situation. Although we trust that neither the [From.GetAdjective] nor the [Root.GetAdjective] people want war, but history has led us to this point and our options are limited. We can only hope that through this assertion of our military power, we can avoid further bloodshed in the future.'\n\nAlthough it is a popular theory that democracies do not go to war against other democracies, recent developments have pointed to a [From.GetAdjective] invasion of [Root.GetName] in the future. History may surprise us yet.
translation: '我们必须严肃面对当前的局面：入侵[Root.GetName]将会是我们唯一的出路。采取任何其他措施都会令我们牺牲大量的战略优势。尽管我们相信无论[From.GetAdjective]还是[Root.GetAdjective]人民都不希望发生战争，但历史让我们不得不走上这条路。我们只能寄望于用这场战争来避免未来再出现杀戮。'\n\n主流观念认为民主国家不得对其他民主国家发动战争，但[From.GetAdjective]的入侵即将威胁到[Root.GetName]的未来。历史总是让人出乎意料。

original: [From.GetName] is a dubious democracy anyway, pursuing such aggressive action.
translation: [From.GetName]采取这样的侵略行径，说明它只是个虚伪的民主国家。

original: [From.GetLeader] Speaks Against Red Menace
translation: [From.GetLeader]反对红色威胁

original: 'Without a doubt, [Root.GetName] communism is one of the greatest threats to liberty and order in this era. Relentless and ruthless, it threatens to devour not only the [Root.GetAdjective] people's hope of a prosperous, democratic society, but that of its neighbors as well. If we do not act now, we may well see this first domino fall too late, leaving more failed social experiments in its wake. How many more need die before we intervene?'\n\nThe nascent worker's movement has intimidated [From.GetAdjective] leaders. While representatives in their opposition have called this a Red Scare aimed at pursuing war with us, the rhetoric of the [From.GetRulingParty] has been highly successful so far.
translation: '[Root.GetName]的共产主义无疑是当今世上自由和秩序的头号威胁。它不仅无情地吞噬着[Root.GetAdjective]人民最求繁荣、民主社会的希望，对周边国家来说也同样如此。如果我们依然无动于衷，民主国家就会一个接一个地沦陷，萌芽中的民主社会也将夭折。为什么不趁牺牲进一步扩大前行动起来呢？'\n\n工人运动正威胁着[From.GetAdjective]领袖，虽然这些领袖中的代表性人物将运动称为红色威胁并扬言要向我们发动战争，但[From.GetRulingParty]目前正取得优秀成果。

original: As long as there is profit to be made, capitalists will manufacture a war.
translation: 只要有利益可图，资本主义者就会继续制造战争。

original: [From.GetLeader] Confronts [Root.GetAdjective] Fascism
translation: [From.GetLeader]对峙[Root.GetAdjective]法西斯主义

original: 'In modern history, perhaps even in history as a whole, there has been no worse tyranny than the iron grip in which [Root.GetRulingParty] now holds [Root.GetName]. People may argue that we should not provoke conflict, that we should trust [Root.GetLeader] to honor treaties and promises in the future, but these people fail to see that treaties made under the reign of fascism are useless. To these dishonorable liars, might makes right, and the paper on which an agreement is written burns just as easily as the books of their detractors.'\n\nJealous of the glorious society we are building and the legacy it is founded upon, the [From.GetAdjective] seem prepared to start a war to destroy it. So much for their pretensions of peace.
translation: '纵观现代历史甚至是整个人类历史，都没有哪个体制的暴政程度比得上[Root.GetRulingParty]铁腕统治下的[Root.GetName]。人们也许会说我们不该煽动政治矛盾，应该信任[Root.GetLeader]，尊重协定和条约，但他们却没有看清这些条约的本质都是法西斯专政下子虚乌有的产物。对于这群可耻的骗子来说，强权即正义，撕毁条约就和烧掉批判者的著作一样简单。'\n\n[From.GetAdjective]妒忌我们的繁荣社会和在此基础上建立的财富，他们似乎企图用战争来摧毁这些东西。再也不能让他们以此作为追求和平的借口了。

original: Inevitable. Better to have it over with.
translation: 既然无法避免战争，那就一举结束它吧。

original: [From.GetLeader] Calls for War Against [Root.GetName]
translation: [From.GetLeader]向[Root.GetName]宣战

original: 'Although we may be a peaceful people, our nature alone does not determine the course we must take in history. This is a time of war. For too long, the [Root.GetAdjective] have possessed the means that we need to make it through the trials we may face, and it's apparent that they will not part with them peacefully. Despite our best efforts to build a modern state, some matters can only be settled through the old trials of battle.'\n\nIn a recent speech to the [From.GetAdjective] people the hostile rhetoric towards [Root.GetName] has intensified and [From.GetLeader] has gone to great lengths to justify an invasion. Some portion of the population support this course, but the decision lies in the lands of their leader.
translation: '我们热爱和平，但这种天性无法改写我们的历史进程，毕竟现在是战争时期。[Root.GetAdjective]如今掌控着一切，我们需要历尽考验夺回它们，而他们显然也不会拱手相让。我们确实想建立现代国家，但有些问题必须用战争才能解决。'\n\n[From.GetLeader]为了辩护自己的侵略行径，最近对[From.GetAdjective]人民发表了一项演说，彻底表现出他对[Root.GetName]的敌意。部分民众支持他的行动，但最终的决定权仍然掌握在他们领袖的手里。

original: They will regret making us their enemy.
translation: 他们会后悔与我们为敌的。

original: [From.GetLeader] Challenges [Root.GetAdjective] Pretensions
translation: [From.GetLeader]质疑[Root.GetAdjective]言论

original: '[Root.GetName] may think themselves more modern and advanced than us, but the truth is that their nation has not been tested as ours has, nor are they prepared for the threats now plain to see on the horizon. By their disdain towards us, and preventing us to seize that which is rightfully ours, they have made us one of those threats to themselves. Their weak and divided nation will hardly resist our claims.'\n\nThe derisive opinion of [Root.GetName] long held by the [From.GetRulingParty] has developed from criticism to hostility. Although popular opinion is that the [Root.GetAdjective] people want to avoid war, [From.GetLeader] claims that our elected leaders have provoked it through their arrogance.
translation: '[Root.GetName]以为自己比我们更先进、更现代化，但事实上他们从来没有像我们国家一样经受过考验，也对即将来临的威胁一无所知。他们蔑视我们，阻止我们获得那些理应属于我们的东西，将我们视为威胁。这个懦弱、混乱的国家将无法阻挡我们。'\n\n由[From.GetRulingParty]提出的谬论可见[Root.GetName]对我们的敌意逐渐加深。尽管[Root.GetAdjective]人民希望能避免战争，但[From.GetLeader]仍声称是我们领袖的自大狂妄挑起了两国之间的矛盾。

original: The voices for peace among the [From.GetAdjective] people are, of course, silenced.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]人民的和平呼声显然被忽略掉了。

original: [From.GetLeader] Wants to Restore Order in [Root.GetName]
translation: [From.GetLeader]期望为[Root.GetName]恢复秩序

original: 'The [From.GetAdjective] national spirit is strong, but not all nations are so fortunate. [Root.GetName] has had its traditions destroyed and rightful rulers long since murdered and buried, all in the name of the idea of the great Marxist revolution. It is our duty to restore order to this world led astray by bloodthirsty usurpers and to assert the strength of [From.GetName] against this threat.'\n\nWhile the [From.GetRulingParty] has always opposed communism, [Root.GetName] has been a target of particular attacks in recent speeches. Fearing their nation's inevitable progress to the next stage of history, a preemptive attack on [Root.GetAdjective] communism is already in the works.
translation: '[From.GetAdjective]有坚强的民族精神，但不是所有国家都能如此幸运。因为马克思主义者的革命行动，[Root.GetName]的传统遭到破坏、合法统治者惨遭杀害。这个世界被嗜血篡权者引入歧途，我们必须为其恢复秩序，用[From.GetName]的力量来对抗这场威胁。'\n\n[From.GetRulingParty]一直以来都反对共产主义，近期则将矛头指向[Root.GetName]。他们担心自己的国家无法抵挡工人革命的浪潮，决定对[Root.GetAdjective]共产主义采取先发制人的攻势。

original: It's too late to reverse the progress we've made.
translation: 他们抵挡不住我们的革命浪潮。

original: [From.GetLeader] Calls Out [Root.GetAdjective] Oppressors
translation: [From.GetLeader]在呼喊[Root.GetAdjective]压迫者

original: 'My opponents would have you believe that my rule is like that of the [Root.GetRulingParty] in [Root.GetName]. They could not be more wrong. While [Root.GetLeader]'s successes are the result of a recent fad, a destructive mass movement bent on bullying other nations into submission, the [From.GetRulingParty] stands in opposition to that movement as the ones who will not submit. I am prepared to do whatever is necessary to eliminate this threat, even if it means war.'\n\nThe [From.GetLeader] regime has adopted a hostile policy towards the [Root.GetAdjective] nation. Our visionary plans for future greatness have put their nation to shame, and unsurprisingly, they feel threatened.
translation: '敌人会让你们认为我所带领的国家就如同[Root.GetRulingParty]治下的[Root.GetName]一样，他们这是大错特错。[Root.GetLeader]之所以成功不过是心血来潮的结果，他们用大规模的暴力行径来让其他国家屈服，而[From.GetRulingParty]正好相反，我们绝不会投降。为了铲除这场威胁我已做足万全准备，即便要进行战争也在所不惜。'\n\n[From.GetLeader]对[Root.GetAdjective]国家采取敌对政策。我们的远大理想让他们感到羞愧，也让他们感受到了威胁。

original: If they want to test our might, they will regret it.
translation: 竟敢公然挑衅我们，他们会后悔的。

original: [From.GetLeader] Questions [Root.GetAdjective] Sovereignty
translation: [From.GetLeader]质疑[Root.GetAdjective]主权

original: 'Who determines the borders of a nation and how are they determined? Whatever way people may have found in the past to justify where [From.GetName] ends and [Root.GetName] begins, we live in a new era. The strategic importance of this border cannot be overstated, and we are well within our rights to shift it to ensure the continued security of our people.'\n\nListening to [From.GetLeader]'s recent speeches, an invasion of [Root.GetName] appears imminent. Dissenting voices have objected, but public support for war is on the rise.
translation: '是谁决定一个国家的疆域有多广，他们又该如何决定？在过去人们用种种理由辩称这儿是[From.GetName]的地盘，那儿是[Root.GetName]的国土，但如今我们活在一个全新的时代，国界有着举足轻重的战略意义，我们有权利对其做出改变，以确保人民的安全得到长久的保障。'\n\n[From.GetLeader]的近期演说表明他们即将入侵[Root.GetName]。尽管有反对的声音，但民众支持战争的呼声越来越高。

original: Has the world learned nothing from the Great War?
translation: 难道这个世界还没有吸取到一战的教训吗？

original: [From.GetLeader] Questions the Motives of [Root.GetName]
translation: [From.GetLeader]质疑[Root.GetName]动机

original: 'There is no doubt that [Root.GetName] is preparing for war. The changes in economic policy make it plain to see that the [Root.GetAdjective] are not a people of peace, but rather waiting for the right opportunity to strike against us. Will we stand idly by and watch them arm themselves while [From.GetName] is undefended? Or will we disarm this threat before it grows beyond our power?'\n\nThe hawks in the [From.GetRulingParty] have turned their eyes towards [Root.GetName], arguing that attack is the best defense. Their viewpoint is gaining traction and [From.GetName] is preparing for war.
translation: '[Root.GetName]无疑是在为战争做准备。该国改变了经济政策也说明[Root.GetAdjective]并非善男信女，他们正在寻找向我们发动攻势的合适时机。我们是该坐以待毙任由[From.GetName]蹂躏吗？还是说我们应该在这股威胁势力壮大之前遏制住它？'\n\n[From.GetRulingParty]内的激进派把目光瞄准了[Root.GetName]，并诡辩要以进攻代替防御。这个观念正逐渐获得支持，[From.GetName]也开始为战争作部署。

original: This is exactly why we need to be ready.
translation: 正因如此我们也必须做足准备。

original: [From.GetLeader] Angered by [Root.GetAdjective] Posturing
translation: [From.GetLeader]态度激怒[Root.GetAdjective]

original: 'Those naïve citizens of [From.GetName] who imagine the [Root.GetAdjective] as a people of peace are entirely out of touch with reality. Those who live at our border do not have the luxury of such delusions, seeing their troops closing in on us just across it. This is a threat we cannot leave unanswered. With every passing day, [Root.GetName] is preparing for war. It would be madness for us not to do the same.'\n\nOur military presence close to [From.GetAdjective] territory has sparked increased concern, since they interpret our troop movements as proof hostile intent. They hardly seem to have considered that their aggressive rhetoric is the reason for our defensive measures.
translation: '[From.GetName]人民竟天真地以为[Root.GetAdjective]热爱和平，根本是痴心妄想。生活在我国边境地区的人民可没有产生这种错觉，因为他们正眼看着敌人的部队逐渐迫近我们的国土。我们必须正视这场威胁。[Root.GetName]日以继夜地为战争作部署，只有愚蠢的人才会无所作为。'\n\n我军接近[From.GetAdjective]领土让该国产生疑虑，并认为我们带有敌对意图。但他们似乎没有考虑到，这样的激进言辞也是我们采取自卫措施的理由。

original: We can hardly disarm after these threats.
translation: 面对这样的威胁我们更不能放松戒备。

original: [From.GetLeader] Advocates Invasion of [Root.GetName]
translation: [From.GetLeader]主张入侵[Root.GetName]

original: 'If we want to have the strategic advantage in the foreseeable, not to say inevitable war with [Root.GetName], there is no room to hesitate. This is about safeguarding our children's futures and ensuring that [From.GetName] has a place in the world tomorrow. This is a matter of devotion to our cause and the ideals we take for granted. It's time to act.'\n\nA series of rousing speeches from [From.GetRulingParty] leaders, most prominently [From.GetLeader], has been calling the public to support an invasion of [Root.GetName]. The geopolitical motives behind the invasion are less prominent in the rhetoric to patriotic sentiments, but this campaign appears highly efficient in convincing the public of its necessity.
translation: '要取得战略优势，即便与[Root.GetName]开战我们也绝不犹豫。我们要保障后代的未来，让[From.GetName]立足于这个世界。让我们为这个国家的事业和愿景献身，是时候行动起来了！'\n\n[From.GetRulingParty]领袖发表了一系列鼓动人心的演说，其中[From.GetLeader]更呼吁全国支持他对[Root.GetName]发动战争。打着爱国情怀牌的地缘政治自不必说，这些演说从说服民众相信战争的必要性这方面来说，确实是行之有效的。

original: We better prepare. The war will come.
translation: 必须做好准备，战争即将来临。

original: [Root.GetLeader] Criticized for Weak Foreign Policy
translation: [Root.GetLeader]的软弱对外政策遭批评

original: 'We had the chance to strike against our enemies, but the [Root.GetRulingParty] let it pass by. Not only is this yet another damning case in a string of missed opportunities to strengthen [Root.GetName]'s position internationally, it is a sign that their claim to be acting in the interest of the [Root.GetAdjective] people is mostly empty rhetoric. It is time for a change in policy.'\n\nOur failure to pursue the war many had expected has been the target of scathing criticism from our political opponents. Not following through on our military plans will make it more difficult for us to convince the people in which direction we're taking [Root.GetName].
translation: '我们曾有机会打击敌人，却被[Root.GetRulingParty]错失。这不仅让我们一次又一次地失去提升[Root.GetName]国际地位的机会，也表明政府所谓为[Root.GetAdjective]人民谋取利益的说法不过是花言巧语。是时候对政策做出改变了。'\n\n没能发动我们政治对手一直以来寻求的战争，如今成了他们批判我们的资本。若无法贯彻执行我们的军事计划，要说服民众相信我们对[Root.GetName]的领导方针就会变得难上加难。

original: Don't they want to avoid war?
translation: 难道人们就不希望避免战争吗？

original: There is no room for public disagreement outside of party meetings.
translation: 绝不能让分歧出现在党派集会之外。

original: We cannot allow people to accuse [Root.GetLeader] of cowardice!
translation: 绝不允许有人指责[Root.GetLeader]

original: Atomic Bombing of [From.From.GetName]
translation: 原子弹爆炸[From.From.GetName]

original: For the first and hopefully last time in history, a nuclear bomb has been detonated in [From.From.GetName] as part of international warfare. The unprecedented destruction stands as a testament to the devastating power of this new weapon, which is feared not only for what it can do to its targets, but what implications it has for the one who deploys it and for humanity itself.\n\nThe world holds its breath waiting for what will come next. Will this force [From.From.Owner.GetName] to surrender to avoid further terror, or will it only strengthen their resolve to strike back against those who would resort to such measures?
translation: [From.From.GetName]是历史上第一个，也可能是最后一个因国际战争遭受原子弹轰炸的地方。这种新型武器显示出了前所未有的破坏力，人们害怕的不仅是原子弹的威力，同时更畏惧那些投放它的人，以及人性本身。\n\n整个世界都在担心未来还会面对怎样的灾难。[From.From.Owner.GetName]会被迫投降吗，还是说他们会更加坚定自己反击的决心？

original: The Atomic Era has truly begun.
translation: 原子时代正式降临了。

original: We will do whatever is necessary to protect the [Root.GetAdjective] people.
translation: 我们将不惜一切代价保护[Root.GetAdjective]人民。

original: Atomic Bombing of Hiroshima
translation: 广岛原子弹爆炸

original:
The streets were like a scene from hell."
 - Kuniyoshi Aikawa

Today, a nuclear bomb was detonated over the city of Hiroshima at an altitude of 580 meters. More than two thirds of the city were instantly destroyed. Despite the city being built to withstand earthquakes, only a few sturdy structures survived the blast.

While the power of the atomic bomb has been played up in the public mind, the human cost of the weapon has been played down. Neither side wants to contemplate the horror of the event, but its legacy will be one of lives lost in the blink of an eye and lasting fallout.
translation:
“街道如同地狱。”
 - 国吉相川

一枚原子弹今天在广岛市580米上空爆炸，整个城市的三分之二被瞬间毁灭。尽管这里的建筑能够承受地震侵袭，但在这场爆炸中幸免的却寥寥无几。

人们清楚认识到原子弹的威力，却忽视了这种武器所造成的人员伤亡。交战双方都不愿再回想起这场灾难，但一个个瞬间消逝的生命和那持久的辐射尘埃将会铭记在每个人心中。

original: How many more will fall before this war ends?
translation: 还要付出多少代价才能结束这场战争？

original: We must act quickly to aid the victims.
translation: 我们必须尽快展开救助伤员的行动。

original: Atomic Bombing of Nagasaki
translation: 长崎原子弹爆炸

original: A nuclear bomb, originally intended for Kokura, was detonated today over the Nagasaki. Weather conditions forced the planes to divert their mission, a combination of smoke, clouds and technical difficulties being deciding factors in an event that may well change history.\n\nThe effects of the bomb were contained somewhat by the city's location in a valley, but the damage is still severe. Some military installations were struck, but the catastrophic civilian losses overshadow them by far. It may take decades before we know the long-term effects of this weapon with certainty.
translation: 一枚原定投放于小仓市的原子弹今天在长崎上空引爆。气象条件迫使投弹的飞机转移任务目标，也许就是这些地面浓烟、空中云雾和其他技术条件的综合因素彻底改写了历史。\n\n城市三面环山的地形使炸弹威力有所减弱，但仍然造成了严重的破坏。当地部分军事设施瘫痪，但灾难性的人员伤亡才是让日本人黯然的原因。恐怕我们需要用数十年的时间才能确定这种武器所造成的伤害。

original: Will this lead to [From.From.Owner.GetAdjective] surrender?
translation: [From.From.Owner.GetAdjective]会因此投降吗？

original: We had hoped Nagasaki would be spared.
translation: 我们也不想让长崎受到伤害。

original: Atomic Bombing of Berlin
translation: 柏林原子弹爆炸

original: Today, at [GetDateText], the German capital of Berlin was struck by a nuclear explosion. The city has suffered several attacks, in this war and the last, but all else pale in comparison to this. Not since the Thirty Years' War has Berlin seen comparable devastation - considering its growth, this was seen as an impossibility.\n\nThe Führerbunker appears to have survived the blast at least partially due to the bomb detonating away from its planned epicenter, and [From.From.Owner.GetLeader] is rumored to still be alive, if outraged. How [From.From.Owner.GetAdjective] leaders should be evacuated and if they can be protected from the fallout is another matter, however.
translation: 今天[GetDateText]，德意志第三帝国首都柏林遭遇了核武器打击。这座城市在战争中已经数遭摧残，但是最后这次，让以前的其他攻击都显得苍白无力。哪怕“三十年战争”也不可能让柏林经受如此的摧残——考虑到核爆的破坏还会进一步增加，这曾被视为不可能发生的事情。\n\n元首地堡幸免于难，至少部分原因是因为爆炸中心偏离了计划中的起爆点，而据传[From.From.Owner.GetLeader]依然还活着，而如何进行[From.From.Owner.GetAdjective]领导人们的疏散以及如何在放射型尘埃中保护他们则是另外一码事了。

original: Today, I am relieved not to be a Berliner.
translation: 今天，我庆幸我不是一个柏林人。

original: Our enemies have struck at the heart of the nation!
translation: 我们的敌人已经入侵了我们国家的心脏！

original: Atomic Bombing of London
translation: 伦敦核爆

original: A nuclear explosion has devastated the city of London today. Despite the city's anti-air defenses, [From.From.Owner.GetNameDef] was not prepared for this attack. At [GetDateText], Big Ben chimed for the last time, having been melted by the blast. Early reports suggest Buckingham Palace has been completely leveled and the whereabouts of the royal family are currently unknown.\n\n[From.From.Owner.GetLeader] has nevertheless been confirmed to have survived and is preparing a rousing speech for the radio later today. With morale at an all-time low, the British people is in dire need of this - or a very eloquent surrender.
translation: 一次核爆在今天摧毁了伦敦城区。尽管这座城市有着防空设施，但是[From.From.Owner.GetNameDef]并没有为核武攻击做好准备措施。[GetDateText]，大本钟最后一次响起，然后在大爆炸中被融化。 最初的报告表明，白金汉宫已经完全被夷为平地，而生活其中的英国王室目前下落不明。\n\n[From.From.Owner.GetLeader]被证实仍然幸存并为今天晚些时候激励国民的无线电演讲做着准备。因为士气前所未有的低落，大不列颠公民迫切的需要这样的激励——或者一份辞藻华丽的投降协议。

original: It's difficult to maintain a stiff upper lip in the face of a nuclear blast wave.
translation: 很难在面对核爆冲击波时依然保持镇定自若的神情。

original: God save the King!
translation: 主佑女王!

original: Atomic Bombing of Kyoto
translation: 京都核爆

original: The city of Kyoto, a prominent [From.From.Owner.GetAdjective] industrial center, was struck today by a nuclear bomb. It is speculated that the city was chosen as a target because it has been regarded as an intellectual center.\n\nThe beauty and historical significance of the Kyoto led many to assume it would be spared from the bomb, but it appears the terror of raining destruction on such a place has rather been seen as a benefit, increasing the psychological impact of the attack. The city's location in the valley somewhat limited the blast, but the old Imperial Palace and many industrial buildings have been completely destroyed.
translation: 京都城，一个[From.From.Owner.GetAdjective]重要的工业中心，今天被核弹袭击了。据推测这座城市被选为目标是因为它被视为一个文化中心。\n\n京都的秀丽和沧桑让很多人认为它会从炸弹空袭中幸免于难，但是在这样的地方进行暴雨般的恐怖毁灭行为已经被看做一种收益，用以增加这次攻击的心理影响力。整个城市地处山谷一定程度上限制了大爆炸的影响，但是京都的旧天皇御所和许多的工业建筑已经被完全摧毁。

original: Legacy and beauty mean nothing in a war like this.
translation: 传统和绮丽在战争面前什么都不是。

original: If they destroy the old, we will build the new.
translation: 如果他们摧毁了旧的历史，那我们将创造新的历史。

original: Atomic Bombing of Tokyo
translation: 东京核爆

original: Today, a nuclear strike was directed at the heart of the Japanese Empire. The capital of Tokyo, although expected to be the target of firebombing, was never assumed to be a prioritized target of this new weapon. Yet ultimately, perhaps due to the significance of the new capital and Imperial Palace which has now been destroyed, an even more all-consuming fire has fallen on the city.\n\nAlthough [From.From.Owner.GetLeader] is reported to have survived, the event has raised questions about how far Japan's enemies are willing to go. If the war does not end with this, what targets remain? What is left to threaten with?
translation: 今天，一次核打击直接发生在大日本帝国的核心地带。首都东京，尽管被认为是燃烧炸弹打击的目标，但是从未被认为会被这种新式武器攻击。然而最终，或许是因为这座新都和天皇御所的意义，导致东京现在已经被摧毁，而更多的烈焰正在降临这座城市。\n\n尽管据报道[From.From.Owner.GetLeader]幸存了下来，这次事件不禁让人怀疑，大日本帝国的敌人们究竟打算进行到什么程度。若战争并未因此结束，那么哪座城市还是他们的目标？他们下一个威胁手段是什么？

original: Does this mean the end of the Japanese Empire?
translation: 这是否意味着大日本帝国的终结？

original: As long as [From.From.Owner.GetLeader] lives, so does the Empire.
translation: 只要[From.From.Owner.GetLeader]天皇尚在，大日本帝国就不会灭亡。

original: Atomic Bombing of Washington D.C.
translation: 华盛顿核爆

original: A nuclear bomb was detonated today over the capital of the United States. In an attack clearly directed at the political center and historical legacy of the US, the White House, the Capitol and a number of monuments and memorials were wiped off the face of the Earth. Even the Burning of Washington over a century ago pales in comparison to the destruction visited upon the city by this devastating weapon.\n\nAlthough President [From.From.Owner.GetLeader] has been brought to safety, the nation has been shaken to its core. No doubt, the US hoped to be the first and only country to wield such a weapon. Those hopes have now been shattered in the worst possible way.
translation: 一枚核弹于今天在美国的首都被引爆。这次攻击显然直接针对了美国的政治中心和历史遗产——白宫，国会大厦和一些纪念碑与纪念馆被从地表抹去了。即使是一个世纪以前的华盛顿大火所造成的破坏，与这次毁灭性武器的造访比起来也是小巫见大巫。\n\n虽然[From.From.Owner.GetLeader]总统已经被送到了安全的地方，但是国家的核心已经被动摇。毫无疑问，美国希望成为第一个也是最后一个使用这种武器的国家。现在这些希望都以最坏的方式破灭了

original: One nation, indivisible, versus one atom, divisible.
translation: 原子可裂，国不可分。

original: The eagle will rise from the ashes like a phoenix.
translation: 白头鹰将会像凤凰一样重生。

original: Atomic Bombing of Rome
translation: 罗马核爆

original: A nuclear explosion struck the city of Rome today, shocking people around the world. Due to its historical and artistic treasures, many had never thought the ancient city would be the target of such indiscriminate destruction. With the Vatican City also partially destroyed and the whereabouts of the Pope unknown, the event has horrified not only Italians, but Catholics around the world.\n\nRome's rapid growth in the past decade has been nearly completely undone by the attack. For a while, it looked like the city could aid the nation's recovery after the war was over. Those hopes have now been turned to dust, along with many people.
translation: 今天，一次核武器打击发生在罗马，让全世界的人民为之震惊。因为她的历史和艺术宝藏，很多人从来没有料到一座古城会成为肆意损毁的目标。随着梵蒂冈城的部分毁灭和教皇的下落不明，这次事件不止震惊了意大利，而且震惊了全世界的基督徒。\n\n罗马过去十年的快速发展几乎被这次攻击完全抹消。过去一段时间内，这座城市看起来可以帮助整个国家在战后迅速恢复。现在这些希望和许多罗马居民一起，都变成了尘埃。

original: Bomba Iacta Est!
translation: 炸弹已掷出。

original: Rome won't be rebuilt in one day...
translation: 罗马不是一天重建的成的……

original: Atomic Bombing of Paris
translation: 巴黎核爆

original: Today, a nuclear device was detonated over the city of Paris, causing widespread destruction and countless casualties. France was in shock as its capital suffered what may be the most devastating attack it ever experienced, despite centuries of wars and revolutions. The Parisians had perhaps expected conquest, but not utter, brutal desolation.\n\nAny victory parades at Champs-Élysées past the remains of the Arc de Triomphe seem unlikely in the city's current state. Perhaps the coming decades will see the birth of a new Paris, but Paris in the public mind, the city built in the Belle Époque, is gone forever.
translation: 今天，一个核装置在巴黎被引爆，造成了大面积的破坏和难以计数的死伤。整个法国为首都的遭遇而感到震惊，这可能是巴黎经历过的最毁灭性的打击，尽管曾经的年代中，法国充满了战争和革命。巴黎人曾经认为他们的城市可能被征服，但不是这样以这样彻底的残酷凄凉的方式。\n\n根据巴黎城区目前的状况，在香榭丽舍大道和凯旋门遗迹进行胜利游行是不可能的。也许未来的几十年后我们能看到一个新巴黎的诞生，但是巴黎这个建于美好年代的城市，在民众的眼中已经永远消逝。

original: The city of light has burned out.
translation: 光之城已被点燃。

original: Only yesterday, it seemed like we'd always have Paris.
translation: 就在昨日，我们还以为我们将永远拥有巴黎。

original: Atomic Bombing of Moscow
translation: 莫斯科核爆

original: A city many have tried and failed to conquer, Moscow was the target of a nuclear attack today. The explosion was directed at the heart of [From.From.Owner.GetAdjective] leadership, the Kremlin having been nearly completely destroyed by the blast.\n\n[From.From.Owner.GetLeader], having grown more aware and fearful of all possible and impossible threats recently, evacuated in time and survived. However, even the vastness of [From.From.Owner.GetName] may not be enough to escape such a ruthless enemy. Indeed, if this continues, the nation will soon consist only of two kinds of wastelands: Those which were there in the first place, and those created by its enemies.
translation: 一个许多人妄图要征服却无功而返的城市——莫斯科，如今沦为了核武的牺牲品。这次爆炸瞄准了[From.From.Owner.GetAdjective]领导集体的心脏，克里姆林宫几乎在这次爆炸中被完全摧毁。\n\n最近，[From.From.Owner.GetLeader]开始变得对一切可能或不可能的威胁越来越警觉，也越来越恐惧，这使得他及时撤离并存活了下来。然而，即使是广袤如[From.From.Owner.GetName]，恐怕也没有地方能够让人躲避如此残忍的敌人。确实，如果这种攻击持续下去，这个国家将很快只剩下两种荒地：一开始就是荒地的地方和被敌人变成荒地的地方。

original: Won't a nuclear winter only make Moscow a more difficult target?
translation: 或许一次核冬天仅仅只是让莫斯科变成了一个更难攻下的目标？

original: They may burn every city we have, but they will never take them.
translation: 他们或许会烧毁我们所有的城市，但他们永远无法攻取这些城市。

original: Atomic Bombing of Copenhagen
translation: 哥本哈根核爆

original: Today, the city of Copenhagen was struck by a nuclear explosion. Having grown after escaping destruction in the Great War thanks to Denmark's neutrality, the capital has never experienced an attack close to this devastating since the Napoleonic Wars. The surrounding area of Öresund has also seen significant fallout and survivors have begun escaping to Fyn and the mainland in fear of further attacks.\n\nKing Christian X's whereabouts are currently unknown, and the nation's morale has been severely damaged by the attack. It remains to be seen if this is the beginning of the end for one of Europe's oldest nations.
translation: 今天，哥本哈根的市区遭到了一次核爆攻击。得益于丹麦的中立政策，这座城市得以自世界大战的破坏中脱离并获得了发展。自拿破仑战争之后，丹麦的首都还未曾经历过破坏力接近这个程度的攻击。厄勒海峡的周边地区出现了大片的辐射尘埃，因接下来的进攻而提心吊胆的幸存者们已经开始逃往菲英岛和大陆。\n\n国王克里斯蒂安十世的下落依旧不明，整个国家的士气都因这次进攻而备受摧残。至于这是不是这个欧洲最老的国家之一的终结的开端，我们还需要再静待事态的发展。

original: Something is irradiated in the state of Denmark.
translation: 丹麦国内的一些东西已经遭到了辐射。（？）Something is irradiated in the state of Denmark。

original: The city has burned before, but not perished.
translation: 这座城市曾被烧毁过一次，但并未因此而灭亡。

original: With plutonium we bring the Danes to their knees!
translation: 我们手中的钚让丹麦人下跪！

original: Atomic Bombing of Stockholm
translation: 斯德哥尔摩核爆

original: The beautiful city of Stockholm, proud Venice of the North, was struck by a nuclear bomb today. Despite their best efforts to stay neutral in the past, the Swedes have now paid the ultimate price for international conflict. The epicenter of the blast was in the middle of south central Stockholm, an area intended for future development and grand construction projects, now irreversibly destroyed.\n\nMuch of the city is beyond recognition, but the old structures at Slussen seem to have survived the blast better than expected. It has been decided that it should stand untouched forever as a monument to the city's resilience.
translation: 美丽的斯德哥尔摩市，令人自豪的北方威尼斯，今天遭到了一次核爆攻击。尽管他们过去曾尽最大努力保持中立，而今瑞典还是因为国际冲突而付出了最大的代价。爆炸的中心在斯德哥尔摩南区的中部，这一区域被规划作为未来的发展空间和大型的建设项目用地，而今这一切都被彻底地摧毁了。\n\n城市的大部都已面目全非，但是斯鲁森地区的一些古建筑在冲击中得以保留的程度看起来比预想中要好。人们已经决定要将其作为城市复兴的纪念碑，永远保留原样，屹立在城市之中。

original: With this, Swedish neutrality will be but a memory.
translation: 经历了这些之后，瑞典的中立立场将成为历史。

original: The Swedish tiger will not lose its stripes!
translation: 瑞典这头猛虎永远不会丢掉它的虎纹！

original: Demand Bessarabia
translation: 索取比萨拉比亚

original: Romania cannot expect to withstand the might of the Red Army, if we send them a demand for our rightfully claimed land in Bessarabia they may just hand it over without a fight.
translation: 罗马尼亚并不能承受红军的威力，如果我们向他们表明我们拥有比萨拉比亚正当的领土宣称权，他们只能将其和平移交。

original: Send the ultimatum!
translation: 发送最后通牒！

original: No, we'll pay the iron price!
translation: 不，我们将用拳头去讨论！

original: Demand Karjala
translation: 索取卡累利阿

original: Finland cannot expect to withstand the might of the Red Army, if we send them a demand for our rightfully claimed land in Karjala they may just hand it over without a fight.
translation: 芬兰并不能承受红军的威力，如果我们向他们表明我们拥有卡累利阿正当的领土宣称权，他们只能将其和平移交。

original: Send the ultimatum!
translation: 发送最后通牒！

original: No, we'll pay the iron price!
translation: 不，我们将用拳头去讨论！

original: Oppress Estonia
translation: 镇压爱沙尼亚

original: Estonia cannot expect to withstand the might of the Red Army, if we send them a demand for basing rights and control of their border security we can effectively annex them without fighting.
translation: 爱沙尼亚并不能承受红军的威力，如果我们表明对他们边境的基本主权和控制权需求，我们就能和平而有效的吞并他们。

original: Send the ultimatum!
translation: 发送最后通牒！

original: No, we'll pay the iron price!
translation: 不，我们将用拳头去讨论！

original: Oppress Latvia
translation: 镇压拉脱维亚

original: Latvia cannot expect to withstand the might of the Red Army, if we send them a demand for basing rights and control of their border security we can effectively annex them without fighting.
translation: 拉脱维亚并不能承受红军的威力，如果我们表明对他们边境的基本主权和控制权需求，我们就能和平而有效的吞并他们。

original: Send the ultimatum!
translation: 发送最后通牒！

original: No, we'll pay the iron price!
translation: 不，我们将用拳头去讨论！

original: Oppress Lithuania
translation: 镇压立陶宛

original: Lithuania cannot expect to withstand the might of the Red Army, if we send them a demand for basing rights and control of their border security we can effectively annex them without fighting.
translation: 立陶宛并不能承受红军的威力，如果我们表明对他们边境的基本主权和控制权需求，我们就能和平而有效的吞并他们。

original: Send the ultimatum!
translation: 发送最后通牒！

original: No, we'll pay the iron price!
translation: 不，我们将用拳头去讨论！

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] seeks to join [SOV.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]请求加入[SOV.GetNameDef]

original: Recent political turmoil in [From.GetName] has left their government with a strong vision for the future that aligns with our own. They have seen the good a powerful Soviet Union can do for the world and are willing to give everything for the Motherland.
translation: 近来的政治动荡已经离开了[From.GetName]政府，原因是他们拥有和我们一致的未来景愿。他们已经看到了一个强大的苏维埃联盟对世界的好处并且愿意为祖国付出一切。

original: Set it in motion.
translation: 发起共产主义运动

original: The time is not right for such a move.
translation: 时机未到

original: Lithuania part of Soviet Union
translation: 立陶宛成为了苏维埃联盟的一部分

original: Finland part of Soviet Union
translation: 芬兰成为了苏维埃联盟的一部分

original: Estonia part of Soviet Union
translation: 爱沙尼亚成为了苏维埃联盟的一部分

original: Latvia part of Soviet Union
translation: 拉脱维亚成为了苏维埃联盟的一部分

original: [From.GetName] wants our rule.
translation: [From.GetName]渴望我们的统治

original: Recent political turmoil in [From.GetName] has left their government with a strong vision for the future that aligns with our own plans. They seek our protection and offer their unconditional support. Officially they will continue as a nation of their own, but they will follow the Motherland in every move.
translation: 近来的政治动荡已经离开了[From.GetName]政府，因为拥有和我们计划中一致的未来景愿。他们寻求我们的帮助并且提供无条件的支持。他们名义上依旧拥有自己的国家，但是他们将跟随祖国的一举一动。

original: Another tool to aid our progress.
translation: 另一种帮助我们进步的工具

original: They will require too much protection.
translation: 他们会索取太多的保护

original: Lithuania puppet of Soviet Union
translation: 立陶宛成为了苏维埃联盟的傀儡国

original: Finland puppet of Soviet Union
translation: 芬兰成为了苏维埃联盟的傀儡国

original: Estonia puppet of Soviet Union
translation: 爱沙尼亚成为了苏维埃联盟的傀儡国

original: Latvia puppet of Soviet Union
translation: 拉脱维亚成为了苏维埃联盟的傀儡国

original: Talented new officers.
translation: 有才华的新同志

original: Our new officers are proving up to the task and are adapting to their new roles in the military high command. With a loyal officer corps in charge of our military [Root.GetLeader]'s purge seems to have some of the effect we hoped for. The Red Army is regaining its power and will soon be stronger than ever.
translation: 我们的新同志证明了他能够胜任现在的工作和适应他在最高统帅部的新角色。一群忠实的军官同志正在领导我们的军队，[Root.GetLeader]的大清洗似乎起到了期望中的作用。红军正在恢复它的力量，不久的将来，它还会变得更加强大。

original: Excellent.
translation: 太好了。

original: Lowers penalty from §YOfficers Purged§!
translation: 降低§Y军官大清洗§!带来的惩罚

original: Great Patriotic War
translation: 伟大的卫国战争

original: Although we still have a lot of work left in rebuilding our military high command, the advancement of the [From.GetAdjective] army on our borders has sparked ingenuity and a patriotic will to fight within out new officer corps. We grow stronger with each blow we take as we prepare to rise up and strike back with all the might of the [Prev.GetName]. Every soldier is willing to throw down their lives and stand firm against our enemies. We expect this to greatly benefit the training and commitment of our new officers even after this war is won!
translation: 虽然我军高层指挥仍是百废待兴，但随着[From.GetAdjective]军队我国境内推进，创造力和卫国作战激情都在我军新军官层内被点燃。我军越挫越勇，并准备以[Prev.GetName]的全力奋起回击。每位战士都愿意光荣牺牲，宁死不屈。即使在这场战争胜利结束后，我军新军官们的水准与担当仍能从中受益良多。

original: For the glory of the [Root.GetName]
translation: 为了[Root.GetName]的荣耀！

original: Adds §YGreat Patriotic War§! which counters some of the penalty from §YOfficers Purged§!
translation: 添加§Y卫国战争§!效果以抵消某些§Y军官被肃清§!的惩罚。

original: The Permanent Revolution
translation: 不断革命

original: Although countless people have been executed and imprisoned as traitors and counterrevolutionaries over the past years, leading positions have been largely safe. They have not been exempt from suspicion, however. With the creation of the Fourth International, Stalin appears posessed by the thought that those closest to him were never truly on his side. Those who try to gain his trust have further fueled this idea to cast themselves in a better light.\n\nThe current situation is one of exceptional irony: the distrust within the current administration has rendered it unsustainable, and a coup is now imminent. Some party members are arguing that reinviting Trotsky and turning the purges on the Stalinists could minimize the damage of the civil war that will ensue. Can this plan, which has been the General Secretary's greatest fear for years, truly be executed?
translation: 尽管过去已有无数人因叛国与反革命罪名遭到处决或监禁，领导层大体上未遭波及。但这并不意味着他们就已被排除嫌疑。随着第四国际的建立，“亲密战友从未真正与自己在一条船上”的想法似乎占据了斯大林的头脑。而那些妄图赢得他信任的家伙的溜须拍马反而加剧了他的想法。\n\n现状极具讽刺意味：政府中弥漫的怀疑使它难以为继，政变近在眼前。部分党员谈论着邀托洛斯基出山再反过来清洗斯大林派以将未来的内战损失最小化。作为长久困扰着总书记的心腹大患的这个计划，又能否真正被实施呢？

original: Unthinkable!
translation: 无法想象！

original: §YA massive civil war will break out soon§!
translation: §Y一场大型内战即将爆发！§!

original: Communism in one country has failed. We need Trotsky.
translation: “一国社会主义”路线已经失败。我们需要托洛斯基。

original: §YA minor civil war will break out when Trotsky returns§!
translation: §Y在托洛斯基回归时，一场小型内战将会爆发。§!

original: The Second Russian Civil War
translation: 第二次俄国内战

original:
With Stalin's increasing paranoia, the Party and military have become divided. Those who have managed to earn his trust - at least temporarily - want to keep him in power and retain the cult of personality he has built up, but many others have been informally cut out of the loop. Some of them believe that Stalin's rule has failed, others suspect they are simply waiting for the day when the NKVD will find or make an excuse to have them arrested.

Together, they have formed a faction powerful enough to challenge the current administration. Their stated goal is to overthrow Stalin's tyranny and transition from a totalitarian state, with a board of military officers overseeing the process.

Stalin's supporters in the military and the Party have rallied to retain the current regime, calling their opponents counterrevolutionary traitors. A new civil war is at hand.
translation:
随着斯大林越来越疑神疑鬼，党和军队已渐渐分裂。那些赢得了他信任的人——至少是暂时赢得——想让他继续主政并保留对他的个人崇拜，但许多人私底已怀二心。有的人认定斯大林的统治已经失败，其他人疑心他们不过是等待着内务部搜罗或编造一个理由上门逮捕他们。

这批人聚成了一股足以动摇现政权的势力，宣称目标是推翻斯大林暴政并在军方监督下从极权政体转型。

军中和党内的斯大林拥护者们已集中起来保卫现政权，并给对方冠上“反革命叛徒”的名号。新的内战已迫在眉睫。

original: Death to the traitors!
translation: 去死吧，叛徒！

original: Russian Liberation Army Founded
translation: 俄罗斯解放军成立

original: The foundation of the Fourth International has reawakened Stalin's fear of traitors in the Party and military command. Having seen the trials and executions in the Great Purge, many suspect another one is incoming. In response, a number of generals led by Andrey Vlasov have formed the Committee for the Liberation of the People of Russia, with the goal of overthrowing Stalin's regime before it can do any more damage.\n\nAlthough the stated long-term goal is a transition to democracy, the exact form is unclear as of yet. All that is clear is that they intend to remove Stalin from power and end the rule of the Bolsheviks.
translation: 基于第四国际重新唤醒了斯大林对于党和军队中的存在的叛徒的恐惧。曾见过大清洗中的审讯和处决，许多人怀疑另一次大清洗正在来临。作为回应，一些以安德烈·弗拉索夫为首的将领成立了解放俄罗斯人委员会，用以在斯大林政权造成更多的伤害之前推翻它。\n\n虽然说长期目标是向民主过渡，但是并不清楚具体将采取什么样的形式。 全部清楚的是，他们打算用蛮力去除斯大林并结束布尔什维克的统治。

original: They must be stopped!
translation: 他们必须被阻止！

original: NKVD Launch Coup
translation: 内务人民委员部发动政变

original: The foundation of the Fourth International has reawakened Stalin's fear of traitors in the Party and military command. Having seen the trials and executions in the Great Purge, many suspect another one is incoming. The NKVD, which has been a crucial tool in the purges, has also been acutely aware of the fact that the agency itself a potential target. Rather than waiting to be imprisoned, executed and replaced, its leaders have decided to strike first and launch a coup with support from the similarly concerned military officials.\n\nHowever, despite its influential position, the NKVD has found it difficult to gain the trust of military leaders. The coup has only succeeded in gaining control of a limited area of the Union, but with the remnants of the old agency now facing certain execution, they are unlikely to surrender.
translation: 基于第四国际重新唤醒了斯大林对于党和军队中的存在的叛徒的恐惧。曾见过大清洗中的审讯和处决，许多人怀疑另一次大清洗正在来临。内务人民委员部，这个用来进行整肃运动的重要工具，也已经敏锐的认识到一个事实，那就是这个机构本身也是整肃的潜在目标。与其等待被监禁，处决和替换，他们的领导人已经决定先下手为强，并在同样担心此事的军方将领的支持下发动了政变。\n\n然而，尽管他们处于权力中心，内务人民委员部发现他们很难取得军事领导人的信任。这次政变只获得了苏维埃联盟部分地区的控制权，但是现在前内务人民委员部的剩余人员现在正面临处决，所以他们不大可能选择投降。

original: They must be captured!
translation: 他们必须被逮捕！

original: The Survivors' Coup
translation: 幸存者政变

original: The foundation of the Fourth International has reawakened Stalin's fear of traitors in the Party and military command. Having seen the trials and executions in the Great Purge, many suspect another one is incoming. With so many gone, there are only a few under suspicion who managed to avoid execution. Having been brutally interrogated and in some cases imprisoned, they know very well that they will be the first victims of another purge. In an act of desperation, these generals have decided to attempt to overthrow Stalin's regime before this happens.\n\nAlthough unlikely to succeed in the attempt, some survivors of the Great Purge have managed to seize control in some areas of the Union. The reign of the General Secretary has at the very least been destabilized.
translation: 第四国际的成立唤醒了斯大林对政党和军事司令部内叛徒的恐惧。在大清洗运动中见到如此多的审判和处决，很多人怀疑下一个大清洗即将到来。很多人死去了，只有很少的被怀疑者逃脱了处决。经历过残酷的审判和监禁，他们非常清楚，自己将会成为另一场大清洗的第一批受害者。陷入绝望之中，这些将军决定在一切发生之前，尝试推翻斯大林同志的统治。\n\n虽然尝试并未成功，但是一些大清洗运动的幸存者已经成功控制了苏联的部分地区。至少斯大林总共书记的统治已经被动摇了。

original: We must stabilize it as quickly as possible.
translation: 我们必须尽快稳定下来。

original: The Successful Purge
translation: 一场成功的清洗。

original: In the wake of the foundation of the Fourth International the hunt for Trotsky's supporters was intensified and several people close to Stalin were excecuted. Left with no one but himself, Stalin has retreated to his mansion. With every treacharous friend and family member finally dealt with he can now find some rest and focus fully on bringing glory to the Soviet Union.
translation: 随着第四国际的成立，对托洛茨基支持者的搜寻越来越严厉，斯大林身边的几名托洛茨基支持者已经被处死。现在只剩斯大林孤身一人，退回到他自己的宅邸。随着每一个危险的朋友和家人被解决掉了，他现在终于有时间稍事休息并把全部精力放在为苏联带来光荣了。

original: Time to hang up the axe
translation: 是时候对轴心国说不了

original: Under New Leadership
translation: 沐浴在新领袖的统治下

original:
With the waning power of the communist party, it has long been clear that the Stalinist system is unsustainable.
New forces have risen up to seize power, invoking Russian ideals to guide our country along a new path.

Symbolising this transition, [Root.GetLeader] has had Stalin deposed and placed in house arrest, far from the halls of power where he devised so many of his dangerous projects.
As a new Russian system grows to replace the decaying corpse of the Party, the secrecy, paranoia and political plotting of the old General Secretary is at an end.
translation:
随着政党力量的削弱，斯大林体系是不可持续的这一点已经暴露无遗。
新的势力已经起义夺取了政权，并调用俄国的理念来指引我国走上新的道路。

 [Root.GetLeader]已经废黜了斯大林并将其软禁起来，使其远离权利的中心，他再也无法进行危险的活动了。
随着一个新的俄罗斯体系的成长起来并取代了原有腐烂的政党，那个隐蔽、妄想、政治阴谋的老总书记斯大林时代已经结束了。

original: It has become clear that the greatest threat to the Russian state is not conspirators against the Communist Party, but the Party itself. With the disillusionment of the communist dream in Russia, new forces have seized power in order to bring our country into the future.\n\nFollowing the deposition of Stalin by [Root.GetLeader], the old General Secretary was given an expedient trial. His paranoid witch hunts being described as the destruction of the nation's leadership at a time of desperate need, Stalin was sentenced to death for treason. The old system goes with him into an unmarked grave.
translation: 很显然，对俄国来说最大的威胁已经不是共产主义的反叛者而是政党本身。 随着共产主义理想在俄国的破灭，新的势力已经夺取了政权将带领我们的国家走向未来。\n\n随着[Root.GetLeader]对斯大林同志的革职，对他进行了一场权宜的审判。一段时间内，他不顾一切的、偏执的政治迫害已经被描述成国家领导层的破坏了，斯大林同志已经被判处死刑，斯大林体系也随他进入墓地。

original: A new dawn for Russian politics.
translation: 俄罗斯政治的新曙光

original: The Fascist Twilight
translation: 法西斯的黄昏

original: Our great role-model, Nazi Germany, has betrayed their deepest principles and has allied themselves to the great enemy: The Communists. As the knowledge spreads, unrest follows in its wake. The people were willing to follow us this far, through fear of a Communist revolution, but with Germany's defection our great revival is being questioned.
translation: 我们伟大的榜样，纳粹德国，已经背叛他们内心最深处的信仰——同他们最大的敌人共产主义者结盟了。 消息四散开来，动荡也随之产生。由于害怕共产主义的革命，人们追随了我们这么久，但德国的变节使 我们伟大的复兴受到了质疑。

original: Return to Democracy.
translation: 回归民主主义

original: Stay true to Fascism.
translation: 仍然忠于法西斯主义

original: The Red Twilight
translation: 共产主义的黄昏

original: The Soviet Union, the inspiration that convinced many of how overthrowing capitalism was possible, has betrayed the international revolution and aligned itself with Nazi Germany. Between socialism in one country and this alliance with fascists, people are beginning to doubt the sincerity of the communist ideals worldwide. Is American communism just another tool [Root.GetLeader] has used to consolidate power?
translation: 苏联，曾经，鼓舞了无数人坚信资本主义是可以被推翻的，如今，已经背叛了国际革命同他们的敌人纳粹德国结盟了。 一个社会主义国家同法西斯主义结盟，全世界的人们已经开始怀疑共产主义的真谛了。美国的共产主义只是[Root.GetLeader]用来巩固权利的工具吗？

original: Return to Democracy.
translation: 回归民主主义

original: Stay true to Communism.
translation: 仍然终于共产主义

original: [From.From.GetName] has declared war on [From.GetName]
translation: [From.From.GetName]已经向[From.GetName]宣战了

original: The world is already an unsafe place. Can we really allow war in our own region or should we ensure that the peace is kept? We can send [From.From.GetName] an ultimatum to make peace with [From.GetName] or leave them to fight it out.
translation: 世界早已不太平了。我们让战火烧至国土还是坚决维持和平？我们可以向 [From.From.GetName]发送最后通牒，以确保他同 [From.GetName]保持和平，或者让他们自己战个痛快。

original: Let [From.From.GetName] know we are prepared for war.
translation: 让[From.From.GetName]知道我们已经做好战争的准备了。

original: §RIf [From.From.GetName] backs down it will result in white peace.§!\n
translation: §RIf [From.From.GetName]做出了让步为我们带来了白色和平。§!\n

original: We will not intervene this time.
translation: 这次我们将不干涉。

original: [From.GetName] intervenes in war against [being_attacked.GetName]
translation: [From.GetName]插手了对抗[being_attacked.GetName]的战争。

original: [From.GetName] is displeased with our conflict war against [being_attacked.GetName]. They threaten us with a war of their own if we do not immediately sign a peace deal with [being_attacked.GetName]. \nShould we back down?
translation: [From.GetName]对我们和[being_attacked.GetName]的冲突感到很生气。如果我们不和[being_attacked.GetName]签署和平协议，他们将会向我们宣战。\n我们应该做出让步吗？

original: Let [From.GetName] know we are prepared for war.
translation: 让 [From.GetName]知道我么已经做好了战争的准备。

original: We will back down.
translation: 我们将做出让步。

original: [Root.GetNameWithFlag] peace with [being_attacked.GetNameWithFlag]
translation: [Root.GetNameWithFlag]与[being_attacked.GetNameWithFlag]达成和平协议。

original: [From.GetNameWithFlag] gains Puppet (focus) war goal against [Root.GetName]
translation: [From.GetNameWithFlag]获得傀儡(策略)[Root.GetName]的战争目标。

original: US Influence
translation: 美国的影响力

original: The [From.GetName]'s advocation for democracy is starting to affect our country. Radio broadcasts allow speeches from [From.GetLeader] to reach our people and we have found many [Root.GetAdjective]'s being attracted to the [From.GetAdjective] way of life. [Root.GetName] is no puppet, nor will we allow our politics to be dictated by The [From.GetName]. However, we cannot deny the influence that [From.GetAdjective] politics have on our country.
translation: [From.GetName]对民主主义的拥护已经开始影响我国了。无线电广播将[From.GetLeader]的演说传递给我们的人民，我们发现很多[Root.GetAdjective]的人民开始被 [From.GetAdjective]的生活方式吸引着。[Root.GetName]再也不是傀儡国了，我们也不允许我们的政治遭受[From.GetName]引导。然而，我们不可否认[From.GetAdjective]的政治活动已经在我国产生了影响。

original: In our hearts we will always be [Root.GetAdjective]
translation: 吾辈内心深处，我们即是[Root.GetAdjective]

original: [Root.GetNameWithFlag] gains: §YUS Influence§!
translation: [Root.GetNameWithFlag]获的：§YUS影响§!

original: The [From.GetName]'s advocation for communism is starting to affect our country. Radio broadcasts allow speeches from [From.GetLeader] to reach our people. We have even found propaganda leaflets encouraging [Root.GetAdjective] workers to organize and promoting the [From.GetAdjective] way of life. [Root.GetName] is no puppet, nor will we allow our politics to be dictated by The [From.GetName]. However, we cannot deny the influence that [From.GetAdjective] politics have on our country.
translation: [From.GetName]对共产主义的拥护已经开始在我国产生影响。无线电广播将[From.GetLeader]传递给我们的人民。我们甚至发现了政治宣传传单鼓励[Root.GetAdjective]工人组织起来宣扬[From.GetAdjective]的生活方式。[Root.GetName]再也不是傀儡国了，我们也不允许我们的政治遭受[From.GetName]引导.然而，我们不可否认[From.GetAdjective]的政治活动已经在我国产生了影响

original: The [From.GetName]'s advocation for fascism is starting to affect our country. Radio broadcasts allow speeches from [From.GetLeader] to reach our people and we have even found propaganda leaflets promoting the [From.GetAdjective] way of life being distributed in some parts of the country. [Root.GetName] is no puppet, nor will we allow our politics to be dictated by The [From.GetName]. However, we cannot deny the influence that [From.GetAdjective] politics have on our country.
translation: [From.GetName]对法西斯主义的拥护已经开始在我国产生影响了。无线电广播将 [From.GetLeader]的演说传递给我们的人民，我们在我国的部分区域甚至发现很多政治宣传传单宣扬[From.GetAdjective]的生活方式。[Root.GetName]再也不是傀儡国了，我们也不允许我们的政治遭受[From.GetName]引导。然而，我们不可否认[From.GetAdjective]的政治活动已经在我国产生了影响。

original: US Protection
translation: 美国的保护

original: The [From.GetName] are now enforcing the Monroe doctrine much stricter. Besides the political influence they already have on our country, [From.GetName] officials now declare that they are prepared to intervene in any conflict between American countries.
translation: [From.GetName]现在更加严格的执行门罗主义。除此之外，美国的政治早已影响到我国，[From.GetName]的官员宣称他们已经准备好干预任何关于北美国家的纷争。

original: The [From.GetName] is growing powerful
translation: [From.GetName]日渐强大

original: [From.GetNameWithFlag] can now intervene in American wars
translation: [From.GetNameWithFlag]现在足以干预美洲国家的战争。

original: The Berlin-Moscow Axis
translation: 柏林——莫斯科轴心

original: A full military alliance between the Germans and the Soviets has the potential to overthrow the world order and bring about a new era of totalitarianism. In order to counter this development we must forge the Democratic nations of the world into a Grand Alliance to combat the Nazi-Communist menace.
translation: 德国和苏联的完全军事同盟已经有潜力颠覆整个世界秩序了，足以给这个世界带来一个极权主义的新纪元。为了应对这种局面，我们必须将所有民主团结起来形成一个伟大的同盟，来打破纳粹德国的威胁。

original: Rally Democracy!
translation: 民主主义国家的团结!

original: No need to overreact.
translation: 无需反应过激。

original: The Grand Alliance
translation: 伟大的联盟

original: Britain invites us to join their faction in order to combat the Nazi-Communist menace. How should we reply?
translation: 英国邀请我们加入他们的阵营，共同对抗纳粹德国。我们该如何恢复？

original: Yes
translation: 接受

original: No
translation: 拒绝

original: France wants to join Allies
translation: 法兰西想要加入同盟国。

original: The world is growing increasingly unsafe. Britain and France remain bastions of democracy and liberty in Europe and France now propose that they join the Allies.\nHow should we reply?
translation: 世界变得越来越不安全了。英国和法国仍然是欧洲民主与自由的堡垒，现在法国建议我们加入同盟国。\n我们该如何回复？

original: Yes
translation: 同意

original: No
translation: 拒绝

original: London Conference
translation: 伦敦会议

original: The German government has started to agitate over the status of Slovenia, which they claim is the historic German province of Carniola, where they claim that Germans and Slovenes are being oppressed by the Yugoslav government. His Majesty's Government has invited the governments of France, Germany and Italy to a conference in London to seek a fair resolution this issue. There is no doubt that the small German minority wishes to join Germany, but the wishes of the Slovene population are less clear. Germany seems ready to let slip the dogs of war over this and the dark clouds of war gather once more upon the continent of Europe.
translation: 德国政府开始扰动斯洛文尼亚的地位，宣称它历史上是德国的省份Carniola，并且对外言论那里的德国人和斯洛文尼亚人遭受到了南斯拉夫政府的压迫。陛下的政府已经邀请法国、德国和意大利的政府来参加伦敦会议探求一个解决该问题的公平方案。毫无疑问那里的少数民族德国人将会乐意加入德国，但是斯洛文尼亚人的想法我们还不清楚。德国似乎打算避免这场浩劫般的战争，然而战争的乌云已经再一次在欧洲大陆集结。

original: A lasting peace must be sought
translation: 必须寻求持久的和平

original: History would not forgive us
translation: 历史不会原谅我们

original: France Deserts Us
translation: 法兰西遗弃了我们

original: The government of France has failed to see reason over our proposed modest border readjustment and resolved to break the peace and wage terrible war. We will let them exhaust themselves in another round of futile trench warfare and then they will beg for our help.
translation: 法国政府并不能明白我们为何要重新调整边界，他们已经决定打破和平发动战争了。我们将让他们在另一场堑壕战中精疲力尽，那是他们将不得不祈求我们的怜悯。

original: They will learn their place.
translation: 他们将会了解他们的地位

original: King George V Dies
translation: 乔治五世去世

original: His Majesty, George V, King of United Kingdom and the British Dominions and Emperor of India has passed away. His quiet calm and devotion to his subjects saw the Empire through both the Great War and the Great Depression. His son will assume the mantle as King Edward VIII, but there are already concerns that he will be too independent of thought. Stanley Baldwin and Neville Chamberlain are preparing to ensure that he will accept direction from the Prime Minister and the Cabinet.
translation: 我们的国王陛下，乔治五世，联合王国及印度的君主，已经离我们而去了。他沉着冷静，一生奉献于人民，带领我们走过了第一次世界大战和大萧条时期。他的儿子爱德华八世将继承王位，但是早有言论王子在思想方面太过于独立。鲍德温和张伯伦正在准备确保他将会接受首相和内阁的指导。

original: May He Rest in Peace
translation: 愿他安息

original: King Edward Abdicates
translation: 国王爱德华八世退位

original: Prime Minister Baldwin has made it quite clear that the dignity of the King-Emperor will be impinged if he were to marry not just a commoner, but also a divorcee and if that was not bad enough, an American. After much soul searching his majesty has chosen love over duty and has chosen to abdicate. His younger brother, Albert, will assume the mantle as King George VI. London bookmakers are already taking odds on whether this shy man will make it to his own coronation.
translation: 首相鲍德温已经明确表示，他和一个美国离婚平民结婚必然会侵犯国王的尊严。 陛下爱美人不爱江山，如今他决定退位了。他的年幼的弟弟，阿尔伯特，将会作为乔治六世继承王位。伦敦的博彩公司已经对这位腼腆的王子能否完成自己的加冕仪式开始下注了。

original: God Save King George VI
translation: 愿上帝保佑吾王乔治六世

original: Return of the King
translation: 国王归来

original: It is no secret that no love is lost between George VI and the [Root.GetRulingParty]. Voices in parliament are now calling for his resignation in favour of his exiled brother, Edward the VIII. This is a man less foreign to the idea of unity through strength, and a man with a vision for England. His are the qualities we seek in a leader of our nation!
translation: 这已经不是秘密了，乔治六世和[Root.GetRulingParty]之间的爱依然未褪去。议会现在已经出现要求他退位，支持他哥哥的声音。他是一个了解团结力量，拥有英格兰视野的男人。 他的品质正是我国领导所应该具备的！

original: For the sake of the Empire, Edward VIII must rule!
translation: 为了帝国的利益，爱德华八世必须统治！

original: We will not interfere with parliament.
translation: 我们将不会干涉议会。

original: Free India Government Established
translation: 自由的印度政府成立了

original: With the support of Japan, Indian nationalists have established a government-in-exile, the Azad Hind.\n\nThe nationalists are spreading propaganda in the Raj, and encouraging Sepoy desertion. While they are lacking support for now, their efforts could eventually become dangerous.
translation: 在日本的支持下，印度民族主义者已经建立了流亡政府，自由印度流亡政府。\n\n印度的民族主义者已经开始四处游说，并开始鼓说士兵们了。我们现在缺少支持，他们的努力对我们来说将是威胁。

original: A fool's errand!
translation: 一个傻瓜的差事！

original: Nationalist support will continue to grow unless countered by the promise of eventual independence.
translation: 除非允许独立，否则民族主义的支持将继续增长

original: Azad Hind Leads Indian Revolt
translation: 阿扎德领导印度人民反抗

original: The Azad hind, the Free India government-in-exile, has been spreading propaganda and canvassing for support among the people of the Raj. Despite the importance of the Empire working together being greater than ever, they have decided that this is the time to strike.
translation: 阿扎德，印度的流亡政府，已经开始四处宣传游说寻找人民的支持。尽管此时帝国比任何时候都需要团结一致，但是他们还是选择了现在进行反击。

original: No, the Empire must stand united!
translation: 不，帝国的统一至高无上！

original: The Indian Revolt
translation: 印度起义

original: The Azad Hind, the Free India government-in-exile, has declared that the time has come for all true patriots to take up arms against the British overlords. The fate of India hangs in the balance, and we must make a choice.
translation: 自由印度临时政府宣布所有爱国者拿起武器反抗英国压迫者的时刻到来了。印度的命运正在历史的分歧点上，我们必须做出决断。

original: We will stand with the Empire!
translation: 我们与帝国同在！

original: We will seize the opportunity!
translation: 我们会好好利用这个机会！

original: Eastward Expansion
translation: 向东扩张

original: Having been forced to cede Gdansk to the Germans, we are now locked in a vise between two empires threatening our sovereignty. As we're losing territory in the west, not being able to trust the Allies to protect us from German aggression, we could consider aligning with the German ambitions and reclaim portions of our old Commonwealth now absorbed into the Soviet Union. We will be easy prey if we remain neutral, and have fought too hard to see another partition of Poland.
translation: 被迫割让西部波兰给德国，现在我国被两个强国包夹，局势危急。 由于东部领土的丢失，我们并不能相信盟友可以保护我们不受德国的侵略，现在我们可以考虑将我们与德国的野心看齐了，收回给予英联邦并转给苏联。如果继续保持独立我们将很容易成为猎物，成为下一个可怜的波兰。

original: It's time to turn the Axis from a threat to an ally.
translation: 是时候打破轴心国对盟友的威胁了

original: Working diplomatically with the Soviet is preferable.
translation: 外交上与苏联合作是可取的。

original: Soviet Union Demands the East
translation: 苏联需要东部

original: Having reasserted their claims on our eastern territories, the Soviet Union has now put pressure on us to cede this land to them, suggesting that this is the only way to avoid another invasion and possible annexation or partition.\n\nOrdinarily, giving in to such threats easily would be out of the question, but the Soviet Union is far from our only concern. If we agree to their demands, we may have less to worry about on the eastern front, although it would also position the eastern front significantly further to the west.
translation: 苏联宣称他们对我们的东部领土拥有主权，强迫我们割让，这大概是唯一避免再次被入侵的途径了。\n\n正常情况下，屈服不是我们的作风，但是我们需要注意的可不仅仅是苏联。如果我们同意他们的需求，我们可以不用担心东部前线了。

original: Give up the east peacefully.
translation: 和平的放弃东部

original: Poland will not surrender without a fight!
translation: 波兰绝不会不战而降！

original: Poland Cedes the East
