translation: 波兰给让东部

original: After we put pressure Poland to give in to our rightful claims on its eastern territories, they have agreed to cede what we demanded without further conflict. However, we can probably abandon any hopes of forming a stronger bond with the nation in the future. Having given us our due, they seem to hope we'll have as little contact as possible.
translation: 为了避免以后的战争，波兰被迫同意割让东部给我们。尽管如此，以后我们不可能和波兰站在同一战线上了。 他们给了我们所想要的领土，现在他们不希望和我们再有所接触了。

original: As long as they recognize our claim, there is no problem.
translation: 只要他们认识到我们的索取，这就没问题了。

original: Poland Refuses to Cede the East
translation: 波兰拒绝给让东部

original: Despite our effort to resolve the dispute with Poland peacefully, they have refused to cede their eastern territories and forced us into a position where the only option for claiming them is through war. Clearly, this troublesome country won't avoid a partition even when they are given the chance.
translation: 尽管我们有意和波兰和平解决领土纷争，但他们拒绝了我们，我们现在只能选择战争途径了。很明显，波兰被瓜分已经不可避免了。

original: Do they think they can stand against us?
translation: 他们能抵抗我们？

original: Soviet Union Offers Protection
translation: 苏联提供保护

original: After the Soviet Union claimed their right to eastern Poland, we assumed another attack as impending. However, a recent offer from the Soviets indicate otherwise. Apparently, provided we cede the claimed territory, they are willing to let us join them in an alliance. Furthermore, they promise that in the event of a war with Germany, we will be compensated for the loss by being granted new land in the west.\n\nWhile this may be a better offer than we expected, we can't know if this supposed future war will ever be pursued. Perhaps the Soviet Union is only looking for an easy land grab and forcing us into their sphere of influence. Nevertheless, it may be the best protection we can count on.
translation: 苏联已经宣布他们对波兰东部的主权，另一场战争将不可避免。尽管如此，最近的消息却预示着完全相反。很明显，如果我们给予他们东部领土，他们将很乐意与我们结盟，并愿意一起面对未来的对德战争，我们还将在西部获得领土补偿。\n\n虽然这可能比我们预期的要好，我们无法预料战争是否会到来。也许只是想轻而易举的获得领土，然后把我们纳入它的影响力之中。尽管如此，这是我们能指望的上的最好的保护了。

original: We must accept now, before it's too late.
translation: 在这一切太迟了之前，我们必须接受。

original: Poland Is Not Yet Lost!
translation: 波兰还没倒下！

original: Poland Accepts Protection
translation: 波兰接受保护

original: Offering to take Poland under our wing and guide them to future conquest in the west in exchange for territory in the east turned out to be a successful approach. Being promised a share of Germany in case of a successful war and our protection, they agreed to cede their eastern territories peacefully.
translation: 将波兰收入羽下，并指引他们去西方寻找土地的方法奏效了。 波兰割让东部领土，我们许诺保护他们免受德国的侵略。

original: An ally against Germany is much preferable to another partition.
translation: 用土地换取对德的帮手更划算。

original: Poland Refuses Protection
translation: 波兰拒绝被保护

original: Despite making the most generous offer we possibly could, attempting an agreement where Poland would cede its eastern territory for a promise of a future share of Germany, [From.GetLeader] has rejected our diplomatic efforts. Poland has chosen the hard path, for us, but even more so for themselves.
translation: 尽管我们提出的条件优厚，但波兰已经拒绝了我们。[From.GetLeader]拒绝了。波兰选择了一条艰难之路，对我们是这样的，对他们自己更是如此。

original: What cannot be bought must be seized.
translation: 强取胜于购买

original: Poland Granted Eastern Germany
translation: 波兰获得东德

original: As previously agreed upon, after the annexation of eastern Germany territories by the Soviet Union, some of these will be come under Polish control as recompense for the past transfer of eastern Poland to the Soviet Union.
translation: 正如先前所商定的，苏联取得东德后，将部分东德领土给予波兰以补偿它割让给苏联的东部领土。

original: A shift to the west was the best we could hope for, under the circumstances.
translation: 在这种情况下，转向西方是我们最期望的情况。

original: The situation seems resolved to our mutual satisfaction.
translation: 这个局面的解决似乎让我们双方都很满意。

original: [From.GetName] Joins the [Root.GetFactionName]!
translation: [From.GetName]加入[Root.GetFactionName]!

original: Acknowledging the need for unity against the threats surrounding our countries on every side, [From.GetLeader] today announced to the world that [From.GetName] has entered a treaty with [Root.GetName] for the sake of our mutual safety.
translation: 出于认可团结的必要性以应对我们周边全方位的威胁，[From.GetLeader]今天向全世界宣布[From.GetName]已加入条约[Root.GetName]以保证我们共同的安全。

original: [Root.GetName] and [From.GetName] today stands as brothers.
translation: [Root.GetName]和 [From.GetName]今天已成为兄弟之邦。

original: [From.GetName] Refuses to Join [Root.GetFactionName]
translation: [From.GetName]拒绝加入 [Root.GetFactionName]

original: In a foolish act of imagined self-preservation, [From.GetLeader] today announced that [From.GetName] will refrain from any diplomatic action that may be seen as threatening to their powerful neighbors. It has therefore declined our request that they join the [Root.GetFactionName].
translation: 在一个你可以想象得到的愚蠢的自保意识下，[From.GetLeader]今天宣布[From.GetName]将对可能被视为威胁的他们强大的邻居不采取任何外交行动。 因此，他拒绝了我们请求他们加入[Root.GetFactionName]的要求。

original: The only safety is standing together.
translation: 团结一致才是唯一安全的方法。

original: Wojtek Never Drops A Crate
translation: 我们可爱的战熊沃伊泰克从不会落下任何一筐东西。

original: Private Wojtek has proven himself a uniquely valuable member of our supply lines. Even during the heat of combat, small arms fire brushing the hair on his head, arms and legs, he did not drop a single crate of munitions. This brave soldier ensured our artillery could keep firing, and was thereby instrumental in defeating the enemy. As a result of this it has been decided that Wojtek should be promoted.
translation: 二等兵沃伊泰克已被充分证明自己是我们后勤部队里独一无二的宝贵的的成员。即使在战斗激烈进行的时候，密集的子弹不断在它的头，胳膊和腿周围飞过，它都没有放弃任何一个弹药箱。 这位勇敢的士兵保证我们的炮兵能够持续开火，从而帮助我们打败敌人。这导致了它声名远扬。

original: May we all take inspiration from his bravery
translation: 我们都可以从他的勇敢中得到启示。

original: Wojtek becomes a §HCorps Commander§!
translation: 沃伊泰克成为了一位§HCorps Commander§!

original: Soviet Ultimatum
translation: 苏联的最后通牒

original: We are under pressure from the Soviet to give up territory. They are threatening with an all-out war in case we don't give in. Giving in may save the lives of many Greek soldiers, but will this be the last time they ask for land?
translation: 我们承受着苏联要求我们放弃领土的压力。 如果我们不屈服的话，他们威胁对我们发动一场全面战争。 屈服会挽救许多希腊士兵的生命， 但是这会是他们最后一次要求土地吗？

original: Avoiding war is best for Greece
translation: 避免战争对希腊来说是最佳选择。

original: Don't give them anything.
translation: 他们别想得到任何东西。

original: Second Ljubljana Award
translation: 第二次卢布尔雅那仲裁

original: Germany is seeking to bully Greece into handing over territory for 'bases'
translation: 德国试图恐吓希腊移交出领土作为 '基地'

original: The Germans are seeking land for their Italian friends at our expense.
translation: 德国人试图拿我们的牺牲的土地分给他们的意大利朋友。

original: The Germans are demanding that we hand over lands to their Bulgarian lackeys.
translation: 德国人要求我们割让土地给保加利亚的走狗们。

original: The Germans are pushing the demands of both Italy and Bulgaria on our territory.
translation: 德国人正在推动意大利和保加利亚同时对我们提出领土要求。

original: We cannot resist them
translation: 我们无法抗拒他们

original: We will not yield
translation: 我们绝不屈服

original: Fate Of Greece
translation: 希腊的命运

original: Germany has demand that we accept 'coordination' for Germany. This would effectively turn us into a puppet of Germany.
translation: 德国要求我们接受 '协同' 德国。这将直接把我们变为德国的一个傀儡国。

original: Accept the Inevitable
translation: 接受不可避免的事实

original: Refuse
translation: 拒绝

original: War On Turkey
translation: 对土耳其宣战

original: Our Italian friends are planning to make their move on Turkey. This is the perfect opportunity for us to secure our position in the Aegean Sea. Let's take Izmir for ourselves and help the Italians chase the Turks far away from Europe.
translation: 我们的意大利朋友计划对土耳其有所动作。这是确保我们在爱琴海的地位的绝佳机会。让我们为了夺回伊兹密尔而战，并帮助意大利人把土耳其赶出欧洲大陆。

original: Izmir will be ours
translation: 伊兹密尔是我们的

original: The Death of Mustafa Kemal Atatürk
translation: 穆斯塔法·凯末尔·阿塔图尔克的逝世

original:
The republic grieves. 

 War hero, revolutionary, president and Father of the Turks, Mustafa Kemal Atatürk has passed away.

He maintained his duty to the Turkish people and the republic he founded up until the very end. Thousands of mourners have paid their respects in Istanbul, before his body was transferred by caisson, ship and train to Ankara. There his state funeral was held with the entire parliament and dignitaries from all over the world in attendance.

With the father of the modern Turkish nation now gone, the republic must move on. The Grand National Assembly has elected former prime minister Ismet Inönü as his successor.
translation:
共和国发布国丧。 

 战争英雄，革命者，土耳其人的父亲和总统，穆斯塔法·凯末尔·阿塔图尔克已经去世了。

 对土耳其人民和他所缔造的共和国，他尽到了义务直到生命的最后一刻。 在他的遗体由轮船和火车运送到安卡拉前，在伊斯坦布尔成千上万的哀悼者对他致以了敬意，来自全世界的各国政要们出席了他的国葬。

土耳其现代化之父现在离开了了，但共和国必须继续前进。 大国民议会选择前首相伊斯梅特·伊诺努作为他的后继者

original: Atatürk will be remembered
translation: 凯末尔将被永远铭记

original: [From.GetName] Is Influencing Our Politics
translation: [From.GetName]影响着我们的政治

original: For a long time the [From.GetAdjective] government has sought to align the path of our countries, and has expressed a great interest in [Root.GetAdjective] politics. Recently this intensified when [From.GetRulingParty] started pushing their [From.GetRulingIdeology] propaganda with a number of speeches and reading material distributed to the [Root.GetAdjective] people. \n\nNow even a number of politicians and other officials are being swayed by the [From.GetAdjective] propaganda, and have started advocating for [From.GetRulingIdeologyNoun] in [Root.GetName].
translation: 长期以来[From.GetAdjective]政府试图使我们国家和他们立场一致， 并对[Root.GetAdjective]政治事务表示了极大的兴趣。 最近这种情况愈演愈烈了，当[From.GetRulingParty]开始推动[From.GetRulingIdeology]宣传把大量[Root.GetAdjective]的演讲稿和宣传材料散发给人民。 \n\n现在，甚至一些政治家和政府官员也被[From.GetAdjective]的宣传所左右，并已经开始提倡[From.GetRulingIdeologyNoun]在[Root.GetName]里。

original: For a long time the [From.GetAdjective] government has sought to align the path of our countries, and has often tried to meddle in [Root.GetName]'s politics. Recently this has intensified, as [From.GetRulingParty] started pushing their [From.GetRulingIdeology] propaganda with no respect for [Root.GetAdjective] political traditions. A number of speeches and other [From.GetRulingIdeology] material is already being distributed to the [Root.GetAdjective] people. It seems that even a number of politicians and other officials are being swayed by the [From.GetAdjective] propaganda and have begun advocating for [From.GetRulingIdeologyNoun] in [Root.GetName].
translation: 长期以来[From.GetAdjective]政府试图使我们国家和他们立场一致，和经常试图干涉[Root.GetName]的政治。最近这种情况愈演愈烈了，当[From.GetRulingParty]开始推动[From.GetRulingIdeology]宣传时并不尊重[Root.GetAdjective]的政治传统。许多的演讲和其他[From.GetRulingIdeology]材料已被分发给[Root.GetAdjective]人民。 目前看来甚至是一些政治家和其他官员也在受到[From.GetAdjective]的宣传所左右，并且已经开始提倡[From.GetRulingIdeologyNoun]在[Root.GetName]里。

original: Interesting
translation: 有意思

original: How dare they!
translation: 他们怎么敢这样做!

original: [Root.GetName] has capitulated
translation: [Root.GetName]已经停止抵抗

original: \n[From.From.GetLeader] has announced that the cowardly [Root.GetAdjective] nation could no longer withstand the pressure from the overwhelming presence of [From.From.GetAdjective] forces throughout the country. The [Root.GetAdjective] government chose to flee the country and has gone into exile. Their main forces have capitulated, and [From.From.GetNameDef] is now in control of their home area.\nThough the war continues elsewhere, this is a great victory for [From.From.GetNameDef].
translation: \n[From.From.GetLeader]已经宣布胆怯的[Root.GetAdjective]政府再也不能承受[From.From.GetAdjective]压倒性的力量所带来的举国上下的压力。[Root.GetAdjective]政府选择逃离这个国家，并已开始流亡。他们的主要部队已经停止抵抗，而[From.From.GetNameDef]现在已经控制了他们的国土。\n尽管战争还在别处延续，但这对于[From.From.GetNameDef]来说是一个伟大的胜利。

original: \n[From.From.GetLeader] has announced that the cowardly [Root.GetAdjective] nation could no longer withstand the pressure from the overwhelming presence of [From.From.GetAdjective] forces throughout the country. The [Root.GetAdjective] government chose to flee the country and has gone into exile. Their main forces have capitulated, and [From.From.GetNameDef] is now in control of their home area.\nThough the war against what remains of the [Root.GetFactionName] continues elsewhere this is a great victory for [From.From.GetNameDef].
translation: \n[From.From.GetLeader]已经宣布胆怯的[Root.GetAdjective]政府再也不能承受[From.From.GetAdjective]压倒性的力量所带来的举国上下的压力。[Root.GetAdjective]政府选择逃离这个国家，并已开始流亡。他们的主要部队已经停止抵抗，而[From.From.GetNameDef]现在已经控制了他们的国土。\n虽然对抗[Root.GetFactionName]的战争依然在别处继续，但这对于[From.From.GetNameDef]来说是一个伟大的胜利。

original: \n[From.From.GetLeader] has announced that the cowardly [Root.GetAdjective] nation could no longer withstand the pressure from the overwhelming presence of [From.From.GetAdjective] forces throughout the country. The [Root.GetAdjective] government chose to flee the country and has gone into exile. Their main forces have capitulated, and [From.From.GetNameDef] is now in control of their home area.\nThough the war against what remains of the [Root.GetFactionName] continues elsewhere this is a great victory for all of the [From.From.GetFactionName].
translation: \n[From.From.GetLeader]已经宣布胆怯的[Root.GetAdjective]政府再也不能承受[From.From.GetAdjective]压倒性的力量所带来的举国上下的压力。[Root.GetAdjective]政府选择逃离这个国家，并已开始流亡。他们的主要部队已经停止抵抗，而[From.From.GetNameDef]现在已经控制了他们的国土。\n虽然对抗[Root.GetFactionName]的战争依然在别处继续，但这对于全体[From.From.GetFactionName]来说都是一个伟大的胜利。

original: \n[Root.GetLeader] has announced that the [Root.GetAdjective] nation can no longer withstand the pressure from the occupying [From.From.GetAdjective] forces, committing travesties throughout the country. The [Root.GetAdjective] government has gone into exile. Their main forces have capitulated, and [From.From.GetNameDef] is now in control of their home area.\nDespite this devastating loss the war against [From.From.GetNameDef] is far from over.

[Root.GetAdjective]政府已经逃离了他们的国家，他们的主要部队已经停止抵抗。[From.From.GetNameDef]已经控制了他们的国土。

original: Great news!
translation: 令人满意的消息!

original: These are dark times
translation: 黑暗时代降临了

original: Uncertain times
translation: 变幻莫测的时代

original: Stanley Baldwin Resigns
translation: 斯坦利·鲍德温辞职

original: Two weeks after the coronation of King George VI, Mr. Baldwin has announced that he will resign the premiership in order to retire at the age of 70. Having led the National Government on-and-off since 1923, he has been the steady hand responsible for bringing the British Empire out of the Great Depression, and in recent years has reluctantly overseen the beginning of Imperial re-armament and the abdication of King Edward VIII. He steps down as a popular and successful prime minister, but has he done enough to counter the growing threat from Germany?
translation: 乔治六世国王加冕仪式的两周后，鲍德温先生宣布辞去总理之位以便在70岁退休。他自1923年开始一直领导国家政府，曾带领大英帝国摆脱大萧条的阴影，并在近年来不情愿地监督帝国进行重新武装和赦免爱德华八世。他作为一位受人欢迎且成功的总理下台，但他做足了应对德国日益增长的威胁的准备了吗？

original: Mr. Chamberlain shall seek to form a government.
translation: 张伯伦先生要设法成立一个政府了。

original: Édouard Daladier Resigns
translation: 爱德华·达拉第辞职

original: With the collapse of the Third Republic and the refusal of the German government to offer an Armistice, it must fall to fresh leadership to continue the fight from the colonies. Whilst few would doubt that Monsieur Daladier has been a fine prime minister, he simply could not contend with the extraordinary set of circumstances in which France has found herself. We can but pray there is light at the end of the tunnel.
translation: 随着第三共和国的崩溃和德国政府拒绝停战，法兰西需要全新的领导以便从殖民地继续战斗。尽管很少有人质疑达拉第先生是一位优秀的总理，但他确实不能帮法国应对这非常情况。我们只能祈祷隧道尽头会有一丝曙光。

original: Monsieur Reynaud shall seek to form a government.
translation: 雷诺先生要设法成立一个政府了。

original: A tale of two cities
translation: 两座城市的传说

original: Following the stunning victory of German forces, the time has come to destroy the last vestiges of bolshevist rule in Europe. Even now, the names of Stalin and Lenin disgrace two major cities in the new German Lebensraum, mocking the soldiers who gave their lives to take them. \n\nThe "Assosciation of Veterans of the Weltkrieg" have presented the government with a suggestion to rectify this horrible state of affairs.
translation: 德国军队取得了辉煌的胜利，现在是把布尔什维克分子的最后残迹从欧洲彻底抹除的时候了。日耳曼新的生存空间里的两座主要城市此时此刻还是以列宁和斯大林的名字命名着，嘲讽着为夺取他们而牺牲的烈士们。\n\n“世界大战老兵协会”向政府提出了纠正这一糟糕错误的提议。

original: Let us honor the heroes of the last war!
translation: 让我们来纪念上次大战中的英雄们！

original: What a preposterous suggestion!
translation: 多么荒谬的提议！

original: §RThe game will end for you.§!
translation: §R对你来说游戏已经结束了§!

original: This will upset the population
translation: 这会让人民伤心的。

original: [From.GetName] seeks to join the [Root.GetFactionName]
translation: [From.GetName] 寻求加入 [Root.GetFactionName]

original: In the face of increasing threats to liberty and democratic values, the [alliance_applicant.GetAdjective] look to us as the defenders of freedom. They now wish to be admitted into our alliance, both to enjoy our protection and to stand with us against the forces that would threaten democracy.
translation: 面对着对民主自由价值观日益严重的威胁，[alliance_applicant.GetAdjective] 将我们视为自由世界的守护者。他们现在正寻求加入我们的联盟，在我们的保护下和我们共同对抗各路威胁民主自由的势力。

original: Our plight to overturn the current world order has not escaped the notice of like-minded nations. The [alliance_applicant.GetAdjective] recognize that their best chance to carve out a prosperous future for themselves is to align with us in the coming conflict, and they have therefore offered to formally join us against our enemies.
translation: 推翻旧世界的秩序非常困难，但在志同道合的兄弟国家面前并非不可能。而 [alliance_applicant.GetAdjective] 则认识到在未来的冲突中和我们保持一致是开创自己国家繁荣昌盛的最好机会，因此他已经正式向我们提出外交照会，要求加入我们来对抗我们共同的敌人。

original: [alliance_applicant.GetName] has recognized that she must band together with fellow socialist republics to strengthen the place of Communism in the world. Accepting our leading role in the international plight of the worker, the [alliance_applicant.GetAdjective] now request to formally enter into an alliance with us.
translation: [alliance_applicant.GetName] 已经认识到她必须加强同其他社会主义国家的联系，巩固共产主义革命在全世界的影响。接受了我们在这国际工人阶层大困境中的领导地位后，[alliance_applicant.GetAdjective]现在要求如我们正式结盟。

original: As the current upheavals in international politics continue to reverberate through the world, the [alliance_applicant.GetAdjective] have deemed us to be their greatest chance of surviving these tumultuous times. They therefore request to be admitted into our alliance, so that we may weather the coming storm together.
translation: 鉴于目前世界政局动荡不断，[alliance_applicant.GetAdjective]则认为我们能成为他们在这混乱动荡之中的救命稻草。因此，他们寻求加入我们的联盟，携手迎接近在咫尺的风暴。

original: All who stand for liberty and democracy may stand with us.
translation: 所有坚信自由民主价值观的人都可以和我们站在一起。

original: The world belongs to all who are strong!
translation: 这世界属于强者们！

original: If we stand together, the revolution cannot but prevail.
translation: 如果我们携手，革命会战无不胜。

original: And weather it, we shall!
translation: 我们在风暴中同舟共济！

original: We are better off without them.
translation: 我们最好不要和他们一起。

original: We already have the allies we need.
translation: 我们已经拥有了我们想要的盟友。

original: [alliance_inviter.GetName] welcomes us to the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]
translation: [alliance_inviter.GetName] 欢迎我们加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]

original: [alliance_inviter.GetName] has decided to accept our request to join the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]. Henceforth we shall stand or fall together.
translation: [alliance_inviter.GetName]已经批准我们加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]。 从今往后，我们会并肩作战。

original: Together we shall defend democracy.
translation: 我们将一起捍卫民主。

original: None can stand against us!
translation: 没有人能反抗我们！

original: The workers' plight could not ask for finer champions!
translation: 就工人们目前的困境来说，没法寻求更好的领袖了！

original: We shall set our differences aside, for now.
translation: 我们现在应该摒弃前嫌。

original: [alliance_inviter.GetName] denies request to join the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]
translation: [alliance_inviter.GetName]拒绝我们加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]

original: [alliance_inviter.GetName] has decided to reject our request to join the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]. We will have to make do without their help.
translation: [alliance_inviter.GetName]决定否决我们加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]的申请。 我们将在没有他们的支援下作战。

original: They call themselves defenders of liberty?
translation: 他们还自称是自由世界的捍卫者来着？

original: Then we will crush them, too!
translation: 那我们就连他们一起碾碎！

original: Their revolution is corrupt!
translation: 他们的革命早已腐化！

original: Our differences were too great.
translation: 我们之间的分歧无法弥合。

original: [alliance_applicant.GetName] joins the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]
translation: [alliance_applicant.GetName]加入了[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]

original: \nEarlier today, [alliance_inviter.GetName] and [alliance_applicant.GetName] issued a joint statement that the latter has now been formally granted member status of the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]. Whether this partnership will be used for offensive or defensive purposes remains to be seen, but undoubtedly extensive joint military planning is already under way.
translation: \n今天早些时候，[alliance_inviter.GetName]与[alliance_applicant.GetName]发表了联合声明，声明表示后者现在正式以会员国身份加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]。这种伙伴关系适用于进攻还是防御目前还不得而知，但可以预见的是双方间广泛的军事合作及规划已经开始。

original: We are stronger together.
translation: 我们携手步入强大。

original: They seek strength in numbers.
translation: 他们似乎是想用数量取胜。

original: It will not avail them!
translation: 这对他们没好处！

original: The war escalates...
translation: 战争态势升级了呢……

original: Our alliance grows stronger.
translation: 我们的联盟日益强大。

original: [From.GetName] invites [Root.GetName] to the [From.GetFactionName]
translation: [From.GetName]邀请[Root.GetName]加入[From.GetFactionName]

original: With a suspicious eye on recent developments in world politics, [alliance_inviter.GetName] extends us their hand of friendship, offering us their protection and urging us to stand with them in defence of the principles of liberty and democracy. As a member of the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName], our people's freedom may well be safeguarded.
translation: 出于对目前局势的担忧，[alliance_inviter.GetName]向我们伸出了他们的友谊之手，在向我们提供保护的同时，他也敦促我们和他们一起为捍卫自由与民主而战。作为[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]的成员国之一，我们人民的自由或许能得到保障

original: Recognizing that sometimes even the strong need allies, the [alliance_inviter.GetAdjective] have invited us to join the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]. If we choose to accept, this may well provide ample opportunity for us to find our place in the sun.
translation: 意识到了对盟友的迫切需求，[alliance_inviter.GetAdjective]已经邀请我们加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]。若我们选择接受，或许我们也能谋求到属于自己的阳光下的地盘。

original: Our ideological allies in [alliance_inviter.GetName] have made note of our valuable contributions to the workers' cause, and this morning we received an invitation us to join the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]. Standing together with other socialist republics, we could spread the revolution with renewed strength.
translation: 我们在意识形态上的盟友[alliance_inviter.GetName]已经注意到我们对工人革命事业的宝贵贡献，并且在今天早晨对我们发出了加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]的邀请。和其他社会主义国家站在一起，我们能有更强大的力量传播我们的革命

original: It appears the [alliance_inviter.GetAdjective] consider us to be of strategic interest to them, and that they deem it more profitable that we work together than that we should let ourselves be divided by our ideological differences. This morning, the [alliance_inviter.GetAdjective] Ambassador delivered an invitation for us to become a member state of the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName].
translation: 看来[alliance_inviter.GetAdjective]认为我们有巨大的战略意义，我们的合作将能带来莫大的好处，也许，我们应该把意识形态的冲突先放在一旁。今天早晨[alliance_inviter.GetAdjective]大使向我们提出了加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]的邀请。

original: We will make our stand with them.
translation: 我们会和他们并肩而立。

original: We only need a few thousand dead...
translation: 我们只要死个千把人，就能……

original: We will fight alongside our comrades!
translation: 我们要和我们的同志一起战斗！

original: It is the profitable choice.
translation: 这是最吼的。

original: [alliance_applicant.GetName] accepts invitation to the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]
translation: [alliance_applicant.GetName]接受邀请加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]

original: [alliance_applicant.GetName] has decided to accept our offer to join the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]. Henceforth we shall stand or fall together.
translation: [alliance_applicant.GetName]觉得接受我们加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]。从今往后，我们将并肩作战

original: [alliance_applicant.GetName] rejects offer to join the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]
translation: [alliance_applicant.GetName]拒绝我们加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]

original: [alliance_applicant.GetName] has decided to reject our offer to join the [alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]. We will have to make do without their help.
translation: [alliance_applicant.GetName]已经拒绝我们加入[alliance_inviter.GetFactionName]。我们将不得不在没有他们支援的情况下战斗。

original: Our help is not wanted.
translation: 我们的帮助略显多余

original: Otto assumes the Hungarian Crown
translation: 奥托秉匈牙利王冠

original: In search of a suitable king, the Kingdom of Hungary extended an invitation to Otto von Habsburg to return to the lands that were until recently ruled by his family. Otto, who has lived in exile throughout Western Europe since the end of the Great War and the dissolution of his father's empire, chose to accept the offer. Today, amidst much fanfare and celebration, he was crowned King of Hungary in a solemn ceremony at the Royal Palace in Budapest.\n\nDuring his coronation speech King Otto thanked the Hungarian people for their loyalty and devotion, and vowed to see the Habsburg lands reunited once more, promising that this time Hungary would be the dominant constituent part.
translation: 为了让合适的人继位，匈牙利王国邀请了奥托·冯·哈布斯堡回到这最近都还由其家人统治的土地上。上次大战摧毁了他父亲的帝国，也让他在整个西欧颠沛流离，他也选择接受我们的提议。今天，在布达佩斯皇家宫殿举行的隆重仪式里即匈牙利国王位。\n\n在的加冕典礼上，奥托国王陛下感谢了匈牙利人民的忠诚和奉献，并且发誓会让属于哈布斯堡的土地再次团结为一体，而这次，匈牙利会成为整个国家的主导部分。

original: No longer a kingdom in name only.
translation: 不再只是王国之名

original: That is dangerous talk...
translation: 真是危险的交谈啊……

original: The race for Austria is on!
translation: 同奥地利的竞赛开始了

original: Will the Empire rise again?
translation: 帝国会再次崛起？

original: Austria votes to unite with Hungary
translation: 奥地利同意加入匈牙利的联邦

original: At the insistence of the Hungarians, Austria has carried out a referendum on the possible reunification of the two nations, under the Habsburg crown. The final count has almost been completed, but it is already clear that it is a landslide victory for the reunification camp. No irregularities in the voting process have been reported, and the Austrian government has found itself obligated to reform into a regional government of the Hungarian state.\n\nThough the move is greatly welcomed by the Hungarian public, the political repercussions of the referendum will likely be felt keenly throughout Europe.
translation: 在匈牙利人民的坚持下，奥地利已经在哈布斯堡皇冠之下开始了两国重新统一的公投。最后的统计工作也趋近完成，局势已经非常明显，支持统一阵营压倒性胜利。没有接到投票过程中有违规行为，奥地利政府也开始改革，成为新国家的州。\n\n虽然现在的情况令匈牙利人民备受鼓舞，但这次公投的政治影响一定会在全欧掀起轩然巨浪。

original: Our brotherly ties have not been forgotten.
translation: 兄弟情尚在

original: This will not go without repercussions...
translation: 这事不会就这么平息下去……

original: The Empire's power-vacuum may yet be filled...
translation: 帝国留下的权力真空也许还没填满……

original: At the insistence of the Hungarians, Austria has carried out a referendum on the possible reunification of the two nations, under the Habsburg crown. The final count has almost been completed, but it is already clear that it is a landslide victory for the reunification camp. There have been ample reports of inconsistencies, voter fraud, and election-rigging, but Austrian officials have dismissed these allegations and have already begun to reform the administration into a regional government of the Hungarian state.\n\nThough the move is greatly welcomed by the Hungarian public, the political repercussions of the referendum will likely be felt keenly throughout Europe.
translation: 在匈牙利人民的坚持下，奥地利已经在哈布斯堡皇冠之下开始了两国重新统一的公投。最后的统计工作也趋近完成，局势已经非常明显，支持统一阵营压倒性胜利。没有接到投票过程中有违规行为，奥地利政府也开始改革，成为新国家的州。\n\n虽然现在的情况令匈牙利人民备受鼓舞，但这次公投的政治影响一定会在全欧掀起轩然巨浪。

original: Brotherly ties and a few handy bribes...
translation: 兄弟情再加请吃饭，哼……

original: That was our plan!
translation: 那便是我们的计划！

original: The Empire's power-vacuum may yet be filled...
translation: 帝国留下的权力真空也许还没填满……

original: An affront to democracy!
translation: 对民主的羞辱！

original: Austria votes against reunification
translation: 奥地利投反对统一一票

original: At the insistence of the Hungarians, Austria has carried out a referendum on the possible reunification of the two nations, under the Habsburg crown. The final count has almost been completed, but a victory for the reunification camp is already out of reach. The Austrian government has therefore decided against joining an Austria-Hungarian union.\n\nIn the spirit of democracy and self-determination, Hungary has accepted the result and has decided not to push their proposals any further.
translation: 在匈牙利人民的坚持下，奥地利已经在哈布斯堡皇冠之下开始了两国重新统一的公投。最后的记票结果已经得出，统一阵营得票数不尽如人意。因此奥地利政府决定不加入奥匈联邦\n\n秉持民主自决精神，匈牙利接受了投票结果，决定不再推动这一建议的继续进行。

original: Most unfortunate.
translation: 太不幸了。

original: Our independence is secured!
translation: 我们的独立得到了保障！

original: Excellent... Our turn next.
translation: 好的……那么该下一个了。

original: The Empire's fall was permanent, then.
translation: 帝国光辉已灭，永远。

original: Austria votes against reunification
translation: 奥地利投反对统一一票

original: At the insistence of the Hungarians, Austria has carried out a referendum on the possible reunification of the two nations, under the Habsburg crown. The final count has almost been completed, but a victory for the reunification camp is already out of reach. The Austrian government has therefore decided against joining an Austria-Hungarian union.\n\nHungary, however, has accused the Austria government of rigging the elections against reunification. They have stated that they will not shy away from the use of force to protect the Austrian people's desire to be reunified with their Hungarian brethren. Both sides have now begun to mobilize, and war seems inevitable.
translation: 在匈牙利人民的坚持下，奥地利已经在哈布斯堡皇冠之下开始了两国重新统一的公投。最后的记票结果已经得出，统一阵营得票数不尽如人意。因此奥地利政府决定不加入奥匈联邦\n\n秉持民主自决精神，匈牙利接受了投票结果，决定不再推动这一建议的继续进行。

original: What are a few deaths for an Empire?
translation: 有多少人会为帝国而死？

original: We will defend Vienna to the last man!
translation: 我们将为守护维也纳战斗至最后一人！

original: This ruins all our plans...
translation: 这特么的，煮熟的鸭子飞了……

original: Let us hope the conflict does not spread.
translation: 让我们祈祷冲突不会蔓延吧。

original: Restoration of Austria-Hungary
translation: 恢复奥匈

original: With the reunification of Austria and Hungary completed, the Hungarian government has gathered international press in Budapest and announced the restoration of the Austro-Hungarian Empire.\n\nKing Otto has assumed his rightful title as Emperor of Austria, and has reiterated his vow that, though the Empire is yet but a shadow of its former self, he shall not rest until all Habsburg lands have been reunited. Their neighbours undoubtedly eye the proceedings in Budapest suspiciously.
translation: 奥匈再统一完成后，匈牙利政府在布达佩斯政府召集了记者宣布恢复奥匈帝国。\n\n国王奥托正式宣布即奥地利皇帝位，并重申了自己的誓言，即在哈布斯堡的全部土地再度团结一致前，他绝不停下脚步。当然他们的邻居都毫不意外的表示了对布达佩斯的怀疑。

original: Like a phoenix from the ashes.
translation: 浴火重生。

original: This greatly changes the situation...
translation: 情况大大不同了……

original: Will they be a friend or a foe?
translation: 他们到底会成朋友还是成敌人？

original: We had better fortify our borders...
translation: 我们更好的巩固了边境的防御……

original: Wilhelm assumes the Hungarian Crown
translation: 威廉秉匈牙利王冠

original: Seeking a King for their nation, the Hungarians, after long negotiations and preparations, officially invited the Swedish Prince Wilhelm, Duke of Sodermanland, earlier this week. Today, amidst much fanfare and celebration, he was crowned King of Hungary in a solemn ceremony at the Royal Palace in Budapest.\n\nIt is said the new King takes the well-being of his people to heart, and that he strongly supports their democratic rights. Furthermore, he advocates dialogue with Hungary's neighbours over hostility. The new King may thus well prove a welcome aid to reducing tensions in the region.
translation: 为了寻求国王，匈牙利人经过长时间的谈判和准备，于本周早些时候正式邀请了索德尔门兰大公，瑞典王子威廉。今天，他在布达佩斯皇宫举行的庄严的加冕典礼中戴上了匈牙利王冠。\n\n据说新国王一心在为人民谋福祉，他坚定的支持人民追寻自己的民主权利。此外，他主张和匈牙利的领国们对话，而非对抗。看来，新国王可以很好的证明他将极大地有利于地区紧张局势的缓和。

original: Another weakling rises.
translation: 又一个弱小诞生了。

original: Another to bear the torch.
translation: 又一盏熊熊燃烧的火炬

original: Friedrich Franz assumes the Hungarian Crown
translation: 弗里德里希·弗朗茨秉匈牙利王冠

original: Seeking a King for their nation, the Hungarians, after long negotiations and preparations, officially invited the German Friedrich Franz, Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin, earlier this week. Today, amidst much fanfare and celebration, he was crowned King of Hungary in a solemn ceremony at the Royal Palace in Budapest.\n\nA member of the SS since 1931, the new King's ideological leanings are well-known, and he has already declared that he 'will bring Hungary the greatness it deserves, no matter the cost'. Together with the King's promise to 'undo the injustices visited on us in the past', it is therefore unlikely this coronation will result in the easing of tensions in the region.
translation: 为了寻求国王，匈牙利人经过长时间的谈判和准备，本周早些时候，他们邀请了梅克伦堡——什未林大公，来自德国的弗里德里希·弗朗茨。今天，在众多的狂欢和庆祝中，他在布达佩斯皇宫庄严地仪式中加冕为匈牙利国王。\n\n新国王从1931年就加入了党卫军，他的意识形态倾向不言自明，而他也宣布要为匈牙利取回应得的东西，不计代价。再加上国王承诺”回敬过去遭到的不公正待遇“，看来这次加冕将不利于地区局势的缓和。

original: A deeply troubling development...
translation: 一个大麻烦正在酝酿……

original: A new potential ally!
translation: 一个潜在盟友！

original: Hungary Renounces Treaty of Trianon
translation: 匈牙利撕毁特里亚农条约

original: In a public declaration, [HUN.GetLeader] has renounced the treaty imposed by the Allied powers after the Great War. Signed by the Hungarians under protest, in 1920, it greatly reduced the country's size and limited the strength of its military.\n\nIn his speech, [HUN.GetLeader] already hinted that Hungary may soon look towards reaffirming their claims on the territories taken from them two decades ago.
translation: 在公开声明中[HUN.GetLeader] 放弃了大战后协约国强加给匈牙利的条约。1920年，政府在匈牙利人民的抗议声中签了字，这极大地浇灭了人们参军的热情，限制了国家军力的发展。\n\n[HUN.GetLeader]已经暗示，匈牙利很快会重新提出对二十年前的土地的声索。

original: The humiliation is ended, but not forgotten!
translation: 仇已雪，耻不忘！

original: They are meddling with the world order...
translation: 他们正在干扰正常的国际秩序……

original: They have escaped the yoke of Versailles.
translation: 他们逃离了凡尔赛的枷锁。

original: Hungary Proclaims Greater Hungary
translation: 匈牙利宣称大匈牙利

original: Having regained the lands that were taken from them in the Treaty of Trianon, [From.GetLeader] issued a proclamation yesterday evening that the nation shall henceforth be known as Greater Hungary. It is hoped that this will serve to increase Greater Hungary's prestige in the eyes of the world, as well as better describe the extent of its borders.
translation: 在夺回被特里亚农条约分割出的土地后，[From.GetLeader]宣布改国号为大匈牙利。这样可以更好的提高匈牙利在世界上的声望，也能更好的描述其疆域的辽阔。

original: The world will see our might.
translation: 全世界都会看到我们的力量。

original: They're a bit full of themselves.
translation: 他们有点自满啊。

original: Hungary Demands Transylvania
translation: 匈牙利宣称特兰瓦尼西亚

original: In an effort to further reverse the Treaty of Trianon, Hungary has issued an ultimatum to Romania demanding the return of Transylvania. No official response has yet been made, but Hungary has already hinted that force of arms will be considered if their demands are rejected.
translation: 为了进一步摧毁特里亚农条约，匈牙利向罗马尼亚发出最后通牒要求收回特兰瓦尼西亚，而罗马尼亚则是尚未作出答复，但匈牙利已经暗示，如果谈判桌上被拒绝，会考虑动用武装力量。

original: We will no longer be cowed!
translation: 我们不会再被骗了！

original: We must think fast...
translation: 我们必须多思考一步……

original: Let us hope they work it out peacefully.
translation: 让我们祈祷他们工作顺利。

original: Romania Returns Transylvania
translation: 罗马尼亚归还特兰瓦尼西亚

original: Romania has announced that it will accept the Hungarian demands for a return of Transylvania. Accordingly, the territory has now been reunited with the country, greatly increasing its size and strength. It is unlikely that a success of this magnitude will deter the Hungarians from issuing further demands for their remaining lost territories.
translation: 罗马尼亚宣布接受匈牙利收回特兰瓦尼西亚的要求。现在，特兰瓦尼西亚已经和祖国团聚，而国家的实力也得到增强。不过这种程度的胜利并不能停下匈牙利追回其他失去土地的脚步。

original: We are on the path to greatness!
translation: 我们正行进在康庄大道上！

original: We had no choice.
translation: 我们别无选择

original: At least peace was preserved.
translation: 至少我们保住了和平。

original: Romania Rejects Hungarian Demands
translation: 罗马尼亚拒绝匈牙利的要求。

original: The ultimatum's deadline has come and gone without a Romanian reply. Outraged Hungarian officials have already denounced Romania's government, claiming they are 'destabalizing the region' with their insistence to adhere to 'unlawful treaties'. Both nations seem to be preparing for a war that may well erupt at any day.
translation: 直到最后通牒到期，罗马尼亚政府都没有答复。愤怒的匈牙利官员谴责罗马尼亚政府坚持“非法条约”，“非法占有该地区”。两国间随时可能爆发战争。

original: If strength is all they will listen to...
translation: 看来他们喜欢被强的……

original: Let them come!
translation: 放马过来吧

original: Stone-headed fools...
translation: 榆木脑袋……

original: Hungary Demands Southern Slovakia
translation: 匈牙利宣称南斯洛伐克

original: Following up on their vows to redress the Treaty of Trianon, Hungary has demanded the return of Southern Slovakia from [From.GetName]. The [From.GetAdjective]s have not yet responded, but the threat of war in Hungarian rhetoric is but all too clear. Rejection may well lead to a new war in the region.
translation: 匈牙利誓言“纠正”特里亚农条约后，要求[From.GetName]归还南斯洛伐克。[From.GetAdjective]目前尚未作出回应，但匈牙利言辞中的战争威胁简直再清楚不过了。拒绝匈牙利的要求很可能导致该地区新的争端。

original: They should be lucky this is all we demand.
translation: 他们很幸运，那正是我们所需要的。

original: Let us hope we can find a compromise...
translation: 让我们祈祷他们能找到妥协的办法……

original: [From.GetName] Returns Southern Slovakia
translation: [From.GetName]交还南斯洛伐克

original: [From.GetName] has officially accepted the Hungarian demands for a return of Southern Slovakia, and has already taken hurried steps to ensure the territory will be returned to Hungary immediately. It is unlikely that this success will deter the Hungarians from issuing further demands for their remaining lost territories.
translation: [From.GetName]已经正式接受了匈牙利的要求，并采取紧急措施确保南斯洛伐克能立刻被匈牙利接管。不过这种程度的胜利并不能停下匈牙利追回其他失去土地的脚步。

original: We welcome them back into the fold.
translation: 欢迎回家

original: [From.From.GetName] Rejects Hungarian Demands
translation: [From.From.GetName]拒绝匈牙利的要求

original: Diplomatic negotiations have broken down, and today [From.From.GetName] publically rejected the Hungarian demands for the return of Southern Slovakia. Outraged Hungarian officials have already denounced [From.From.GetName]'s government, claiming they are 'destabalizing the region' with their insistence to adhere to 'unlawful treaties'. Both nations seem to be preparing for a war that may well erupt at any day.
translation: 外交谈判已经破裂，今天[From.From.GetName]公开宣布拒绝了匈牙利关于收回南斯洛伐克的提案。愤怒的匈牙利官员谴责[From.From.GetName]政府坚持“非法条约”，“非法占有该地区”。两国间随时可能爆发战争。

original: Hungary Demands the Vojvodina
translation: 匈牙利索要伏伊伏丁那

original: In light of their previous successes in obtaining the return of lost territory, the Hungarians have now demanded that Yugoslavia return the Vojvodina. As the Yugoslavs try to find a diplomatic solution, Hungarian impatience has already become more and more clear, and should the Yugoslavs reject the demands it is unlikely a peaceful solution will be found.
translation: 鉴于之前收复失地时取得的成功，匈牙利人现在要求南斯拉夫归还伏伊伏丁那。在南斯拉夫试图寻求外交上的解决方案时，匈牙利的不耐烦也日益明显。看起来，若南斯拉夫拒绝这一领土要求的话，此事将不能和平解决。

original: The march to Greater Hungary continues.
translation: 通往大匈牙利的进军顺利前行。

original: We must think fast...
translation: 我们必须快点想出对策……

original: Yugoslavia Returns the Vojvodina
translation: 南斯拉夫归还了伏伊伏丁那

original: Yugoslavia has decided to cave to Hungarian demands, and has arranged for the rapid transfer of the Vojvodina to its neighbour. Though it required ample use of gunboat diplomacy, it is undeniable that Hungary has grown into a new regional powerhouse.
translation: 南斯拉夫决定了向匈牙利的要求让步，并做好准备将伏伊伏丁那迅速转让给邻居。尽管这是充分利用了舰炮外交的结果，但不可否认的是，匈牙利已经成长为新的地区强国。

original: Another diplomatic victory!
translation: 又一次外交上的胜利！

original: Yugoslavia Rejects Hungarian Demands
translation: 南斯拉夫拒绝了匈牙利的要求

original: In a clear act of defiance the Yugoslavs have rejected Hungarian demands for the Vojvodina. Hungary, on its part, has made no efforts to step down its threats of using force to secure its 'lawful territory'. Both nations seem to be preparing for a war that may well erupt at any day.
translation: 作为一个显而易见的挑衅，南斯拉夫拒绝了匈牙利索取伏伊伏丁那的要求；而匈牙利方面则并未试图放慢其威胁使用武力确保法理领土的脚步。看起来这两个国家都在积极准备应对一场随时都很可能爆发的战争。

original: Hungary Claims Overlordship over Slovakia
translation: 匈牙利宣称了自己在斯洛伐克地区的领主权力

original: The Hungarians have raised claims that Slovakia should once more be a part of their nation, either as an integral part or as an autonomous region. An ultimatum to this effect has been issued, backed with the threat of force, and diplomats from several European nations are in a frenzy trying to find a peaceful solution to this latest crisis.
translation: 匈牙利人提出了要求，宣称斯洛伐克应当再一次成为他们国家的一部分，成为国家主体不可分割的一部分或是作为一个自治区。有关此事的最后通牒已被下达，并以武力威胁作为后盾，现在部分欧洲国家的外交官疯狂地寻求外交途径来解决这一来自匈牙利的最新危机。

original: The Hungarians have raised claims that Slovakia should once more be a part of their nation, either as an integral part or as an autonomous region. An ultimatum to this effect has been issued, backed with the threat of force, and the Slovak government is in a frenzy trying to find a diplomatic solution to this latest Hungarian crisis.
translation: 匈牙利人提出了要求，宣称斯洛伐克应当再一次成为他们国家的一部分，成为国家主体不可分割的一部分或是作为一个自治区。有关此事的最后通牒已被下达，并以武力威胁作为后盾，而斯洛伐克政府正疯狂地寻求外交途径来解决这一来自匈牙利的最新危机。

original: Let's hope force won't be needed.
translation: 希望不要动用武力

original: This is not a minor demand...
translation: 这个要求可不小……

original: Are we willing to part with our independence?
translation: 我们愿意放弃独立吗？

original: [From.GetName] Caves to Hungary
translation: [From.GetName]向匈牙利屈服

original: After ample deliberations, the [From.GetAdjective] Government under [From.GetLeader] has decided to give in to Hungarian demands. They have accepted Hungarian control over Slovakia, prefering to appease [HUN.GetLeader] to preserve the peace. Undoubtedly this will strengthen Hungarian resolve in future dealings with their weakened neighbours.
translation: 经过深思熟虑，[From.GetLeader]领导的[From.GetAdjective]政府决定屈从于匈牙利的要求。他们接受匈牙利对斯洛伐克的控制，以满足[HUN.GetLeader]来换取和平。毋庸置疑这将加强匈牙利未来对付他们衰弱的邻居时的决心。

original: After ample deliberations the Slovaks have decided to give in to Hungarian demands. Seeing no alternative, they have parted with their independence in a bid to preserve the lives of their people. Undoubtedly this will strengthen Hungarian resolve in future dealings with their weakened neighbours.
translation: 经过深思熟虑，斯洛伐克决定屈从于匈牙利的要求。没有其他选择，为了保护人民的生命，他们放弃了独立。毋庸置疑这将加强匈牙利未来对付他们衰弱的邻居时的决心。

original: The Slovaks are better off this way.
translation: 这样对斯洛伐克人而言更好。

original: It was a necessary sacrifice.
translation: 这是必要的牺牲。

original: [From.From.GetName] Rejects Hungarian Demands
translation: [From.From.GetName]拒绝了匈牙利的要求

original:
A diplomatic crisis has erupted between Germany and Hungary, concerning the fate of Slovakia. [HUN.GetLeader] had previously declared that Slovakia was a core interest of [HUN.GetNameDef], owing to its historical ties with Hungary. His government expected to be consulted on any measure concerning Slovakia. 

German leader [GER.GetLeader] has refused to accept any such demands, calling them "foolish and dangerous interference in the internal affairs of a sovereign nation."

With tensions running high, more and more observers are wondering if Hungary might resort to violence to deliver a fait accompli.
translation:
在德国和匈牙利之间爆发了一场关于斯洛伐克的命运的外交危机。[HUN.GetLeader]早些时候声明斯洛伐克是[HUN.GetNameDef]的核心利益所在，在历史上就是匈牙利的一部分。任何有关斯洛伐克的决定都应该征求匈牙利政府的意见。

德国领袖[GER.GetLeader]拒绝了匈牙利的要求，并称之为“愚蠢而且危险的干涉他国内政的行为。”

由于紧张局势升级，越来越多的观察员开始担心匈牙利会不会通过武力造成既成事实。

original: Clinging tenaciously to their independence, the Slovaks have rejected Hungarian demands, and are forifying their border. Hungary has made no effort to de-escalate the situation, and both nations seem set on a course to war.
translation: 固执地坚守着自己的独立性，斯洛伐克人拒绝了匈牙利的要求，并开始加强他们的边界武装。匈牙利并未致力于缓解局势，两国都已踏上通往战争之路。

original: We stand as one. Let them come!
translation: 我们团结一致。让他们来吧！

original: Renewal of the Rome Protocols
translation: 重申罗马议定书

original: At Hungarian instigation, Italy, Austria and Hungary have renewed the Rome Protocols originally signed in 1934. The agreements pertain to economic development and rapprochement. Essentially a declaration of friendship, there are signs that it may lead to an official alliance aimed at counteracting the growing revisionist and expansionist tendencies of Germany.
translation: 在匈牙利的煽动下，意大利、奥地利与匈牙利重申了原本于1934年签订的罗马议定书。协议相关的内容包括经济发展与友好的多边关系。原本只是一个友好宣言，但有迹象表明这或许会导向一个官方联盟，并致力于压制德国日益膨胀的修正主义与扩张主义。

original: At Hungarian instigation, Italy and Hungary have renewed the Rome Protocols originally signed in 1934. The agreements pertain to economic development and rapprochement. Essentially a declaration of friendship, there are signs that it may lead to an official alliance aimed at counteracting the growing revisionist and expansionist tendencies of Germany.
translation: 在匈牙利的煽动下，意大利与匈牙利重申了原本于1934年签订的罗马议定书。协议相关的内容包括经济发展与友好的双边关系。原本只是一个友好宣言，但有迹象表明这或许会导向一个官方联盟，并致力于压制德国日益膨胀的修正主义与扩张主义。

original: We welcome our new friends.
translation: 我们欢迎新的朋友。

original: This does not bode well...
translation: 这可不是个好兆头……

original: Perhaps good things may come of this.
translation: 希望这能带来点好事。

original: Pact of Rome Formed
translation: 罗马盟约已缔结

original: Today, the respective governments of Italy, Austria and Hungary issued a joint statement announcing the formation of the Pact of Rome. The three powers have vowed to aid each other militarily both defensively and offensively, should the need arise. The balance of power in the region has changed drastically, overnight.
translation: 今天，意大利、奥地利与匈牙利各自的政府发布了一份联合声明，宣布了罗马盟约的缔结。三方立誓宣称，只要有需要，相互间将在防御和进攻两方面进行军事援助。这一地区的力量均衡在一夜间发生了剧变。

original: Today, the respective governments of Italy and Hungary issued a joint statement announcing the formation of the Pact of Rome. The two powers have vowed to aid each other militarily both defensively and offensively, should the need arise. The balance of power in the region has changed drastically, overnight.
translation: 今天，意大利与匈牙利各自的政府发布了一份联合声明，宣布了罗马盟约的缔结。双方立誓宣称，只要有需要，相互间将在防御和进攻两方面进行军事援助。这一地区的力量均衡在一夜间发生了剧变。

original: We stand together.
translation: 我们将共同奋战。

original: This is reason for concern...
translation: 这值得关切……

original: Germany is no longer unopposed.
translation: 德国不再没有对手了。

original: Horthy Assassinated
translation: 霍尔蒂被暗杀

original: Reports have emerged from Hungary that Miklos Horthy was shot by a lone gunman today after leaving the Parliament building in Budapest. Thought he was immediately rushed to the hospital, doctors announced that he was already deceased by the time he arrived. The gunman, shot by police as he tried to escape the scene, has been identified as a communist party member.\n\nThe assassination has caused an uproar in domestic Hungarian politics, as Horthy's anti-communist leanings were paramount in keeping revolutionary elements at bay. Without the old admiral at the helm of the political scene, it is likely that communist influences will increase dramatically.
translation: 自匈牙利传来的报告显示，霍尔蒂·米克洛什今日离开布达佩斯的国会大厦后被一名独行抢手射杀。尽管他被立即送往了医院，但医生宣布他在抵达医院时就已离世。枪手在试图逃离现场时被警方击毙，并被辨认出是一名共产党员。\n\n鉴于霍尔蒂的反共立场是导致革命党陷入绝境的主要原因，这次刺杀引发了匈牙利国内政局的骚动。缺少了这位老海军上将执掌政局，共产主义的浪潮很可能会急速膨胀。

original: A man's life is but a small price to pay.
translation: 人死轻于鸿毛。

original: The Revolution cannot be stopped!
translation: 革命不可阻挡！

original: Can the communists stoop any lower?
translation: 共产党行事就不能低调点吗？

original: Austria Denies Referendum
translation: 奥地利拒绝全民公投

original: Austria has outright rejected the Hungarian calls for a referendum, despite Hungary's increasing belligerence. The latter has accused the Austrian government of flagrantly disregarding the democratic rights of their people. They have stated that they will not shy away from the use of force to protect the Austrian people's desire to be reunified with their Hungarian brethren. Both sides have now begun to mobilize, and war seems inevitable.
translation: 奥地利公开拒绝了匈牙利有关进行全民公投的号召，无视了匈牙利日益增长的敌意。而后者则控告奥地利政府罪大恶极地漠视了其人民的民主权利。他们宣称不会回避使用武力来保护奥地利人民与匈牙利同胞重归一统的意愿。双方都已开始进行动员，战争看起来已不可避免。

original: The Polish-Romanian Alliance
translation: 波兰-罗马尼亚同盟

original: The Poles and Romanians have anounced a renewed commitment to each other's defense. Although good relations have existed between the two nations for well over a decade now, today's announcement indicates that a policy of mutual defense is increasingly dominating military planning both in Poland and in Romania.
translation: 波兰人与罗马尼亚人已经重新宣布了双方在有关防御方面的承诺。虽然两国间保持友好关系已经远远超过了十年，不过今天的宣告表明了有关共同防御的政策正逐渐成为波兰与罗马尼亚两国军事计划的主体。

original: We need each other.
translation: 我们需要彼此。

original: They think it will save them?
translation: 他们认为这能够救自己？

original: Let's hope it pays off.
translation: 希望这能有回报。

original: The Cordon Sanitaire
translation: 隔离线

original: Citing the increasing dangers posed by the ideologies to their east and west, the Romanians have announced the formation of the Cordon Sanitaire. The alliance welcomes all who find themselves strangled by fascism and communism in Eastern Europe, and already some countries are considering to join their forces with Romania.
translation: 援引了正在与日俱增的东西方意识形态威胁，罗马尼亚已经宣布组建“隔离线”。这一联盟欢迎所有自觉被东欧的法西斯与共产主义所困的国家，一些国家也已经在考虑与罗马尼亚合作。

original: We are taking charge.
translation: 我们正在成为主导。

original: We stand with Romania.
translation: 我们与罗马尼亚站在一起。

original: This messes with our plans...
translation: 这会搞乱我们的计划……

original: A commendable initiative.
translation: 这一创举值得赞赏。

original: Now who is being hostile?
translation: 现在是谁正在受到敌对？

original: Bulgaria Submits to Romania
translation: 保加利亚向罗马尼亚屈服

original: In response to a Romanian ultimatum, and faced with immediate Romanian military action should they refuse, the Bulgarians have made significant changes to their government to make it more Romania-friendly. Bulgaria has accepted all of their neighbour's demands, and it is unlikely they will refuse further requests. As a result, it can now only be regarded as a Romanian puppet.
translation: 为了应对罗马尼亚的通牒，也面临着一旦拒绝后罗马尼亚可能会采取的军事行动，保加利亚人大幅调整了他们的政府使之与罗马尼亚更为亲近。保加利亚已经接受了其邻国的所有需索，而且他们似乎也不会拒绝进一步的要求。结果是，他们现在只能被看做是罗马尼亚的傀儡。

original: They knew what was best for them.
translation: 他们知道什么最适合自己。

original: A necessary measure...
translation: 一个必要的措施……

original: A troubling development.
translation: 令人不安的发展。

original: Bulgaria Rejects Romanian Demands
translation: 保加利亚拒绝了罗马尼亚的要求

original: Despite having been issued an ultimatum, and being faced with immediate Romanian military action should they refuse, Bulgaria has rejected the Romanian demands. The latter has refused to back down, and both countries seem on a clear path towards military conflict.
translation: 无视了最终通牒与拒绝后会面临的军事行动，保加利亚拒绝了罗马尼亚的要求。后者拒绝让步，两国在通往军事冲突的道路上毫无阻挡。

original: They'll see how wrong they were.
translation: 他们会看到自己错得有多离谱

original: Come and get it!
translation: 来试试看吧！

original: Yet another Balkan War...?
translation: 又一次巴尔干战争……？

original: Yugoslavia Submits to Romania
translation: 南斯拉夫向罗马尼亚屈服

original: Faced with Romanian demands for a 'drastical restructuring' of their state, and the threat of military force if they should refuse, Yugoslavia saw no other course of action than to submit. The announced 'restructuring', however, has not only resulted in the partitioning of Yugoslavia in its constituent states, but has also involved the installation of puppet governments.\n\nIt is clear that predominantly Romanian interests have been served under the pretense of the right of self-determination, and that Romanian influence in the region is continuing to grow.
translation: 面对着罗马尼亚对他们国家进行“大刀阔斧的重组”的要求及拒绝后的武力威胁，南斯拉夫除屈从外没有其他选项。然而，宣告中的“重组”不仅仅导向着对南斯拉夫各成员国的分割，同时也包括了组建傀儡政府。\n\n很显然罗马尼亚假托了民族自决权的名义，暗地里主导的是自己的利益，而罗马尼亚在这一地区的影响力也在日益增长。

original: What a masterstroke!
translation: 真是妙举！

original: How devious.
translation: 套路太深了。

original: Yugoslavia Rejects Romanian Demands
translation: 南斯拉夫拒绝了罗马尼亚的要求

original: Despite being faced with Romanian demands for a 'drastical restructuring' of their state, and the threat of military force if they should refuse, Yugoslavia has rejected the ultimatum. Even though ample pressure was exerted on the country from multiple directions, the Yugoslavs are resolved to defend their nation with tooth and nail. Romania has now declared war, and it is not inconceivable that other nations might partake in a partitioning.
translation: 无视了罗马尼亚对他们国家进行“大刀阔斧的重组”的要求及拒绝后的武力威胁，南斯拉夫拒绝了最后通牒。尽管承受了来自多方施加的大量压力，南斯拉夫决意竭尽全力保卫自己的国家。现在罗马尼亚已经宣战，而其他国家参与肢解也并非难以置信。

original: They asked for it.
translation: 他们自找的。

original: Come and get it!
translation: 来试试看吧！

original: We warned them.
translation: 我们警告过他们。

original: They cannot hope to last long.
translation: 他们不能指望坚持太久。

original: Yugoslavia Partitioned
translation: 肢解南斯拉夫

original: At Romanian instigation, Yugoslavia has been issued an ultimatum calling for a 'restructuring of their state'. Faced with pressure from multiple neighbours at once, the Yugoslavs have seen no alternative but to accept, and a partitioning of the nation is presently under way.
translation: 在罗马尼亚的教唆下，南斯拉夫已经颁布了名为“国家重组”的最终提案。同时面对着来自多个邻国的压力，南斯拉夫除接受外没有其他选择。现在，一次针对这个国家的肢解正在进行中。

original: We have our friends to thank.
translation: 我们要感谢我们的朋友。

original: This was an excellent idea!
translation: 这是一个绝妙的主意！

original: Greedy bastards.
translation: 贪婪的杂种。

original: We know the feeling...
translation: 我们知道这种感觉……

original: Coup in Romania
translation: 罗马尼亚政变

original: As dissatisfaction with the country's leadership has risen to dangerous levels in Romania, Prince Michael has now instigated a coup with the aid of substantial elements of the military. Early reports indicate it is successful, and King Michael has already announced he has assumed the role of head of state, intending to give Romania the leadership it requires.
translation: 在罗马尼亚，由于对国家领导层的不满已经增长到了一个危险的级别，米哈伊王子在军方的大力支持下推动了一场政变。早期报告指出这场政变很成功，米哈伊国王已经宣布自己成为国家元首，并准备给予罗马尼亚所需要的领导力。

original: It is a change for the better.
translation: 这会使情况好转。

original: He seems more... Modest, at least.
translation: 至少，他看起来更……谦逊。

original: King Carol II Abdicates
translation: 卡罗尔二世国王退位

original: Pressured by powerful elements in his government, King Carol II saw no choice but to announce and sign his abdication. His successor is King Michael, but many of the dictatorial powers obtained by Carol have been vested back into the government and so it is unlikely the young King will be able to wield similar power as his predecessor.\n\nFollowing his abdication Carol appears to have emptied his expansive bank accounts and has fled into exile, taking up residence in one of Mexico City's more expensive neighbourhoods with his mistress Magda Lupescu.
translation: 受到来自政府内部有力分子的压力，卡罗尔二世国王除宣布并签署退位诏书外没有其他选择。他的继任者是米哈伊国王，但卡罗尔拥有的许多独裁权力被归还给了政府，因此这位年轻的国王似乎将不能行使与他前任类似的权力。\n\n紧随退位之后，卡罗尔似乎清空了他庞大的银行账户并开始了流亡，与他的情妇玛格达·卢佩斯库一同定居在了墨西哥城的一个富人区。

original: Good riddance.
translation: 终于摆脱了。

original: Amusing.
translation: 有意思。

original: Yugoslavia Claims Bulgaria
translation: 南斯拉夫宣称保加利亚

original: Citing the foundations of their nation as a 'union of the South Slav peoples', Yugoslav rhetoric has recently increasingly argued for the Bulgarian people's membership of this union. Now, this propaganda has taken a drastic new turn as Yugoslavia has outright staked their claim to the Bulgarian region. As both nations ready their forces, war may well erupt at any moment.
translation: 视自己国家的建立为“南斯拉夫诸民族之联盟”，南斯拉夫近来开始越来越多地就保加利亚民族是否是此联盟一员的问题展开雄辩。现在，这一宣传活动产生了急剧的变化：南斯拉夫直截了当地提出了对保加利亚地区的宣称。鉴于两国都已整备好了军队，战争随时都有可能爆发。

original: Yugoslavia for all Slavs!
translation: 全斯拉夫民族的南斯拉夫！

original: We're ready for them!
translation: 我们已经整装待发！

original: The Powderkeg never disappoints.
translation: 火药桶从不使人失望。

original: The Banovina of Croatia
translation: 克罗地亚自治省

original: As a result of continuing and increasing problems with Croatian nationalist elements, the Yugoslav government has been necessitated to grant increased autonomy to the Croatians. A new semi-independent state, the Banovina of Croatia, has been called into being, and though it is still nominally a dependency of Yugoslavia, the government's influence in the region has now been greatly reduced.
translation: 为了应对持续增长的克罗地亚民族主义分子问题，南斯拉夫政府被迫授予克罗地亚人更多的自治权。这一新的半独立国被称作克罗地亚自治省。尽管其名义上仍属于南斯拉夫，但政府在这一地区的影响力已被大幅削减了。

original: It was necessary.
translation: 这是必要的。

original: Long live Croatia!
translation: 克罗地亚万岁！

original: The start of a Yugoslav collapse?
translation: 南斯拉夫崩溃的开始？

original: Yugoslavia Claims Macedonia
translation: 南斯拉夫宣称马其顿

original: With the aim of unifying the Macedonian peoples, Yugoslavia has announced that it now considers Central Macedonia an integral part of the Yugoslav nation. To back up their claim, divisions have been poised at the border, and the threat of a new military conflict looms over the region.
translation: 为了统一马其顿民族，南斯拉夫已经宣布他们现在视马其顿中部为南斯拉夫国家不可分割的一部分。作为其宣称的后盾，数支部队已被部署在边境，一次新的军事冲突的威胁正在这一地区显现。

original: All South Slavs are one!
translation: 所有的南斯拉夫民族是一个整体！

original: They're welcome to try!
translation: 欢迎他们来试试！

original: Troubling developments.
translation: 令人不安的发展。

original: Yugoslavia Claims Italian Border
translation: 南斯拉夫宣称意大利边境

original: The Yugoslav government has recently increasingly spoken out against the Italian treatment of Slav minorities in the border regions of Istria and Zara. Today it announced that it considers these regions, taken by Italy after the Great War and predominantly populated by ethnic Slavs, to be an integral part of the Yugoslav nation Furthermore, to safeguard the rights of the inhabitants of these regions, the Yugoslavs have indicated that they will not shy away from use of military force.
translation: 南斯拉夫政府近来越来越多地公然对抗意大利，抗议其对待边境地区伊斯特里亚和扎拉的斯拉夫少数民族的态度。今天，南斯拉夫宣布，这些意大利于世界大战后获取、主要由斯拉夫人聚居的地区，已被其视作南斯拉夫国家不可分割的一部分。此外，为了保护这些地区居民的安全，南斯拉夫表示他们不会回避诉诸武力。

original: Only in our nation will they be safe.
translation: 只有在我们的国家内才能保障他们的安全。

original: We'll squash them if they try!
translation: 只要他们敢来，我们会捏爆他们！

original: Another conflict is brewing.
translation: 又一次冲突正在酝酿。

original: Yugoslavia Recognizes Soviet Union
translation: 南斯拉夫承认苏维埃联盟

original: Yugoslavia, even more stoically than other nations, has for years refused to recognize the communist state that is the Soviet Union. With today's announcement that the government of Yugoslavia will henceforth establish official relations with the Soviets, this policy has at last come to an end. Whether this means an opening of the Yugoslav state to communist influence remains to be seen, but the tone of the announcement was surprisingly cordial.
translation: 数年间，南斯拉夫一直拒绝承认苏联这一共产主义国家，态度甚至比其他国家更为顽固。随着南斯拉夫政府今天宣布此后将与苏联正式建交，这一方针最终也迎来结束。判断这是否意味着南斯拉夫开始受共产主义影响尚需时日，但这一宣告的语气出人意表地充满热忱。

original: They have some interesting ideas.
translation: 他们有些有趣的主意。

original: We will show them to the Revolution.
translation: 我们会引领他们走向革命。

original: The Soviet influence spreads...
translation: 苏维埃的影响开始扩散了……

original: The Pan-Slavic Worker's Congress
translation: 泛斯拉夫工人大会

original: Disagreeing with fundamental aspects of Soviet communism, the Yugoslavs have taken their own approach to the ideology. Rather than be a member of the Comintern, the Yugoslav government has announced that they aim to lead the Southern Slavs in their fight for the rights of the worker. It is likely that they will soon attempt to bring their neighbours into the fold, a move that could seriously upset the balance of power in the region.
translation: 并未认同苏联的共产主义基础纲领，南斯拉夫人尝试了发展自己的意识形态。并未选择成为第三国际的成员，南斯拉夫政府已经宣布他们计划自己领导南斯拉夫人，为工人的权利而奋斗。看起来他们似乎很快就会开始尝试把他们的邻国拉进来，这一举动将严重颠覆这一地区的力量平衡。

original: We will lead our fellow Slavs!
translation: 我们将领导斯拉夫同胞！

original: The insolent little upstarts!
translation: 这群粗野的暴发户！

original: Interesting...
translation: 有趣……

original: Perhaps this brings stability?
translation: 或许这会带来稳定？

original: Excellent.
translation: 好极了。

original: Unfortunate.
translation: 真是不幸。

original: Draft Dodging
translation: 应征公民逃脱兵役

original: A new report by the War Office shows a marked reduction in available manpower. It appears that the latest batch of recruits is much smaller than initially expected. The discrepacy is currently under investigation, but first leads point towards a large number of people who are technically fit for service managing to avoid the draft through various means. 18 year old students are suddenly skilled workers employed in critical war industry, former athletes fail their fitness tests and in some cases, recruits have simply vanished without a trace.\n\nWhen people are caught and interrogated, they point towards the poor conditions in the army, the indifferent officers and not wanting to die for a lost cause. Military leaders demand a harsh crackdown on people avoiding the draft, but many in the government believe that improving the living conditions of enlisted soldiers might be the better approach.
translation: 陆军部的最新报告显示我国可征召人口数量明显下降。看来最近的新兵数量会比预期少很多。在对于出现征兵缺口的调查中，我们突然发现有许多完全符合征兵要求的人在用各种方式逃避服役。18岁的学生忽然就成为了重要兵工厂的熟练工人，以前很健壮的运动员因为种种原因没有通过体测，甚至还有一些已经入伍的新兵莫名其妙的消失了。\n\n当逃兵被逮捕并审讯时，他们指出军队内部的恶劣条件、冷酷无情的军官以及他们都不希望为注定失败的事业而死的心声。军方领导人要求对拒服兵役者进行严格的惩戒，但政府中的很多人认为改善军队内部环境才是更好的办法。

original: The ineffective official response to the widespread avoidance of the draft has only made the problem worse. More and more recruits never show up after receiving their drafting letter. Counter-Intelligence has intercepted a professionally made pamphlet advising people on how to avoid the draft, suggesting things like bribing doctors to certify the recruit to be medically unfit. Exceptions for family fathers have led to war widows with children finding themselves mobbed with marriage proposals while the number of people applying for exceptions for ethical reasons have hit record numbers.\n\nMilitary leaders have suggested eliminating the last few exceptions and make examples out of a few shirkers that have been caught. Others in the government have suggested that we should appeal to the sense of civic duty in our citizens and point out the consequences of a defeat in this war.
translation: 对于大面积逃离兵役的行为，无效的官方措施导致问题雪上加霜。越来越多的新兵在收到征兵信后就人间蒸发了。而就在最近，反间谍机构截获了一种经过专业制作的小册子，里面的内容是教会人们如何逃服兵役，比如说贿赂医生来证明身体不够服兵役等。许多带着孩子的战争寡妇都在近期收到了很多求婚信，就是因为很多人想钻当父亲就可以免服兵役的政策空子来逃兵役。\n\n军方领导人建议我们取消这些政策，并拿几个被抓到的拒服兵役者来杀鸡儆猴。但政府里的其他人建议我们用各种方式来重新唤起人民的公民责任心，并告诫全体人民战争失败的后果。

original: With government responses to draft dodging having no positive effects whatsoever, more and more people have started to wonder why they should put themselves at risk while others stay in safety. Recruits that do turn up often report being harrassed or ridiculed in the streets as fools fighting for a doomed cause. Reports of mothers forbidding their children from answering the draft order are everywhere, and the War Office has submitted a report claiming that they are no longer sure how many people they are supposed to draft, as their bureaucracy has started to break down under the strain of processing all those missing soldiers.
translation: 由于政府制止逃兵役行为的措施并没有产生任何积极效果，越来越多的人开始思考为什么他们要置自己的生死于度外来保全其他人。很多新兵在大街上被其他人嘲笑，因为许多群众都认为士兵们是在为一个渺茫的目标而奋斗的傻瓜。关于母亲禁止她的孩子去响应征兵法案的报道比比皆是。而陆军部也在报道中坦白，因为他们的各个机构为处理军队里的逃兵都已经焦头烂额，所以他们也不知道还应该征多少人。

original: Nothing can be done about it.
translation: 那将一事无成。

original: We should arrest anyone found evading the draft!
translation: 我们应该逮捕所有拒服兵役的懦夫。

original: A pay rise for the enlisted soldiers is perhaps in order.
translation: 新兵的工资或许应该被增加。

original: It is time for harsher measures.
translation: 是时候采取更严厉的措施了。

original: Appeal to the people's sense of civic duty.
translation: 唤醒人民的公民责任感。

original: We must make an example.
translation: 杀鸡儆猴

original: We must give the people something to fight for.
translation: 我们必须给我们的人民一个能为之奋斗的目标。

original: Strikes!
translation: 罢工！

original: Production in several factories has slowed down dramatically over the last few days as the workers have declared a strike on all war production. Demanding "Peace and Bread!", they have so far refused all attempts to negotiate a settlement. Some in the government have advocated a sharp military response, followed by a swift execution of the ringleaders as enemy agents and traitors. However, others in the civil service have recommended a more measured approach, pointing out that a heavy-handed response may well backfire if the soldiers involved are not as loyal as we thought they were.
translation: 在过去的几天里，由于工人们宣布在所有军工工厂里进行罢工，我们的军用品产量在急剧下降。他们不仅在到处喊着“和平与面包”的口号，而且从开始到现在他们还拒绝以谈判来解决问题。政府里的一些人建议用军事手段来阻止罢工，然后以敌方代言人和叛徒的名义迅速处决掉工人领袖。然而，其他的议员则希望政府使用一种更加慎重和保险的方法，他们指出，如果我们的士兵没有我们想像中的那么忠诚，那么对工人运动的强硬举措只会适得其反。

original: Government efforts to convince the strikers to return to work seem to have had no effect whatsoever. On the contrary, strikes have been reported in further factories, and the last few hold outs in the originally affected work sites have also put down their tools after facing the anger of their colleagues. While stockpiles have so far been able to cushion the blow to front line supplies somewhat, it is only a question of time before the production outages start to affect our ability to prosecute the war.\n\nThe War Office has again urged the government to take an unyielding line with the strikers, but other factions inside the administration have suggested that offering to meet the workers half-way may be enough to convince them to return to work.
translation: 政府试图说服罢工者返回工作岗位的努力毫无效果。相反，在报告中罢工者还在准备进一步的罢工，原本仅存的还在工作岗位上的工人也在他们愤怒的同事的鼓动下放下了工作来参与到罢工里面。虽然到目前为止，政府的石油储备仍然可以对前线物资紧缺产生一些缓冲作用，但是罢工迟早会开始削弱我们的战争潜力。\n\n陆军部再次督促我们对罢工者采取强硬措施，但是政府里面的其他人认为增加一半的工资就可以让工人们乖乖回岗工作，而不用付诸于武力。

original:
What started as industrial action in a few isolated places has now spread across the entire country, affecting even industries that are only connected to the war effort in tertiary ways. Even the workings of the government itself have become affected, as many low level clerks, messengers, and drivers have refused to show up to work in increasing numbers. 

In many places, worker councils have taken over the factory buildings. Reports from the secret police indicate that some places seem to have started production of weapons again - for a major uprising against what is being called "The War Regime".

Military High Command believes that decisive action by loyal troops could still win the day, while the civilian side of the government argues that this risks a civil war and certain defeat.
translation:
工人们在国内一些边远地区也开始了罢工活动，这场罢工甚至还发生在了一些独立的军工企业中。哪怕是政府自身的运行也开始受到罢工的影响，许多的职员、司机与邮差，都拒绝在数量越来越多的抗议者面前工作。

在很多地方，工人委员会都接管了厂房。来自我们秘密警察的报告显示，有部分武器工厂的武器生产线又重新开始工作了——但这些武器是为推翻所谓的“好战政权”所准备的。

军队里面的高级指挥官们认为，由忠诚的部队果断地进行一次行动可以有很大成效，而文职人员则认为这会引起国内的内战。

original: This will blow over.
translation: 这终将平息。

original: Make a demonstration of military force in the towns.
translation: 把军队派遣到小镇里去。

original: Make propaganda heroes out of the people still willing to work.
translation: 把那些仍然在工作的人宣传成英雄！

original: Draft the workers into military service and put the factories under military control.
translation: 把那些工人征入军队，再把工厂置于军事管制下。

original: Offer to increase the food rations of workers.
translation: 提议增加工人们的食物配给份额。

original: Send in the troops, arrest the strikers, execute the ringleaders.
translation: 派遣部队，逮捕暴民，处决头目！

original: Propose new welfare legislation.
translation: 提出新的福利法。

original: Mutinies in the Army
translation: 军队内乱

original: Alarming news have reach Military High Command about a number of units in our Army refusing orders from superior officers. While none of the units have left their position in the line, representatives of the soldiers have made it quite clear that they will not obey any orders to attack the enemy.\n\nThe rebellion has so far been contained to a small number of battalions and a handful of training and support units, but many in the War Office fear that this uprising will soon spread to other units and may eventually render us unable to continue the war. Decisive action is needed.
translation: 最高军事统帅部收到了一条令人震惊的消息，有很多的部队拒绝服从他们上级军官的命令。虽然他们没有抛弃自己的阵地，但是士兵们已经明确地表示拒绝服从任何针对敌人的进攻命令。\n\n到目前为止，叛乱已经被控制在少数几个营和若干训练与支援单位里面，但是陆军部里的很多人担心这场叛乱会波及到其它部队并使得我们无法继续这场战争。必须要进行一场果断的行动了。

original: Efforts to address the mutinies in the army have shown no effect. Emboldened by the lack of effective government response, the muntineers have expanded their list of demands to include an immediate cease-fire followed by a comprehensive peace treaty and demobilization.\n\nThe War Office strongly recommends that we send a strong signal to the mutineers to deter any further action on their part.
translation: 解决军队叛乱问题的努力毫无作用。由于政府缺乏有效的应对措施，哗变的军人们增加了他们的要求，包括立即停火、与敌人达成全面和平条约和马上遣返他们回家。\n\n陆军部建议我们立即向叛军表现出强硬态度的信号，以此来阻止他们采取进一步行动。

original: With the government evidently unwilling or unable to address their issues, the mutineers have decided to take measures into their own hands. Elections for "Worker and Soldier Councils" have been announced, with the express goal of taking over the country and making peace with the enemy.\n\nUnless action is taken swiftly, these councils may very well end up replacing our government in some areas of the country and render us unable to continue the war.
translation: 由于政府不愿意或者说无法满足他们的要求，叛军们决定采取措施。他们成立了“工人与士兵委员会”，并向所有人宣布他们的目标是全面接管国家政权并与我们的敌人立即签署和平条约。\n\n如果我们不立即采取紧急措施，这个委员会很可能在国内的一些地方取代我们的政府并使我们没有能力继续这场战争。

original: We can't do anything about that now.
translation: 我们无能为力。

original: Surround the mutinious units with loyalists and order them to stand down.
translation: 把那些叛变部队包围起来并命令他们投降。

original: Hold a patriotic speech before the mutineers.
translation: 在叛军面前展开爱国主义演说。

original: Publically announce that anyone found supporting the mutineers will be charged with treason.
translation: 公开宣布所有支持叛军的人都将被指控叛国！

original: Announce a peace initiative. Make sure it is unacceptable to the enemy.
translation: 发表和平声明。一定要保证敌人可以接受。

original: Mobilize loyalist militias and arrest all soldiers not at their duty stations.
translation: 动用忠诚的义勇军来逮捕所有擅离职守的士兵。

original: Offer the soldiers to permit them to elect their own officers.
translation: 给予士兵权力来选择他们自己的长官。

original: This will take about §Y15 days§! to implement.\n
translation: 这会花费§Y十五天§! 来落实。\n

original: This will take about §Y30 days§! to implement.\n
translation: 这会花费§Y三十天§! 来落实。\n

original: This will take about §Y45 days§! to implement.\n
translation: 这会花费§Y四十五天§! 来落实。\n

original: Military Crackdown succeeds
translation: 军事镇压成功

original: Our swift response has proven very effective. Military police units, supported by local law enforcement and patriotic volunteers, swarmed out in a well-coordinated operation to visit every missing draftee. Most were willing to answer the call when they were informed of the consequences of failing to report for duty. Military High Command has publically declared that anyone who showed up at their duty station will not be charged with any crime or punished for failing to do so in the past. Still, a number of people have categorically refused to take up arms for their country and have been arrested.
translation: 我们的快速反应行动被证明是正确而有效的。在当地执法人员和爱国志愿军的帮助下，大量的宪兵在精心的协调下蜂拥而至，以此来视察每一个被征入伍的新兵。大多数的新兵在知道拒服兵役的后果后都决定去军队报道来履行他们的义务。军队总指挥部宣布，从现在开始，对重新回到军队履行义务的人，他们以往的逃兵役行为将既往不咎。尽管如此，仍有一些人拒绝拿起武器，保家卫国，他们都已经被宪兵队所逮捕。

original: Decisive action prevented worse.
translation: 果断的行动阻止了事态恶化。

original: Draft Riots
translation: 征兵暴乱

original: Our attempts at resolving the situation through military force have not been met with success. It appears that someone in our administration has leaked our planned operation to the public, which responded quickly. When military police and other law enforcement agencies tried to apprehend known draft dodgers, they found their way blocked by angry mobs, demanding an end to the war and to forced conscription. In several cases, street battles erupted between the police and the protesters, leading to a number of fatalities when the soldiers were forced to use their weapons to defend themselves. It took several hours until the police gained full control over the situation.\n\nAn ugly mood has settled over the capital as the barricades are cleared away and the dead are buried. Reports from the War Office show no change in the number of recruits reporting for duty. Many in the government wonder how much longer we can continue fighting under these circumstances.
translation: 我们通过军事力量来控制局势的努力没有获得成功。看来政府内部有人把计划提前泄露给了公众，并使得他们很快做出了反应。当宪兵队准备去逮捕名单上的逃兵时，他们的道路被愤怒的暴徒所阻拦，那些人要求停止征兵并结束战争。在几场冲突中，宪兵和暴徒在街道上爆发了冲突，其中有几次宪兵们不得不使用武器进行自卫，但这造成了一些伤亡。赶来的警察花了好几个小时才控制形势。\n\n在死者被埋葬，壁垒被清除后，一种令人厌恶的气氛笼罩着我们的首都。陆军部的报道显示前来报道的新兵人数没有任何变化。就连政府里的很多人都在想，在这种内忧外患的情况下我们还能坚持多久。

original: The situation has not necessarily developed to our advantage.
translation: 形势发展对我们并不有利。

original: The Conscription Rebellion
translation: 征兵暴乱

original: Our attempts at resolving the situation through military force have not been met with success. It appears that someone in our administration has leaked our planned operation to the public, which responded quickly. When military police and other law enforcement agencies tried to apprehend known draft dodgers, they found their way blocked by angry mobs, demanding an end to the war and to forced conscription. In several cases, street battles erupted between the police and the protesters, leading to a number of fatalities when the soldiers were forced to use their weapons to defend themselves. \n\nThe situation quickly spiralled out of control after that, as citizens rushed the soldiers and stormed police stations to arm themselves. Several cities in the country are now in a state of armed insurrection against the government. Ironically, the rebels seem to have no issues finding soldiers willing to take up arms.
translation: 我们通过军事力量来控制局势的努力没有获得成功。看来政府内部有人把计划提前泄露给了公众，并使得他们很快做出了反应。当宪兵队准备去逮捕名单上的逃兵时，他们的道路被愤怒的暴徒所阻拦，那些人要求停止征兵并结束战争。在几场冲突中，宪兵和暴徒在街道上爆发了冲突，其中有几次宪兵们不得不使用武器进行自卫，但这造成了一些伤亡。\n\n在那之后情况迅速失控，市民们开始冲向士兵和警察局并以此来武装自己。国内有几个城市已经被叛军所控制并反对现政府。讽刺的是，叛军并没有碰到无人愿意入伍的情况。

original: Oh, so NOW they want to fight!?
translation: 哦，所以他们现在就想来战个痛！？

original: Draft Reform proves effective
translation: 改革方案被证明有效

original: The social measures passed by the government as part of a larger process of reforming the military recruitment policy have proven surprisingly popular. Higher pay and more frequent leave are often cited as the biggest new benefits, but many also point to the new government programs to support war widows and orphans. Fewer and fewer men can justify refusing their country's call to the colors, and public support for draft-dodgers has all but disappeared.\n\nIndeed, there has been a recent upswing in public support for the government as more and more people realize that the [ROOT.GetAdjective] way of life is under attack.
translation: 作为整顿武装部队征兵政策的全面改革的一部分，政府前期通过的阶段化社会改革措施，出乎意料地受到社会欢迎。更高的工资和更频繁的休假被认为是士兵福利改革方面的一项大动作，人们也发现新福利政策也提高了对战争寡妇与战争孤儿的补助。越来越少的人可以找到正当化理由来拒绝国家的征兵，公众舆论对拒服兵役的人的同情也逐渐消失。\n\n事实上，当人们真正意识到[ROOT.GetAdjective]生活方式已经受到攻击时，他们对于政府的支持率就已经开始提升了。

original: A wise decision.
translation: 一个明智的决定。

original: The 591. Penal Battalion
translation: 第591惩戒营

original: Seeing the severity of the situation, the Military High Command has decided that more drastic measures are required to show that evading one's civic duty to defend their country will not be tolerated. At dawn, military police raided the homes of a number of carefully selected, well known and connected people who have used their influence to allow others to avoid the draft. Still in their nightgowns, they have found themselves conscripted into the military and escorted to the barracks under armed guard, where they will be formed up into a separate unit, to avoid their subversive influence from spreading to other units. \n\nThe news of this has spread quickly, and it appears that most people who until now believed that they could get away with ignoring their draft notice have changed their mind. Recruitment stations across the country report that a growing number of people have come by to ask what exactly the consequences would be if a "friend" of theirs who had attempted to avoid the draft would turn themselves in.
translation: 鉴于现在局势的严峻程度，最高指挥部决定要在国内采取更加严厉的措施，以此来表明军队对逃兵役行为的零容忍态度。今日黎明时分，宪兵队有计划地突袭了一些知名人士的豪宅，这些所谓社会名流利用他们的人脉和影响力使得某些人逃避兵役法案。他们被捕时还穿着睡袍，被全副武装的宪兵拉入军营强制服役，为了避免他们的恶劣行为影响其它部队，总指挥部把他们编成了一个独立的部队。\n\n这一消息很快就在人群当中传开了，这打消了很多人想要浑水摸鱼逃兵役的打算。全国各地的征兵站报道说，很多的人都来打探如果他们的“朋友”逃兵役的下场会是什么。

original: They may yet redeem themselves.
translation: 他们也许还可以将功补过。

original: Local Elites Voice Their Protest
translation: 地方精英表示抗议

original: Seeing the severity of the situation, the Military High Command has decided that more drastic measures are required to show that evading one's civic duty to defend their country will not be tolerated. At dawn, military police raided the homes of a number of carefully selected, well known and connected people who have used their influence to allow others to avoid the draft. Still in their nightgowns, they have found themselves conscripted into the military. Their families have mobilized their extensive support networks to protest this descision. The War Office has been flooded with calls and letters from simple workers who want their factory manager back to undersecretaries in various other ministeries, demanding to know why people working in fields critical to the war effort have been removed from their work. It appears that even some cabinet members have second thoughts about the war - perhaps fearing for the safety of their own sons.
translation: 鉴于现在局势的严峻程度，最高指挥部决定要在国内采取更加严厉的措施，以此来表明军队对逃兵役行为的零容忍态度。今日黎明时分，宪兵队有计划地突袭了一些知名人士的豪宅，这些所谓社会名流利用他们的人脉和影响力使得某些人逃避兵役法案。他们被捕时还穿着睡袍，被全副武装的宪兵拉入军营强制服役。但是他们的家人动用了长期以来建立的人脉来抗议我们的行为。陆军部里充斥着普通工人的请愿信，他们希望他们的工厂主管可以回到工作岗位，还询问我们为什么在战争的关键时刻逮捕关键军事生产领域的领导人。有很多的内阁成员也开始对我们的行动表示不满——因为被抓的人都是他们的儿子们。

original: Have they no sense of duty?
translation: 他们都没有责任感吗？

original: A Somber and Sacred Duty
translation: “一个严肃而又神圣的职责”

original: Of course I want to live. I want to go and finish school, I want to meet girls, I want to start a family - but if we lose this war, I won't be able to do these things, either. So I fight."\n\nThe letter, sent anonymously to every major newspaper in the country, has made huge waves. Claiming to be from a soldier who at first tried to avoid the draft, but then realized that he must fight to save his country, it has apparently struck a nerve with many others who felt similarly. Draft boards across the country report that the number of people who still refuse to answer their summons has been more than made up for by new volunteers who will no longer wait until they are called, while others go and fight to save their country and their way of life.
translation: “我当然想活下去。我还想完成我的学业，我想和我的女孩天天见面，我想组建一个新的幸福家庭——但是如果我们输掉了这场战争，我们将失去一切。所以我选择战斗！”\n\n这封寄给全国各大报社的匿名信一经报道便引起了轩然大波。这个自称是一个士兵，而且曾是企图逃服兵役的人，他用这封信表示已经意识到他必须为了自己的国家而战，这也触动了很多与他有过相同经历的人的心弦。全国委员会报告称，仍然拒绝回应国家的召唤的人数已经超过了新的志愿兵们，但是其它人已经下定决心准备为拯救国家和他们自己的生活方式而战。

original: We will not let their lives be spent in vain.
translation: 我们不会让他们的牺牲付之东流。

original: The end of a coward
translation: 懦夫的结局

original: They led him to the wall at the break of dawn. He refused a last cigarette, but accepted the blindfold. His last words were an apology to his mother for causing her so much pain. The firing squad aimed well. A few minutes later, the doctor present declared him dead."\n\nWhile unable to catch all people who have been evading the draft, authorities have been able to make a number of arrests. Given the grave situation we are in, the War Office has decided that these men be tried under military law for failing to report to duty. The first series of death sentences has been handed down and the condemned have been excuted by firing squad. These measures have evidently had the desired effect.
